NVTṬ_1,1.0.1	viśva vyāpī viśva śaktiḥ pinākī viśveśānaḥ viśva kṛt viśvamūrttiḥ viśvajñātā viśva saṃhāra kārī viśvārādhyaḥ rādhayatu īhitam naḥ nāmāmi dharma vijñāna vairāgya aiśvarya śāline nidhaye vāc viśuddhīnām akṣapā ādāya tāyine grantha vyākhyā= chalena eva nirasta akhila dūṣaṇāḥ nyāyavārttika tātparyaṭīka asmābhiḥ vidhāsyate icchāmi kim api puṇyam dustara kunibandha paṅka magnānām uddyota kara gavīnām ati jaratīnām samuddharaṇāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.1–1,1.1.2^1	 atha bhagavatā akṣapādena niḥśreyasa hetau śāstre praṇīte vyutpādite ca bhagavatā pakṣila svāminā kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham vārttika ārambhaḥ iti śaṅkām nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtra ākāra ukta aśa astra prayojana anuvāda pūrvakam vārttikā ārambha prayojanam darśayati yat akṣapādaḥ iti yadi api bhāṣya kṛtā kṛta vyutpādanam etat tathā api dignāga prabhṛtibhiḥ arvācīnaiḥ kṛhetu santam asa samutthāpanena acchaditam śāstram na tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam iti uddyota kareṇa sva nibandha uddyotena tat apanīyate iti prayojanavān ārambhaḥ iti sūtra ukta prayojana anuvādaḥ ca prayojana vat śāstra vyutpādanena sva nibandhasya prayojanavat tām prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgam darśayitum vyutpādana mātrasya ca kāka danta parīkṣā grantha sādha araṇyena prekṣāvat pravṛtti anaṅga tvāt atra ca eka viśati prabheda bhinnasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ tasmai kasya jagataḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.2^2–1,1.1.3	 parama kārūṇikaḥ hi bhagavān muniḥ jagat eva duḥkha paṅka magnām uddidhīrṣuḥ śāstram praṇītavān tatra yadi kaścid na pravarteta kim āyātam śāstrasya na ca anadhikṛta puruṣa vyutpādanena asya tapaḥ nidheḥ kaścid asti doṣaḥ tathā ca viśvāmitrāḥ triśaṅkum yājayāmāsa viśaṣṭhaḥ cadhama yoni jām akṣa mālām upayeme tapaḥ prabhāvaḥ eva hi tāddaśaḥ teṣām yatas evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmānaḥ vilīyante iti na ca asmad ādīnām manda tapasā mayam prasaṅgaḥ na hi gajānām udaryam tejaḥ vaṭa kāṣṭham aśitam pacati iti asmad ādīnām api udaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam ku tārkikaiḥ dignāga prabhutibhiḥ āhitam ajñānam kutārkikā jñānam iti avigīta śiṣṭa ācāra parampara prāptaḥ parama śiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛtaḥ api iṣṭadevatā namaskāraḥ na śāstre niveśitaḥ na khalu anyat api maṅgalyam śāstre niveśitam prasiddhatara tayā tu maṅgalya antara vat śiṣyāḥ avagabhiṣyanti iti sarvam avadātam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.4^1	 tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathama sūtram anūdya tasya tātparyam āha pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti etat śāstrasya ādi sūtram tasya śāstrasya abhisaṃbandha vākyam ādi grahaṇena krama prāptasya eva prathamam vyākhyānam yuktam na dvitīya ādeḥ iti darśitam abhimataḥ saṃbandhaḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ śāstra niḥśreyasayoḥ hetu hetumat bhāvaḥ tasya idam sūtrā vākyam ābhisaṃbandha vākyam pramāṇa ādi padārtha ta tva jñānāt iti atra hi jñāyate anena iti jñānam iti vyutpatyā tatva jñānam śāstram ucyate pañcamyā ca tasya hetu tvam na hi viṣa ghna mantra vat sva rūpa mātreṇa tad avivakṣita artham niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti padārtha tatva avagama karaṇa tayā śāstram apadiśati na tu svarūpeṇa tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇa āditatva avagamaḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ ita yuktam bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.4^2	 tathā ca pramāṇa ādi padārthata tvam pratipadyam pratipādakam ca śāstram iti śāstra pramāṇa ādi padārtha ta tvayoḥ jñāpyajñāpaka bhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa ādi padārtha ta tva jñāna niḥśreyasayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ sūcitaḥ bhavati tat idam abhigheya saṃbandha prayojana pratipādana artha tvam prathama sūtrasya pad padārtha tattva jñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasa adhigamam pratyupayogaḥ tathā agre nivedayiṣyate viniścita āpta bhāvaḥ ca muneḥ āpta tvena tad vākyāt prayojana ādi viniścitya pravartsyanti āpta tva aviniścaye tu artha saṃśayāt na khalu kṛṣi ādau= api viriścita sasya ādi adhigamānām pravṛttiḥ antarā avagraha ādi pratibandhena phala anutpādasya api nyāya prāpta tvena tat abhidhānam anarthakam iti sāmpratam viśeṣa smṛti anapekṣasya saṃśayasya anutpādāt vākyāt tu viśeṣasmṛtiḥ iti na ānarthakyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.5	 tat evam prathama sūtra tātparyam uktvā bhāṣyasya ādi vākya tāt paryam āha pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau= iti evamādi tasya anusandhāna vākyam tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasa adhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya kutaścid nimittāt vighaṭana śaṅkāyām anu sūtra ghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanam ghaṭanam anusandhānam tasya vākyam anusandhāna vākyam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.6^1	 evam kila atra śaṅkyate yat aśakya anuṣṭhāna upāya upadeśakam tad anarthakam yathā jvahara takṣaka cūḍāranta alaṅkāra upadeśakam vacanam tādṛśam ceda śāstram iti tathā hi prameya ādīnām tāvat padārthānām tattva jñānam pramāṇa tattva jñāna adhīnam na hi pramāṇam tattvena anavadhāritam bodhaka tva mātraṇa sva gocara avadhāraṇāya alam tāvat mātrasya tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇyāt api tu bodha katvā eka artha samavetena avyabhicāri tvena tat eva hi pramāṇyam tat ca aśakya avadhāraṇam tad anavadhāraṇāt ca prameya ādayaḥ duravadhāraṇāḥ tathā hi vijñānaḥ ca tāvat prāmāṇyam svatas vā niścīyate paratas vā na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.6^2	 na khalu vijñāna māna ātma saṃvedanam ātmānam api gṛhṇīyāt prāgava tad prāmāṇaṇyam na api vijñāna antaram tat vijñānam iti ava gṛhṇīyāt na punar asya avi abhicāri tvem jñāna tva mātram ca tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇam iti na svatas prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam etena sva saṃvedana naye api avyabhicāra grahaṇam pratyuktam na api paratas param hi tad gocaram vā jñānam abhyupeyeta artha kriyā nirbhāsam vā jñānam tad gocarana āntarīyaka artha antara darśanam vā tat ca sarvam svatas anavadhārita prāmāṇyam ākulam sat katham pūrvam pravartakam jñānam anākulayet svatas vā asya prāmāṇye kim aparāddham pravatāka jñānena yena tasmin= api tat na syāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.6^3	 na ca prāmāṇyam jñāyate svatas iti āveditam yadā ca saṃvedana prāmāṇyam aktena krameṇa duradhigamam tadā kā eva kathā indriya ādīnām avyabhicāri saṃvedana kārya vyaṅgya pramāṇa bhāvānām tat eva dṛṣṭa arthāḥ pramāṇa bhṛtām vyavahārāḥ bhavantu sandehāt api yathā tathā adṛṣṭa arthāḥ tu bahu vitta vyāya āyāsa sādhyā vaidikā vyavahārā datta jalāḥ jalayaḥ prasaktāḥ tasmāt pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñāpana dvāreṇa na śāstram niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyate iti sā iyam āśaṅkā prāmāṇya jñāna upāya kathanena ādi vākyena bhāṣya kṛtā nirākṛtāḥ tathā hi pramāṇam arthavat iti nitya yoge matubh nitya tā ca avyabhicāritā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.6^4	 tena artha avyabhicāri iti arthaḥ iyam eva ca artha avyabhicāritā pramāṇasya yad deśa kāla nara avastha antara avisaṃvādaḥ artha svarūpa prakārayoḥ tad upadarśitayoḥ atra hetuḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyāt samartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt yadi punar etad arthavat na abhaviṣyat na samartha pravṛttim akariśyat yathā pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ iti vyatirekī hetuḥ anvaya vyatirekī vā anumānasya svatas pramāṇa tayā anvayasya api saṃbhavāt pravṛtti janaka tvam tu pramāṇasya na sākṣāt kim tu artha pratipatti janana dvāreṇa iti āha pramāṇataḥ artha grati pattau= iti sarvasya ca asya upapattim vārtti kavya ākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyāmaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.7^1	 syāt etat bhavantu pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ śakya jñānāḥ śāstreṇa tu te na abhidhīyante iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasya itu atas āha śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvāt yadi api śreyaḥ duḥkha nivṛttim ātyantikīm vakṣyati tathā api sa upāyā eva sā atra śreyaḥ śabdena vivakṣitā tanmātrasya śāstra aviṣaya tvāt tat ayam arthaḥ śāstram tāvat etat puruṣa śreyaḥ saha upāyena abhidhattaḥ iti anubhava siddha sat aśakyā anuṣṭhāna tayā apavaditavyam sā ced aśakyā anuṣṭhāna tāpanītā pramāṇataḥ ityādinā saṃhitam niḥśreyasena saha śāstram iti śāstrasya ityādi grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇoti śāstram punar ityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇa iti antena 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.7^2	 pramāṇa ādi vācaka pada grahaṇena tad lakṣaṇāni ca tad parīkṣā aśva upalakṣayati tathā ca pañca adhyāyī śāstram iti aṅktam iti avirodhaḥ pañca adhyāci iti anena vyūhaḥ samūhinām ucita ānupūrvī upalakṣaka pada svarūpam āha padam punar ita ema smṛti samārūḍhāḥ varṇāḥ eka artha pratipādana avacchinnāḥ samūhaḥ evam sva artha smṛti avāntara vyāpārāṇām sūtrapadānām nānā padārtha viśiṣṭa eka padārtha rūpa vākya artha pratyāyana kārya avacchinnānām samūhaḥ veditavyaḥ evam ca kvacid kenacid arthena ekena sūtra vākyānām eka vākya tvam samūhaḥ prakaraṇam prakaraṇānām api kayācid sva artha saṃgatyā samūhaḥ āhnikam evam tatra tatra veditavyam etāḥ ca prakaraṇa āhnika adhyāya artha saṃgatīḥ tatra tatra leśataḥ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.8	 tat evam śāstra svarūpam darṃśayitvā na antareṇa tad artha kathanam puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvam asrū sidhyiti iti tad artham kathayati tad padārthāḥ iti nanu pramāṇa ādīnām pratinaram ānantyena durjñāna tvam iti tad avastham eva ānarthakyam śāstrasya prasaktam iti atas āha ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇa ādīnām pramāṇa tva ādi sāmānya viśeṣaḥ iti yāvat etat uktam bhavati āntar gaṇika bhedāt ānantye api sva sāmānya viśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ na durjñānāḥ iti yatas asya padārthāḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ tat tasmāt śāstram puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhatte 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^1	 syāt etat pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ prāmāṇikāḥ aprāmāṇikāḥ vā aprāmāṇika tve kalpanā mātra nirmitāḥ katham niḥśreyasāya kalpante na yaḥ ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ kalpanāḥ kośasya ananta prasara tvāt prāmāṇika tve vā pramāṇāt eva tad siddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyam iti atas āha pratyakṣā iti pratyakṣa anumāna adhigata grahaṇena aprāmāṇika tvam niṣiddham atas eva vastu tattvam iti pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ na upamāna viṣayāḥ iti na upamānam upanyastam yadi api prameyam ātma ādi apavarga anta lakṣaṇam āgamikam tathā api āgamasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā tatra api mūla bhūtam anumānam pratyakṣam vā asti iti pratyakṣa anumāne eva darśite nanu uktam prāmāṇika tve śāstra vaiyarthyam iti atas āha tasya viṣayaḥ iti vyavaharamāṇāḥ api pramāṇaiḥ laukikāḥ vainayika buddhi virahiṇaḥ na etān padārthān viviñcate aviviktāḥ cete na niḥśreyasāya kalpante iti anadhigata iti aṅktam ādhyātmikī śaktiḥ śuśrūṣā ādiḥ puruṣati uktam tatra vivakṣitam puruṣa viśeṣam grahītum saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣa prakārān darśayati puruṣaḥ punar iti heyam darśayati tatra iti upādeyān āha itaraḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^2	 apekṣā jijñāsā sā sandigdhasya tāvat asti viṣayasya vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇām puratas jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām viṣyamāṇasya vigalite ahaṅkāre sandigdhasya sa jāta jijñāsasya sa apekṣasya sataḥ apratipannasya api kenacid prakāreṇa sandeham āpādya sa apekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā tat idam uktak itare sa apekṣāḥ santaḥ pratipādyāḥ iti asandigdhaḥ api tattva pratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyate iti tat kim sa apekṣam ādhikṛtya śāstram pravṛttam tathā ca pramātaṇām na pramāṇa antare pravṛttiḥ syāt iti atas āha te yadā iti kañcid viṣayam jijñāsavaḥ yedandriya ādi apekṣante tadā pratyakṣeṇa pratipādyāḥ evam uttaram api yojyam ayam abhisandhiḥ na dṛṣṭa prayojana upayogi vastu vijñāsā iha apekṣa abhimatā kim tu niḥśreyasa upayogi padārtha jijñāsā sā ca asmin= eva śāstre pravṛtti hetuḥ na anyatra tat idam uktam yadā punar iti parama puruṣa arthayasa dhanam tu jijñāsavaḥ iti śeṣaḥ iha abhimatam śreyaḥ nirdhārayitum śreyaḥ mātra pramārān āha śreyaḥ punar sukham ahita nivṛttiḥ ca 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^3	 tatra api avāntara prakārān āha tat śreyaḥ sukhan duḥkha nivṛttiḥ ca bhidyamānam dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate tat āha dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena na vyāsajya kim tu pratyekam iti āha dṛṣṭam sukha strakcandana vanitā ādi bhoga janma adṛṣṭam sukham svarga ādi evam ca duḥkha nivṛttiḥ api śreyaḥ dṛṣṭām adṛṣṭam ca iti yojanīyam cakāra lopāt ahita nivṛtteḥ śreyasaḥ ātyantikān ātyantika tvena dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭasya bhedam āha ahita nivṛttiḥ api iti abhimatam śreyaḥ nirdhārayati ātyantikī iti punar iti nirdhāraṇam avadyotayati ātyantika tvam nirvṛtteḥ nivṛttasya punar anutpādaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^4	 sa ca kārya kāraṇa tad anuṣaṅgi nivṛttyā lakṣyate na hi akāraṇam kāryam jāyate tat idam uktam ekaviṃśati prabhada bhinduḥ kha hānyā iti gauṇa mukhya bhedena ca ekaviṃśateḥ śarīra dīnām duḥkha tva prakārān āha evaviṃśati iti ṣaṣṭham indriyam manaḥ tasya viṣayaḥ icchā dveṣa prayatnāḥ yadi api viṣayaḥ śarīram api tathā api anyathā asya duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ iti āha śarīram iti śarīra avacchinnaḥ ātma pradeśaḥ duḥkha āyatanam iti śarīram duḥkha āyatanam uktam indriya viṣaya buddha dīnām duḥkha tva upacāre kāraṇam āha indriyāṇi iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^5	 tatra indriyāṇi tāvat gandha ādi viṣaya bodhanāt viṣayāḥ bodhya tvāt buddhayaḥ tu sākṣāt duḥkha sādhanāni iti duḥkha tvena upacaryante saṃkhasya duḥkha tva upacāra bījam āha sukham iti sādhana pāratantyam kṣayitvam kāmaḥ iti duḥkha hetavaḥ sakala sukhān asaṅginaḥ tasmāt sukham api duḥkha anuṣaṅgi ukta prakāra duḥkha hāna sādhanam āha tasya hāniḥ iti saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāna pariśodhita parama nyāya mārgaḥ khalu heya upādeya bhūta dvādaśavidha prameya tattva paribhāvana bhavā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila pravṛtti hetu doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ apravartamānaḥ na śarīra indriya ādi hetum apūrva dharma adharma pracayam ātanoti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.9^6	 anādi bhava parampara upattam ca dharma adharma pracayam anantam api aniyata vipāka samayam api prasaṃkhyāna paripāka prabhāvāt paritas tad tad upabhoga bhāginaḥ kāyāt nirmāya tad ttphala upabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti acintya sāmarthya atiśayaḥ hi samādhiḥ yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ kaḥ hi yoga prabhāvāt ṛte agastyaḥ ica samudram pibati saḥ iva ca daṇḍaka araṇyam sṛjati iti sā iyam ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ tat idam uktam śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.10	 syāt etat kevalasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ puyaṣa pravṛtti aṅgam iyam tu duḥkha vat sukhasya api ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ iti katham śreyaḥ katham ca prekṣā vat pravṛtti aṅgam iti atas āha puruṣāḥ rāga ādimante iti yadi api rāga ādimatā puthak janānām etat na pravṛtti aṅgam te hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam api annam madhura tayā āpāta ramaṇīyam viṣa viṅgat tu mārayatu mā va mīmarat upayu jmahe tāvat āpāta sukham kaḥ hi hasta gatam pāda gatam karoti iti vicintya upabhu jate vivekinaḥ tu āyatim ālocayantaḥ svargam api kupita phaṇi phaṇā maṇḍala= chāya pratimaḥ iti apajahati tena mā bhūt etat rāga ādimatām pravṛtti aṅgam vivekinām tu bhaviṣyati avivekinām api ca apratipanna vipratipannānām viveka ādhāna upayaḥ pūrvam āveditaḥ śāstra pravṛtti aṅga mātram eva ca iha vivekaḥ vairāgyam abhimatam iti pravṛtteḥ dvaividhyam aika rūpyam dvairūpyam ca puruṣa bhedaḥ rāga vairāgyābhyām prāptavyasya sarvasya sukhasya duḥkha saṃbhedena aniṣṭa pakṣa nikṣepāt aniṣṭa pratiṣedha arthā eva pravṛttiḥ vivekinām eka rūpā eva avivekinām tu pravṛttiḥ dvi rūpa iti uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.11^1	 tat anena prapañcena pramāṇataḥ artha pratipatta viti ādi vākyasya tātparyam abhidhāya tad avayavam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti vivarītum bhūmim āracayati pravṛtteḥ api iti dṛṣṭam pravṛtti sāmarthyam hetuḥ iti rāga ādimad pravṛtti sāmarthyam upanyastam na tu vīta rāgānām na hi tad pravṛtteḥ niḥśreyasa adhgima lakṣaṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ niḥśreyasasya alaukika tvāt pramāṇasya arthavat anarthaka tvāt iti ayuktam pramāṇam anarthakam iti hi vipratiṣiddham iti atas āha pramāṇam tāvat iti na hi apramāṇam apramāṇam iti gṛhītam pravṛttyai kalpate kim tarhi pramāṇam iti na ca apramāṇe pramāṇa abhimānaḥ vinā pramāṇa ādi sādharmyāt iti tat sādharmyam pṛcchati kim punar iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.11^2	 uttaram sāmānya paricchedaka tvam tad vivṛṇā iti pramāṇena api iti rajata vijñānam api purovarti śukla bhāsvaram sat dravyam paricchinatti śuktikā jñānam api kevalam ekasmin= ava viṣaye rajata samāropa apavādābhyām buddha corvādhaka bhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ tat evam ubhayatas pravṛttiḥ samarthāt pramāṇāt eva na apramāṇāt artha vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam pramātā iti tatas ca siddhaḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ anartha vat vacatirekaḥ iti abhisandhiḥ tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ anartha vat vacatireka saṃpanna pramāṇasya arthavat tve hetuḥ iti āha tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ hetoḥ punar pramāṇasya arthavat tvam artha avyabhicāri tvam asamarthā tu anantarā api na saṃbadhyate yogayatā virahāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^1	 saṃprati ādi vākyam ākṣeptum anuvadati pramāṇataḥ iti ākṣipati paraspara iti samādhatte na iti ākṣepa vākyam vibhajate yadi pramāṇataḥ iti na tāvat artha pratipattiḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ api tu tad viniścayaḥ na ca tanmātram api tu tad artha jātīyasya śreyaḥ hetu tām asakṛt upalabhya saṃprati upalabhyamānasya arthasya tad jātīya tayā śreyaḥ hetu bhāva anumāna sahitaḥ viniścayaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ sā iyam śreyaḥ sādhana tā anumāna sahitā pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattiḥ viniścatiḥ samartha pravṛtti nimitta muktā na ca artha vinaścayaḥ prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam ca śreyaḥ hetuta anumāna nimitta vyāpti grahaṇam ca na samarthām pravṛttim vinā na ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ tābhyām vivana iti paraspara āśraya tā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^2	 tat idam uktam cadi pūrvam pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattiḥ rviniścitiḥ apekṣita upayata anumāna sahitā pravṛtti samārthyam antareṇa kim iti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣita upāyaḥ eva iti ca toyam eva iti ca iti samādhānam vibhajate tat ca na evam iti yat tāvat uktam pramāṇasya duravadhāraṇa tvāt artha viniścaya abhāvāt na pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam na svatas prāmāṇyam śakya avadhāraṇam paratas tu dṛṣṭa artheṣu anabhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu pravṛtti sāmathyat iva tat gamyate artha prati iti adhīnā tu pravṛttiḥ na artha avadhāraṇa adhīnāḥ artha sandehāt api prekṣāvatām pravṛtteḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^3	 no khalu upāya tā vinaścayena api pravartamānā na anāgata phale sandihate tat amī saṃdihānāḥ api pravartamānāḥ pravṛtti samārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvam viniścatya tad jātīyasya anyasya abhyāsa daśa pannasya pravṛtti samārthyāt prāk eva tad jātīya tvena liṅgena prāmājhaya avadhāraṇāt artha viniścayena pravartante evam ca dṛṣṭa artha mantra āyurveda prāmāṇyam pravṛtti sāmarthyena avadhārya tad jātīyasya āpta uktasya adṛṣṭa arthasya vedasya vinā api pravṛtti sāmarthyam prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam āpta ukta tvena nivedayiṣyate na ca phala jñānam parīkṣyate prekṣā vat dhiḥ tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭa tva āt iṣṭa lakṣaṇa tvāt ca phalasya tad sādhana tvam te parīkṣante 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^4	 tathā hi toya jñānam pipāsoḥ tatra pravṛttiḥ pravṛttasya tad āptiḥ āptasya pānam pānena ca udanyā upaśāntiḥ iti etāvatā eva pramātā kṛtī bhavati na punar udanya upaśamam api parīkṣate tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭa tvāt iti kecid vayam tu brūmaḥ phala jñānam api abhyāsadaśa āpannatayā tad jātīya tvena liṅgena avadhṛta avyabhicāram eva evam tat pūrvam tat pūrvataram tat pūrvatamam iti na ca saṃpratitanasya phala jñānasya prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya idānīm eva pūrvasya phala jñānasya tad jātīya tvena pramāṇya avadhāraṇe sati anavasthā iti vācyam pūrvatara sādharmyeṇa pūrvam eva pūrvasya avadhṛta prāmāṇya tvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^5	 evam pūrvatama sādharmyeṇa pūrvatarasya evam tat pūrva sādharmyeṇa pūrvatamasya iti anāditayā eva atra parihāraḥ eteṣu ca madhye yat phala jñānam svapna ādi upabhoga tulya tayā śaṅkita vyabhicāram tad anabhyāsa daśā āpannam atas pravṛtti sāmarthyam tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya vinivaśanīyam iti artha pratipatti pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ anādi tvam uktam anumānasya tu pravṛtti sāmarthya liṅga janmanaḥ anyasya vā nirasta samasta vyabhicāra śaṅkasya svatas eva prāmāṇyam anumeya avyabhicāri liṅga samuttha tvāt na hi liṅga ākāra jñānam liṅgam vinā na ca liṅgam liṅginam vinā iti svatas eva gṛhīta avyabhicāliṅga samuttham niṣkampam upapadyate jñānam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^6	 pratyakṣa jñānam tu arthāt utpadyamānam api na gṛhīta avyabhicārāt api tu sattā mātreṇa avasthitāt na ca kāraṇa antarāṇi api indriya ādīni asya arthena gṛhīta avyabhicārāṇi na ca arthena avyabhicārāṇi śābdam tu jñānu na arthāt utpadyate tad abhāve api sati śabde bhāvāt na api liṅgasya iva śabdasya artha avi abhicāraḥ kim tu saṅketa grahaṇa mātrāt padārtha pratyāyanena vākya artham adhigamayati śabdaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣa śābda vijñānayoḥ na svatas avyabhicāra grahaḥ iti pravṛtti sāmarthyam tat jātīya tvam vā liṅgam artha avyabhicārāya anusaraṇīyam jñāna gata tad jātīya tva liṅga grāhiṇaḥ ca jñānasya mānasa pratyakṣasya tādṛśasya adṛṣṭa vyabhicāra tayā paritas nirasta samasta vibhrama āśaṅkasya svatas prāmāṇyam iti na anavasthā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^7	 aitena upamānam vyākhyātam saṃvedanasya ca artha avarubhi cāritā kathanena tad kāraṇānām indriya ādīnām api pramāṇa tvam aktam veditavyam na hi avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvāt anyat eṣām prāmāṇyam na ca artha vyabhicāriṇām indriya ādīnām katham artha avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvam iti sāṃpratam kāraṇa sva bhāni yoga paryanuyogayoḥ aśakya tvāt tasmāt artha sandehāt anabhyāsa daśāpannāt pramāṇatā artha pratipattau pravṛtti samārthya saṃbhavāt pravṛtti samārthya jñānasya ca abhyāsa daśa āpannasya tad jātīya tvena prāmāṇya anumānāt anabhyāsa daśa āpannasya tu pravṛtti sāmarthya antara jñānena prāmāṇya anumānāt anādi tva at na artha pratipravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ paraspara āśraya tvam asti iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.12^8	 arthasya apekṣita upāyata anumāna pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ paraspara apekṣa tvam avaśiṣyate tatra api anāditā parihāraḥ utpanna mātrakasya hi bālakasya stanam dṛṣṭvā prāk bhavīyaḥ tad jātīya apekṣita anubhava janitaḥ saṃskāraḥ āvirasti tatas ca smaraṇam tatas apekṣita upāya ta anumānam tatas pravṛttiḥ tatas tasyāḥ sāmarthyam evam pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmani iti anāditayā na bīja aṅkura vat paraspara apekṣitā iti artha pratipattiḥ iti artha pratipatti śva arthasya apekṣita upāya tā pratipattiḥ ca iti arthaḥ tasmāt sarvam avadātam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.13^1	 tat anena uktena krameṇa pramāṇataḥ artha pratipatau= iti asya śāstra anusandhāna vākya tva tātparyam ca samāhitam idānīm asya eva tātparya antaram āha pramāṇa pravṛtyoḥ vā iti tatra idam amāśāṅkyate muniḥ hi pratyakṣa saṃśaya ādi vyutpādana dvāreṇa sākṣāt ca anena śāstreṇa anvīkṣikpā heya upādeya bhāva avasthita dvādaśavidha prameya vyutpādakam nyāyam anumāna para nāmānam niḥśreyasa siddhaye vyutpādayāṃbabhūva na ca nyāyataḥ pramāṇāt prameya tattva niścaya mātrāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ api tu ādi anta varjjam daśānām prameyāṇām duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam ātmanaḥ ca yāthātmya bhāvanam ityādibhyaḥ pravṛttibhya ātma tattva sākṣātkāra vairāgya paripāka krameṇa apūrvayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ anutpādena utpannayā uśva upabhogāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.13^2	 prakṣayeṇa iti tathā ca niḥśreyasam pratyantaraṅga tvāt pramāṇān nyāyāt pravṛttiḥ eva balīyasī na nyāyaḥ tasmāt pravṛttiḥ eva vyutpādanīyāḥ na pramāṇam niḥśreyasa hetuḥ api pravṛtteḥ antaraṅga tvāt tatra idabhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyam phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ na tu pramāṇataḥ asatya artha pratipattau tasmāt arthavat prayojana vat pramāṇam api pravṛtti vat eva etat uktam bhavati yathā antaraṅga tayā pravṛttiḥ balīyasī evam mūla kāraṇa tayā pramāṇam api 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.13^3	 na hi apramāṇāt pravṛttiḥ phalena abhisaṃbadhyate tasmāt tulyam ubhayam api tathā api pramāṇa vyutpādanena pravṛttiḥ api vyutpāditā bhavati iti pramāṇasya vyutpādanam akāri śāstreṇa na tu pravṛtteḥ sāmānya abhidhānam ca parama nyāya param tasya eva prakṛta tvāt iti prāmāṇya jñāna upāya pratipādana para tayā anusandhāna vakya tvam asya pūrvam uktam saṃprati para paryanuyoga mukhena asya anusandhāna vākya tvu pratipādayati loka vṛttā iti yathā hi pramāṇa pratipatti upāyam pratyācakṣāṇakaḥ evam praṣṭāvyaḥ jāyate kim bhavān pramāṇena pramāṇa jñāna upāyam pratyācaṣṭe apramāṇena vā iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.13^4	 yadi brūyāt pramāṇena iti sa prativaktavyaḥ pramāṇa jñāna upāyam avidvān katham bhavān evam āha iti apramāṇena iti ced anujñayā vartitavyam atha pramāṇena agṛhīta prāmāṇyena iti vā manasayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ tasmāt anicchatā api tvayā loka vṛttam anusaraṇīyam anyathā na asi laukikaḥ na parīkṣakaḥ iti unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāḥ iti tat idam loka vṛttam ākṣeptāram bodhayitum anena bhāṣyeṇa anūdyate pramāṇataḥ artha pratipatau pravṛtti sāmarthyā vat pramāṇa yatas atas sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇena avagata arthavat tvena artham avadhārya pravartamānaḥ phalam upalabhate iti loka vṛttam tat pramāṇataḥ ityādinā vākyena kāraṇa pradarśana dvāreṇa anūdyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.14^1	 asya eva bhāṣyasya tātparya antaram vaktu bhūmim āracayati heya hānā iti arthaḥ artha śabdaḥ pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau= iti atra sthitaḥ padam vāyakam yeṣām tāni tathā etad vāttika granthasya etādṛśaṃ vyākhyānam bhāṣya gatasya tu anyathā bhaviṣyati upāyaḥ śāstram iti śāstra śabdaḥ tad artha paraḥ arthasya api śabdavat śāstra śarīra tvāt atra ca heya hāna adhigantavya padaiḥ pramāṇa prameyayaḥ rūpa ādānāt go balīvarda nyāyena saṃśaya ādiṣu nigraha sthāna anteṣu śāstra padam pravartate tena upāya padena saṃśaya ādayaḥ nigraha sthāna antaḥ eva uktāḥ iti grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇa iti heyam iti tātparyam āha etasmin= ca iti cena pramāṇa pramā pramātṛ prameya rūpam caturvarga antaram api sūcayati tatra heya ādi caturvarge cāryamāṇa tayā artha pada sūcite pramāṇa ādi caturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānya pradarśana artham idam bhāṣyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.14^2	 yadi api caturvarga dvaya tattva avagamaḥ niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ tathā api pramāṇam eva pradhānam tad mūla tvāt itara siddheḥ tat idam uktam arthavat iti atiśāyane matubh pramātṛ ādi apekṣayā heya ādi epa kṣayā ca atiśayena prayojana vat pramāṇam kasmāt pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau satyām pravṛttasya pramātuḥ tad itara pratilambhāt pramāyāḥ ca tad kārya tvāt tat idam uktam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti tat etasmāt prādhānyāt vivakṣā bhedena trivarga dvayāt prāk uddeśaḥ pramāṇasya iti etena yat ā āhuḥ eke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyam tat prameyasya eva atha uṣāya tvāt tat saṃśaya ādīnām teṣām pramāṇa upāya tvāt kasmāt ca pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ prāthamyam pramāṇasya iti tat nirastam bhavati pramāṇa upāyānām api saṃśaya ādīnām pramāṇa adhīna tvāt iti nanu avagatam artha pada tayā heya ādi caturvargaḥ darśitaḥ itiḥ pramāṇa ādi caturvargaḥ tu katham pradarśitaḥ iti pṛcchati katham punar iti uttaram pramāṇa grameya adhigatayaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.15^1	 tat evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum upakramate tat idam vākyām avayavaśas upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate avayavaśas iti tatra asya avayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇataḥ iti vivṛṇoti tatra iti vibhajate pramāṇataḥ iti iyam nimitta pañcamī nimitta pañcamī ced kasmāt pramāṇāt iti na abhihitam iti atas āha asya iti pramāṇataḥ iti evaṃrūpasya abhidhānam vacana vyāpti artham vibhakti vyāpti artham ca iti vacana vyāpti artham iti mṛśyāmahe na tu vibhakti vyāpti artham iti pañcamī vyatirekeṇa taserabhāvāt iti āha katham punar iti pariharati labhyate iti vyāpteḥ prayojanam pṛcchati kim siddham bhavati iti uttaram vacana vyāptyā saṃplavaḥ vyavasthā ca tat ubhayam vibhajate pramāṇena iti yatra dvayoḥ bahūnām vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānām tatra ekaikasya api asti pratipatti sādhana tvam pramāṇasya iti kathayitum saṃplava avasare api pramāṇena iti aṅktam atas eva vyavasthāyām eva kāraḥ pramāṇena eva iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.15^2	 vibhakti vyāpteḥ prayojana māha vibhakti vaya āptyā heta tu karaṇa bhāvaḥ gamyate iti anuṣajyate tad vibhajate pramāṇāt artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti hetu tvam gamyate pramāṇena artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti karaṇa rūpaḥ arthaḥ gamyate iti saṃbandhaḥ kasmāt punar karaṇa arthaḥ gamyate iti atas āha pramāṇena iti artham artha adhigati sādhayati iti sādhakatama tvāt atra ca karaṇa bhāvanā antarīyakasya hetu bhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānam pramāṇa phalayoḥ tādātmya pratiṣedha artham bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt hetu phala bhāvasya na khalu paraśuḥ eva cchidā iti pramāṇa prātipadika labdha karaṇa tva anuvādaḥ ca pramākāraka antarebhyaḥ abhyarhita tvena asya vyutpādya tvam ca prāthamyam ca yuktam iti darśayitum saṃplavam ākṣipati saṃplava iti samādhatte na iti ākṣepu vibhajate syāt matiḥ iti viśiṣṭaḥ bhinnaḥ viṣayaḥ yeṣām tāni tathā bahuvacanam āntar gaṇika bheda abhiprāyam artha sāmarthya samuttham hi pratyakṣam artha gocaram 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.15^3	 saḥ eva arthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ yaḥ jñāna pratibhāsam ātmanaḥ anvaya vyatirekau= anukārayati na ca sāmānyam nirasta samasta artha kriyā sāmarthyam evam bhavitum arhati sva lakṣaṇam tu syāta tat eva hi parama artha sat artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ etat eva asya svam asādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam yat deśataḥ ananugamena ādeśa ātmakasya paramāṇu tvam kālataḥ ananugamena ca kṣaṇika tvam tasmāt sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam pratyakṣam na ca sva lakṣaṇam anumānasya api gocaraḥ tat hi gṛhīta pratibandha liṅga hetukam pratibanṇaḥ ca tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ aśakya grahaḥ iti sāmānya dharmau= āśrayate na ca sāmānyam ekam aneka deśa kāla avasthā saṃsargi bhavitum arhati tat idam anādi vāsanā udbhūta vikalpa dhiṣṭhānam vikalpa ākārasya vai alīkasya vā bāhya tvam anumāna gācaraḥ abhyupeyam tat ca bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyāt ca bāhya sādṛśyat ca niyata pratibhāsa tvāt ca anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham yat khalu bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇam tad anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham eva yathā amūrta tvam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.15^4	 tat vijñāna ādau bhāve śaśa viṣāṇa ādau ca abhāve sādhāraṇam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇaḥ ca vikalpa gocaraḥ asti ghaṭaḥ na asti ghaṭaḥ iti yadi punar asādhāraṇaḥ bhāvaḥ bhavet asti śabdaḥ na prayujyeta punarukta tvāt na astīyapi na vaktavyam virodhāt evam abhāva asādhāraṇye api vācyam na ca alīkasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ parama artha sattā sva lakṣaṇena sādṛśyam manyate anya vyāvṛteḥ na ca gauḥ iti niyatau buddhi vyapadeśau vināḥ ca ādi vyāvṛttim tasmāt sāmānyam anya vyāvṛtti rūpam abāhyam bāhya bheda agrahāt bāhya tvena avagāhyamānam anumānam bāhyaḥ pravartayati pāramparyeṇa ca bāhya pratibandhāt bāhyam prāpayat saṃvādakam sat bhrāntam api pramātṛ āśaya vaśāt pramāṇam tat asya na sva lakṣaṇam gocaraḥ pratyakṣam apita na sāmānya gocaram iti āveditam na ca abhyām anyat pramāṇam asti pramāṇasya sataḥ atra eva antarbhāvāt anantarbhāve vā pramāṇa tva anupapattaḥ na ca sāmānya viśeṣābhyām anyat asti prameya antaram yatra ete tat saṃploṣyete iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.16–1,1.1.17^1	 samādhāna vākyam vivṛṇoti etat ca na iti yathā ca etat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate viśeṣaḥ vyavacchedakaḥ sa ca vakra koṭara ādiḥ antyaḥ ca vyavasthā saṅkara udāharaṇāni āha indriya vat iti saṃplavam amṛṣyamāṇaḥ āha adhigata tvāt iti samādhattena anyathā iti ākṣepam vivṛṇoti yadi iti syāt etat na asti vaiyarthyam adhigatī nām ā aśutara vināśi tayā tad gocara adhigati antara utpādam prati pramāṇa antarasya arthavat tvāt iti atas āha adhigatam ca artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena iti yadi api adhigatayaḥ āśutara vināśinyaḥ tathā api ekatara pramāṇa janita artha adhigalibdha janmanaḥ saṃskārāt eva sthāyinaḥ tad artha smṛti santati saṃbhāvāt adhigamartham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭam piṣṭam syāt iti samādhi vākyam vivarītum anuvadati na anyathā iti vivṛṇoti na brūmaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.17^2	 ayam abhisandhi na hi pramāṇa kāraṇāni prekṣāvantiḥ yena evam ālocayeyuḥ janitam eva pramāṇam anyam ena asmāsu vayam iha udāsmahe iti na api sva kāraṇa bala labdha janmāni pramāṇāni dirśitaḥ ayam arthaḥ anyatamena ca asmāsu pramāṇena kṛtam asmābhiḥ iti virantum arhanti pramātuḥ cetana tvāt ayam anayogaḥ iti ced na priyatamasya vastunaḥ anena bhūyas bhūyas pramitsita tvāt apramitsitasya api ca durjana vacana ādeḥ prameyasya anena pramīyamāṇa tvāt tasmāt na pramātṛ abhisandhānāt pramāṇasya pravṛttiḥ apravṛttiḥ vā arthe kim tu samārthyot anyathā agni dāha ādi duḥkhasya apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.18	 cattu pramāṇam pramitsa adhīna pravṛtti tat yadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kim āyātam pramāṇasya na hi toyam api pipāsunā na pīyate iti tasya pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ api iti tasmāt pratyutpanna kāraṇa sāmagrī janitā buddhiḥ pramā tad janakāni ca pramāṇāni samāna viṣayāṇi api saḥ eva ca anena sāmagrī bhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇa ityādinā yadi api sākṣātkārāsa akṣātkāra ādiḥ api prakāra bhedaḥ asti tathā api asau prakṛta anupayogāt na uktaḥ yadi ca dravyam tvacā gṛhītam iti kṛtam cakṣuṣā cakṣuṣā vā gṛhītam iti kṛtam tvacā iti ucyeta na rūpa vijñānam vā sparśa vijñānam vā upajāyeta tad artham cakṣuḥ vā tvac vāmi upetavyam tathā ca saṃplava vaiyarthye api vyavasthāyām na vaiyarthyam iti āha viṣaya antaraḥ iti prakṛtam upasaṃharatitasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.19	 vibhakti artham nirūpya prātipadikā artha nirūpaṇam avatārayati pramāṇa iti atra ca avadhāryate anena iti avadhāraṇam vicāraḥ iti vicāraṇāya bhāva bhavitārau pṛcchati kim punar iti kecid āhuḥ anadhigata artha gantṛ pramāṇam iti viṣaya sārūpyam sa ākārasya vijñānasya iti ante vijñānasya eva anākārasya ātmānām aprakāśana sāmarthyam iti apare upalabdhi sādhanam iti vṛddhāḥ tasmāt viprapitteḥ saṃśayāt praśrnaḥ bhāva praśrna vyākhyānena bhavitṛśnaḥ vaya ākhyātaḥ uttaram upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam na ca saṃśaya viparyāsa rūpa upalabdhi kāraṇayoḥ prasagḍaḥ arthavat iti adhikārat tayā uśvepa darśita artha vyabhicāreṇa anarthavat tvāt no khalu vikalpayamānam vastu asti artha kriyāsu vā upayujyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.20^1	 syāt etat smṛti hetoḥ api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ na hi asau na upalabdhi hetuḥ na ca artha sahakāri pramāṇam iti saṃskārasya artha sahakāritā virahāt a prāmāṇyam iti sāṃpratam nadī pūrasya pipīlikā aṇḍa saṃcaraṇasya ca atīta anāgata varṣa liṅgasya śabdasya atīta anāgata gocarasya artha sahakāritā virahiṇaḥ ca pramāṇa tva prasaṅgāt jñāpaka tvena kāryatvena vā kathañcid artha saṃbandhe saṃskārasya api tat samānam iti tasya api smṛti rūpa upalabdhi hetoḥ prāmāṇyam prasaktam mā evam pramāṇa śabdena tasya apāsta tvāt pramāsa adhanam hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ hi śabda artha sabandhaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.20^2	 lokaḥ ca saṃskāra mātra janmanaḥ smṛteḥ anyām upalabdhim artha avyabhicāriṇīm pramāma ācaṣṭe tasmāt tad hetuḥ pramāṇam iti na smṛti hetau prasaṅgaḥ anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca dhārāvāhika vijñānānām adhigata artha gocarāṇām loka prasiddha pramāṇa bhāvānām pramāṇyam vihanti iti na adriya mahe na ca kāla bhedena anadhigagocara tvam dhārāvāhikānām iti yuktam parama sūkṣmāṇām kāla kalā bhedānām piśita locanaiḥ asmādṛśaiḥ anākalanāt na ca ādyena eva vijñānena upadarśita tvāt arthasya pravartita tvāt puruṣasya prāpti tvāt ca uttateṣām aprāmāṇyamam eva vijñānānām iti vā ācayam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.20^3	 na hi vijñānasya artha prāpaṇam pravartanāt anyat na ca pravartanam api artha pradarśanāt anyat tasmāt artha pradarśana mātra vyāpāram eva jñānam pravartakam prāpakam ca pradarśana ca pūrvavat uttareṣām vijñānām abhinnam iti katham pūrvam eva vijñānam pramāṇa na uttarāṇi api puruṣa apekṣayā tu prāmāṇye candra tāraka ādi vijñānasya puruṣa anapekṣitasya aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ na ca ati davīḥ tayā tad arthasya heya tayā tat api puruṣasya apekṣitam tasya upekṣaṇīya artha viṣaya tvāt na ca upekṣaṇīyam api anupādeya tvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātmānātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.20^4	 upalabdhi mātrasya tvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātmānātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti upalabdhi mātrasya artha avi abhicāriṇa smṛteḥ anyasya pramā śabdena abhidhānāt hetu grahaṇena sārūpya śaktyoḥ phalāt abhinnayoḥ apākaraṇāt hetu hetum at bhāvasya tādātmaye anupapatteḥ iti upalabdhi hetu tve ca pramāṇa tvam bhavitṛvyākhyānena bhāvaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tat evam jñānam ajñānam vā upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti sthitam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.21^1	 tat etat ati vyāpaka tvena ākṣipati samāna tvāt iti samādhatte ayam viśeṣaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ sarvaḥ karttā karaṇa gocara vyāpāraḥ na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate karaṇam ca dvidhā siddham āsiddham ca tatra siddham paraśu ādi dāru udvaidhībhāvāya udyamya udyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinatti iti ucyate na tu sākṣāt kartṛ vyāpāra gocaraḥ dāru udvaidhībhāvaḥ kim tu sparśa vat vegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasya udyamana nipātana lakṣaṇaḥ tu kartṛ vyāpāraḥ paraśu gocaraḥ eva 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.21^2	 evam svarga kāmaḥ api kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate kim tu tad karaṇam yāgam a siddham sādhayati svargaḥ tu yāga vyāpārāt eva apūrva abhidhānāt cetana āśrayāt deśa kāla avasthā bheda āsādita pariṇati viśeṣāt sākṣāt utpadyate tadvat iha api pramātā siddham indriya ādi asiddham ca tad sannikarṣa ādi vyāpārayan= utpādayan vā karaṇaḥ eva caritārthaḥ karaṇam tu indriya ādi tad sannikarṣa ādi vā na anyatra cārita artham iti sākṣāt upalabdhau= eva phale vyāpriyate prameyasya tu pratyakṣāt anyatra upalabdhi hetu bhāvaḥ eva tāvat na asti tatra api indriya saṃbandha mātre upayujyate prameyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.21^3	 indriyam eva tu tad tad sannikarṣa ādi vā sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ tatas siddham etat na pramātā sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ kartṛ tvāt yaḥ yaḥ kartā sa sarvaḥ na sākṣāt phala hetuḥ yathā vraścana yajamāna ādiḥ tathā ca ayam tasmāt tathā tathā pratyakṣam prameyam na sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ prameya tvāt yat yat prameyam vat tat sarvam na pramā hetuḥ anumeya ādi vat tathā ca etat tasmāt tathā iti tat idam pramātṛ prameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārtha tvam acaritārtha tvam ca pramāṇasya tasmāt tat eva phala hetuḥ pramātṛ prameye tu phala uddeśena pravṛtte iti tad hetū kathañcid iti codayati akaraṇa iti na akaraṇaḥ kartā pramāṇam api vyāptum arhati iti arthaḥ pariharati na indriya artha iti yadā jñānam pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasya utvattau= iti arthaḥ punar codayati yadi tarhāti pariharati tasmin= api iti codayati yadi pramātṛ prameyābhyām sadbhyām pramāṇam iti pramāṇam antareṇa pramāyāḥ abhāvāt pramātṛ prameyayoḥ asiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.21^4	 pṛcchati katham iti uttaram pramāṇam iti iti artha sva rūpa mātram eva kārakam kasmāt na bhavati tat ca kriyā saṃbaddhasya purastāt api asti iti ataa āha na ca dravya mātram iti astu tarhi tadīyaḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ pradhāna kriyāyām sādhyāyām kārakam tasya api pradhāna kriyāyām nimitta tvāt iti atas āha na ca kriyā mātram iti na hi svarūpeṇa devadattaḥ vraścanaḥ na api tadīyaḥ vyāpāraḥ udyamana nipāta na ādiḥ loṣṭha ādya aśrarūḥ kva tarhi kāraka śabdaḥ pravartate iti atas āha kāraka śabdaḥ hi iti pradhāna kriyā sādhane hetau avāntara kriyā viśeṣa yukte kāraka śabdaḥ pravartate dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhāna vyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇa gocaraḥ udyamana nipātana ādiḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ karmaṇaḥ ca dārūṇaḥ sparśavat vegavat tīkṣṇatara kuṭhā rasa yogaḥ eva avāntara vyāpātaḥ tena hi dārū sva avayava parispanda labdha janmanaḥ avayava vibhāgāt dvaidhībhāvam anubhavati tasmāt avāntara pradhāna vyāpāra saṃpannam kārakam iti sāmānyatas prasādhya prakṛte yojayati pramātṛ prameya śabdau ca iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.21^5	 tāvanreṇa kriyām pradhāna kriyām iti arthaḥ pariharati na pācaka ādi śabda vat iti loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ khalu ayam śabda artha saṃbandhaḥ lokaḥ ca atīta anāgata vartamāna kriyā saṃbandha mātra vivakṣayā kāraka śabdān prayuṅkte pācakam ānaya pakṣyati iti ca pācakaḥ ayam apākṣīt iti ca pācakaḥ ayam pacati iti ca tulya vat traikālya viṣaya prayoga darśanam tat kasya hetoḥ apacati api pāka saṃbandham pratyasti svaru upśaktiḥ devadatta ādau= iti dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇām kārya upajananam prati svarūpam ca saha kāri grāma samavadhānam ca tatra asati api saha kāri grāma samavadhāne kāraka śabdānām pravṛtteḥ sati api ca svarūpe trekālya vyāpini trekālya yogi kārya asaṃbhave apravṛtteḥ traikālya yogi kārya upahita maryādam eva svarūpam kāraka śabdānām pravṛtau nimittam iti asati api pratyutpanna pramā hetu pramāṇa saṃbandhe pramātṛ prameya śabdayoḥ pravṛttiḥ iti upapannam pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇa janyate iti tat pramāṇam upalabdhi sādhanam sākṣāt na pramātṛ prameye iti siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.22^1	 sati api ca upalabdhi sādhana tve pramātṛ prameyayā ūrūpabdhi hetuḥ iti atra aprasaṅga sādhākatamāsādhaka tamayoḥ sādhakatame kārya saṃpratyayāt sa atiśaya tvena udbhūtattvāt tasya iti āha sādhakatama tvāt vā iti sādhakatama artham pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram pramāṇasya bhāva abhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvat tā bhāva abhāvavat tā sādhakatama arthaḥ lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā sāmānadhikaraṇyam na tu pramātṛ prameya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam api asti pramāyāḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ iti atas āha na pramātarī iti pramātṛ prameyābhyām saha pramotpādasya anya yoga vyavacchedena saṃbandhaḥ pramāṇena tu saṃbandhaḥ pramā utpādasya ayoga ani ayoga vyavacchedābhyām iti atiśayaḥ pramāṇasya pramātṛ prameye hi pramāṇa upakṣīṇa vṛttinī na pramāyām vyāpriyete tena antarāya saṃbhavat na avaśyam pramātṛ prameya vyāpāre sati pramā bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.22^2	 pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavati eva iti kalpa antaram āha yadvān vā pramimīte saḥ atiśayaḥ pramimītaḥ iti svatantram kartāram daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇāt vyavacchettum yadvā aneva iti ca sa avadhāraṇām tatra yat vāniti kartṛ antaram vyavacchinatti na hi kartā kartṛmān kim tu pramāṇavān svatantraḥ hi āśrayaḥ paratantreṇa āśrīyate kartṛ adhīnam hi karaṇam iti āveditam pramātā prameyavān api kvacid bhavet tad tantra tvāt prameyasya na tu prameyavān eva anumāna ādiṣu prameyasya atīta tva ādinā tadvat tau= ihāt na tu liṅga dijñānavān na kadācid iti avadhāraṇa phalam saḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇasya asya eva ca viśeṣasya atiśaya tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati pramāṇe sati iti kalpa antaraka āha satārva iti pūrveṇa bhāva pradhānaḥ atiśayaḥ yādṛśasya darśitaḥ tādṛśasya eva iha vyatireka pradhānaḥ atiśayaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.22^3	 akartṛ tvam ahetu tvam iti arthaḥ kalpa antaram āha saṃyoga vat carama bhāvitāḥ vā sa iti kartavya tākam hi vyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam na tu cakṣuḥ ādi svarūpam karaṇa ādi śabda pravṛtti nimitta mātram tu svarūpam syāt iti pūrvam āveditam tat ca siddham asiddha vā pramātṛ prameya vyāpārasya paścāt eva tathātvena saṃpadyate iti caram abhāvī iti ucyate saḥ ayam asya carama bhāvita atiśayaḥ tathā tantūnām paṭe janayitavye antyāḥ saṃyoga bhedāḥ yad anantaram paṭe utpadyate eva iti kalpa antaram āha prapipatteḥ ānantarya vā yatas eva pramāṇam carama bhāvi atas eva tad anantaram pratipatteḥ pramāyāḥ bhāvāt pratipatteḥ ānarnyam eva pramāṇasya atiśayaḥ sa ca iti caḥ avadhāraṇe idam api lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā uktam kalpa antaram āha asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tā vā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.22^4	 catastraḥ khalu imāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramiyaḥ bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa bhājaḥ anubhūyante na ca pramātā tad bheda hetuḥ sya sādhāraṇyāt na ca prameyam ekasya api prameyasya saṃplave sarva pratipatti sādhāraṇyāt pramāṇāni tu yathāyatham catasṛṣu api pramitiṣu asādhāraṇāni iti bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa nibandhanāni tat idam asādha araṇyam atiśayaḥ aśeṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pramātā atra vivakṣitaḥ kalpa antaram āha pramākāraṇa iti pramāyāḥ asamavāyi kāraṇa khalu ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa ca sarva pramāsodhāraṇaḥ na asau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyaḥ viśeṣṭum tayoḥ api tadvat eva sādhāraṇyāt asādhāraṇam tu pramāṇam yathāyatham ātma manaḥ saṃyogam avacchinatti eve sukha ādi prameyāṇām api manaḥ eva asādhāraṇam vyavacchedaṅka draṣṭavyam saḥ ayam asya atiśayaḥ atiśaya atiśayinoḥ abheda vivakṣayā atiśaya śabda vācyam iti uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^1	 krama prāptam artha grahaṇam tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe artha grahaṇam iti kasmāt punar niṣidhyate pramāṇa viṣayā pratipattiḥ iti atas āha yatas na pramāṇa viṣaya iti itikartavya tā anuṣṭhānam tasmin arthyate iti arthaḥ toyakaṇṭaka ādiḥ tasya tathā āmāvaḥ arthanīya tvam tat ca sukha duḥkha sādhana tvam sukha sādhanam khalu upa ādeya tvena duḥkha sādhanam ca heya tvena arthye tātparya antaram āha upekṣaṇīya iti upekṣaṇīya viṣaye pramāṇe pravṛtti sāmarthyam na asti iti tat pratiṣadhyate na ca tat apramāṇam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^2	 tasya api dṛṣṭa pramāṇa sādharmyeṇa liṅgena prāmāṇya anumānāt iti codayati pramāṇa agahaṇam iti samartha pravṛtti janikā hi pratipattiḥ na apramāṇāt bhāvati iti arthāt eva pramāṇāt iti gamyate iti arthaḥ pariharati na pramāṇa viśeṣa jñāpana artha tvāt ayam abhisandhiḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyena hi kāryeṇa pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumātavyam na ca etat sākṣāt pramāṇasya kāryam kim tu artha pratipatteḥ tad anantaram hi samarthā pratipatti rūpa jāyate artha pratipattiḥ tu pramāṇa kāryā iti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇa kāryā satī pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumāpayati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^3	 tasmāt artha gamyam api pramāṇam artha pratipatti karaṇa tvena dyotanīyam anyathā pramāṇam arthavat artha pratipatteḥ masartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt iti kim kena saṃgatam pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa bhāsāt vyāvṛttiḥ tasya jñāpanam saḥ eva arthaḥ yasya pramāṇa grahaṇasya tat tathā uktam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt etat uktam bhavati pramāṇa kāryāyāḥ artha prapitteḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam na tad ābhāsa kāryāyāḥ tasmāt pramāṇasya arthavat tvam gamyate iti tat idam uktam tat yā iha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛtti sāmarthyam pratipādayati pramāṇam ayam arthaḥ pramāṇa kartṛ pravṛtti samārthyam pratipadyamānam prāpnuvat tat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇa kārya artha pratipattiḥ iti idam api pramāṇa grahaṇasya prayojanam iti āha na ca pramāṇa grahaṇam iti eka deśi vyākhyānam upanyasyati sukha iti na kevalam sukha duḥkha hetu tvāt arthyamāna tvāt jñāyamāna tvāt ca dūṣayati na iti sarvasya sukha duḥkha tad hetu tvena heya pakṣa nikṣepāt upādeyānām pramāṇa śāstra apavargāṇānām abhāva prasaṅgāt vyāghātaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^4	 avivakṣita tvāt ca iti caśabda samuccitam aśakya hāna tvam hetu antaram ādarśayati na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam iti sukha daḥkha tat hetavaḥ hi heyāḥ sane hāna upāyam apekṣante na ca pramāṇa ādeḥ anyaḥ tad upāyaḥ saṃbhavati na ca pramāṇa ādiḥ sva ucchedāya paryāptaḥ na ca asmāt apavargaḥ na adhigamyate tasmāt na śakyam pramāṇa ādinā pramāṇa dihānam iti na ca etat niḥśreyasa hetum śāstram praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tad anuvartinaḥ vā bhāṣya kārasya vivikṣitam iti āha na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam vivakṣitam tasmāt asmad vacā ākhyānam eva śobhanam iti āha kim tu iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^5	 pravṛtti sāmarthya ādhāna yogya vamam adhikāraḥ tasmāt sukha duḥkha tad hetu rūpa artha pratipattiḥ eva hi samarthām pravṛttim ādhatte na tu artha mātrā pratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ na kevalam vyāghāta aśakya hāna avivakṣita tvaiḥ artha padena na sarva saṃgrahaḥ aśakya tvāt api na sarva saṃgrahaḥ iti āha na saṃvidaḥ iti sukha duḥkha tad hetu tayā na saṃvidaḥ grahaṇam saṃgrahaḥ sarva madhya patitāyāḥ api kutas anadhikārāt sukha duḥkha tad hetu yogya tā virahāt na api arthyamāna tvena saṃgrahaḥ iti āha akarma tvāt ca 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.23^6	 na tāvat sarvāḥ eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvid gocarāḥ manaḥ yonayaḥ saṃvedyāḥ bhavitum arhanti eka nīla viṣaya saṃvid paramparā mātre eva puruṣa āyuṣa sahasra paryavasānāt viṣaya antara saṃcāra abhāva prasaṅgāt ca tasmāt anavasthā abhayā t ante kasyāścid saṃvidaḥ asaṃvedya tayā phala mātra tvam abhyupeyam tathā ca sā na arthyate na ca sukha duḥkhe tatretuḥ iti na sarva saṃgrahaḥ saṃvidaḥ asaṃgrahāt iti arthaḥ tat evam ādivākya vyākhyāya bhāṣya vākya antaram avatārya tatra ekaderśi vyākhyānam dūṣayitum upanyasyati saḥ ayam pramāṇa arthaḥ iti dūṣayati na ubhayasya api parisaṃkhyāta tvāt arthaḥ tu sukham ityādinā bhāṣya granthena kārya kāraṇābhyām ubhaya tvam prāṇabhṛt bhedasya aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt iti ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti vat na pratijñā arthena saṅgacchate iti āha prāṇabhṛt bhedasya ca iti tat etat eka deśi mata dūṣaṇam asmin vyākhyāne na asti iti āha na artha śabdasya iti candranādi viṣayam pramāṇam sukha prayojanam eva kaṇṭaka ādi viṣayam ca pramāṇam duḥkha utpāda prayojanam eva iti etat ubhayam parisaṃkhyātum niyantum aśakyam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.24	 evam kila atra śaṅkyate sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ vastūnām svābhāvikaḥ bhavet na vā svābhāvika tve nīlaḥ iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukhaḥ iti kara bhavat manuṣyāṇām api kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt evam nidādhe api kuṅkumam sukham syāt candanam ca hemantate api sukham bhavet evam tṛṣṇa jaḥ iva apām suhitasya apaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran asvābhāvika tve tu anādi vāsanā vaicitrya labdha janma puruṣa dharma kalpanā anupātinaḥ sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ na pramāṇa prayojanam bhavitum arhanti iti tatra idam upatiṣṭhate saḥ ayaṃpramāṇa arthaḥ iti nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇa bhaṅga adhikāre tathā sthema bhājām api vastu nāma kramāṇām api krama vat sahakāri kāraṇa samavadhāna vaśāt upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ kramavantaḥ dharmāḥ bhavanti iti tat iha api yadi api na jātyā sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ bhāvanām bhavati tathā api jāti deśa kāla avasthā puruṣa bheda sahakāri samavadhānāt upapatsyate sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ avyavasthayā iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.25^1	 tat siddham etat pramāṇa arthaḥ aniyataḥ aniyata prāṇabhṛt bheda hetuka tvāt yat yat aniyata kāraṇakam kāryam tatva sarvam aniyatam eva yathā aniyata kāla megha udaya nibandhanam varṣam tathā ca ayam tasmāt aniyate iti kasmāt punar pramātṛ ādi caturvarge pramāṇasya eva arthavat tvam ucceta na pramātṛ ādīnām api iti āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham bhāṣyam anuvadan= eva vyācaṣṭe arthavati ca samarthe samyak arthe artha avyabhicāriṇī iti yāvat pramāṇe arthavanti bhavan simarthāni samyak arthāni pramātṛ ādīni arthasya tu samyak tvam idam eva yat yādṛśaḥ pramāṇena upadarśiḥ tasya tathātvam na punar anyathā bhāvaḥ iti yadā tu ādi bhāṣya vākye artha śabdaḥ prayojana vacanaḥ tadā evam vyākhyānam arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yatas samartham śaktam pramāṇa pratipatti ādi krameṇa pūrva uktena prayojanam prati atas samarthe pramāṇe pramātṛ ādīni arthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti yatas tāni api pramāṇa vat eva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanam prati iti atra hetaḥ anyatama apāyaḥ iti tasya artham vyācaṣṭe anyatamatva arthaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.25^2	 nanu anyatama śabdaḥ bahuṣu anirdhānita viśeṣam ekam āha na tu sādhakatamam iti atas āha pramāraṇāt iti sādhāraṇa śabdaḥ hi pramaraṇāt viśeṣe vartate tat yathā śivikā vahana pakrame puruṣam ānayā iti puruṣa śabdaḥ viṣṭau tadvat iha api pramātṛ ādi parihāṇyā pramāṇasya arthavat tva abhidhāna niyama prakrama iti pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ vācyaḥ iti tatra eva anyatama śabdaḥ vartate yadi api artha pratipatti artha avyabhicāra dvāreṇa pramāṇasya avyabhicāraḥ gamyate dṛṣṭe viṣaye tathā api adṛṣṭe viṣaye na tad janita prapitta yavi abhicāreṇa avi abhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyaḥ vijñātum pratīya vyabhicārasya pramāṇa avi abhicāra grahaṇa manreṇa aśakya jñāna vat 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.25^3	 tasmāt dṛṣṭa arthasya mantrāyurvedasya pravṛtti sāmarthya avadhṛta artha avyabhicārasya sādharmyāt āpta praṇītvāt agnihotra ādi vākyānām pramāṇānām avyabhicāra grahaṇa puraḥsaram eva trivargasya avyabhicāra grahaṇam na punar atra trivargasya avyabhicāraḥ śakyaḥ anyatas paricchettum adṛṣṭa artha viṣayasya ca caturvargasya iha arthavat tvena prayojanam dṛṣṭa arthe sandehāt api vyavahāra siddheḥ tat idam caturvarge pramāṇasya prādhānyam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.26^1	 caturvarga vibhāga pare bhāṣye pramātā prathamam darśitaḥ tatas tasya lakṣaṇam āha pramātā svatantraḥ iti svātantryam pṛcchati kim punar svātantryam yasya abhisaṃbandhāt svantraḥ iti bhāṣya kṛtā pramāta upalakṣitaḥ na lakṣitaḥ na khalu īpsā ajihāsayoḥ vā pravṛttau vā svāntryam pramātṛ tvam api tu pramāya arm ipsā ādi svātantryeṇa tu tad uttara kāla bhāvinā pramāyām svātantryam parva kāla abhāvi upalakṣim tena tad carim anuvartamānaḥ vārtika kṛt upalakṣaṇa antaram kartṛ tva uttara kāla bhāvi a āha kāraka phala upabhoktṛ tvam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.26^2	 na hi sarvaḥ kartā samasta kāraka janyam svarga ādi vaudana ādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvij pācaka ādiṣu ca vyabhicāra darśanāt kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛ tva uttara kāla bhāvinī phala upabhoktṛ tā kartṛ vana āntarīyaka tayā dupalakṣayati yajamānasya rājñaḥ ca praiṣādinā tad tad vayā pāre kartṛ tvāt yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ tad abhisandhi pūrvakam preṣaṇa m adhyeṣaṇam va yuktam tasarvam paci arthaḥ iti svātantrya lakṣaṇam āha tad samavāyaḥ vā kāraka abhidhānena sannidhāpitām kriyam tat iti sarva ānāmnā parāmṛśati yasya hi vyāpāram prādhānyena dhātuḥ ākhyāta pratyayaḥ vā abhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.26^3	 tathā hi viklidyantī yatra taṇḍula ādayaḥ kartāraḥ pacanti iti atra devadatta ādayaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ ekatra taṇḍula ādeḥ vyāpāraḥ upāttaḥ aparatra devadatta ādeḥ iti prādhānyena ca aśeṣa kāraka nivartti a tvam pradhāna kriyāyāḥ avāntara vyāpāra bhede api pradhāna kriyā uddeśena samasta kāraka pravṛtteḥ iti puruṣaḥ iti prakṛta kriyā apekṣam pramāyāḥ puruṣa āśraya tvāt iti lakṣaṇa antaram āha tad prayoktṛ tvam itarā prayojya tā vā tasya cetanasya sarva kārakāṇi prati prayoktṛ tvam taiḥ ca kārakaiḥ aprayojya tā vā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.26^4	 acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛ tvam na svābhāvikam iti bhāvaḥ parisamāpti padārtham vyācaṣṭe tattva parisamāptiḥ iti tattvam hi pramāṇa vyāpya tvam pramāṇa vyāpāra viṣaya tvam tat ca hāna upādāna upekṣābhiḥ paryavasyati paryavasānam parisamāptiḥ viniyojya iti vaktavye yogyatā grahaṇam īpsite api dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścid pratibandhāt puruṣeṇa anupātte mā bhūt tattva aparisamāptiḥ iti yadi api hi tat puruṣeṇa anupāttam tathā api upādāna yogya tā pradarśanāt asti tattva parisamāptiḥ iti tat pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti atra tad śabdena hāna upādāna lakṣaṇam viniyogam parāmṛśati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.27	 kim punar tattvam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuḥ tattvpratyaya prakṛteḥ tadaḥ artham pṛcchati kiṃpunar iti uttaram sat asatī tat praśnam vibhajate tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti atra iti uttaram vibhajate sat asatī tat atha kasmāt prakṛti puruṣau vā pañca skandhāḥ vā param brahma advaitam vā jīva jīva stra vādayaḥ vā sapta pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vayuḥ iti vā catvāri bhūtāni ityādi iti na tadaḥ vācyāni bhavanti iti atas āha pramāṇa viṣaya tvena adhikārāt sūtra bhāṣya vākya tad vivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇa viṣayaḥ ca adhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyā ādi siddhānta bheda anupātinaḥ arthāḥ pramāṇa viṣayāḥ yathā ca etat tathā atreva nivedayiṣyate upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.28^1	 prakṛti artham vyākhyāya pratyārtham vyācaṣṭe tad bhāvaḥ iti sat asatoḥ yathā saṃkhyam vidhāyaka prakāṇa viṣaya tā sataḥ bhāvaḥ tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca asataḥ bhāvaḥ tat iti vidhāyaka pramāṇa viṣaya tām parāmṛśati tad pratiṣadhena ca pratiṣadhakam pramāṇam upasthāpitam tena pratiṣedhaka pramāṇa viṣaya tvam eva tat pratiṣedhaḥ iti anena uktam bhavati etat vibhajate tayoḥ khalu iti śaṅkate pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt iti sarva sāmarthya viraheṇa tu asat sataḥ vyāvartate yadi ca āsat api pramāṇa viṣayaḥ tarhi na asamartham tathā ca sat asatā uḥ abhedaḥ iti arthaḥ nirāka rotinaḥ anaikāntāt na vayam asāmarthyena asataḥ bhedam ācakṣmahe yena evam upālabhyemahi iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkā vibhajate tatra bhavet iti nirākaraṇam vibhajate tat ca na iti gavā ādi cetanam acetanam ghaṭa ādi iti yadi sat asatī samarthe kutas tarhi tayoḥ medaḥ iti atas āha svatantrā iti asat upalabdhiḥ eva sat upalabdheḥ anyā anupalabdhiḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.28^2	 nanu saṃyoga vibhāga ādiṣu satsu api taratantra upalabdhi karaṇa tva matiḥ te teṣām saṃyujyamāna vibhajyamāna ādi adhīna nirūpaṇa tva ādityaḥ āha pratiṣedha mukhena pratipadyate pratīyate satām keṣāñcid pāratantrye api na niṣedhya niṣedha adhikāraṇa pāratantryam iti arthaḥ saṃprati sat upalambhakasya pramāṇasya asadu upalambhaka tvam pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣya kāreṇa pradīpaḥ dṛṣṭānte upanyastaḥ satu sādhya samaḥ tasya api pramāṇa sāmagrī niveśat iti śaṅkyamānaḥ atyanta loka prasiddha tayā asya dṛṣṭānta tvam samarthayate pradīpa vat iti gopāla aṅganāḥ api hi kim atra asti stenaḥ asmad dhanam vā apavarake na vā iti sandihānā pradīpam upādāya samantāt avalokya apavarakam asti iha asmad dhanam na asti stenaḥ iti samam eva niścinvanti na tu stena abhāva niścayāya upāyantaram upādadate tena agāpālāj namā ca paṇḍita rūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat idam uktam na hi asat pratipattau= upāya antaram āsthīyate lokena 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.28^3	 anāśrayaṇe hetum āha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭa ādike arthe svatantre na anena samāna jātīyam tulya upalambha yogyatam dṛśya antaram asti nīla pītau hi paraspara abhāvavantau tena nalī niṣedhe na avaśyam pīta vidhiḥ bhāva abhāvau tu paraspara abhāva ātmānau no khalvabhāva abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid anyaḥ bhāva rūpāt na api bhāva abhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvāt tat evam pradīpa upāyasya pratipattuḥ pratīti kramam uktvā parīkṣakāṇām upapattikramam āha yadi abhaviṣyat iti yadi kaścid āśaṅketa dṛśya tām abhāvaḥ pradīpena bhāvaḥ api bhaviṣyati iti tatra eṣa parīkṣakāṇām tarkaḥ upatiṣṭhate yadi abhaviṣayat iti tat evam laukika parīkṣaka saṃmatam dṛṣṭāntam upapādya dārṣṭa antike yojayati eve pramāṇena api indriya ādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti pūrvavat vyākhyeyam upasaṃharati tat evam iti sarvam ca etat upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.28^4	 nanu yadi sat asatī pramāṇa viṣayau kasmāt sat bhedāḥ iva asat bhedāḥ api sūtra kṛtāḥ na ucyantaḥ iti atas āha tatra teṣu sat asat bhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇa asat bhedāḥ na prakāśante iti na ucyante niṣedhya niṣedha adhikāraṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt asat bhedānām bhāva bheda tantram pramāśanam iti bhāva bheda kathanena eva abhāva bhedāḥ api gamyante iti na uktāḥ iti arthaḥ atha vā kathitāḥ eva yeṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa upayogi yam tu na tathā na teṣām prapañcaḥ anupayukta bhāva prapañcaḥ iva vaktavyaḥ iti āha caturvarga anantarbhāvāt vā bhāva prapañca vat abhāva prapañcaḥ iti niḥśreyasa anupayogini bhāva prapañce yathā caturvarga anantarbhāvaḥ evam abhāva prapañce api iti atha niḥśreyasa upayoga abhāvaḥ kutas avagantavyaḥ iti atas āha bhāva upadeśāt eva abhāvaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti dvividham pramāṇam bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca yathā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva jñānam yatas dvitīya sūtra samutyānam prameyeṣu ca apavargaḥ eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ eve prayojana ādiṣu api iti tatra tatra ūhanīyam iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.29	 tat evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum bhāṣyam paṭhati sat ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate iti atra prathame kalpe caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe khalu śabdaḥ spaṣṭa arthe tat eva ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekhyate na asat tasya sat adhīna prakāśa tvāt iti dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce khaluḥ avadhāraṇe sati ṣoḍaśa adha eva upadekṣyamāṇe asat api upadekṣyate iti arthaḥ prakṛti artham vyācaṣṭe vyūhaḥ iti sūtrasya sa prapañca tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyāci khya asunā bhāṣya kāreṇa tāsām khalu āsām sadvidhānām iti bhāṣyeṇa sūtram avatārya paṭhitam tat asya vārtika kṛt tātparyam āha te ete sat bhedāḥ iti sūtram te ete pramāṇa ādayaḥ sat bhedāḥ niḥśreyasa upayoginaḥ na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ tasmāt sat su pramāṇa ādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa eva udiyeṣṭāḥ lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ santaḥ api niḥśreyasa anupayogāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.30^1	 dvandva svarūpam āha sarva padā iti dvandva parigrahe tātparyam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati sarve eva iti bahu vrīhi karma dhārayayoḥ asaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhī samāsa parigrahe nigraha sthānasya antya padārthasya prādhānye vivakṣita artha hāna prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ nirdeśe yayā vacanam vigraha eti asta bhāṣyasya tātparyam āha yathāvacanam iti anyonya nirapekṣāṇām pratyekam pramā hetu bhāvaḥ pramāṇānām iti hi bahuvacana prayojanam prameyeṣu tu yadi api prameya tā vāstavī pratyekam asti tathā api apavarga hetu bhāvena prameya tā samudāye samāpyate na tu pratyekam ātma ādīnām anya matasya api atattva jñāne saṃsārān anivṛtteḥ iti yat eva hi nirdeśa vacana bhedasya prayojanam tat eva ca uddeśe api tayoḥ eka vākya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.30^2	 pramāṇa ādīnām iti vibhakti artha vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam paṭhitvā pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram kārakāṇām iti tad vibhajate yatra iti kāraka arthaḥ pradhāna kriyā yat uddeśena sarva kāraka pravṛttiḥ kāraka grahaṇena ca tat na antarīyaka tayā pradhāna kriyā api ānīta iti vivaraṇe sā api darśitāḥ yadi api sva svāmi bhāva ādau= api saṃbandhe antargataḥ kriyā kāraka saṃbandhaḥ a sti saṃbandha mātrasya kriyā garbha tvāt tat na antarīyaka tvāt ca kārakasya tathā api asau na vivakṣyate saṃbandha mātram eva tu vivakṣyate iti arthaḥ tatra codayati tattvasya iti ṣaṣṭhī ca anarthikāḥ avyatireke tad anupapatteḥ iti api draṣṭavyam tatra aniyam avādi eka deśī pariharati na ubhayathā api iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.30^3	 bhāvasya bhavitra dhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt bhāvanirūpaṇam eva bhavitṛ nirūpaṇam ākṣipati abhede api iti iṣu sthityā yathā tad bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ iṣobhāvaḥ dharmaḥ gatiḥ tasya pratiṣadhaḥ sthitiḥ tiṣṭhategrati nivṛtti artha tvāt evam atra api na pramāṇa prameya ādi mātram acyate tattva grahaṇena api tu artha antaram teṣu eva yat yat samāropitam rūpam anyathātvam iti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate gatimat iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ yathā dvekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane iti dvi tva eka tvayoḥ iti saṃkhyā iva vikṣāyām tu dvi ekeṣu iti syāt tena gati mad tvam artha antaram iṣoḥ nabhavati iti asmin= arthe iṣoḥ sthitiḥ iti prayujyate iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.30^4	 tat etat eka deśi matam artha antara tva niyama vādī dūṣayati tat na iti pramāṇa dibhyaḥ anartha antarasya tattvasya ca iṣoḥ anartha antarasya gati abhāvasya ca asiddheḥ yathā ca bhāva atiriktaḥ abhāvaḥ tathā kṣaṇa bhaṅga adhikāre nivedayiṣyate pramāṇa ādi atiriktam ca tattvam anantaram eva darśayiṣyati iti tattvasya jñānam ityādi bhāṣyam vyāpaṣṭe tattvam jñāyamānam iti ubhayam pṛcchati kim punar iti tattva praśnasya uttram tattvam iti nimitta tvam śaktiḥ pramāṇa ādīnām sā ca dvayī su rūpa lakṣaṇā sahakāri sākalya lakṣaṇā ca atīndriyasya sāmarthyasya naiyānikaiḥ anabhyupeta tvāt śakteḥ ca bhāva tvena bhavitṛ nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt bhavituḥ api nirūpaṇam bhavati iti uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.31^1	 abhimatam niḥśreyasam grahītum niḥśreyasa dvaividhyam āha niḥśreyasam purar iti takri jña dṛṣṭam niḥśreyasam grahītum dṛṣṭam ati prasaṅga āpādanena dūṣayati eve ca kṛtvā iti sūtra kāra abhimatam niḥśreyasam āha param tu iti etat uktam bhavati yadi api niḥśreyasa padam abhimata mātra vāci pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānasya ca dṛṣṭam api niḥśreyasam saṃbhavati tasya eva tatas sākṣāt utpatteḥ tathā api ātma ādi vācaka prameya pada samabhivyāhārāt adṛṣṭam eva niḥśreyasam abhipreta sūtrakārasya tatra ca pramāṇam ādi tattva jñānasya api pārarmyeṇa hetu bhāvaḥ asti eva iti codayati dṛṣṭam iti dṛṣṭe darśanam eva pramāṇam adṛṣṭam tu niḥśreyasam aprāmāṇikam darśana abhāvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na na asti arthasya tathā abhāvāt arthaḥ ātma ādiḥ tasya āgama anumāna sahakāriṇā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva anumānam eva atra arthe pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.31^2	 ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārtha tattva jñāna mātram eva para niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti yathā āhuḥ ekaḥ bhāvaḥ tattvataḥ yena dṛṣṭāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ tattvataḥ tena dṛṣṭāḥ iti tān pratyāha yadi punar iti na hi bhāvānām tattvam anyat atas pratyakṣa viṣayīkṛtāt rūpāt iti bhāvaḥ mokṣamāṇāḥ iti sani mucaḥ akarmakasya guṇaḥ vā iti guṇa abhyāsa lopau na kevalam vastu vṛttiḥ sūtrakārasya api saṃmatam editi atas āha pṛthak upadeśāt ca prameyasya pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ yadi ca yat kiñcit prameya tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasasya parasya prāptiḥ kimartham ātmāt asūtreṇa dvādaśa eva prameyāṇi na adhikāni na nyūnāni ca iti avadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa tasmāt tat eva sākṣāt upayoti niḥśreyase na padārtha mātram iti āha prameya avadhāraṇa arthāyām ca utrara sūtra prikriyā āyām akuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt kutas prameyasya vihata tvāt ādyena sūtreṇa iti tasmāt yadi upapattiḥ yadi ca sūtrakārabhimata subhayathā api prameya tattva parijñānam parasya niḥśreyasasya hetuḥ tat anena ātma ādeḥ iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.32^1	 atha kim tattva jñānasya ātma ādi viṣayasya adṛṣṭaḥ eva kaḥ api sāmarthya atiśayaḥ yatas para niḥśreyasa utpādaḥ mā evam kim tarhi dṛṣṭayā eva dvāra iti āha bhāṣya kāraḥ tat ca etat iti niḥśreyasa hetu bhāva abhidhānasya anu paścāt udyate anūdyate tattva jñāna utpāde hi sākṣāt tad viṣaya mithyā jñāna ādi nivṛtti krameṇa apavarga utpādaḥ iti dvitīya sūtreṇa ānadyate tat etat bhāṣyam tat ca etat ityādi adhigacchati iti antam anūdya vyācaṣṭe heyam iti mithyājñānam ātma ādiṣu prameyeṣu avidyā tad mūlam tṛṣṇā upalakṣaṇam ca etat dveṣaḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ tad mūlau ca dharma adharmau tat etat heyam hānam tattva jñānam hīyate hi anena etat sarvam tasya pramāṇasya upāyaḥ śāstram adhigantavyaḥ mokṣaḥ evaṃmavayavān vibhajya tātparyam āha etāni iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.32^2	 etāni catvāri artha padāni puruṣa artha sthānāni na kevalam heya adhigantavya bhedena dvādaśa vidra prameyam darśayataḥ tad viṣaya tattva jñānāya ca sa upakaraṇa nyāya abhidhāna pramāṇa vyutpādakam śāstram praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmatam api tu sarveṣām eva adhyātma vidām ācāryāṇām iti bhāṣyatāt paryam iti arthaḥ tatra saṃśaya ādīnām pṛthak vacanam anarthakam ityādi codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭesaṃśaya ādi agrahaṇam iti satyam iti parihāra bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭaiḥ na vidyā iti codyam vivṛṇoti saṃśaya ādayaḥ iti parihāram vivṛṇoti na vidyā iti prasthānam vyāpāraḥ teṣām pṛthak vacanam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa tasyāḥ saṃśaya ādi iti na ca vācayam astu vidyā trayam eva kṛtamānvīkṣikyā vidyayā iti tasyāḥ eva samasta vidyā avadātīkaraṇa hetu tvāt yathā vakṣyati pradīpaḥ sarva vidyānām iti sa ca ayam kiṃsvid iti vastu vimarśa mātram anavadhāraṇa jñānam saṃśayaḥ iti bhāṣyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.32^3	 tat vyācaṣṭe tatra saṃśaya ādiṣu saṃśayaḥ tāvat iti jñānam avadhāraṇam pratyayaḥ iti paryāyāḥ iti manvānaḥ ca ādayati anavadhāraṇa ātmakaḥ iti na jñāna mātra paryāyaḥ avadhāraṇa śabdaḥ api tu tidvaśeṣa viścaya vacanaḥ kiṃsvid iti dolāyamānasya ubhaya koṭi spṛśaḥ pratyayasya arthe anavadhāraṇa ātmakasya api pratyātmam mānasena pratyakṣeṇa avadhāryamāṇa tvāt iti pariharati na vyāghātaḥ iti tat tasmāt abhayam iti tatra nānapalabdhe ityādi bhāṣyam avatārayitum pṛcchati sa katham nyāyasya iti yadi nyāyasya aṅga saṃśayaḥ bhavet saḥ api vyutpādyeta iti bhāvaḥ uttaram yasmāt iti etat ākṣipati upalabdhaḥ iti pañca rūpaḥ catū rūpaḥ vā hetuḥ nyāyaḥ pratijña ādi ava yava samūhaḥ vā nyāyaḥ nīyate prāpyate vivakṣita artha siddhiḥ anena iti tasya āśrayaḥ viṣayaḥ upalabdhaḥ ucyamānaḥ nirṇotaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ sandigdhe hi tasmin hetuḥ sandigdha āśraya tayā asiddhaḥ syāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.32^4	 yathā iha naga niku je mayūraḥ kekāyitā pātāt iti tadā apāta sandehe atas na nirṇītaḥ ced na upalabdhaḥ tatas ca upalabdhaḥ ca anirṇotaḥ ca iti vyāhatam iti arthaḥ pariharati na asti vyāghātaḥ iti samām anyataḥ parvata mātram upalabdham nirṇotam tad viśeṣaḥ tu vahnimat tva ādiḥ a nirṇītaḥ iti punar codayati evam api iti upalabdhaḥ nirṇotaḥ iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt samāna viṣaya tvam darśayati tathā ca vyāghātaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhedena tu vyāghātam pariharan sāmānādhikaraṇyam na samarthayasaḥ iti bhāvaḥ pariharati na yathā tathā iti vyāpadeśāt iti sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ sāmāna adhika araṇyāt yaḥ eva sāmānyaḥ nirṇotaḥ saḥ eva viśeṣataḥ anirṇotaḥ api saṃbhavati iti na vyāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ evam artha nyāya pravṛtti artham asandigdhe nyāya pravṛtteḥ anupapatteḥ na hi kariṇi dṛṣṭe cītkāreṇa tam anumi ime pekṣāvantaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^1	 prayojana svarūpa pratipādana pūrvakam prayojana pada prayojana pradaśana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣe atha prayojanam vyākhyātum pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaṃram yena iti sphuṭataram avaitat iti arthaḥ punar pṛcchati kena iti eka deśi matena uttaram āha dharma iti tatra kāmaḥ iti icchā mātram vā ucyate kāminī viṣayaḥ vā rāgaḥ pūrvasmina kalpe kāmaḥ iti eva astu kṛtam dharma ādi bhaḥ sarveṣām eva kāmyamāna tvāt uttarasmin= avyāptiḥ saraka mṛgayā ādīnām kāmyānām asaṃgrahāt dharma mokṣayoḥ api nāstikān pratyapravartaka tvam tasmāt ayuktam editi manvānaḥ āha vayam tu paśyāmaḥ iti sukhasya āptyāḥ duḥkhasya ha anyāḥ viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam pratyayam upalakṣam ati asatyoḥ akāraṇavāt satyoḥ vā anarthakat pavāt pravṛtteḥ iti tathā api sukha duḥkha āptita hānyoḥ eva kartuḥ pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ na tad sādhane na hi anya dvijānāti icchati ca karoti ca anyat iti ghaṭate atiprasaṅgāt na ca phalam puruṣa pravṛtti gocaraḥ tad sādhanam tu tad gocaraḥ tad sādhana tva vijñānāt tad sādhanaḥ eva pravartate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^2	 tat na ati pa saṅgaḥ iti ced hanta tarhi tad sādhana tva jñānam eva pravartayati na phala jñānam jñāna icchā pravṛttīnām kārya kāraṇa bhūtānām sāmāna adhika araṇyena saṃpratipattaṃriti abhiprāyeṇa āha sukha duḥkha sādhana bhāvat sarve arthāḥ cetanam prayojayanti iti tuśabdaḥ phalāt vyavacchinatti atra api viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam pratyayam upalakṣayati etat uktu bhavati toyam upalabhya tad jātīyasya apekṣi sādhanām dṛṣṭa carīm anusmarati atha tad jātīya tā liṅgena dṛśyamānasya apekṣi sāṇana bhāvam anumimīte anumāya ca pipāsuḥ pravartate tena upāya jñānasya sākṣāt puruṣa pravṛtti hetuvam phalasya tu īpsitam asya udyeśatayā iti sarvam sundaram tad āśrayaḥ ca nyāyaḥ pravartate iti bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe tat idam prayojanam nyāyasya iti ākṣipati kaḥ iti samādhatte upakāraka tvam iti yathā rāja āśritaḥ paṇḍitaḥ iti upakāraka tvam eva darśa yati tad mūla tvāt iti vidhiḥ pravṛttiḥ na jātu niṣprayojanā kākadanta ādau parīkṣām ārabhante prekṣāvantaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^3	 ākṣipati kā punar iyam iti nyāya āśraya tvam prayojanasya pratijñāya parīkṣā śraya tva samartha namasaṅgatam iti bhāvaḥ uttaram nyāyaḥ tasmāt na asaṃgatam iti arthaḥ nanu evam api nīyate prāpyate vivakṣita artha siddhiḥ anena iti vyupattyā pratyakṣa ādi pratyekam nyāyaḥ na ca etat pratyekam prayojanam āśrayate ajihāsita anupāditsitānām api avijñāsitānām arthānām pratyakṣa ādi gocara tva darśanāt itti ākṣipati kaḥ punar ayam nyāyaḥ samādhatte pramāṇaiḥ iti pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa mūlāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ pañca avayavāḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ arthasya liṅgasya parīkṣaṇa parīkṣā parīkṣitu tu liṅga panca avayava upapannam anumeya pratyaya phalam bhāvayati eva na tu atumeya artha parīkṣā tasya sandigdha tve api svarūpeṇa parīkṣā an āspada tvāt iti nanu avayavaiḥ ced artha parīkṣaṇa na tarhi pramāṇaiḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ abheda abhāvāt ityatas āha kim uktam bhavati iti na sākṣat pratijña ādayaḥ avayavāḥ artha parīkṣāyām upayujyante api tu sva kāraṇa tad pramāṇa sūcanena 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^4	 tasmāt pramāṇānām avāntara vyāpāraḥ pratijña ādayaḥ iti upapannam pramāṇaiḥ artha parīkṣaṇam tat idam uktam pramāṇa vyāpārāditi iti tasmāt na ekaikam pramāṇam iti samasta pramāṇa upakaraṇa tvāt eva ca asya parama tvam iti āha saḥ ayam iti pañca avayava upapanna tayā ca pratyakṣa āgām a āśrita tvam na tad virodhaḥ iti pradarśana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣya tātparyām vyācaṣṭe prayakṣa āgama iti katham punar anena bhāṣyeṇa tat ucyate iti atas āha yat iha anumānena iti yat punar anumānam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa catra punar iti yatra hi virodhaḥ tatra pramāṇa mūlānām avayavānām pratijña ādīnām itaretara pratisandhānam eka vākyatā na asti pramāṇa virodhena ca ugya tā virahiṇām tad padārthānām pārama arthika anvaya abhāvāt iti tīrtham darśanam tasya pratirūpakaḥ adarśanam iva darśayati iti yāvat sa khalu tādṛśaḥ pañca avayava prayogaḥ lābha pūjā khyāti kāmaiḥ paṇḍitavyaḥ janairūpa varṇyamānaḥ pratyavāyāya prāc ava tu apavargāya iti arthaḥ tat evam samudāyataḥ bhaṣyam vyākhyāyava yava vibhāgāya paṭhati yat punar anumānam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^5	 pratyakṣa viruddha udāharaṇam āha anuṣṇaḥ agiḥ ava yavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti atra codayati kaḥ punar iti ida mātra ākūtam rūpa traya saṃpannam etat kṛtaka tvam na vā na ced tatas eve tarhi tad anumāna ābhāsam iti kṛtam pratyakṣa virodhena atha anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharma tatā saṃpannam api bādhita viṣaya tayā etatat apramāṇam tat ayuktam rūpa traya saṃpattyām khalu etat sva asādhyena avinābhūtam bhavati na ca bādhāvinā abhāvayoḥ saha saṃbhavaḥ bādhāyāma pakṣa dharmaḥ bhavet anaikāntikaḥ ca hetaḥ vijñāsita dharmaṇaḥ dharmiṇaḥ pacyamāna tvena pakṣa tvam na punar pratyakṣa avadhṛta sādhya viruddha dharmasya tasya ajijñāsita tvena apakṣa tayā tad dharmasya apakṣa dharma tvāt na ca aikāntikaḥ sādhya dharmiṇī eva pratyakṣa upasthāpita sādhya dharmavati darśanena vyabhicārāt na ca sa pakṣa āsa pakṣau= eva anvaya vyatireka agamyā vinābhāva darśana viṣayau na pakṣaḥ iti sāmpratam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^6	 yadi hi pakṣam vihāya bahis eva sa pakṣa āsa pakṣayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ gamyeta tadā bahis vyāpti mātra balena pakṣa dharmaḥ api hetuḥ na pakṣe sādhyam sādhayet asiddhāḥ hi tatra asya sva sādhyena vyāptiḥ tat etat paṇḍakam udvāhya mugdhāyāḥ putra prārthanam iva tasmāt antar bahis vā sarva upasaṃhāreṇa avinābhāvaḥ avagantavyaḥ evam ca siddhaḥ pakṣe api vyabhicāraḥ sādhana dharmasya iti anaikāntika tvam tathā ca rūpa traya sampannaḥ hetuḥ bādhita viṣayaḥ ca iti asaṃbhavaḥ tasmāt suṣṭhūkm kaḥ punar asya anumānasya rūpa traya samnnasya virodhaḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ rūpa traya saṃpannam viruddham ca iti arthaḥ atra samādhim āha anumāna aviṣaye prayogaḥ vakṣyati hi anumāna adhikāre yathā anaupadhikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ anumāna aṅgam na tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādiḥ avyāpaka tvāt atiprasaṅgat ca iti sa ca evam pravartate yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvaḥ anuṣṇaḥ yathā ghaṭadiḥ iti na ca vahneḥ iva dhūma saṃbandhe ārdra indhana saṃyogaḥ guru anta vāsinoḥ sāhacarye iva svādhyāya adhyayanam upādhiḥ kṛtaka tvān uṣṇa tvayoḥ saṃbandhe upalabhyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^7	 saḥ ayam śaṅkitaḥ samāropitaḥ vā prayatnena punar punar anviṣyamāṇaḥ anupalabhyamānaḥ tatra tatra ghaṭa ādau= upādhiḥ na asti iti pratyakṣeṇa yadi abhaviṣyat ghaṭa ādi vat eva vyajñāsi atra vijñāna abhāvāt na asti eva iti tarka sahāyena niśvīyate saḥ ayam rūpeṇa iva rasasya śvastanena iva savituḥ ūdayena adyanasya tad udayasya samudra vṛddha ceva candra udayasya samāna kālasya kṛtaka tvasya anuṣṇa tvena svābhāvikaḥ autsārgikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyena yaḥ yaḥ kṛkaḥ sa sarvaḥ anuṣṇaḥ iti avadhāritaḥ na tu nirvibhajya tejaḥ avayavini na hi sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ eka deśa viṣayā bhavitum arhati eka deśa viṣaya tve yatra eva na darśitā tena eva anaikāntika tvam āśaṅkyeta tathā ca tatra tatra eka deśe pratyekam vyāpti pradarśanam aśakyam ānanyāt tasmāt sarva upasaṃhāreṇa eva tad upadarśanam tat iha kṛtaka tvam autsargika sāmānya viṣaya vyāpti smaraṇa sadhrīcīnam pakṣa dharma tā vaśāt viśeṣe tejaḥ vayavini sādhayitum anuṣṇa tā unmukham yat na sādhayet tat kim pratyakṣeṇa apahṛta viṣaya tvāt āhosvit anaikāntika tvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.33^8	 na tāvat anaikān ki tvam prāk eva sāmānyatas anaupādhika saṃbandhasya avadhāraṇāt uṣṇe tejaḥ vayavini kṛtaka tvasya darśanāt anaikāntikam apakṣa dharmaḥ vā kṛtaka tvam iti ced na anumānena sāmānyatas avadhṛta vyāptinā tasya ana auṣṇya asādhanāt pratyakṣeṇa tejaḥ avayavinaḥ auṣṇya graheṇa tatra kṛtaka tvasya hetoḥ vṛttau= utpannam api vyāpti vijñānam bādhyate tatas ca ana ekānki tvāt a pravṛttiḥ anumānasya iti ced na anumāna pravṛtti viṣaye sādhya dharmiṇi hetoḥ vyabhicāra an udbhāvanāt anyathā tad gata sādhya dharma sandehe tatra upalabhyamānaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sandigdha byatiḥ eki vādana ekāntikaḥ syāt sandigdha sādhya dharme dṛṣṭāntaḥ iva sādhana dharmaḥ tathā ca anumāna mātram ucchidyeta pratyakṣeṇa sādhya dharma viparya darśanāt tejaḥ vayavinaḥ anuṣṇa tvena asādhaya tvam tathā ca anaikāntika tvam tat idam uktam yasmina viṣaye tejasaḥ anuṣṇa tve etat prayuktam sa pratyakṣeṇa apahṛtaḥ iti evam ca anumāne dūṣite kṛtam apakṣa dharma tva vyabhicārābhyām tad upajīvibhyām iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.34^1	 yat punar dignāgena pratyakṣa viruddham anumānam udāhṛtam tat upanyasyati apare punar iti aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti bruvāṇaḥ śabda svarūpam eva apalapati na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat asti śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat aḥ tita śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam na ca agṛhyamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sat vyavahāra gocaraḥ tasmāt evaṃvādinaḥ abhiprāya vyāptam asat tvam śabdasya tathā ca pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ dūṣayi taiḥ tu iti sa viśeṣaṇe hi vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṃkrāmate iti utsargaḥ kvacid punar viśiṣṭa vidhānam api bhavati ananya gati tvāt tat yathā lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti sati vibhave na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.34^2	 tadvat iha api aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti śruti vākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇa tva viśeṣaṇa upasaṃkāntaḥ niṣedhaḥ na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate na api śrāvaṇa tva niṣadhāda arthaḥ śabda niṣedhaḥ vādi abhiprāya vyāptaḥ vacana artha avirodhinaḥ arthasya artha gamya tvāt na tad virodhinaḥ śrāvaṇa tva niṣedhasya ca adhikāraṇa śabdaḥ iti na śabda abhāve tad niṣedhaḥ avakalpate na ca abhāvaḥ tucchaḥ iti tṛtīyaḥ upapādayiṣyate na ca śrāvaṇa tvam pratyakṣa gocaraḥ tat hi śabda śrotrayoḥ saṃbandha kṛt taddhita samāseṣu saṃbandha abhidhānam tu atalbhyām iti kātyāyanīya vacanāt na ca pratyakṣa apratyakṣa vṛtti saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tasmāt śrāvaṇa tvam apratyakṣam iti na atra pratyakṣa virodhaḥ tat idam uktam indriya vṛttī nām anīndriya tvāt iti vṛttiḥ sva arthe saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^1	 āgama viruddham udāharati śuci iti manu ādibhiḥ nara asthi sparśa pratiṣedhāt sparśe ca prāya śvitta upadeśāt aśuci tvam nara śiraḥ kapāla ādīnām iti kāpālikaḥ ākṣipati katham iti na asmākam vedaḥ tad mūlā vā smṛtayaḥ pramāṇam iti abhiprāyaḥ uttaram śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti bruvatā śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa anapekṣeṇa anumāna mātra sahāyena atra vastuni vayā śuci rūpaḥ arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ kim uktam bhavati śuci iti yadi ucyeta spraṣṭuḥ pratyavāya abhāvaḥ siddhāntī pṛcchati sa kasya iti vācyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^2	 yadi ātmanaḥ iti brūyāt kāpālikaḥ avigītā hi vyavahāra paramparā asmākam kāpālikānām nara śiraḥ kapālaka sparśa tad avasthita anna pāna upayoga lakṣaṇā dākṣiṇātyānām ivāhnena evuka ādi lakṣaṇā kriyā śreyaskarī tasmāt asmākam apratyavāya karayā śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti arthaḥ tatra sa upahāsam uttaram āha tad āgama anuṣṭhāna tātparya avasthānāt kāpālikasya evam etat śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa lakṣaṇa āgama vihitam artham ācaratām tad nisiddham ca pariharatām dākṣiṇātyānām āhnena evuka ādi anuṣṭhānam anādi adya yāvat anuvartamānam avigītam āmnāya mūla tām anumāpayati ātmānaḥ śreyaḥ hetu bhāvena na khalu āgama anapekṣaḥ sahasreṇa api anumānaiḥ imam artham avagantum arhati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^3	 kāpalikānām tu āgama vihitam akurvatām kurvatām ca tat niṣiddham artham prayatnena anādiḥ api vyavahāraḥ śākya mallaka ādīnām iva na veda anumāna mūlam iti bhāvaḥ atha trayī vidām nara śiraḥ kapālam apratyavāya hetuḥ iti brūyāt tadā trayyā vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena prāmāṇya upagamāt āgama virodhaḥ tadīya sparśasya trayyām niṣedhena pratyavāya hetu va niścayāt api ca āgama anapekṣaḥ anumānena śaucam nara śiraḥ kapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyaḥ jāyate śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti kaḥ arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^4	 nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate saḥ eva arthaḥ tat kim pṛcchacate iti atas āha viśeṣa vidhānam ca śeṣa pratiṣedha param loke dṛṣṭam yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyati iti ukte na vāmena iti gamyate tat iha yadi śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam kim anyat aśuci iti vaktavyam na hi nara uccāra ādīnām aśuci tve pramāṇam anyat astyāgamāt āgama pramāṇyam ca na manyasaḥ iti bhāvaḥ atha trayī vidveṣāt anumāna pakṣa āpātinā tvayā sarvam eva nara viṣ kapāla ādi śauca pakṣe nikṣipyate iti āha atha sarvam eva śuci pariharati dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti kṛtaḥ sarvasya pakṣīkṛta tvāt codayati atha anumāna viruddhra kasmāt anumānam na bhavati iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^5	 na khalu pramāṇa tvena pratyakṣa āgamābhyām anumānasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ yena tau bādhakau= anumānasya na anumānam iti bhāvaḥ pariharati ekasmin= anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāvāt ayam abhisandhiḥ yat tāvat anumānam pūrva pravṛttam tena bādhita viṣayam tabdala bhāvi paścattanam anumāna na sva kāryāya paryāptam yathā uktam aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iyasya anumānasya anumāna virodhaḥ iti labdha svarūpam hi vastu kvacid kiścid niṣidhye na tu jñāna ākāra alīke bahis iti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^6	 tat iha śrāvaṇa tvam śabdasya niṣedha tā pūrvam śravaṇam indriyam atīndriya tat grāhrātvam ca vastunī anumātavye śabda upalambha lakṣaṇena kāryeṇa tathā ca etena eva anumānena apahṛta viṣayam aśrāvaṇa tva anumānam caramam anvaya vyatireka saṃpannam api na sva ucitam kāryā janayati eve tanu bhuvana ādīnām na karteśvaraḥ aśarīri tvāt mukta satma vat prayojana abhāvāt iti ādi āpi īśvara dharmi grāhi mūlāna mānena apahṛta viṣaya tayā nyāya ābhāsam veditavyam tasmāt paraspara anapekṣa samāna kāla pravṛtti samartha anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāva abhiprāyam etat uktam na hi anayoḥ anyatarat bādhyam bādhaka vā saṃbhavati kim tu mithas sat pratipakṣa tayā na pramām kurutaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^7	 kasmāt punar na samāveśaḥ anumānayoḥ asamāveśe vā kutas sat pratipakṣatā iti atas āha na hi anvaya vyatireka sampanne iti iha anvaya vyatireka grahaṇena samāna balayoḥ anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharma tva asat pratipakṣa tvāni upalakṣitāni etaiḥ sampannayoḥ yadi samāveśaḥ ekasmin viṣaye bhavet tatas ekatarasya bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam vā gamyeta api na tu etat asti asaprapipa kṣatā sampatteḥ abhāvāt iti upasaṃharati tasmāt na anumāna virudvam anumānam tulya balam api tu sat pratipakṣam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.35^8	 pratyakṣam api anumeya viruddha sādhanāt anumānasya pratipakṣaḥ iti sat pratipakṣa tayā anvaya vyatireka ādi sampannasya anumānasya na pratyakṣeṇa tad viruddha artha upasaṃhāriṇā samāveśaḥ iti na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ iyabhiprāyeṇa codayati pratyakṣa virodhyapi iti pariharati na na iti tulya balau hi mithas pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbala uttama balau na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣaḥ hariṇa śāvakasya kim tu samara kaṇḍū nighna viṣāṇa koṭi samullikhita gaṇḍaśailasya vipina māhiṣasya tasmāt pūrva bhāvi pratyakṣam ananyathā siddham sat asat pratipakṣam anumānam samāna viṣaya samāveśāt bādhataḥ iti yuktam iti arthaḥ
