NVTṬ_1,1.1.36	 codayati atha upamāna viruddham anumānam kasmāt na bhavati go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti āraṇyakasya vākyam śrutvā yadā nāgarakaḥ vanam gataḥ go sadṛśam piṇḍam upalabhe tadā asya vākya artha anubhava āhita saṃskāra prabodha janita smṛti apekṣa go sādṛśya jñānam upamānam puras avasthitasya piṇḍasya gavaya śabda vācya tva jñāne pramāṇam tatra yadi kaścid pramāṇayet na eṣa piṇḍaḥ gavaya śabda vācyaḥ gopiṇḍa sādṛśyāt gopiṇḍa antara vat iti tat ida mana mānam upamānena bādhita viṣayam astu iti arthaḥ saṃpratipattiḥ uttaram na upamāna viruddham na bhavati iti anuṣajyate asti ced kasmāt na uktam iti ataa āha pūrva pramāṇa virodha anuvidhānāt na uktam iti śeṣaḥ tat darśayati upamāna virodhaḥ iti sva phala dvārā śabdam pramāṇam darśayati upamāna virodhaḥ iti sva phala dvārā śābdam pramāṇam darśayati āgama iti sva phala dvārā eva pratyakṣam pramāṇa darśayati sārūpya jñānam iti upasaṃharati pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ virodhāt virodha abhidhānāt uktam tat upamāna viruddham anumānam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.37^1	 bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra vāda jalpau= iti prayojana svarūpa upayoga abhidhāna anantaram dṛṣṭānta pade vyākhyātavye tad ullaṅghanena vāda jalpayoḥ kaḥ avasaraḥ iti arthaḥ avasaram āha tena anena iti prayojana vyākhyāna aṅgam eva idam na vāda jalpa vyākhyā aṅgam iti asti avasaraḥ iti bhāvaḥ tatra śabda artham vyācaṣṭe tasmin nyāya ābhāse iti vāda jalpa kathayoḥ hi na dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ vastuni viruddha dharma dvaya samāveśa amāvāt tasmāt dvayoḥ ekasya nyāyaḥ ekasya tu nyāya ābhāsaḥ iti vāda jalpābhyām vivicyate nyāya ābhāsaḥ iti tu sannidhānāt uktam sannihita artha tvāt sarva nāmnaḥ iti vitaṇḍā tu parīkṣyatam sa prayojanā niṣprayojanā vā iti tuśabdaḥ prasiddha prayojanābhyām vāda jalpābhyām vyavacchinatti pratipakṣa sthāpana ahīnā hi vitaṇḍā ucyate tatra sthāpanā hīna tvāt pratipakṣa hīnā iti pratīyate na khalu sthāpana abhāve sthāpya saṃbhavaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.37^2	 tathā vitaṇḍa cate vyāhanyate anayā pratipakṣa sādhanam iti vyutpattyā para pakṣa upaghātena pāriśeṣyāt sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asyāḥ prayojanam pratīyate tat evam sandigdha prayojanā satī vitaṇḍā parīkṣyate prayojanavatī na vā iti tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tatas na sarvāḥ vidyāḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi tad mukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ vitaṇḍāyāḥ eva karma rūpāyāḥ vidyā rūpāyāḥ vā niṣprayojanātvāt atha prayojanavatī tatas upapannā prayojana vyāptiḥ kim tāvat prāptam tatra kecid bruvate niṣprayojanā vitaṇḍa iti sthāpanā hīna tayā tāvat sthāpayaḥ pakṣaḥ na asti avayava vyutpattyā api para sādhanāvidhātaḥ pratīyate na ca tāvat mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asti na hi parvata nitamba vartiti dhūme asiddha tva ādinā dūṣite vahneḥ tatra abhāvaḥ niścīyate tat idam uktam dūṣaṇa mātra tvāt iti tam imam niṣprayojana vitaṇḍā vādinam pratyāhatat ca na evam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.37^3	 para sādhana dūṣaṇena asya pāriśeṣyāt sva pakṣaḥ sidhyatu mā vā saitsīt sa tu sva pakṣa set dhaca eva prayojanena pratipakṣa sādhanam āhanti iti bhāvaḥ tat aneva yadi prayojanam anuyuktaḥ ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam atha na pratipadyate ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa atha pakṣam api iti atha api ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe atha para pakṣa iti nāstikaḥ hi sat asat ubhaya anubhaya rūpa tayā na vicāram sahantaḥ iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati tat ayam para pakṣa pratiṣedha mātra prayuktaḥ pravartate na tu asya asti pakṣaḥ na ca sthāpanā tayoḥ api prameya pakṣa pātitayā dūṣya tvāt iti arthaḥ etat api ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa tādṛś eva etat eda dvibhajate etasmin= api pakṣe caturvarga ced pratīpadyate saḥ asya pakṣaḥ pratipattiḥ abhyupagamaḥ yadi api sthāpya eva pakṣaḥ tathā api tat na antarīyaka tayā abhyupagama mātreṇa caturvargaḥ api pakṣaḥ uktaḥ kaḥ caturvargaḥ iti atas āha caturvargaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.37^4	 eṣa sādhana vādī jñāpayati aham vaitaṇḍikaḥ jāne anena pañca avayavena sādhāna avākyena idam sādhyam jñāpyate iti caturvargaḥ tad pratītyā khalu asya vaitaṇḍikasya para pakṣa niṣedhaḥ prayojanam sidhyati tathā ca na viṣprayojanaḥ ayam vaitaṇḍikaḥ iti arthaḥ dvitīyam kalpam dūṣayati atha na pratipadyate iti caturvarganā antarīyaka tvāt dūṣaṇam api na pratipadyate iti unmatta vat upakṣaṇīyaḥ iti arthaḥ aparam api nāstika vaitaṇḍikam prati doṣam āha pratipakṣā iti asiddha viruddha ādi doṣaḥ vākyasya vaitaṇḍika prayuktasya arthaḥ tam yadi pratipadyate saḥ asya pakṣaḥ atha asiddha viruddha ādīnām sadbhāva abhyupagame prameya madhya pātinām prameya mātra vicāra asaha tva abhyupagamaḥ vighaṭate iti sva vākya abhihitam eva addhi viruddha ādi na pratipadyate pūrvavat doṣaḥ na ayam laukikaḥ na parīkṣakaḥ iti tasmāt vitaṇḍā api prayojanavatī iti na avyāpakam prayojanam iti siddham saḥ ayam prasakta anuprasaktivādaḥ prayojana vyākhyāna aṅgam iti āha uktam prayojanam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.38^1	 dṛṣṭānta pada vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam anubhāṣate pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ iti ākṣipati kim uktam bhavati iti na tāvat yaḥ yaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ sa sarvaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ adṛṣṭāntasya api pratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt na api yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ āgama ādi viṣayasya api dṛṣṭānta tvāt tasmāt ayuktam etat iti ākṣepaḥ iti tad samādhāna bhāṣyam yatra iti tat vacā ācaṣṭe laukika parīkṣakāṇām darśana vighāta hetuḥ iti etat ca kvacid laukika parīkṣakāṇām kvacid parīkṣakāṇām iti mantavyam anyathā yat aprasiddham laukikānām kevalam paṇḍita rūpa vedanīyam paramāṇu ādi tasya adṛṣṭānta tā syāt atra ca yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ saḥ evam te tu yaḥ eve sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti draṣṭavyam evaṃbhūta vyākhyānasya prayojanam darśayati evam ca iti tat vibhajate darśana avidhātā iti na kevalam prameya virodhaḥ sūtra virodhaḥ ca iti atas āha tatas ca udāharaṇa sūtram vyāhanyate yat teṣu teṣu śāstra pradeśeṣu atīndriya udāharaṇa sūtram siddhānte pūrva pakṣe vā yathā mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat aṇu śyāma tā anitya tva vat iti evamādi tat vyāhanyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.38^2	 na tu udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa sūtram tat hi pratyakṣa viṣaya dṛṣṭānta tve api upapadyate eva tasmāt bhāṣye pratyakṣa vacanam dṛṣṭānta viṣaya pramāṇa dāḍhrayam lakṣayati pratyakṣa mūla tvāt vā pratyakṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ anyathā anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti saḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ prameye antar bhavan= evam artham pṛthak uktaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam iti nyāyasya pañca avayava ātmakasya vacana samūhasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ mūlam atas tasya pṛthak upadeśaḥ atas ca asya pṛthak upadeśaḥ yat sati tasmin= iti anumāna nimitta tvam āha pūrva pratyakṣā iti dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dṛḍhatara pramāṇa avadhāritam iti arthaḥ śābda mūla tām drṛṣṭāntasya darśayati pūrva jñātam ca artham iti saṃbandha grahaṇa viṣayaḥ arthaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ saṃbandha grahaṇam ca śābdasya api jñānasya nimittam prathama śrāviṇaḥ śabdāt artha jñāna abhāvāt tasmāt asti śābde api dṛṣṭāntasya upayogaḥ iti aparam api pṛthak upādāna prayojanam āha nāstikasya iti aprapañcane hetum āha tat uktam bhāṣyaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.39^1	 siddhān pada vivaraṇa bhaṣyam vyācaṣṭe abhyupagama iti tad vibhajate abhyupagamaḥ idim itthambhūtam ca iti tad vibhajate idam iti iti idam iti hi dharmi viṣayam siddhāntam darśayati dharmaḥ sarva tantra siddhānta viṣayaḥ ittham iti prati tantra adhikāraṇa abhyupagama siddhānta viṣayam darśayati vyavasthāyām upalakṣaṇa tayā pratitantra siddhānta mātram udāharati idam sāṃkhyeṣu eva iti upalakṣaṇa tām udāharaṇasya ajānānaḥ codayati sarva tantra iti pariharati yaḥ ayam iti abhyupagama vyavasthitiḥ anabhyupagamāt vyavacchinatti na tu puruṣa viśeṣe vyavasthāpayati iti bhāvaḥ asya api prameya antar gratasya api sataḥ pṛthak upādāna prayojanam āha tasya prameyaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.39^2	 tatra sarva tantra siddhānta siddhaḥ tāvat vipratipannānām api vādinām dharmaḥ tasya sarva tantra siddhānta siddhasya viśeṣeṣu prati tantra siddhāntāḥ pravartanta tathā hi yadi ghaṭaḥ nāma na sarva tantra siddhānta siddhaḥ kim āśrayā avayavī vā paramāṇu samūhaḥ vā jñāna ākāraḥ vā pradhāna pariṇāmaḥ vā brahma pariṇāmaḥ vā tad vivartaḥ vā iti prati tantra siddhāntāḥ pravartante katham ca prati tantra siddhānta āśrayaḥ vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ pravartante kim āśrayaḥ ca nyāyaḥ syāt tathā yadi adhikāraṇa siddhāntaḥ na bhavet katham sādhya sāmānya vyāptam sādhana sāmānyam iti sāṇana viśeṣat sādhya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta tasmāt asti prameyasya api siddhāntasya pṛthak upādana prayojanam abhyupagama siddhāntam ca upariṣṭāt vicārayiṣyati vāttika kṛt iti tad prayojanam iha asmābhinogktam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.40^1	 krama prāptān avayavān āha atha avayavāḥ nanu yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya sama vāci kāraṇam kim tathā eva ete pratijña ādayaḥ vākyasya no khalu rāgana guṇāḥ varṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇa tām pratipadyante iti āha vākya eka deśāḥ iti avayavāḥ iva avayavāḥ na punar samavāyi kāraṇam yathā hi avayavāḥ samudāyinaḥ ekasmin= avayavini kārye dhārayitavye ca evam ekasmin vivakṣita artha pratipādane pratijña ādayaḥ avayavāḥ vākyasya samudāyasya samudāyinaḥ iti nanu varṇānām āśutara vināśinām kramavatām eka kāla tva abhāve samudāya abhāvāt kutas tad samudāyaḥ vākyam kutas ca eka deśa tā ityāśa yavān ākṣipati kim punar vākyam uttaram pūrva pada smṛti apekṣaḥ antya pada pratyayaḥ smṛti anugraheṇa pratisandhīyamānaḥ viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ vākyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.40^2	 viśiṣyate iti viśeṣaḥ padārthaḥ ekaḥ kriyā vā kārakam vā prātipadikā arthaḥ vā padārtha antara viśiṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ yathā somena yajeta go dohanena paśu kāmasya yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ vā somam na pibet sa vrātyaḥ iti tasya viśeṣasya ekasya pratipatti hetuḥ tat evam samūha nibandhanam padānām eka kārya tvam sūcayati kaḥ viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ iti atas uktam antya pada pratyayaḥ antyam viśeṣyam viroṣaṇa pūrvaka tvāt tasya padam na ca tad aviditam sattā mātreṇa cakṣuḥ ādi vat viśeṣyam pratipādayati iti atas uktam pratyayaḥ iti pratīyamānam viśeṣya vāci padam viśeṣyam bodhayati pratītiḥ ca na anubhavaḥ api tu smṛti na hi kramavat varṇa samudāyaḥ padam śravaṇa indriya anubhava gocaraḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhavanti tu pratyekam varṇāḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.40^3	 na ca ete pratyekam padam na ca pūrva varṇa smṛti nicaya sāhitaḥ antya varṇa anubhavaḥ śrotra jaiti yuktam smṛtīnām sva kārya saṃskāra virodhinīnām asahabhāvāt vinaśya davinaśyat avasthayoḥ tu upāntyā antya varṇa smṛti anubhavayoḥ syāt na ca etāvatā artha pratyayaḥ pūrva varṇa smṛtīnām nirobhāvāt na ca pūrva varṇa anubhavanita saṃskāra sahakāriṇaḥ śravaṇāt eva labdha janmanaḥ pratyayasya ekasya adhyasta tad smṛti anubhava rūpa vaicitryasya sat asat varṇa avagāhinaḥ viṣaya bhāvam āpannā varṇāḥ arthadhiyam ādadhati iti sāmpratam saṃbandha saṃvedana āhita saṃskāra ubdodha samaya janmanā sva janitena saṃskāreṇa saṃbandha smṛti utpatti samaye vināśāt padārtha avabodhaka tva anupapatteḥ tasmāt smṛtiḥ eva pratyayaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.40^4	 atas eva adhyayana samaye guru mukhāt gṛhītaḥ veda rāśiḥ vedāṅga upāṅga jñāna saṃskṛtena smaryamāṇaḥ eva tasya artham bodhayati evam ca yadā padārtha pratyāyane eva pada anubhavaḥ na kāraṇam tadā vākya artha jñāne nānā padārtha smaraṇā kāṅkṣā yogya tā sannidhāna avadhāraṇa ādi vyavahite kā eva kathā iti yadi tarhi viśeṣya padam eva smaryamāṇam viśiṣṭam artham avagamayati kṛtam pada antaraiḥ tatas eva vākya artha pratipatteḥ iti atas uktam pūrva pada smṛti apekṣaḥ pūrvam viśeṣaṇam tad pūrvaka tvāt viśeṣya pratīteḥ tasya padava smaryamāṇa pūrva pada apekṣaḥ yadi api smaraṇāni na saha saṃbhavanti tathā api eka smṛti samārūḍhāni vā padāni nirantara smṛti saṃtāna samārūsani vā paraspara apekṣāṇi tathā ca smaryamāṇam viśeṣya padam viśeṣaṇa pada apekṣam viśiṣṭam artham avagamayati iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.41^1	 syāt etat padamālā ced smaryamāṇā vākya artha vodhanī kṛtam tarhi padārtha vodhanena kṛtam ca pada tad artha saṃbandha bodhanena iti atas uktam smṛti anugraheṇa iti pratyekam padebhyaḥ yāḥ padārtha smṛtayaḥ tad anugraheṇa etat uktam bhavati yadi api vākya artha vodhanāya pada mālā pravṛttāḥ tathā api padārtha smṛtiḥ ava antara vyāpāra bhūtāḥ apekṣate kāṣṭhāni iva pāka pravṛttāni jvalanam avāntara vyāpāram na ca padānyagṛhīta saṅketāti padārthān smārayanti iti upapannā padārtha smṛti saṃbandha saṃvedanayoḥ apekṣā iti yadi hi padārtha smṛti apekṣā padamālā vākya artha vodha narī hanta daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpāḥ bhavanti iti evamādīnām api vākya artha bodhaka tvam syāt iti atas āha pratisandhīyamānaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.41^2	 pratipadam sandhānam ghaṭanam pratisandhānam tat ca sva artha dvāreṇa ākāṅkṣā yogya tā satti adhīnam na ca daśa dāḍima ādi vākya ādiṣu tat asti iti na tatas vākya artha avabodhaḥ iti arthaḥ tat evam eka smṛti samāroheṇa ema artha avacchedena ca padānām samūhaḥ vākyam tasya bhāgāḥ eka deśāḥ iti yāvatī ityādi bhāṣyam avatārayati te kiyantaḥ bhāṣya vyākhyānena uttaram yāvabhdiḥ iti pṛcchati kā iti na hi samāpteḥ niṣpatteḥ anyā siddhiḥ asti iti abhiprāyaḥ uttaram padārthasya iti dharmiṇaḥ siṣā dhāyiṣita dharma viśiṣṭa tvam vāstavam iti arthaḥ samāpti pṛcchati kā iti uttaram viśeṣa iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.41^3	 vāstavaḥ dharmaḥ siddhiḥ tad gocaraḥ tu viniścayaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ niṣpattiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ kiyadbhiḥ kim abhidhānaiḥ ca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyate iti āśaṅkya bhāṣya kṛta uktam tasya pañca iti tat vyācaṣṭe samākhyā iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra āgamaḥ iti na hi agama vat pratijñā vacanam niścāyakam hetu vacana ādi vaiyarthyāt niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt iti samādhatte āgama adhigatasya iti ātma ādi prameya pratipādana uddeśena hi śāstram etat pravṛttam tat na antarīyaka tayā nyāyam vyutpādayat tam eva vyutpādayet yaḥ ātma ādeḥ prameyasya sākṣāt niścāyakaḥ tad pratipādaka āgama pramāṇi aniścāyakaḥ vā 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.41^4	 tasya ca nyāya viśeṣasya ādyaḥ avayavaḥ pratijñā āgama artha viṣayā sākṣāt tad viṣaya āgama pramāṇi apratipādakasya ca paramparayā tasmāt āgamaḥ pratijñā āgama upacārasya ca prayojanam idam yad artha saṃvādena āgamena anugṛhyate nyāyaḥ sa prayojanaḥ ca bhavati āgama artha jñānasya niḥśreyasa hetu bhāvena nirūḍha tvāt tasmāt yadi api na nyāya mātra vartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ tathā api prakṛta nyāya abhiprāyeṇa etat draṣṭavyam tathā ca āgama artha saṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpita viṣaya tvam api parākṛtam veditavyam yat āhuḥ eke sarvaḥ ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena eva dharma dharmi bhāvena na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.42^1	 tathā anumānasya nyāya anugrahāka tvam hetu vacanasya anumāna tva upacāreṇa bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam hetuḥ anumānam iti tat khalu anumāna pratipādakam vacanam viṣaya tayā anumānena anugrahītavyam na ca liṅga darśana mātram anumeya pratipatti hetuḥ api tu saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri na ca hetu vacana mātrāt sahakārita a= agamyate tasmāt na liṅga vacanam anumāna pratipādakam iti katham anumāna tva upacāraḥ iti atas āha evam liṅga darśana mātre dṛśyamāne liṅga rūpe saṃbandha smaraṇa rahite hetu upacārāt anumāna tva upacārat hetuḥ anumānam iti uktam bhavaṣya kṛtā tat eva vibhajateyat tu dvitīyam liṅga daśanam saṃbandha grahaṇa samaye liṅga darśanam prathamam tad apekṣayā sādhya dharmiṇi liṅga darśanam dvitīyam tad saṃbandha smṛti vyakti hetu bhāvāt smaryate anayā iti smṛtiḥ saṃskāraḥ tasya vyaktiḥ kārya abhimukhīkaraṇam tatra hetu bhāvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.42^2	 kvacid pāṭhaḥ saṃbandha smṛti hetu vyakti hetu bhāvāt iti sa tu sugamaḥ eva atas hetuḥ iti ucyate etat uktam bhavati yat tat dvitīyam liṅga darśanam śuddham api āpātatas saṃbandha smṛti hetu bhāvāt saṃbandha smṛti sahakāryā iva tathā ca anumānam evam ca tad pratipādakasya vacasaḥ upapannaḥ anumāna tva upacāraḥ iti siddham evam ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tad vacanasya buddhi vikā alpita liṅga viṣaya tvam parāḥ tam veditavyam evam anyeṣu api avayaveṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu etat eva prayojanam yojanīyam iti udāharaṇam pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam tat vyācaṣṭa smṛti viṣayasya iti yatra pratyakṣa viṣaye pūrvam vyāptiḥ gṛhītā tasya smṛtiḥ iti smṛti viṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punar ūpa darśanāt avipratipattyā punar smaraṇāt tad smārakam vacanam udāharaṇam pratyakṣam mūla bhūta pratyakṣa pramāṇa samuttha tva āt itas 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.43^1	 kaḥ punar ūpa māna arthaḥ iti pratyakṣam iva pratyakṣam iti atra ivakāre tatra upama arthaḥ kaḥ iti arthaḥ etat eva vibhajate yasmāt iti upamānam upanayaḥ iti bhāṣyam tat vyācaṣṭe yathā tathā iti upamāna eka deśaḥ iti upanayaḥ hi tathā ca etat iti pravartamānaḥ udāharaṇa stham yathāśabda artham apekṣate iti yathā tathā iti pravartate iti kim punar ūpa mānam yasya ayam eka deśaḥ iti atas āha upamānam khalu tathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti upadeśa upayoge upayogaḥ tad artha viṣayaḥ anubhavaḥ tasmin sati paśvāt vanam gataḥ nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇa adṛṣṭa pūrvam piṇḍam paśyati smarati ca upadeśa artham piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyam pratyakṣeṇa eva paśyati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.43^2	 tat evaṃbhūtam sārūpya jñānam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ ayam piṇḍe iti pratīti hetu rūpa mānam tat etasya upamānasya upadeśa artha smaraṇa gavaya piṇḍa go sārūpya apratyakṣa rūpasya eka deśe sarūpye yaḥ yathā tathā bhāvaḥ saḥ upanaye api asti iti etāvatā upamāna tva upacāraḥ upanayaḥ iti arthaḥ saḥ ayam sarva pramāṇa viniveśena paramaḥ nyāyaḥ stūyate nigamana vyākhyāna bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati kaḥ punar iti na khalu avayavānām pramāṇānām vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ uttaram eka vākya iti adhyāropaḥ buddhacā pratisandhānam sāmarthyam pṛcchati kim punat iti uttaram itaretarā iti sāmarthyam hi padānām dharmaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.43^3	 iha tu vibhajyamānānām avayavānām nad mūlānām ca pramāṇānām sa ākāṅkṣa tvam eva dharmaḥ samārthyam tat atra samasta rūpa sampanna liṅga pratipādanam ekam prayojanam vibhajyamānasa ākāṅkṣa tvam ca asti iti siddham eka vākya tvam avayavānām iti nigamana padam vyutpādayati nigamyante iti saḥ ayam iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar parama śabdasya arthaḥ iti uttaram vipratipapanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam paśca avayava vākyasya parama tvam iti etat eva vyatireka mukhena pratipādayati ekaikaśas iti yadi api loke pratyakṣa ādīnām ekaikaśas api vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam tatra tatra upalabhyate tathā api yat etat veda prāmāṇyam ātma ādi pratipādanam ca niḥśreyasa upayoti na tat pañca avaya vākya udatat śāstra upadiṣṭa upakaraṇāt vinā sidhyati iti anena abhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.43^4	 avayavānām pṛthak abhidhānam ākṣeptum vikalpayati kim punar avayavāḥ iti vikalpa prayojanam pṛcchati kim ca atas uttaram yadi pramāṇa antaram iti samādhatte na pramāṇa antaram iti prayojana antaram āha te ete iti yatas eva vāda ādi pravṛtti hetavaḥ atas eva tattva vyavasthāyāḥ ca āśrayāḥ bhavanti iti pṛcchati kaḥ iti na hi kuṇḍam iva vadarāṇi tattva vyavasthā avayavān āśrayati iti arthaḥ uttaram viśeṣa pratipādaka tvam dhama viśiṣṭa udharmaḥ viśeṣaḥ viśiṣyate iti vyutpattyā tad pratipādaka tvam avayavānām tattva vyavasthā āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.44^1	 krama prāpta tarka pada vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣate tarkaḥ na pramāṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ pramāṇa padena hi catvāri pramāṇāni saṃgṛhīta atinaḥ na ca eteṣu anyatamaḥ tarkaḥ iti arthaḥ astu tarhi pramāṇa pada saṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇa antaram asaṃgṛhītam pramāṇa padena prameya padena iva asaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśaya ādayaḥ prameyāḥ iti atas āha na pramāṇa antaram bhāṣyam anubhāṣya hetum āha aparicchedaka tvāt aniścāyaka tvāt tat eva vyatireka mukhena darśayati pramāṇam iti syāt etat aparicchedaka tvam asiddham tarka jñānasya saṃśaya ādi vat guṇa tvena ātma liṅga tvāt anyathā tu akiñcit karavāt upādāna vaiyarthyam iti atas āha pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāgāt tu iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.44^2	 na hi vayam guṇa tvena utpattimat tvena vā rūpeṇa aniścāyaka tvam tarkasya ācakṣmahe kim tu pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāga hetu tayā na ca evam asya akiñcitkara tvam iti arthaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram yukta ayuktā iti idam yuktam idam ayuktam iti itikāreṇa yukta ayukta viṣayam tarka jñānam parāmṛśati tat anena tarkasya svarūpam darśitam tasya vyāpāram āha yat tatra yuktam bhavati saṃbhavati tad anujānāti na tu avadhārayati tarkaḥ etat uktam bhavati pramāṇam tattva avadhāraṇāya pravṛttam karaṇa tayā itikartavyatām apekṣate tarkaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣaya yukta ayukta vicāra ātmā pramāṇam yukte tattve pravartamānam anujānan pramāṇam anugṛhṇarati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.44^3	 tad anugṛhītam pramāṇam tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam na ca pramāṇa viṣaye ced tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtam asya pramāṇa anujñayā nanu ayam eva niścāyakaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti sāmpratam tasya prasaṅga tayā pāratantryeṇa sva yam asādhana tvāt asti hi prasaṅgaḥ na prasaṅgaḥ hetuḥ tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat bhū tale pravartamānam tad viśeṣaṇa tayā ghaṭa abhāve api pravartamānam yat i atra abhaviṣyat ghaṭaḥ bhū talam iva adrakṣyata tena saha tulya darśana yogya tvāt na ca dṛśyate tasmāt na asti iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānam ghaṭa ābhā viśiṣṭe bhū tale pravartate kevalam eva idam bhū talam na iha ghaṭaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.44^4	 evam svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śabdaḥ api pravartamānaḥ parama āptasya bhagavatar iśvarasya niyogaḥ na asvarga phalāyām yāga bhāvanāyām avakalpate iti samāna padena upattaḥ api duḥkha tayā dhātvarthaḥ sādhyaḥ iti na yuktam bhinna pada upattaḥ api puruṣa viśeṣaṇam api svargaḥ eva bhāvanā phalam yuktaḥ iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānaḥ pravartate na ca yadi abhaviṣyat ghaṭaḥ iti vā yadi abhaviṣyat dhātu arthaḥ sāghyaḥ iti vā kriyā atipattiḥ asti yad āśraya aniṣṭa prasaṅgena ayukta tvam itarathā tu yukta tvam tat tarkeṇa niśvīyate tasmāt na pramāṇam niśvayāya tu pravṛttam pramāṇam tad viṣaya vivecanena anugṛhṇan itikartavyā tvena upayujyate yartha uktam mīmāṃsā saṃjñakaḥ tarkaḥ sarva veda samudbhāvaḥ saḥ atas vedaḥ rūma aprāpta kāṣṭha ādi lavaṇa ātma vat 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.45	 pūjita vicāra vacanaḥ hi mīmāṃsā śabdaḥ ayukta pratiṣedhena yukta abhyanujñānam tarkaḥ pramāṇa iti kartavyatā tvena ca pramāṇāt vedāt bhedaḥ uktaḥ saḥ atas vedaḥ iti aṅgāḍi ganoḥ abheda vivakṣayā itikartavya tā tvam ca asya sākṣat darśitam dharme pramīyamāṇe hi vedena karaṇa ātmanā itikartavya tā bhāgam mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.46^1	 iti sarvam avadātam tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣye karma iti karma kāraṇakam apūrvam dharma adharmau= iti yāvat kārye kāraṇa tva upacārāt etat upapādanāya pṛcchati katham punat iti nikāya viśiṣṭābhiḥ apūrvābhiḥ śarīra indriya buddhi vedanābhiḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ janma tasya katham karma nimitta tā iti arthaḥ atra pramāṇam anumānam āha bhadavat tvāt vicitra tvāt iti arthaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti bhedam āha sugatiḥ iti pramāṇam uktvā tasya iti kartavya tā bhūtam tarkam avatārayati saḥ ayam bhedaḥ iti yadi ekam nimittam syāt vaicitryam na bhavet na hi abhinnāt kārya vaicitryam upapadyate tasya ākasmika tva prasaṅgāt atas uktam anekam iti nanu anekam yāga ādi brahmahatyā ādi kriyā rūpam kāraṇam astam kṛtam apūrvaiḥ iti atas uktam avasthitam yāga ādikā tu kriyā āśutara vināśinī na cira bhāvine svargāya kalpate iti arthaḥ avasthitam ced yāga ādya ahitam apūrvam dharmaḥ asti iti sadā eva sukhinā bhavitavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.46^2	 evam adharmaḥ asti iti sadā eva duḥkhī syāt iti sukha duḥkhayoḥ kādācid ka tvam vyāhanyeta na hi avasthitāt kāraṇāt anavasthitam kāryam iti atas uktam anityam na hi avasthānam nityatām brūmaḥ kim tu tāvat anena sthātavyam na yāvat antya sukha duḥkha saṃvijñānam janayati atha naśyati iti nanu bhinnāni santu a pūrvāṇi tathā api sarvāṇi sarva ātma samavetāti yathā avayavī sva avayaveṣu tathā ca sarva sādha araṇyānna ukta vaicitrya utpādaḥ iti atas uktam eka dravyam eka dravyam ced aḥ tu tarhi sarva sādhāraṇe pṛthivī ādau yatra kvacid tathā api vaivitryānupapattiḥ iti atas uktam pratyātma niyatam atha pṛthivī ādi eva kāraṇa janma vaicitrye kasmāt na bhavati iti āśayavān pṛcchati kim kāraṇam iti kasmāt kāraṇāt iti arthaḥ uttaram pṛthivī āpadīnām iti mā bhūt pṛthivī ādi pṛthivī ādi gatam kiñcid bhaviṣyati iti atas āha pṛthivī ādi gatasya iti bhāṣya ukta prameya tve tarkasya hetum āha upalabdhi viṣaya tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.47	 tarka anantaram nirṇayaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tarka hetuka tvāt tasya svarūpam āha nirṇayaḥ tattva jñānam iti yadi evam indriya āpāta janma pratyakṣa jñānam api tattva jñānam iti nirṇayaḥ syāt iti atas āha pramāṇanām iti anena pañca avayava vākyam upalakṣayati tatra sa tarkāṇām pramāṇānām samāvāyāt paramārthataḥ tu tarka pūrvakaḥ tattva viniścayaḥ nirṇayaḥ iti pratyakṣa ādīnām api tarka sahāyānām nirṇaya phala tvam iti syāt etat dhūma ādi gocareṇa nirṇayena vahni ādau= anumīyamāne pramāṇa bheva nirṇayaḥ na phalam iti āśayavān pṛcchati kadā punat iti vidita abhiprāyasya uttaram yadā iti saṃkalayya tarka nirṇaya vyutpādanasya prayojanam āha tau= etau= iti parīkṣakaḥ atra lokaḥ loka śabdena ucyate tad itarasya tarka asaṃbhavāt buddhvā iti parīkṣya nirṇayam kṛtvā iti arthaḥ śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.48^1	 nirṇaya anantaram vāda vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam vādaḥ khalu iti tad anubhāṣya upapattim āhavādaḥ iti nānā pravaktāraḥ yasmin sa tathā ekasya api śāstra kartuḥ pūrva pakṣa uttara pakṣa sādhana dūṣaṇa pratipādakaḥ vacana samūhaḥ vādaḥ syāt iti nānā pravaktṛkaḥ iti uktam siddhānta bhedān avidhānena hi dvau= api sva siddhānta anurūpam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca āhatuḥ iti arthaḥ pratyadhikaraṇa ityādi bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ācaṣṭe pratyadhikaraṇam asya sādhanam adhikriyate iti adhikaraṇam sādhyam tat adhikṛtya sādhana pravṛtteḥ pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanam yasmin vāde sa tathā uktaḥ asya eva artham niṣkarṣṭum pṛcchati kim uktam bhavati niṣkarṣati ubhābhyām vādi prativādibhyām sva sva sādhye sādhanam vaktavyam tathā ca nānā pravaktṛka tvena tulya tve api vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇa sādhana tvena bhadeḥ siddhaḥ bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.48^2	 vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīna tayā pratyadhikāraṇa sādhana tva abhāvāt tathā api jalpāt abhedaḥ vādasya asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇa sādhanava tvam ca nānā pravaktṛka tvam ca iti atas āha anyatara smin= adhikaraṇe nirṇayaḥ iti vāde hi tāvat brūte na yāvat anyatarasmin pakṣe nirṇayaḥ jātaḥ tattva bubhutsorvādinoḥ vāde adhikārāt jalpe tu puruṣa śakti parīkṣā lakṣaṇe apratibhādinā api parājya upapatteḥ na avaśyam tattva nirṇayaḥ tasmāt anyatara nirṇaya avasāna tvena jalpāt bhedaḥ vādasya iti siddham yathā ca etat tathā upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate iti āha tat ca iti tasya svarūpam pṛcchati  saḥ ayam iti uttaram vākya iti codayati nanu ca iti vākya samūhaḥ ca jñānam ca iti vipratiṣiddham etat iti arthaḥ pariharati na iti sādhana upālambha grahaṇasya śabda viṣaya tvāt avidodhaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.49	 yugapad eva jalpa vitaṇḍe vyācaṣṭe tad viśeṣau= iti viśiṣyete bhidyate iti viśeṣau tasmāt vādāt viśeṣau bhinnau bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar viśeṣaḥ yad yogāt viśiṣṭe vādāt jalpa vitaṇḍe iti arthaḥ uttaram aṅga ādhikyam aṅga hāniḥ ca yathāsaṃkhyam tat eva darśayati chala iti tat kim idānī saṃśaya ādibhiḥ iva atyanta vairūpyam vādena jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ na iti āha etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathā mārga bhedaḥ iti etāvān eva viśeṣaḥ na sarvathā kathā tvena saṃśaya ādi vyāvṛttena sāmānya viśeṣeṇa trayāṇām api abhedāt iti arthaḥ aparam api bheda hetum āha viṣaya bhedāt ca iti tat vibhajate śiṣya ādi iti śiṣyamāṇaḥ atyanta viparyastaḥ durjñāna avalepa durvidagdhaḥ iti yāvat na tu evaṃbhūtaḥ śiṣya ādiḥ viparyastaḥ api anavalipta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.50^1	 krama prāptānām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam āha anyatama iti pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅga rūpeṣu anyatamam liṅgam dharmam ekam dvayam trayam vā anuvidadhānāḥ ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsa antaḥ iti hetvābhāsāḥ uktāḥ nigraha sthānebhyaḥ iti bhāṣyam avatārayitum āha te ca nigraha sthānam iti avatārayati nigraha sthāna iti avatārya dūṣayitum eka deśi matena vyācaṣṭe yasmāt kila ete iti kila śabdaḥ ayam arucau tat etat eka deśi vyākhyānam dūṣayati na ubhayathā api asaṃbandhāt kim ye ye nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiśyante te sarve vāde codyante atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti ubhayathā api anaikāntika tvāt na avinā bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ tat etat vibhajate na vāde codanīya tvam iti kasmāt ubhayathā api avinā abhāva abhāvaḥ iti atas āha yadi tāvat iti tasmāt na ayamavinābhūtaḥ hetuḥ vāde codanīya tvam vā pṛthak upadeśaḥ vā bhāṣya kāreṇa uktaḥ iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti vāde codanīya tvāt iti upalakṣaṇam pṛthak upadeśāt iti ca draṣṭavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.50^2	 tat evam eka deśi matam dūṣayitvā sva matena bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe etat eva tu nyāyyām iti nigraha sthānebhyaḥ hetvābhāsānām pṛthak upadeśe prayojanam yat bhāṣya akṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate sāmānya upadeśena viśeṣaḥ upadiṣṭe viśeṣa upadeśaḥ prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ca iti kaṭha bhojane viśeṣaḥ gamyate tadvat iha api nigraha sthāna upadeśena eva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣām viśeṣeṇa abhidhānam prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati etāvān eva sūtra kṛtaḥ vyāpāraḥ yat sūtraṇam nāma tatra nigraha sthāna viśeṣāṇām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam vādasya ca tattva nirṇaya avasāna tvam ālocya vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigraha sthāna tvena hetvābhāsāḥ na apratibhā ādayaḥ iti prayojanam varṇayāñcakāra bhāṣya kāraḥ syāt etat bhavantu vāde codanīyāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ mā ca bhuvan= apratibhā ādayaḥ kim evam api iti āha vidyā prasthāna prameda jñāpana artha tvāt vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ vidyāḥ paramparayā niḥśreyasa upayogāt tāsām prasthānam vyāpāraḥ tasya bhedaḥ tad jñāpana artha tvāt atas eva jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti āha 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.50^3	 codayati atha kasmāt iti yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tatas nigraha sthāna tvena codyeran na tu teṣām asti prayogaḥ apramāṇa tvāt pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha tvāt ca vādasya tasmāt nigraha sthāna mātra tvam hetvābhāsānām tathā ca na pṛthak upadeśaḥ nigraha sthāna upadeśena eva labdha tvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati pramāṇa sāmānyāt iti na khalu hetu ābhāsan tabt uddhyā prayu jāte vādi prativādinau api tu hetu buddhyā tathā ca asti teṣām vāde prayogaḥ iti vāde nigraha sthāna tvena heva ābhāsāḥ ca ādyantām na apratibhā ādīni iti arthavān pṛthak upadeśaḥ tat etat vikalpya ākṣipati vāde kānicid iti samādhatte na lakṣaṇa paratantra tvāt artha tathā bhāvasya iti brūmaḥ lakṣyate iti lakṣaṇam samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam rūpam vādasya ca nigraha sthānānām ca tad adhīnaḥ hi teṣām tathā abhāvaḥ vyavasthā kānicid eva nigraha sthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇi iti sāmānyatas abhidhāya tat eva lakṣaṇa paratantra tvam abhimate viśeṣe yojayati vādasya iti uktam ākṣipati pramāṇa pratirūpaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.50^4	 niścitau hi vādam kurūtaḥ niścayaḥ ca pramāṇa phalam iti kutas apramāṇasya avakāśaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram bhrānteḥ iti na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇa mūlaḥ apramāṇa mūlasya api tasya darśanāt anyathā viparyāsāt apravṛtti prasaṅgāt vādinoḥ ca abhra anta tve vastunaḥ viruddha dharma dvaya samāliṅgita tvam ekadā syāt iti bhāvaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar śiṣya iti upāsya upāsakayoḥ parasparam na dhvaṃsanam saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ uttaram vivakṣita artha apratipādaka tvam eva na khalīkāraḥ iti hetvābhāsānām ca pṛthak karaṇam na vāde tanmātra avadhāraṇa artham api tu yasmin= anuddhāvite api nigraha sthāne tattva pratipatti vyāghātaḥ bhavati tasya sarvasya saṃgraha artham evam ca nyūna adhika apa siddhāntāḥ api saṃgṛjītāḥ bhavanti tatra pṛcchati nyūna adhikā iti uttaram pramāṇa iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya upapādayati jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti sa ahaṅkāraḥ vijigīṣuḥ apratibhā ādibhiḥ api nigraha sthānaiḥ tiraskṛtaḥ galita ahaṅkāraḥ tattva bubhutsutām nītaḥ paścāt vādena vyutpādyate iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.51	 chala ja ati nigraha sthānānām pṛthak upadeśa prayojana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣate chala iti upalakṣaṇa artham iti bhāṣya avayavam vyācaṣṭe parijñāna artham eva kevalam pirajñānasya phalam uktam sva vākye parivarjanam aprayogaḥ para vākye ca udbhāvanam iti codayati chala jā ati nigraha sthānāni iti atra hi jāteḥ sva vākye parivarjanam uktvā punar svayam prayogaḥ na yuktaḥ kasmāt vyāghātāt etat vibhajate svākyaḥ iti pariharati na vyāghātaḥ kutas praśna apākaraṇa artha tvāt tat vibhajate svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kim uktam bhavati pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyām vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiḥ anena prativādinā prayuktā iti te prāśnikāḥ enam paryanuyu jīran he vādin katham kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyām jātiṣu katamā jātiḥ iti saḥ ayam prāśnikānām praśnaḥ tad apākaraṇa artham svayam sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt ete iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.52^1	 sūtrakāreṇa śāstrasya ātyantika duḥkha uparama rūpa niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ prayojanam uktam bhāṣya kāraḥ tu na asti eva tat prekṣāvatām prayojanam catrānvīkṣikī na nimittam bhavati iti āha sā iyam ānvīkṣikī iti tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe sā iyam ānvīkṣikī nyāya vidyati yadi api itarāḥ vidyāḥ pramāṇikam eva artham abhiniviśante tathā api etat vidyā pratipādyam eva pramāṇa ādi upajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra na tu pramāṇa ādi api vyutpādayanti yathā pratyakṣa ādi upajīvya pravartamānam anumānam na pratyakṣa ādi viṣayam api tadānīm eva gocarayati 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.52^2	 tat anena vidyā upakaraṇa grahaṇena vyāpāraḥ ānvīkṣikyāḥ darśitaḥ saṃprati vidyānām yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāma agrihotra kṛṣi ādīni tatra āpi ānvīkṣikī upāyaḥ iti āha upāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām vidyā vyutpādyānām na tu hālika mṛgayva ādi karmaṇām api na hi vidyā padebhyaḥ yāvat mātrā gatiḥ tāvat mātreṇa prekṣavatām paritoṣaḥ mā bhūtādityaḥ vai yūpaḥ iti ādibhyaḥ āditya ādīnā yūpāditā tasmāt saṃśaya parīkṣā pramāṇa viniveśa dvāreṇa tad artha tattvam avadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyāḥ evam daṇḍanīti vārtayoḥ anugantavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.52^3	 tasmāt ānvīkṣikī pariśodhita pramāṇa pramāśitam sāma ādi itarāḥ vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayam iti śeṣaḥ api ca dravya guṇa karmaṇām abhimatān abhimata upāya tā prajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvāḥ vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā tatra kim aviśeṣeṇa sādhya sādhana iti kartavyatāsu pravartayantu āhosvit sādhana iti kartavya tā mātre tatra yadi sādhya aṃśaḥ api pravartana agocaraḥ tadā śyena ādi sādhyāyāḥ hiṃsāyāḥ vihita tvena na anarthava tvam atha sādhya aṃśam rāgataḥ prāptam anūdya sādhana itikartavyate eva vidharayete tatas śyena ādi sādhyāyāḥ hiṃsāyāḥ avihita tvena na hiṃsyāt sarvāḥ bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhāt anartha tvam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.52^4	 tat iha sādhya aṃśe apravartanam ānvīkṣikī gamyam evam anuṣṭhāna gatāḥ prayojaka tva aprayojaka tvādayaḥ ānvīkṣikī gamyāḥ evam vārtā ādiṣu apī iti tat evam ānvīkṣikīm āśrayante sarva vidyā iti āha āśrayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām sarvāsām vidyānām puruṣa pravartanāḥ dharmāḥ teṣām āśrayaḥ vārtikakāraḥ tu dharma dvāreṇa vidyānām eva śrayaḥ iti vyācaṣṭe sarva vidyā upakāraka tvāt āśrayaḥ sarvāsām vidyānām iyam upakaroti vidyayā pravartanāyām kartavyāyām iyam sahakāritayā upakaroti iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.53^1	 syāt etat vyutpādyāḥ ced pramāṇa ādayaḥ sarva vidyā upayoginaḥ tarhrātyantikī dukhaḥ nivṛttiḥ ānvīkṣikyāḥ phalam niḥśreyasa padāt avagamyate vyutpādya svabhāva ālocanayā hi tat gamyate sa ca vidyā antara sādhāraṇaḥ iti vidyā antara adhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha tat idam tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ ca yathāvidyam veditavyam vidyā antarāṇi tāvat yat tattva jñānam kurvanti tad svabhāva ālocanayā hi tad vidyā sādhye eva niḥśreyasa bhade upayujyante na anyatra iha tu pramāṇa ādi yadi api sādhāraṇam tathā api asādhāraṇa ātma ādi rūpa pramaya samabhivyāhṛtam sat abhimataḥ eva niḥśreyaseḥvatiṣṭhate iti viśuddhena arjanena homa sādhanasya dravyasya prāptiḥ svāgatam 
NVTṬ_1,1.1.53^2	 ādi grahaṇena krama paryanta aṅga grāma sākalyam gṛhyate śva mārjāra ādibhiḥ anupaghātaḥ anupahata tvam ādi grahaṇāt viśuddha abhisandhiḥ iti śeṣam ati rohitam vāda ādīnām nigraha sthāna antānām upadeśaḥ para abhibhava upāya tayā madamāna ādi hetu tvena niḥśreyasa paripanthi iti manvānaḥ codayati madamānā ādi iti pariharati na sūtra artha aparijñānāt na ayam sūtra arthaḥ sarveṣām tattva jñānam sākṣāt niḥśreyasa upayogī iti kim tu ātma ādi tattva jñānam tat itarat tu pāramparyeṇa tatra jalpa ādīnā para ahaṅkāra praśamanam avāntara vyāpāraḥ iti na niḥśreyasa paripanthitā kim tu ānukūlyam iti arthaḥ mada māna ādi nimitta tvam ca hetuḥ asiddhaḥ iti āha yat ca idam iti upasaṃhārati tasmāt na nimittam vāda ādi parijñānam rāga ādīnām iti iti sūtra samāptau 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.1^1	 tat evam prathama sūtreṇa śāstrasya abhidheya prayojana saṃbandhān darśayatā padārthāḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ uddhiṣṭāḥ teṣām ca lakṣaṇam uktvā tad parīkṣā vartayiṣyate aparīkṣya tattva jñāna nirṇaya ayogāt na ca anirṇota prayojana saṃbandhānām pramāṇa ādīnām lakṣaṇa parīkṣayoḥ avasaraḥ na ca prayojana saṃbandha nirṇayaḥ parīkṣām vinā iti tad parīkṣā artham dvitīyam sūtram tatra prayojana abhidhānasya dvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ dvividham hi prayojana abhidhānam grantha kṛtām dṛṣṭam samīcīnam asamīcīnam ca yathā vātika ādi prayojana abhidhānam āyurveda ādi prayojana abhidhānam ca 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.1^2	 tasmāt abhidhāna sāmānyāt ubhayathā darśanāt ca saṃśayaḥ tatra utsūtreṇa prayojana abhisaṃbandha pratipādana param pūrva pakṣa bhāṣyam tat khalu vai niḥśreyasam ityādi tat vibhajate na tattva parijñānāt apavargaḥ kutas ubhayathā doṣāt tad atyanta vimokṣa lakṣaṇaḥ apavargaḥ niḥśreyasam tat ced tattva jñāna anantaram sampradāya ucchedaḥ vāta putrīyatā ca śāstrasya syātām tasmāt na tattva jñāna anantaram niḥśreyasam tathā sati pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasam iti mithyā na ca anyat niḥśreyasam iti abhimānaḥ pūrva pakṣa vādinaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.2^1	 atra idam siddhānta sūtram upatiṣṭhate duḥkha janma iti tasya tātparyam abhidhāya avatārayati na prayojana anabhisaṃbandhaḥ kutas niḥśreyasasya para apara bhedāt catastraḥ hi pratipattayaḥ prameye ātma ādau prathamā tāvat āgamāt yām ācakṣate śravaṇam iti dvitīyā tu śrutasya parīkṣya nyāyana vyavasthāpanam yām āhuḥ mananam iti sā ca anvīkṣikyām āyatate ānvīkṣikī ca saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāpanam pramāṇa tattva jñāpanāya upādatte pramāṇa tattva jñāpanam ca heya upādeya bheda vyavasthita prameya tattva parijñāpanāya tatra api ādi anta varjita daśa varga jñāpanam ādi antayoḥ eva ātma apavargayaḥ rū upādeyayoḥ tattva jñānasya upakaroti na ca ayam ān vīkṣikī vidyā avaghṛta prameya tattvaḥ api parituṣyati pūrvavat eva ātma ādi gata viparyaya vāsanā anuvṛtteḥ no khalu diś mūḍhaḥ sahasreṇa api anumāṇaiḥ viparyaya saṃskāram apanayati tattva asa akṣātkāraḥ tu viparyaya saṃskārāḥ nivartayati tad janitā ca vāsanā viparyaya vāsanām iti loka siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.2^2	 tasmāt ātma ādi sākṣāt kāravatīm caturthau pratītim aśeṣa tad gocara vāsanā viparyāsa śamanīm arthayamānena ādara naiḥ antara ryābhyām dhyāna cintā ādi śabda vācyā tṛtīyā pratītiḥ sākṣātkāra phalā dīrgha kālam upāsanīyāḥ atha pariniṣpanna dhyāna upāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīm pratipadya caturthau pratītim nirmukta sakala kleśa jālaḥ apravartamānaḥ dharma adharma sādhaneṣu nirūddha anāgata dharma adharma prabandha utpādaḥ bhūta indriya vijayī prajñā jyotiḥ jaḥ vat neva muktaḥ iti ucyate na ca evam avasthaḥ vīta rāgaḥ api sahasā eva deha ādibhiḥ viyujyate prāk upāttasya dharma adhama pracayasya abhuktasya bhujyamānasya ca aprakṣīṇa tvāt na ca prāya śvittena iva ātma jñānena adatta phalāni eva karmāṇi kṣīyante iti yuktam na abhuktam kṣīyate karma iti smṛteḥ atyanta sukha duḥkha saṃvijñāna virodhasya karmaṇām avadhāraṇāt autsargikasya kvacid prayaśvitta ādau viśeṣa vacanena apavādāt kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi iti śruteḥ yoga ṛddhi vaśāt yugapad utpāditān ekavidha deha upabhogena api upapatteḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.3	 tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimākṣye atha supatsye iti ca abhukta upabhajyamāna phala karma prakṣaya avaghi tva darśanam yogārddhi vaśāt ca aniyata vipāka kālāni api dīrgha kāla phalāni api karmāṇi piṇḍīkṛtya bhūta indriya davi jayitayā yugapad eva bhuṅkte acintyaḥ hi samādhi prabhāvaḥ iti uktam na ca acintya tvāt vinā eva upabhogena karma āśayān prakṣayiṣyati iti yuktam dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa kathañcid upapattau atyanta adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ ayogāt tasmāt utpanna tattva sākṣātkārasya doṣa abhāvāt pravṛtti uparame yaḥ anāgatā pūrva anutpādaḥ tad aparam niḥśreyasam tat ca tattva sākṣātkāra anantaram bhavati tādṛśaḥ ca muniḥ tattva jñānavān śāstrasya praṇetā iti na vāta putrīyam śāstram iti param tu riḥ śreyasam yoga ṛddhi prabhava sampadā yugapad upabhogena upātta karma āśayasya kṣayāt sarva duḥkha uparamaḥ iti upapannam niḥśreyasa dvaividhyam iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.4^1	 tat etat darśayati yat tāvat iti tattva sākṣātkāraḥ tattva jñānam saṃharṣaḥ sukham āyāsaḥ duḥkham tatra anāgatābhyām tāvat pravṛtti abhāvāt anutpādāt evam ucyate vidyamāna kāraṇe api sukha duḥkhe aśaktaḥ adviṣaḥ ca bhu janaḥ na sukha duḥkha tayā manute na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ na tatra tṛpyati tat ca tasya sukham na ca tat dveṣṭi tat ca tasya duḥkham iti syāt etat bhavatu etat aparam niḥśreyasam prakṛte tu kim āyātam iti atas āha ayam śāstra arthaḥ artha śabdaḥ nimitte aparam niḥśreyasam śāstrasya nimittam atha apara niḥśreyasa utpāda samayaḥ eva para niḥśreyasa utpādaḥ api kasmāt na bhavati iti āha param tu niḥśreyasam tattva jñānāt krameṇa bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.4^2	 no khalu utpanna tattva sākṣātkāraḥ samucchinna vāsanā viparyāsa jñānaḥ tad kārya doṣa tad kārya pravṛttīnam nivṛttyai prayatate kāraṇa nivṛttya eva āyatna labhya tvāt kārya nivṛtteḥ na hi kapha udbhāva jvara praśamanāya kapha nivṛttau satyām yatna antaram ātiṣṭhate tatas eva tad siddheḥ param tu niḥśreyasam na tāvat bhavati yāvat upabhogāt upātta karma āśaya pracayaḥ na kṣīyate tasmāt tattva sākṣātkāra ādhāna prayatnāt paraḥ tad upabhoga prayatnaḥ āstheyaḥ tathā ca na tulya kāle utpādaḥ para aparayoḥ niḥśreyasayoḥ tat idam uktam krameṇa iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.5	 tat evam artha gati pariśodhya sūtram avatārayati krima iti yadi api aparasmin= api niḥśreyase mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛttīnām api samuccheda kramaḥ asti tathā api janma duḥkha uccheda kramaḥ na asti pūrva upāttasya karma āśaya pracayasya tādavasthyāt tasmāt janma duḥkha uccheda krama samabhivyāhṛtaḥ mithyājñāna ādi uccheda kramaḥ parasya eva niḥśreyasasya śāstra prayojanasya tad pratipādanam arthaḥ prayojanam yasya tat tathā uktam idam ca avāntara prayojanam pradhāna prayojanam agre vakṣyati 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.6^1	 atra kecid yoga vibhāgam icchanti kāraṇa ucchedāt kārya ucchedaḥ abhimataḥ na ca asau duḥkha ādīnām mithyājñāna antānām apradarśite kārya kāraṇa bhāve sidhyati tasmāt duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām ityakaḥ yogaḥ atra kila samāsāt eteṣām itaretara yogaḥ avagamyate sa ca yogyatayā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇam yuktam kāraṇena ca kāryam iti atas siddhe kārya kāraṇa bhāve uttarottara apāye tad anantara abhāvāt apavargaḥ iti anena yogena kāraṇa uccheda krameṇa kārya uccheda krama pratipādanena apavargaḥ pratipādyate atra ca uttara tvam pāṭhā apekṣayā kāraṇasya tad anantara tvam ca kāryasya avyavahita ādi pāṭhā apekṣayā mithyājñāne kāraṇe tad kāryāḥ doṣāḥ eve śeṣeṣu api yojyam tam imam sūtra vibhāgamamṛṣyamāṇaḥ vārttika kṛt āha idam sūtram eka vacanena bhedam vyāvartayati na hi samuccheda krama pratipādanena apavarga para tayā eka vākya tve saṃbhavati vākya bhedaḥ nyāyyaḥ eva nivṛttyā anya nivṛttya eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ākṣiptaḥ iti na asau sūtre darśanīyaḥ na hi artha ākṣiptam sūtra kārāḥ darśayanti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.6^2	 tat idam sūtra grahaṇa prayojanam tathā hi su alpa akṣaram asandigdham sāravat viśvatomukham astobhamanavadyam ca sūtram sūtra vidaḥ viduḥ iti astobham anadhikam artha labhya pradarśane tu adhikam bhavet iti tat sūcanāt sūtram syāt tathā hi ahuḥ laghūni sūcita arthāni su alpa akṣara padāni ca sarvatas sāra bhūtāni sūtrāṇi āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ iti itaretara yogena api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sūcanīyaḥ eva sa varam eka nivṛttyā anya nivṛttya eva sūcyatām eka vākyatā anurodhāya iti parama tāt paryamasya āha etad saṃbandhena eva śāstrasya niḥśreyasa adhigama lakṣaṇena prayojanena yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrvam ākṣiptaḥ tad samādhānena arthena arthavat etat sūtram saṃbandha padena viṣaya vācinā viṣaci sam ādhānam lakṣayati tat evam sūtra tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava vyākhyānam avatārayati padārthasu iti yadi api sāma bheda ādau hala śakaṭa dau ca mithyājñānam aneka prakāram saṃbhavati tathā api na tat saṃsāra hetuḥ api tu ā ātma ādi dvādaśavidha prameya viśeṣa viṣayam iti sūtra stham mithyājñānam viśeṣṭum āha tatra iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.6^3	 tat etena ātma ādi apavarga paryante ityādi bhāṣyam avatāritam tat etat ākṣipati kaḥ vṛtti artha eti na khalu yathā kuṇḍe vadaram paṭe vā śauklyam evam prameye mithyājñānam pravartate tasya jñātṛ samaveta tvāt iti arthaḥ uttaram viṣaya arthaḥ yāvat uktam bhavati pramaya viṣayam mithyājñānam iti tāvat uktam bhavati prameye vartate iti viṣaya tvam ca agre nivedayiṣyate aneka prakāram iti uktam tat āha tatra ayam bhedaḥ tatra ātmani tāvat pradhāne prameye na asti iti katham punar etat mithyājñānam iti atas āha ātmā tāvat iti atra śaṅgate tasya anupapattiḥ kutas sat asatoḥ sārūpya abhāvāt iti ced sarvatra hi rajata udaka ādi vibhrameṣu śukti rajatayoḥ vā marūmarīci salilayoḥ vā sārūpyam eva nimittam pratīmaḥ na hi jātu rūpam rasa ādiṣu hastinam vā maśaka ādiṣu āropayanti asadṛśe api śvete pīta bhramaḥ madhure ca tikta bhramaḥ pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti ca dṛśyate iti ced na tatra api sārūpya saṃbhavāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.6^4	 tathā hi bahi nirgacchat ati accha nayana raśmi saṃpṛkta pitta gatam pītimānam āśraya rahitam śaṅkham ca doṣa ācchādita siti mānam anubhavan pīta gaṇasya ca tad asaṃbandham ananubhavan= tad asaṃbandha agraheṇa pīta cīra vilva ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt śaṅkha pītaḥ iti viparyasyati evam tvac indriya upanītam guḍa dravyam ananubhūyamāna mādhuryam anubhavan rasanā agra vartinaḥ ca pittasya asvabhāva jāta tiktasya tikta tvam anubhavan tad āśrayam ca pittam ananubhavan= asaṃbandha āgraha sārūpyāt tikta nimba sāmānādhikaraṇyena tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti vapiḥ yasyati ati śīghra tayā ca eṣa kramaḥ na lakṣyate na ca brūmaḥ yatra sārūpyam tatra bhramaḥ iti yena atiprasaktiḥ codyeta api tu yatra bhramaḥ tatra avaśyam kathañcid sārūpyam iti evam dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra ādiṣu api kiñcid kathañcid sārūpyam ūhanīyam na ca sa dasatoḥ atyanta vilakṣaṇayoḥ sārūpyam asti tat katham ātmani nāstita āropaḥ iti ākṣepaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.7^1	 samādhatte na pramāṇa gamya tā upapatte ākṣepam vibhajate na hi sat asatī iti samādhānam vibhajata tat ca na evam iti yadi sat asatoḥ samāna tvam na asti tarhi bhedaḥ tathā ca kasya kutra āropaḥ iti atas āha kriyā guṇa iti saḥ ayam asat dharmān kriyā guṇa rahita tva ādīn satya ātmani samāropya asat tayā viparyasyati na asti ātmā iti natu ātmānam sarvatas abhyarhitatamam paśyan tatra asau snihyati snehāt ca tad upakārāya ghaṭate evam tat paripanthinam dveṣṭi dveṣāt ca tad apakārāya dyaṭate tatas ca karma āśayam ācinoti tatas janma tatas ca duḥkham iti evam ātmanaḥ tādṛśasya mā bhūt tattva ajñānam astu nāstitāsamāropaḥ eva tāvat yatas na pravartate yathā āhuḥ sukhī bhaveyam duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.7^2	 yā eva aham itidhīḥ sā eva sahajam sattva darśanam atra ucyate yadi api rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ nairātmya darśanam tathā api na asti karma na asti karma phalam iti dṛṣṭeḥ paramam nidānam evam pretyabhāva abhāva jñānasya ca tathā ca duḥkha hetoḥ heya vargasya abhāvāt na tad dhānāyānena ghaṭitavyam na ca avaṅghaṭamānaḥ heyam hātum arhati saḥ ayam vṛścika bhiyā palāyamānaḥ āśīviṣa mukheni patitaḥ secam āstika tvāya ātma astita upāsanīyāḥ abhyarhita tā ca ātmanaḥ atyanta duḥkha nivṛttau= upapadyate ayam eva ca asya upakāraḥ yad ātyantika duḥkha śamanam sūkhādhāne tu asya tad anuṣaṅgi duḥkha ādhānāt apakāra prasaṅgāt na hi jātu kaścid cetanaḥ sukham āpsyāmi iti madhu viṣa sampṛktam annam upabhuṅkte tasmāt nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ prayatnena ucchet tavyā prekṣāvatā iti siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.8	 aparam api saṃsāra hetu mithyā darśanam āha evam anātmani iti pṛcchati ki punar iti uttaram ahaṅkāra iti viśeṣam āha icchā ādi iti punar pṛcchati katham punar iti uttaram śarīra iti upasaṃharati evam iti sāmānya dharmaḥ ahaṅkāra āspada tvam viśeṣa dharmaḥ icchā ādi ādhāra tā tām khalu ayam śarīra ādiṣu āropyaḥ ete eva aham iti śarīra ādiṣu ātma bhāvam āropayati 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.9	 evam siddham kṛtvā viparyayam sarvam uktam saṃprati sandihānaḥ viparyaya svarūpam pṛcchati kaḥ punar ayam viparyayaḥ parīkṣakāṇām vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ kecid su a ākāra bāhya tva viṣayam jñānam viparyayaḥ iti ācakṣate anye asāt viṣayam jñānam anye tu anirvacanīyam eva jñānam apare tu agrahaṇam evava anyathā ākhyāti tu vṛddhāḥ uttaram atasmiḥ tat iti pratyayaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.10^1	 idam atra ākūtam na tāvat su a ākāram rajata ādi bāhya tayā ālambante vibhramāḥ tathā hi jñāna ākāra tvam rajata ādeḥ anubhavāt vyavasthāpyet anumānāt vā anubhavaḥ api rajata pratyayaḥ vā svāt bādhaka patyayaḥ vā na tāvat rajata pratyayaḥ sa hi idam anahaṅkāra ākāra āspadam rajatam ādarśayati na ca antaram aham iti hi tadā syāt pratipattuḥ pratyayāt avyatirekāt bhrāntam hi jñānam su a ākāram eva bāhya tā ālambate tathā ca anahaṅkāra āspadam asya viṣayaḥ jñāna ākāraḥ api jñāna ākāra tā punar asya bādhaka jñāna pravedanīyā iti ced 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.10^2	 hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālika pakṣapātam parityajya ālocayatu āyuṣmān ki puras varti dravya ākāra tā mātram pratiṣedhati rajatasya āhosvit jñāna ākāra tām api asya ādarśayati bādhaka pratyayaḥ tatra jñāna ākāra topadarśana vyāpāram bādhaka pratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ puras varti tva niṣedhāt arthāt jñāna ākāra tā siddhiḥ iti ced tad niṣedhaḥ vaṇij vīthī ādau= upalabdhasya rajatasya vyāvasthāpane hetuḥ āntara tvam tu asya anupalabdha caram kutastyam na ca anumānam atra prabhavati iti caturthenivedayiṣyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.11^1	 santu tarhi bādhaka pratyaya anurodhāt asat prakāśana śīlāḥ eva mithyā pratyayāḥ tathā hi bādhakam vijñānam na idam rajatam iti rajata jñāna gocarasya asattvam gṛhṇāti na ca asataḥ viṣaya bhāvaḥ na upapadyate na hi viṣaya tvam nāma kāraṇa tvam yena asati na syāt kim tu sva kāraṇa dhīnaḥ sāmarthya atiśayaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ jñānasya yena santam iva asantam api gocarayati na ca viṣaya sāmarthyam atra upayujyate jñānasya sāmarthyāt eva tad bhāva siddheḥ atas eva asat prakāśana sāmarthyam eva mithyājñānānām avidyā tvam anirvacanīyam kecid ā asthiṣata atra idam ālocanīyam kim etat mithyājñānam asat sat ā ātmanā gṛhṇāti iti asat viṣayam upeyate āhosvit sat eva sat antarātmanā gahṇāti sataḥ ca sat antarātma tvena asattvāt asat viṣayam ucyate na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ rajata ātmanā ced asat ālambeta na satī śuktikām katham punar asau rajātarthaḥ śuktau pravartate na punā rajata abhāve kaskāt ca idam iti purovarti dravyam aṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajata tvam niṣedhati na idam rajatam iti yadi tatra na prasañjitam rajata tvam pūrva vijñānena 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.11^2	 atha śuktiḥ eva rajata ātmanā asatī iti tad ākāratayā tām ālambamānam mithyājñānam asat ālambanam ucyate tatra anujñayā vartāmahe na khalu anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ api sat antaram sat antarātmanā sat abhyupagacchanti tathā sati anyathā iti eva na syāt yathā āhuḥ anyathā ākhyāti vādinaḥ tasmāt yat anyathā santam anyathā pratipadyate tad nirālambanam jñānam abhāva ālambana ca tat iti na ca rajata ātmanā purovartinaḥ dravyasya anirvacanīya tā mithyājñāna samaye sattvena bādhaka samaye ca asattvena nirvacanīya tvāt na ca evaṃbhūtasya asataḥ prathā na upapadyate tasya sat asadbhyām upākhyeya tvāt yaḥ punar advaita vādinā prapajcaḥ vaināśikānām vā sāmānya ādiḥ naḥ bahis ki tu alīkam tad viṣayam ca jñānam mithyājñānam iti api na saṃbhavati tasya sarva upākhyā rahitasya kenacid sārūpya abhāvāt tad kāraṇaka tvāt ca bhrānteḥ kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvasya sulabha tvāt tasmāt prapañcaḥ ca sāmānya ādi ca vastusatī nāmam īcīna vijñāna gocarau tabda adhakam ca upariṣṭāt apākariṣyate tasmāt na ani vacanīya khyātiḥ api 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.12^1	 syāt etata anyat anyathā prakāśate iti saṃvid viruddham na tāvat sadbhāva mātreṇa ālambana tvam tanmātrasya sarva pratyaya sādhāraṇyena sarve arthāḥ sa varpratyaya viṣayāḥ iti savarsarvajña tā āpattiḥ na ca kāraṇa tvena ālambana tvam rūpa ādi vijñānānām rūpa ādi vat cakṣuḥ ādi api kāraṇam iti cakṣuḥ ādi ālambanatva prasaṅgāt atīta anāgata viṣaya tvam ca vijñānasya na syāt atīta anāgatayoḥ asattvena akāraṇa tvāt tasmāt pratibhāsamānam ālambanam tathā ca rajata pratibhāsaḥ śuktikā ālambanam iti durghaṭam 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.12^2	 api ca cakṣuḥ ādīnām samīcīna jñāna upajanana sāmarthyam iti katham ebhyaḥ mithyājñānam bhavitum arhati na hi śyāmāka bījam parikarma sahasreṇa api kalama aṅkurāya kalpate doṣa sahāyāḥ locana ādayaḥ mithyā pratyayam ādadhate iti ced na doṣāḥ hi kāraṇānām sāmarthya nighnanti na punar kārya antara upajanana sāmarthyam ādadhati na khalu bhṛṣṭam kuṭaja bījam nyagrodha dhānāyai kalpate kim tu na karoti kuṭajadhānām api ca sva gocare vyabhicāre vijñānānām sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānam samīcīnam āstheyam tathā hi rajatam idam iti dve jñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.12^3	 tatra idam iti puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇam doṣa vaśāt tad gatasya śuktikā tva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt tāvat mātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajate smṛti janayati sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhīta tā aṃśa pramoṣeṇa grahaṇa mātram avatiṣṭhate tathā ca rajata smṛteḥ puras varti mātra grahaṇasya va mithas svarūpataḥ ca viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt sannihita rajata viṣaya vijñāna sārūpyeṇa idam rajatam iti bhinne api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ kvacid punar grahaṇe eva mithas agṛhīta prabhede yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.12^4	 atra hi viniryat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya kāyasya iva ati svacchasya pītattvam ca gṛhyate pittam tu gṛhyate śaṅkhaḥ api doṣa vaśāt guṇa rahitaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate tad anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ asaṃsarga āgrahāt sārūpyāt pīta cira bilva phala pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca bheda āgraha prasañjita abheda vyavahāra bādhānāt ca na idam rajatam iti viveka pratyayasya bādhakattvam api upapadyate tad upapattau ca bhrānta tvam api loka prasiddham siddhra bhavati tasmāt yathārthāḥ sarve api bhramāḥ pratyaya tvāt paṭa pratyaya tvayavat iti prāptam 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.13^1	 evam prāpte abhidhīyate asti tāvat rajata arthinaḥ rajatam iti jñāne sati puras varti dravya pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca iti sarva janīnam tat kim grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ tad gocarayoḥ ca bheda agrahāt bhavatu āhosvit abheda grahāt na tāvat cetanaḥ ajñānāt pravartate api tu jñānāt purovarti vastu grahaṇa rajata jñānāt agṛhīta bhedam svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ vā rajata arthinam purovarti dravye pravartayati iti ced hanta bhoḥ kim etāvatā purovarti vastu gocaram jñānam rajata gocaram bhavati āhosvit tanmātra gocaram eva yadi rajata gocaram puras varti rajata tayā agṛhṇāt katham na anyathā ākhyātiḥ atha tanmātra gocaram kaḥ bheda agrahasya upayogaḥ na hi vṛkṣa mātra darśanam niścayena śiṃśapā arthinam pravartayati na hi tatra śiṃśapā jñānam asti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.13^2	 asti tu iha rajata vijñānam agṛhīta bhedam idam iti jñānena iti ced nanu rajata vijñānam purovartini dravye na vartate puras varti jñānam ca na rajate iti tatra purovarti dravya mātra arthaḥ purovartini pravarteta na rajata arthaḥ evam rajata arthaḥ yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena puras vartina dravye na hi tatra tena rajata tvam avagatami iti atha idam rajatam iti dve jñāne bheda agrahāt idam rajatam iti eka jñāna sadṛśe tena tat ucitam vyavahāram pravartayataḥ yadi evam tat rajatam iyam śuktiḥ iti bheda avabhāsi vijñāna vyavahāram api kasmāt na pravartayataḥ yathā eva hi bheda agrahāda bhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam evam abheda agrahāt bhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam api saḥ ayam ubhayatas bheda abheda graha sārūpyāt pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām yugapad ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭām daśām āveśitaḥ prajñā śālibhiḥ ati vyākhyayā 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.14^1	 syāt etat viparyaya jñāna utpāde api śukti rajatayoḥ bheda agrahe asya vyāpāraḥ āstheyaḥ anyathā gṛhīta bhedānām api viparyaya utpāda prasaṅgāt tathā ca śakyam tatra api vaktum yathā bheda grahāt viparyaya jñāna utpādaḥ evam abheda agrahāt kasmāt na samīcīna jñāna utpādaḥ iti tatra yaḥ tava parihāraḥ saḥ asmākam vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ bhaviṣyati iti yathā āhuḥ akhyāti vādinaḥ yeṣām api viparīta khyātiḥ teṣām api ajñāna vāsana nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ iti mā evam jñāna hetūnām ajñāta rūpa kārya saṃbandhānā cukṣuḥ ādīnām darśanāt cetana vyavahārāṇām tu abuddhi pūrvakāṇāma pratīteḥ buddhi pūrvaka tve tu vivekāgrahaḥ upayujyate na vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ yadi aviveka grahaḥ api tad paripanthī vidyate iti kutas anyatara nibandhanaḥ vyavahāraḥ tasmāt samāropaḥ eva bheda agrahaḥ iti tat siddham etad vivāda adhyāsitam rajatāt iva jñānam purovarti vastu viṣayam rajata arthinaḥ tatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.14^2	 yat yad arthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tat vijñānam tat viṣayam yathā ubhaya siddham samīcīna rajata vijñānam tathā ca etat tasmāt yathā yat ca uktam anavabhāsam āmā śuktiḥ anālambanam iti tatra kim śuktikā tvasya rajatam iti jñānam pratyanālambana tvam sādhyate āhosvit dravya mātrasya sita bhāsvarasya puras vartinaḥ tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddha sādhanam uttarasmin= anavabhāsanam asiddham idam iti purovartinaḥ dravyasya aṅgulyā nirdeśāt dṛṣṭam ca duṣṭānām api kāraṇānām autsargika kārya pratibandhena kārya antara utpādaka tvam tat yathā vetra bījānām dāva agni dagdhānām kadalī prakāṇḍa janaka tvam bhasmaka duṣṭasya ca audaryasya tejasaḥ bahutara anna pāna pācaka tvam na idam rajatam iti ca pratyakṣa bādhaka pratyayāt apahṛta viṣayam pratyaya tvena vibhramāṇām yathārtha tva anumānam na udetum arhati yathā ca pramāṇa ābhāsa vyabhicāre api pramāṇe āśvāsaḥ tathā pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau iti atra upapāditam diś mātram atra darśitam prapañcaḥ tu tattva samīkṣāyām asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ iti uparamyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.15^1	 tat evam ātmani mithyājñānam vyākhyāya śarīra ādiṣu ekādaśasu mithyājñānam bhāṣyaḥ eva darśitam tat tu spaṣṭa tvāt asmābhiḥ na vyutpāditam iti āśayavān āha śeṣam iti tatra śarīra ādiṣu manaḥ paryanteṣu yathāyogam mithyājñānam duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam iti antena bhāṣyeṇa uktam pravṛtti ādiṣu śṛṅga grāhikayā uktam pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet iti antena bhāṣyeṇa evam mithyājñānasya svarūpam darśayitvā mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛttita janma duḥkhānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ doṣa ādīnām svarūpam ca uktam etasmāt ityādinā tāpaḥ iti antena bhāṣyeṇa saṃprati mithyājñāna ādi ucchedāt apavargaḥ iti vakṣyati tat ca ayuktam sati api tad ucchede saṃsāra tādavasthyāt na hi ānya ucchede anyasya ucchedaḥ tathā ca na apavargaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam artham upapādayitum aktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ te hame mithyājñāna ādayaḥ ityādi tat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭa te hame duḥkha ādayaḥ iti bhāṣya kāra ukta kramāt viparīta krama abhidhānam vārttika kṛtaḥ evam sūtra kāra ukta kramāt viparīta krama abhidhānam bhāṣya kṛtaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.15^2	 tat duḥkha ādīnām mithyājñāna pūrvaka tvena mithyājñānasya duḥkha ādi pūrvaka tvena anādi tvam darśayitum pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti yadi ete eva saṃsāraḥ tarhi sūtrakāraḥ prameya sūtre kasmāt duḥkha ādibhyaḥ pṛthak pretyabhāvam saṃsāra apara nāmānam upādatte tasmāt ebhyaḥ anyaḥ eva saṃsāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ uttaram duḥkha ādīnām iti na eṣām svarūpam api tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ krama vyatikramatātparyam āha sa ca anādiḥ iti atra hetum āha pūrva aparā iti duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣāḥ viṣaya tvena tāvat mithyā jñānasya kāraṇam evam asati janmani mithyājñānasya anutpattara viṣayaḥ api janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam evam vinā pravṛttim janma abhāvāt janma dvādeṇa pravṛtteḥ api mithyājñāna kāraṇa tvam pravṛtti dvāreṇa ca doṣāṇām tathā mithyājñānāt deṣāḥ doṣebhyaḥ pravṛttiḥ pravṛtteḥ janma janmanaḥ duḥkham 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.15^3	 yadi api pravṛttiḥ eva sākṣā duḥkha hetuḥ tathā api anāyatanasya tasya anutpatteḥ antarā janma karoti atha sā eva duḥkham iti anādi tvāt ca na anyonya āśrayam cakrakam vā bīja aṅkura santānayoḥ ivā iti saṃpratibīja apāyaḥ iva tad jānya aṅkura pravāha nivṛttiḥ mithyājñāna apāye tad janya doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha mithyā jñāna ādi pravāha nivṛttiḥ kāraṇa nivṛttau kārya nivṛtteḥ iti kathana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati yadā tu tattva jñānāt iti apāyaḥ api tattva jñānāt mithyājñānasya svarūpataḥ vā viṣayataḥ vā phalataḥ vā syāt na tāvat svarūpataḥ tasya aśutara vināśinaḥ saṃskārāt vā jñāna antarāt vā apāyasya tattva jñāna sādha araṇyena tasya api bādhya tva prasaṅgāt na api viṣayataḥ na hi śuktikā jñānam rajata jñānasya rajata viṣaya tām apahartum utsahate jātam hi tat rajatam viṣayīkṛtya yathā āhuḥ gṛhītvā artham gatāḥ caurāḥ kaḥ tānāt chettum arhati iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.15^4	 na api phalam apaharati upadarśitaḥ hi tena arthaḥ pravartitaḥ ca tatra puyaṣaḥ tat idam uktam katham apāyaḥ iti uttaram samāna viṣayaḥ iti yasmin= eva hi purovartini dravye pūrveṇa rajata tvam āsañjitam tatra eva uttaram tat viruddham śuktikā tvam dharmam upanayati tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvam ādarśayat tat janitām pravṛttim vighaṭayat phalam asya apaharati iti bhāvaḥ na tu samāna viṣaya tā mātreṇa virodhaḥ mā bhūt ekasmin= ātmani nitya tva vibhu tva jñānayoḥ virodhaḥ iti atas āha yasmāt iti tatva mithyā tva kathanena mithas viruddha dharma prasa janam sūcayati nitya tva vibhu tva jñānayoḥ tu samāna viṣayayoḥ api aviruddha dharma upasthāpaka tayā tattva jñāna tvāt iti arthaḥ kasmāt virodhaḥ iti atas āha vastunaḥ iti paraspara abhāva dharmiṇoḥ ekatra samavāye na idam svābhāvikam nānātvam kvacid api iti advaita prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.16^1	 atra deśayati katham punar iti prathamam utpannam mithyājñānam anupajāta virodhi tena apahṛta viṣayam paśrvāttanam tattva jñānam udetum eva na utsahate prāk eva tu mithyājñānam bādhitum iti bhāvaḥ uttaram mithyājñānasya iti tatra hi prathamam upajātena anupajāta virodhinā jñānena uttaram bādhyate yatra pūrva apekṣam uttaram upajāyate tat khalu pūrva virodhe na jāyeta ajātam sat katham pūrvam bādheta yathā pratyakṣa ādi viruddham anumānam iha tu dve api jñānedoṣa upahata anupahata indriya artha sannikarṣa janmanī paraspara anapekṣe 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.16^2	 tatra pūrvam anupajāta virodhi tvāt ki bādhatām anāgatasya aprāpta tvena bādhitum aśakyatvāt sva kāraṇa balāt āsādyamāna janmanaḥ ca utpatti virodhasya ca aśakyā tvāt tat evam utpannam uttaram upajāta virodhitayā pūrva bādha ātmakam sannān upakṛdya pūrvam utpattum arhati iti bādhate tat tu na pūrveṇa na api anyena kenacid iti bhāvati artha sahāyam artha asahāyam ca mithyājñānam tat anena bādhya tva abādhya tve mithyājñāna tattva jñānayaḥ ru upalakṣyete tat idam anyaiḥ api uktam pūrvāt para balīyaḥ tvam tatra nāma pratīyatām anyonya nirapekṣāṇām yatra janma dhiyām bhavet 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.17	 iti tathā ca anupajāta virodhi tvam atra bādhya tve hetuḥ upajāta virodhi tvam ca bādhakatvaḥ iti yat upalakṣaṇa artham sa sahāya tva abhidhānam tat jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati kasmāt uttaram tayā tvena iti anena abādhya tvam tattva jñānasya uktam iti na kevalam abādhya tvam dṛḍha mūla tvam api tattva jñānasya iti āha pramāṇa antara anugrahāt ca antara śabdaḥ viśeṣa vacanaḥ ātma ādi tattva jñānam hi phalam pramāṇa viśeṣaiḥ āgama anumāna pratyakṣaiḥ anugṛhyate tasmāt dṛḍha mūla tvāt tat api tattva jñānam mithyājñānam nivartayati iti arthaḥ etat eva vibhajate āgama iti etat eva sphorayati yadā hi iti āgama mayena hi jñānena prameyam gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāya vijñānena anumāna apara nāmnā vyavasthāpya bhāvayataḥ yad ā ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt yoga ja dharma sahāyāt utpadyate tattva viṣayaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ pratyakṣa phalam tatra trayāṇām api pramāṇānām pratisandhānam asti iti dṛḍha mūla tvāt tena mithyājñānam bādhyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.18	 viṣayam bhāvayati iti vyācaṣṭa samāhitaḥ iti samāhita tvena cetasaḥ dhāraṇām darśayati ananya manāḥ iti pratyāhāram cetasaḥ tattva viṣaya buddhi dhārā vipacyamāna tvam dhyānasya tattva jñānasya sphuṭa ābha tva ārambha avasthā dhyāna janita bhāvanā saṃskāraḥ dhyāna bhāvanā tasyāḥ vivekaḥ mithya jñāna vāsanāyāḥ pūrvam hi mithyājñāna vāsanā tattva jñāna vāsanāyāḥ balavatī āsīt atha abhyāsa vaśāt tulya balā bhavat atha iyam eva balīyasī tattva jñāna vāsanā saṃbhinnā mithyājñāna vāsanayā saha anuvartate saṃprati tu tattva jñāna vāsanayā atyanta balīyasya sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt mithyājñāna vāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattva jñāna vāsanā tasyām iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.19	 nanu anena krameṇa nivartatām mithyājñānam nivṛttam tam tattva sākṣātkāra samaye api kasmāt punar sva vāsanā vaśāt na jāyate na khalu mithyājñāna vāsanā anādi kāla pravṛttā ādimatā tattva jñānena tad saṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitum iti atas āha nivṛtte ca iti tāvat eva puṃsām buddhayaḥ asthirāḥ bhrāmyanti sva ucitam ca saṃskāra jātam ātanvate na yāvat bhūtam artham sākṣātkurvanti atha sākṣātkṛtya tatra sthira padāḥ bhavanti kṣiṇvanti ca sa vāsanāt mithyā pratyayān bhūta arthaṃpakṣapātaḥ hi buddheḥ svabhāvaḥ yat āhuḥ bāhyāḥ api nirūpa plava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ na bādhaḥ yatnavat tve api buddheḥ tad pakṣa pātataḥ iti tasmāt mithyājñānasya na punar u utpādaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.20^1	 uktam eva artham smṛti dāḍhrayāya pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uktam smārayitum uttaram saha iti bhavatu mithyājñānasya nivṛttiḥ sa vāsanasya tatas api kim iti atas āha mithyājñāna iti atra pṛcchati ye tāvat iti uttaram teṣām api iti vairāgya svarūpam pṛcchati ki punar iti rāga abhāvaḥ hi vairāgyam na ca tasmāt eva rāga ādīnām abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ uttaram bhoga anabhiṣvaṅga lakṣaṇam iti uktam viṣaya doṣa paribhāvanā paripākāt khalu viṣaya parityāga icchā bhavati tayā virodhi guṇena viṣaya tṛṣṇā ca tad paripanthini vidveṣaḥ ca tad adhikaraṇa aśrva īrṣi ādayaḥ nivartante asaktiḥ viṣaya parityāga icchā vaśitayā ca svayam upanateṣu viṣayeṣu mādhyasthya darśanam doṣa abhāve kim bhavati iti atas āha doṣa abhāvaḥ iti pṛcchati kā punar iyam iti yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇam syāt tatas janma nivṛttyai tad nivṛttiḥ arthyeta na punar asau kṣaṇikā sataḥ āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.20^2	 atas kim artham nivartyate iti bhāvaḥ vidita abhiprāyaḥ uttaram āha dharma adharmaḥ kasmāt punar ūpa cāraḥ iti atas āha janma sādhana tvāt etat vibhajate na asmin= iti upacāre prayojanam darśayitvā nimittam āha dharma adharmayoḥ tu iti vartamāna anāgatayoḥ aviśeṣeṇa doṣa apāyāt nivṛttiḥ ūktā iti bhrāntyā deśayati yau tāvat anāgatau= iti pariharati na anāgatayoḥ iti anāgata abhiprāyam etat iti arthaḥ yadi evam vartamānayoḥ kutas prakṣaya eti atas āha vartamānayoḥ iti astu pravṛtteḥ abhāvaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha pravṛtti abhāvaḥ iti uktam vivekam iha api yojayati atra api iti vartamāna nivṛtti hetu pṛcchati atha iti uttaram saṃskāra iti śrutiḥ tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye iti kim janma abhāve sidhyati iti atas āha janma abhāvaḥ iti atra eva vṛddha saṃmatim āha etat ca tat āhuḥ iti tat etat ca iti yojanāḥ prāṇanasya kāla bheda avacchedaḥ āyuḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.21	 syāt etat mahāpralaye api mithyājñāna ādinā duḥkhāntena asti viyogaḥ iti atra api mukti prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha saḥ ayam mithyājñāna ādinā iti sarvatas iti tṛtīya arthe tasiḥ sarveṇa iti na ca pralaya avasthāyām sarveṇa viyogaḥ karma avidyā vāsanayoḥ ana vināśāt muktau tu tayoḥ api vināśaḥ karma vāsanā ca sarva kāryāṇām utpādikā avasthāpikā ca tad nivṛttau śarīra ādi vat tattva jñāna saṃskārasya api pralayaḥ iti aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa vimuktaḥ muktaḥ iti ucyate iti saddhim 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.22^1	 stād etat tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna apāyaḥ iti uktam kim punar tattva jñānam iti atas uktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ tattva jñānu tu iti tat anubhāṣya sarveṣām jñānānām bhāṣya uktānām anugatam ekam svarūpataḥ tu iti codayati kasmāt iti no khlu ayam prekṣāvatām samācāraḥ yat duḥkha bhiyā sukha parityāgaḥ iti api tu sukham duḥkhāt vivicyaḥ upādadate duḥkham ca varjayanti na hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ na upyante bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyante iti uttaram viveka hānasya iti yadi api sukha duḥkhe bhinne tathā api anitya tva kṛtaka tva vat paraspara anuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasya upādānam duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanam śakyam iti arthaḥ kaḥ punar ayam anuṣaṅgaḥ yatas viveka hānam aśakyam iti atas āha anuṣaṅgaḥ adhinābhāvaḥ tad svarūpam āha yatra ekam sukham vā duḥkham vā tatra itarat duḥkham vā sukham vā 
NVTṬ_1,1.2.22^2	 tad anena anitya tva kṛtaka tvayoḥ iva sukha duḥkhayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ darśitaḥ na ca avinābhāvaḥ vinā saṃbandhāt iti tad siddhaye saṃbandha vikalpān āha samāna nimitta tā vā anuṣaṅgaḥ avinābhāvaḥ vā śabdaḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa saṃbandha antara apekṣayā na tu pūrva apekṣayā atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā na tu pūrva apekṣayā atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā tayoḥ asādhāraṇyāt iti mantavyam tayoḥ avinā abhau= a siddhi artham saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna upalabhyatā vā manaḥ gocara tvam ubhayoḥ tatas ca siddhaḥ anavina abhāva apara nāmā anuṣaṅgaḥ iti yatra ekam tatra itarat iti vā yatra yasmin nimitte sati iti vā yatra ādhāraḥ iti vā yatra upalabdhi sādhane satī iti vyākhyeyam itiḥ sūtra samāptim sūcayati 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.1^1	 tat evam pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānasya niḥśreyasa saṃbandhaḥ uktaḥ parīkṣitaḥ ca tatra etat syāt sva padebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ tattvataḥ jñātā yathāyatham mithyājñāna ādi nivṛtti krameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante kṛtam uparitanena prabandhena iti atas uktam bhāṣya kṛtā trivadhā ca asya iti na nāmadheya mātrāt pramāṇa ādīnām tattva jñānam bhavati api tu lakṣaṇa parīkṣaṇābhyām iti asti prabandhasya uttarasya upayogaḥ iti bhāṣya arthaḥ tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati pravṛtteḥ iti yadi puruṣa kalpanā mātrāt traividhyam atha ānantyam eva kasmāt na bhavati sarvatra tasya sulabha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ uttaram arthasya tathā abhāvāt arthasya prayojanasya sākṣāt śāstra kāryasya tattva jñāna lakṣaṇasya tathā eva trividhayā eva śāstra pravṛttyā bhāvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.1^2	 tathā hi lakṣaṇam nāma vyatireki hetu vacanam tat hi samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchidya lakṣyam vyavasthāpayati na ca asya dharmi darśanam antareṇa pakṣa dharma tā sidhyati iti tad upadarśanāya nāmadheya mātreṇa dharmiṇām uddeśaḥ yadi api ca pratilakṣaṇam uddiṣṭāḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ tathā api śāstra abhisaṃbandha parāt api vākyāt samadhigamyante iti uddeśaḥ api uktaḥ na ca aparīkṣitaḥ hetuḥ vyatirekī catū rūpaḥ bhavati iti parīkṣā api avaśyam kartavyā tasmāt tattva jñānasya arthasya tathā abhāvāt traividhyam iti tat etat vibhajate nāmī padārthāḥ iti kim tu iti arthaḥ tattva jñānam tathābhūtam yena arthena hetunā śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ tredhā bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.2^1	 uddeśa svarūpa pratipādana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati nāmadheyena iti pariharati mātra grahaṇa sāmarthyāt iti yadi api pramāṇaṇa ādi śabdāḥ api kāraka śabdāḥ eva tathā api uddeśa samaye tad arthānām sat api kāraka tvam avivakṣitam api tu prātipadikā artha mātram ghrāṇa ādi sūtre tu lakṣaṇa pare kāraka tvam vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇa tva ayogāt iti adoṣaḥ atra ca yadi api sūtrakāreṇa saṃśaya pramāṇa prameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na prayojana ādiṣu tathā api tad karaṇāt eva prayojana ādi parīkṣā api sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhā iti uktam atas eva bhāṣya kāraḥ sarvatra parīkṣām anvavartayat iti syāt etat vibhāga param etat sūtram iti vakṣyati na ca vibhāgaḥ nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavaccheda artham ekam kiñcid upasaṃgrāhakam antareṇa na ca pramāṇa tvāt anyat atra upasaṃgrāhakam na ca idam alakṣitam upasaṃgṛhṇāti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.2^2	 na ca etat sūtram asya lakṣaṇam vibhāga paratvāt iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa param bhāṣyam tatra uddiṣṭasya iti tasya arthaḥ yadi api vibhāga param etat sūtram tathā api pramāṇa pada samabhivyāhṛtam sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇa tvam api lakṣayati iti tathā hi pramīyate anena iti asya vākyasya arthe pramāṇa pada prayogaḥ pramā ca smṛteḥ anyaḥ artha avyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmāt vibhāga parāt api sūtrāt pratīyamānam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam apekṣitam saṃgṛhītam iti pramāṇa tva upagṛhītānām pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇānām yuktaḥ vibhāgaḥ tathā ca vibhāga paratvena sākṣāt sāmānya lakṣaṇānabhidhānāt vibhaktasya lakṣaṇam ucyate iti uktam tat ca iha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa ityādi tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe uddiṣṭasya iti lakṣaṇa alakṣaṇa mātra vivakṣayā lakṣitasya alakṣitasya iti uktam tat ca chale sāmānyatas pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣate iti gamayitavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.3	 atra bhāṣyam atha uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam iti tasya arthaḥ ucyate anena iti vacanam sūtram vibhāgasya atha iti trividha pravṛtti vyutpādana anantaram viviktānām pratipādanam vibhāga vacanam na ca vivekaḥ svarūpaḥ upayujyate iti atas āha atha uddiṣṭa vibhāga dvāreṇa iti na atra vibhāga mātram vivakṣitam api tu tad dvāreṇa nyuna adhika saṃkhyā vyavacchedaḥ tattva jñāna aṅgam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.4^1	 avyākhyāne hetum āha sūtra iti codayati uddiṣṭasya vibhāga ānarthakyam vyāghātāt trividhā ca asya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ iti asya ānarthakyam anartham artha viparyayam kāyati kīrtayati iti anarthakaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam kasmāt vyāghātāt vyāghātam eva sphorayati trividhā ca asya śāstryasya iti pariharati na uddiṣṭā iti parasparam vibhaktāḥ nāmadheya mātreṇa uddiśyante iti uddeśa intarbhāvaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati sāmānyena uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam viśeṣeṇa uddeśaḥ iti vibhāga prayojanam pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaram niyamaḥ tad vibhajate yadi iti punar codayati lakṣaṇataḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.4^2	 pramāṇa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ yat catvāri eva lakṣayati tat avagamyate na nyūnāni adhikāni vā pramāṇani iti arthaḥ pariharati lakṣaṇasya iti ākṣepam vibhajte syāt eṣa iti parihāram vibhajate na lakṣaṇasya iti anya param api vākyam tat eva artha labhyam svīkaroti na ca pratyakṣa ādīnām samāna asamāna jātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamī ādi abhāvaḥ upayujyate lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttasya kvacid akaraṇam na tad abhāve pramāṇam sataḥ api anupayogena akaraṇa āpatteḥ tat etat āha anya asaṃbhavasya iti vibhāga uddeśasya punar ananya para tvāt anya ābhāvi niścayaḥ bhavati iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.5^1	 akṣasya akṣasya iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya tātparyam āha ayam ca sūtra vivakṣāyām iti akṣam akṣam prati vartate iti vigṛhya avyayībhāve kṛte sarva indriya avarodhaḥ bhavati nanu yadiḥ idṛśaḥ vigrahaḥ kasmāt punar bhāṣya kāreṇa akṣasya akṣasya iti vigṛhyate iti atas āha anyathā tu vastu nirdeśaḥ iti artha mātram anena pratipādyate na punar samāsaḥ iti arthaḥ atha kasmāt samāsaḥ eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyate iti atas āha samāse hi akṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti yadi sūtra gatasya pratyakṣa padasya avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ anyatra punar asya kaḥ samāsaḥ iti pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram prādi samāsaḥ iti tathā hi prāpta āpanna alaṃpūrva gati samāseṣu para vat liṅga tā pratiṣedhāt abhidhaya liṅga upādānāt pratyakṣaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣa abuddhiḥ pratyakṣam jñānam iti abhidheya liṅga tā siddhā bhavati kvacid pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.5^2	 sūtra vivakṣayā avyayībhāvaḥ iti uktam tatra śaṅkate kasmāt punar sūtra vivakṣayā iti ucyate yāvatā sarvatra eva kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati iti tatra idam upatiṣṭhate samāse hi avyayībhāva samāse hi sarvatra pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti vyutpatti nimitta mātram ca idam pratyakṣa śabdasya na tu pravṛtti nimittam tasmāt na indriya gataiḥ guṇa sāmānya ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ tu artha sākṣāt kāri jñāna janaka tvam tad nimittaḥ khalu ayam pratyakṣa śabdaḥ tatra tatra laukika parīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate yathā mayūra śabdaḥ mayūra tva sāmānya nibandhanaḥ kāsucid eva patatri vyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ mahyām rauti iti anvākhyāyate tat idam pratyakṣam uddhiṣṭam api sat pramāṇa tad ābhāsa saṃkīrṇam iti tat vivekāya lakṣaṇam upayujyate yadi tu uddeśa padam tat vivecayet kṛtam tarhi lakṣaṇa praṇayanena 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.6^1	 vigraha vākya gatā ca vṛttiḥ bhāṣya kṛtā vyākhyātāḥ vṛttiḥ tu sannikarṣaḥ jñānam vā vṛttiḥ iti hi vyāpāraḥ sa tu vyāpāraḥ ucyate yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye ca aram abhāvī dharma bhedaḥ phala utpāda anukūlaḥ apekṣyate yathā paṭe janayitavye tantubhiḥ carama bhāvinaḥ saṃyoga bhedāḥ svarge vā janayitavye yāgena apūrvam ātma dharmaḥ tathā iha api indriya ādinā pramāṇena pramāyām phale pravṛttena tad utpādana anukūlaḥ sannikarṣaḥ jñānam vā carama bhāvī dharma bhedaḥ apekṣyate iti bhavati vyāpāraḥ saḥ eva vṛttiḥ iti ākhyāyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.6^2	 vyavasthām darśayati yadā sannikarṣaḥ vyāpāraḥ indriya ādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanam vā sa vikalpakam vā sākṣātkāra vat vijñānam pramitiḥ phalam ubhayasya api indriya vyāpārāt sannikarṣa aparabhidhāna anutpatteḥ na ca antarālikena nirvikalpakena indriya vyāpāra vicchedaḥ iti pratyakṣa vyākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyate yadā jñānam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā vyāpāraḥ indriya ādīnām tadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ phalam tatra upādeyam idam salilam iti buddhiḥ anāgata upādāna viśiṣṭam salilam ālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī salila mātra sākṣātkāraḥ tu syāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.6^3	 na ca tanmātram asya phalam api tu upādeya tā sā ca parokṣāḥ anāgata tvāt tasmāt upādīyate anena iti upādānam upādānam ca asau buddhiḥ ca iti upādāna buddhiḥ tatra toya ālocanam atha toya vikaltaḥ atha tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa cara pipāsā upaśamana hetu bhāvasya smṛti bīja saṃskāra udbodhaḥ atha tasya smaraṇam atha liṅga parāmarśaḥ tad jātīyam ca idam iti tat idam liṅga parāmarśa vijñānam sākṣātkāra vat liṅge vinaśyat avastha vya āpti smaraṇa sahakāri dṛśyamānasya salilasya pipāsā upaśamana hetu tayā anumāna mukhena upādāna buddhiḥ ūcyate anumāya khalu ayam tathā abhāvam tat upāditsarn ihamānaḥ tat upādatte na ca vyāpti smṛti vicchinnam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā na liṅga parāmarśa jñāna hetuḥ iti vācyam tad udbodhita saṃskāra dvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīm asataḥ api kāraṇa tvāt na khalu kṛṣi karma śasya adhigati samaye samasti na ca yāga ādikam svarga ādi utpāda samaye na ca trivṛt kaṣāya pānam vireka samaye āntarālika kārya paramparayā tu tad sādhāna tvam sarvatra samānam 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.7^1	 syāt etat kā punar iyam pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ toyasya yāḥ anumāna gocaraḥ na tāvat mīmāṃsaka vat ati indriyā śaktiḥ yusmābhiḥ abhyupeyate kim tu kāraṇānām svarūpam vā sahakāri sākalyam vā tatra svarūpam hetūnām pratyakṣam eva sahakāriṇā pratyakṣa apratyakṣāṇām sākalyam kārya samutpāda ekavyaḥ janīyam na tu tat toya rūpa darśana mātrāt śakya anumānam tat kim aparam avaśiṣyate yat anumānasya gocaraḥ iti atra ucyate na vayam atīndriyam sāmarthyam ātiṣṭhāmahe na api sahakāri sākalya anumānam ācakṣmahe kim tu svarūpasya kārya saṃbadhitām na ca iyam svarūpam eva ihasthasya iva nārikela dvīpāt āgatasya api vahni darśana mātrāt grāhaka tva avagama prasaṅgāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.7^2	 tasmāt kārya upahitam svarūpam anumeyam idam eva ca asya kārya upadhānam yat kārya utpādāt pūrvam avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ ānantarya niyamaḥ na ca tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa carasya tathā abhāva darśane api dṛśyamānasya toyasya tat dṛṣṭam bhavati yena tatra smaryeta na khalu ujjayinyām upalabdhasya saudhasya pāṭaliputre smaranti abhra antāḥ upādānena hānam vyākhyātam na ca upekṣā anupādāna tayā hāna pakṣe nikṣiptāḥ ahāna taya upādāna pakṣa niḥśrepa prasaṅgāt upādāna prayatna aprasava hetu tayā na upādānam iti ced kim iyam hāna prayatnam api prasūte yatas hānam syāt tasmāt yā na ubhaya prayatna prasava hetuḥ sa upekṣā buddhiḥ tṛtīyā loka prasiddhā iti siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.8^1	 pratyakṣa pada vyutpattim darśayitvā anumāna ādi padeṣu avi vyutpatti gati diśati evam anumāna ādiṣu api iti tatra idam anumānada vyutpatti bhāṣyam mitena liṅgena liṅginaḥ arthasya paścāt mānam anumānam iti mitiḥ mānam tathā ca liṅga darśana udbodhita saṃskāra jā smṛtiḥ vyavacchinnāḥ tasyāḥ miteḥ anya tvena loka siddha tvāt mitena iti ajñāna sandeha viparyāsāḥ liṅga viṣayāḥ vyudastāḥ bhavanti tathā api mitena arthasya jñānam śābde api asti iti atas uktam liṅgena iti apakṣa dharmataḥ nivartayati liṅginaḥ iti tathā api dharmiṇaḥ pratyakṣa gocara tvāt kṛtam anumānena iti atas uktam arthasya iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.8^2	 arthyate sādhyate iti arthaḥ na ca dharmaḥ svarūpeṇa arthyate kim tu jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ paścāt iti anuśabdasya vyākhyā tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati mitena iti kasmāt ayuktam iti atas āha phala abhāvāt iti etat vibhajate etasmin= iti anumāna jñānasya phala avasthāyām eva arthaḥ mitaḥ iti meyam na avaśiṣyate yatra etat siddham sat pramāṇam bhavet iti arthaḥ tatra phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam āsthāya yatas iti adhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte na eṣa doṣaḥ iti anadhyāhāreṇa api adoṣaḥ iti samādhāna antaram āha bhavatu vā iti pūrva uktam doṣam smārayatti nanu ca iti pariharati na doṣaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.8^3	 atha kasmāt hāna ādi viṣayam pramāṇam ucyate na sva gocaram pratīti atas āha sarva ca pramāṇam iti yadi api vahni jñānasya anumānasya sataḥ heya tva ādikam viṣayaḥ tatra eva vyāpārāt anyathā pramāṇa phalayoḥ vibhinna viṣaya tvena vipratipattyā pramāṇa phala bhāva ayogāt na hi panasa viṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvaḥ bhavati tathā api phala antara anapekṣam utpattau= eva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ tatra tu na tat pramāṇam phala antara ajanaka tvāt api tu phalam eva iti arthaḥ viṣaya antaram prati tu pramāṇam iti āha viṣaya antaram iti codayati yadi iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.8^4	 bhāva sādhanaḥ ced pramāṇa śabdaḥ phalam asya arthaḥ na tu phalam sva viṣaye karaṇam tad vyāpārasya tad janakena eva kṛta tvāt na ca sva viṣayāt anyat viṣaya antaram asya saṃbhavati atiprasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ pariharati uktam phalam iti yadi api yatra phalam saḥ asi a autpattikaḥ viṣayaḥ tathā api yatra anena pramāṇena satā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ janayitavyāḥ saḥ api vyāpāreṇa viṣayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ phalatvaḥ eva hetum āha jñātaḥ iti parokṣa artha avagāhitayā heya ādi buddhayaḥ pratyakṣa phalam na bhavanti bhavanti tu anumānasya iti niyama vādinām matam apanyasya dūṣayati kecid tu iti aniyamam rocyamānaḥ āha ubhayam tu iti
