NVTṬ_1,1.3.9–1,1.3.10	 anumāna śabda vat phalena nirvacanīya tvam upamāna śabdasya iti manvānaḥ ākṣipati sāmīpya iti samādhatte na asti vyāghātaḥ iti na iyam upamāna śabdasya phalena nirūktiḥ api tu pramāṇena nirūktiḥ iti na vaya āghātaḥ iti arthaḥ śabda viṣayā pratipattiḥ śābdam pramāṇam yat khalu caitra gām badhāna iti vākyam idam iti anusandhāna ātmakam smārtam vijñānam upajāyate tat padārtha smaraṇa sahakāri viśiṣṭa artha viṣayam vijñānam prasūte tat śābdra pramāṇam pramāṇam uktvā phalam asya āha phalam tat eva yadā hi etat pramāṇam tadā vākya artha vijñānam phalam yadā anumāna vat vākya artha vijñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna upādāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.11	 atra pratyakṣa ādīnām krama uddeśa prayojanam prati eka deśi matam upanyasyati kecid tu iti pratyakṣa parāḥ hi pramāṇa antara janyāḥ pramitayaḥ iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam yadi api kiñcid anumānam anumāna ādi pūrvakam api tathā api prāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakam upamānam tu pratyakṣa pūrvakam api śabda pūrvakam eva iti asya anumānāt apakarṣaḥ smaraṇa sahakāritā ca anumāna sādṛśyam upamānasya asti iti anumāna anantaram uddeśaḥ alpa jñāna adhīnam ca bahu jñānam iti alpa viṣaya pratyakṣa ādi uddeśebhyaḥ paraḥ bahu viṣaya śabda uddeśaḥ iti tat etat eka deśi matam eka deśī antara matena dūṣayati tat ca ayuktam iti aparaḥ iti ākliṣṭaḥ hi prathamam mahā viṣayam eva duravadhāraṇa tvāt nirūpayati alpa viṣayam tu kliṣṭaḥ api śaknoti nirūpayitum atas mahā viṣaya tvam prāthamyaḥ eva hetuḥ na caramatvaḥ iti arthaḥ anantara matam dūṣayati etat ca iti etāvatā krama mātram bhavet na tu tad viśeṣa niyamaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.12	 saṃprati vimarśa pūrvakam sva abhibhata krama niyama hetum avadhārayan= eva pūrva eka deśi matam apākaroti tasmāt anyaḥ iti vimarśa nimittam vipratipattim āha pratyakṣam pūrvam prādhānyāt iti ekaḥ mahā viṣaya tvāt ca ādau śabda upadeśaḥ iti aparaḥ tatra mahā viṣaya tvam anaikāntikam sanna āgamasya eva pūrva upadeśam gamayati iti āha ubhayam iti pṛcchati katham iti uttaram pratyakṣaiṇa api iti mahā viṣaya tva lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa dharma darśana nimittam saṃdeham āha tatra iti sva abhimatena hetunām krama viśeṣa niyamam avadhārayati pratyakṣasya iti iti yadi api pramiteḥ pratyakṣa paratvena pratyakṣasya prādhānyam tathā api śāstre vyutpādya tvena anumānasya api tat asti iti sādhāraṇa tayā na hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.13	 syāt etat vyavasthita viṣayam pratyakṣam na anumāna viṣaye pravartate na ca anumānam agṛhīta saṃbandham udeti na ca saṃbandha grahaḥ saṃbandhi graham antareṇa na ca anumāna viṣaye sāmānya rūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate anumāna antareṇa tu grahaṇe anavasthā tasmāt kāraṇa bhāvāt na anumānam asti etena śabda upamāne api parāḥ te tayoḥ api saṃbandha saṃvedana adhīna janma tvāt tasmāt na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti vibhāga vacanam anupapannam iti śaṅkām apanetum vimarśa pūrvakam vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ kim punar pramāṇāni iti tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya avyākhyāne kāraṇam āha kim punar etāni iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.14^1	 sā ca iyam pramitiḥ pratyakṣa parā iti bhāṣyam tat anubhāṣya hetum āha sā iyam iti ākāṅkṣā bhāva pratipādanāya pratīti svarūpam kramam ca āha yathā ayam iti āhitaḥ utpāditaḥ pratyayaḥ niścayaḥ yasya saṃsarga upadhānam varhi prati sa tathā sandigdhena hi niścayāya pravartitavyam eva niścitaḥ tu viniścayāya pramāṇa antare pravartamānaḥ tad abhyarhitataram manyate dhūma aṅga tvena iti aṅga tvam vyāpaka tvam vyāpyam punar vyāpti kriyāyām karma tvena pradhānam tat anena dhūma vyāpaka tva upadhānena dhūmāt gamyamānaḥ bahniḥ parokṣaḥ iti darśitam 
NVTṬ_1,1.3.14^2	 anupahita prakāśa satu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahita vahni svarūpa prakāśaḥ sa hi sākṣātkāraḥ iti tāvat ayam pramātā sa ākāṅkṣaḥ yāvat upadhāna vyavahitam svarūpam upalabhate upadhāna anapekṣaḥ tu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahitam sākṣāt varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati dhūma aṅga tvena dhūma viśeṣaṇa tvena iti kecid tat tu prakṛta anupayogi tayā ayuktam iti upasaṃharati atas pradhānam iti saḥ ayam guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ bheda āśrayaḥ vyavasthāyām na asti vyavasthitānām pratyekam eka tvāt tasmāt vyavasthāyām guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ na cintyaḥ iti itiḥ sūtra samāptau 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.1^1	 pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa viśeṣa lakṣaṇānām artha ākṣipta sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāga uddeśa hetu tvena tad anantara abhidhānam iti āha atha vibhaktānām iti tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ityādi sūtram asya tātparyam āha sūtra arthaḥ sūtra prayojanam samāna asamāna jātīya viśeṣaka tvam samāna jātīyam anumāna ādi asamāna jātīyam pratyakṣa ābhāsa prameya ādi tebhyaḥ viśeṣaka tvam viśeṣaḥ tat asya sūtrasya prayojanam yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam tad rūpam na śakroti grahītum saḥ anena lakṣaṇena bodhyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.1^2	 evaṃlakṣaṇakam pratyakṣam iti tasmāt sāmānnayataḥ siddha vivikta pratyakṣa mātra anuvādena lakṣaṇa vidhāna param idam sūtram itas tu avagata lakṣaṇaḥ tena eva vivicya pratyakṣa tattvam gṛhṇāti iti samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ sūtra arthaḥ uktaḥ iti atra ca yahaḥ iti adhyāhṛtya yat tadonitya abhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣam iti pramāṇa vāci pratyakṣa padra yojanīyam evam ca jñāna pramāṇya pakṣe api yat tad viśeṣya jñānam pratyakṣa phalam liṅga parāmarśaḥ vā tad api indriya artha sannikarṣa utu anna tva ādi upeta tvena bhavati pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam iti na avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇasya iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.2^1	 sūtra padārtham pṛcchati atha iti uttaram indriya iti sannikarṣa grahaṇa labhyam prakāra bhedam parisaṃcaṣṭe sannikarṣaḥ punar iti punar śabdena saṃyoga samavāya pada upādānāt vyavacchinatti saṃyoga pada upādāne hi na samavāyaḥ labhyate samavāya pada upādāne vā na saṃyogaḥ sannikarṣa pada upādāne tu abhimata lābhaḥ artha grahaṇena arthyamāṇa tayā jñeya svarūpya ugya tā darśitāḥ na ca asau= aṇu ākāśa ādīnām asti iti sati api saṃyoga ādau na asau= artha sannikarṣaḥ iti tat vyudāsaḥ utpanna grahaṇena ca sannikarṣasya utpādaka tvam sūcitam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.2^2	 tatas sati api artha svarūpa yogya tve saṃyukta saṃyoga ādeḥ anutpādakasya sannikarṣasya vyudāsaḥ anyathā kuḍya ādi saṃyuktena indriyeṇa kuḍya ādi vyavahitasya tad saṃyuktasya ghaṭa ādeḥ tad samavetasya ca rūpa ādeḥ api grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na ca etāvatā trividhaḥ eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ ca iti sāṃpratam svatantra vyāghātāt anubhava vyāghātāt ca ye hi dravya guṇa karma āśrayam sāmānya atiriktam sādṛśsayam artha ānataram rocayante teṣām katham rūpa ādi bhedānām anyonyasya sādṛśyam pratyakṣam bhavet 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.2^3	 na hi tad indriyeṇa saṃyuktam na api indriya saṃyukta samavetam tasmāt caturthaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ itarathā svatantra vyāghātaḥ anubhava vyāghātaḥ ca anubhūyante hi rūpa gandha tva ādayaḥ sāmānya viśeṣāḥ anugatāḥ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu paraspara vyāvṛtti matīṣu ete na anubhūyeran asati sannikarṣa antare yadi tu vaiyātyāt āhuḥ na anubhūyante eva iti tadā prativaktavyam kutastyaḥ ayam anantāsu rūpa gandha ādi vyaktiṣu rūpam iti vā gandhaḥ iti vā vyapadeśa bhedaḥ cākṣuṣa tva ādi upādhi nibandhanaḥ iti ced na ananu saṃhita upādherūpa hita pratyaya ayogāt na khalu ananu saṃhita daṇḍaḥ caitram daṇḍī iti vyapadiśati na ca indriyāṇi atīndriyāṇi indriya darśana viṣaya bhāvam anubhavanti tasmāt asti indriyeṇa rūpa tva ādi sāmānya anubhavaḥ yat nibandhanāḥ kāsucid eva kecid eva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśa ibhedāḥ iti siddham sannikarṣa antaram viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇam samaveta viśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.3^1	 yasya indriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśam tatra darśayati tatra cakṣuḥ iti śabdassya ākāśa guṇa tvam karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnasya nabhaḥ bhāgasya śrotra tvam ādyasya eva śabdasya saṃyoga vibhāga yoni ja tvam santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāyaḥ ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataram upapādayiṣyate avayava a= ayavinau guṇa guṇinau kriyā kriyāvantau jāti jātimantau ca mithas saṃbaddhau= anubhūtete na anyathā tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti ca śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti ca paṭaḥ spandate iti ca paṭaḥ dravyam iti ca buddhi vyapadeśau syātām śuklaḥ paṭaḥ ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya jñānam na tu saṃbandhi jñānam iti ced 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.3^2	 kim punar idam sāmānādhikaraṇyam tādātmyam iti ced na dvitīya buddhi vyapadeśayoḥ paunaruktyāt apauna rūktyam ca abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ yat anyatarat upalabhya anyat bubhutsante na ca ekam vastu dvi ātmakam iti yuktam bheda adhiṣṭhānasya tat na antarīyakasya dvi tvasya ekātmani virodhena asaṃbhavāt tasmāt bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete asaṃbandhe gauḥ aśvaḥ iti vat tad anupapatteḥ saṃbandhe api kuṇḍe dadhīti vat vaiyadhi karaṇya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na śabda vṛtti bhedena saṃbandha abhede api sāmānādhikaraṇya vaiyadhikaraṇya vyavasthāpanāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.3^3	 na hi jātu dadhi śabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍa śabdaḥ vā dadhni vartante tu surabhim adhara śukla ādi śabdāḥ sva abhidheyam nimittīkṛtya paṭa ādiṣu evam paṭa ādi śabdāḥ api jāti ādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tena sāmānādhikaraṇye api pravṛtti nimittānām na aikātmyam parasparam na api dravyeṇa kim tu taiḥ tainvitam ekam dravyam pratīyate śabdānām tu tatra ekasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tad vācyānām aikātmya bhramaḥ ayuta siddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhīti vat na sphuṭataraḥ viveka prakāśaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.3^4	 tat evam asti saṃbaddha anubhavaḥ na ca asau saṃbaddha anubhavam vinā iti saṃbandhaḥ anubhūyate sa ca ayuta siddhi ādi saṃpattyā samavāyaḥ na ca asya anyaḥ samavāyaḥ avasthānāt na ca indriyeṇa asya saṃyogaḥ adravya tvāt na ca asaṃbaddhasya grahaṇam indriyāṇām prāpya kāritva samarthanāt tasmāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pariśiṣyate nanu ayam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ anyatra saṃbandha antara pūvrakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat kim atra saṃbandha antaram kalpyatām tathā ca anavasthā iti uktam na ca indriyā saṃva baddhasya grahaṇam tasmāt vinā saṃbandha antaram viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eṣitavyaḥ iti siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.4^1	 evam abhāve api yat indriya saṃyuktam vā yat vā indriya samavetu yathā bhū tale ghaṭo na asti iti vā na asti akāre anudātta svaraḥ iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā viśeṣaṇa bhāvena samavetasya viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca indriya pratyāsattyā grahaṇam na ca bhū tala ādi rūpam eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ na artha antaram iti sāṃpratam sati api ghaṭa ādau bhū talasya bhāvāt na ca kaivalyam tasya dharmaḥ ghaṭa bhāva virodhī ghaṭa abhāvāt anyaḥ na ca dṛśye ghaṭa ādau bhū tala upalambhaḥ kaivalyam abhāva vyavahāra hetuḥ iti yuktam evam hi ghaṭa saṃsṛṣṭa bhū tala grahaḥ api kaivalyam iti ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāram pravartayet na hi adṛśyaḥ ghaṭaḥ tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.4^2	 dṛśye anupalabhyamānaḥ iti tu viśeṣaṇe kim aparāddham upalabhya abhāvena yena tad apākaraṇāya upalambha abhāvaḥ abhyupeyate tasmāt sa divāsat api tattvam abhyupeyam tat ca pratyakṣam akṣa vyāpāre sati tad pratyayāt na ca pratiyogi smaraṇa vyavahitaḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ nālam abhāva dhiyam upajanayitum iti sāṃpratam iti agra darśayiṣyāmaḥ sa vikalpakassa pratyakṣa tva siddhau yathā śabda smaraṇa pūrva gṛhīta piṇḍa anusandhāna ādayaḥ na indriya vyāpāram vyavadadhati iti na ca śabda smaraṇa ādīnām anuyogitā bhū tala vikalpam pratyaṅga tvāt sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt ghaṭasya tu pratiyogitā iti sāṃpratam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.4^3	 kasya punar pratiyogī ghaṭaḥ tad abhāvasya iti ced bhavatu ghaṭa abhāva anubhavasya tu ghaṭa smaraṇam hetuḥ iti na pratiyogi kim tu anuyogyā iva nanu svarūpa mātram dṛṣṭam veśma ādi artham smaran= eva bahis nitaḥ caitraḥ yadā pṛcchyate kenacid vayasya tava gṛhe tadā kim āsīt maitraḥ iti sa caitraḥ pratiyogi smaraṇa virahāt pūrvam apratipanna maitrābhāvaḥ api tad praśna janita maitra smṛtiḥ kṣaṇam dhyātva tad abhāvam avagamya āha mitra tatra na āsīt maitraḥ iti tadīyam asati indriya artha sannikarṣe abhāvabuddhiḥ bhavantī pratyakṣādyatiriktam abhāva ākhyam pramāṇa vyavasthāpayati iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.4^4	 na etat saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇena manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇa abhāvam maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tad abhāvasya tadānīm anumānāt tathā hi tat geham tadā maitra abhāva vat jñāna arhasya maitrasya ajñāne gehasya jñāyamāna tvāt yat yasya jñāna arhasya ajñāne jñāyate tat tad abhā va vat yathā ghaṭa bhāva vat bhū talam tathā ca geham tasmāt tathā na ca yat kadācid ānumānikam tenenidraya gamyena na bhavitavyam pramāṇa saṃplava vyavasthāpanāt tat saddhim viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāvasya indriya prameya tā iti saṃyoga samavāya pada parihāreṇa sannikarṣa pada upādānasya prayojanam āha saḥ ayam sannikarṣa śabdaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.5^1	 tat anena prabandhena indriyasya arthena sannikarṣāt yat utpadyate jñānam tat pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam saṃprati na tarhi iti codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yadi indriya artha iti pratyakṣa jñāna kāraṇa abhidhāna pravṛtteḥ tat eka deśam vadan= akuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt iti arthaḥ kāraṇa antarāṇi darśayati tat yathā iti viṣaya saṃyoti cakṣuḥ ālokaḥ ca tad stham rūpam ātmīyena hi rūpeṇa āloka cakṣuṣī dravyam darśayate iti sthitiḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.5^2	 mahat tvam vā aneka dravyavat tvam vā aneka dravyāḥ avayavāḥ tadvat tvam avayavinaḥ mahataḥ eva na dvi aṇukasya tasmāt anyonya nirapekṣa tvam mahattva aneka dravyavat tvayoḥ iti vikalpaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ iti sati api evaṃlakṣaṇaka tve cukṣuḥ ava yavinaḥ taijasasya na cākṣuṣa tvam iti atas uktam upalabdhi kalaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti dharma adharma nimittaḥ ubhdava samākhyātaḥ saṃskāraḥ upalabdhiphalaḥ na ca asau cakṣuṣi tasya adṛṣṭa vaśena anudbhūta rūpa sparśa tvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na vaktavyāni iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ hi sūtrakāraḥ tat eva brūyāt yat asya asādhāraṇam kāraṇam na tu sat api sādhāraṇam asya kāraṇam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.5^3	 na hi tat tasya lakṣaṇam ati vyāpteḥ iti arthaḥ tat anena na idam ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam asādhāraṇam kāraṇam ced pratyakṣa lakṣaṇāya upādeyam hanta anyat api asya asādhāraṇam asti kāraṇam iti tat api upādeyam iti codayati indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tarhi iti tat anena manasaḥ tarhi iti asya bhāṣyasya arthaḥ uktaḥ veditavyaḥ pariharati na anena eva indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa eva tasya indriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya ukta tvāt tad ukti sādhyam yat tat tena eva kṛtam tat sādhyam tu indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ na śaknoti sādhayitum 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.5^4	 na ca sukha ādi jñāne mānase asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tu sarva vyāpakaḥ vakṣyati hi manasaḥ indriya tvam sukha ādeḥ ca artha tvam siddham eva iti saṃprati vyāpaka tvam abhyupetya parīhāra antaram āha indriya artha iti yadi api indriya manaḥ sannikarṣe api indriyam asti pratyakṣa jñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśāt indriya jñānam iti tathā api manasā vyapadeśa amāvāt manasaḥ tatra aviśeṣaka tvam indriya artha sannikarṣe tu ubhayam api viśeṣakam ubhābhyām pratyakṣa jñānasya vyapadeśāt iti ayamasya indriya manaḥ sannikarṣāt viśeṣaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.6^1	 codayati yadā tu iti tuśabdaḥ pūrva pakṣam vyāvartayati yu jānasya hi yoginaḥ yad ātma manaḥ sa yogāt ātmani buddhayaḥ bhavanti tāḥ khalva ātmanā vyapadiśyante ātma buddhayaḥ iti manasā ca vyapadiśyante manaḥ buddhayaḥ iti tasmāt ubhābhyām vyapadeśāt ubhayoḥ viśeṣaka tvam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa vat ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti arthaḥ pariharati yat ca iti caḥ avadhāraṇe yat eva asādhāraṇam tat vyapadeśa bhāj bhavati kāraṇa tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati yathā cukṣuṣā indriya tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣam iti tathā manasā āpi indriya tvena vyapadiśyate jñānam mānasam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.6^2	 evam yathā rūpeṇa arthena vyapadiśyate jñānam rūpa jñānam iti tathā ātmanā api arthena vyapadiśyate ātma jñānam iti tatra ca asādhāraṇa tvam eva tayoḥ yatra tu indriya antaram eva asādhāraṇam liṅga ādi vā tatra ca ātmā na arthaḥ api tu pramātā eva yathā rūpa ādi jñāne anumāna ādi jñāne vā na tatra jñānam mānasam iti vā ātma jñānam iti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ tayoḥ sādhāraṇyāt ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tu indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ na tu indriya artha sannikarṣasya eṣa saṃgrāhakaḥ avyāpaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.7^1	 eka deśinaḥ parīhāram upanyasyati indriya manaḥ saṃyogasya vā agrahaṇam bhede abhedāt yadā hi nāgara yoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihita manasaḥ vikasita niḥspanda nayana utpalāḥ saudha māla āgavākṣakaiḥ avanipatim sa bala vāhana mati cira parāvṛttam gopureṇa niviśamānam ālokayanti tadā khlvāsām ekena eva indriya manaḥ saṃyogena krama vat aneka indriya artha sannikarṣa sahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstika āśvīya ādi pratyakṣa jñānāni jāyante tat idam āha yasmāt iti codayati yadi iti yadā hi mandam gacchati gavi dūratas saṃyukta samavāyena indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa śuklaḥ gauḥ ityajñāsīt atha pratyāsīdan gacchati iti api vijānāti tena eva saṃyukta samavāyena sannikarṣeṇa tena pratyakṣa jñānasya śuklaḥ iti ca gacchati iti ca bhede api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ na bhidyate tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣe tulya tvāt indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ api tatra vaktavyaḥ iti arthaḥ pariharati na vaktavyaḥ kutas ukta uttara tvāt iti tad vibhajate uktā iti nanu bhavatu uktam uttaram bhede abheda āditi asya ākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ iti atas āha anabhyupagamāt ca 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.7^2	 eka deśi matam etat asmābhiḥ na abhyupeyate tasmāt na samādheyam iti arthaḥ tat kim idānīm bhidyamānasya pratyakṣa jñānasya na ayam bhidyate iti samāna tvāt na uktaḥ iti bhāṣyam anupapannam eva na iti āha indriya manaḥ saṃyogasya ca agrahaṇam samāna tvāt pṛcchati kena iti uttaram ātma manaḥ iti punar pṛcchati kim punar samāna tvam uttaram vyapadeśa abhāvaḥ iti uktam tena bhāṣyasya ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣa jñānasya rūpa jñānasya rūpa jñānam iti vā cakṣuḥ vijñānam iti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ iva ayam indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ na bhidyate evam hi sa bhidyate yadi sva saṃbandhi vācakena vyapadeśena svam anyatas vyāvartyate na viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭam jñānam api anyatas vyāvartayet na tu asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya m anobhyām pratyekam asya vyapadeśaḥ yathā indriya artha sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya arthābhyām vyapadeśaḥ rūpa jñānam iti cakṣuḥ jñānam iti vā tasmāt vyapadeśa abhāvaḥ ātma manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa sāmyam indriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya tasmāt samāna tvāt na uktaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.8	 prākara antaram samāna tve darśayati atīndriya ādhāra tā vā iti lakṣaṇam hi prasiddham bhavati yathā dhūmaḥ vahneḥ na ca atīndriya dvaya ādhāra sannikarṣaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ yathā indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ arthasya saṃbandhinaḥ ekasnaya prasiddha tvāt indriya manasoḥ tu dvayoḥ atīndriya tvāt ātmā tu yadi api yu jānasya śarīra ādi atiriktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tathā api asmad ādīnām na tathā iti atīndriyaḥ uktaḥ tat anena ati indriya ādhāra tvam sva rūpeṇa uktvā tat evam viṣaya āvṛtti tva manaḥ vṛtti tvābhyām atīndriya ādhāra tvam sāmānyam āha viṣaya āvṛtti tvam vā iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti samāna tvāt iti bhāṣya uktaḥ hetuḥ caritārtha tvāt iti sva uktaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.9	 ākṣipati indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti ayuktam iti sa antara grahaṇāt iti hetum vibhajate viprakṛṣṭa iti nanu na arthaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ tatra prāpteḥ iti atas āha na tu cakṣuṣaḥ iti kasmāt iti atas āha bhūta viśeṣasya iti bāhyaḥ bhūta viśeṣaḥ ālokaḥ tasya prasādaḥ indriya avyavadhāyaka tvam kuḍya ādibhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kāca abhra paṭala ādiṣu su accheṣu samasti syāt etat asti kṛṣṇasāra lakṣaṇaḥ bhū viśeṣaḥ prasanna andhasya api atas tasya api rūpa upalabdhiḥ syāt itpataḥ āha tad tṛṣṇā pūrvakā iti rūpa upabhoga tṛṣṇā hi tad sādhanam kṛṣṇasāram api viṣayīkaroti etat uktam bhavati bhūta viśeṣaḥ karma apekṣaḥ rūpam caṣṭaḥ iti cakṣuḥ iti ucyate karma kṣāyāt tu prasanna andhasya na rūpam caṣṭaḥ iti na cakṣuḥ astu golakam eva cakṣuḥ kim etāvatā api iti āha na ca iti vicchinnam hi golakam arthāt anubhūyate iti arthaḥ tat evam vastunaḥ sāntarasya grahaṇam aprāpya kāri tve hetuḥ uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.10^1	 kecid tu sāntaram iti grahaṇa viśeṣaṇam hentu bruvate tat matam upanyasyati apare tu iti sādhya viparyayāt asya vyatirekam darśayati na hi prāpya kāriṣu iti pakṣa dharma tām āha dṛṣṭam tu iti yat ca uktam aprāpya kāri tve sādhanam pṛthutara grahaṇāt iti tad vibhajate pṛthutarā iti dvi āśrayaḥ hi saṃyogaḥ alpam eva saṃyoginam anurudhyate na mahāntam na jātu ratha ādi saṃyogāḥ nabhaḥ vyaśnuvate mā bhūt sarvatra ratha ādīnām tad saṃyoga ādīnām ca upalabdhiḥ tena yāvat mā atra rāṣṭra vanādeḥ golakena vyāptam tāvat mātrasya grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ hetu antaram āha diś iti asya api vyatireka mukhena gamaka tvam darśayati yadi prāpya kārī iti aparam api hetum āha sannikṛṣṭā iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.10^2	 yadi api gati kṣaṇānām pratyekam spāśrayasya deśa antara vibhāga saṃyoga upajananam prati kṣipra tayā na viśeṣaḥ sva āśraya pratyāsattau ca aviśeṣaḥ tathā āpyā cāpādāna vibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīya deśa prāpteḥ antarāla vartī yāvān gati kṣaṇa pracayaḥ pūrva aparībhūtaḥ gatiḥ iha vivakṣitaḥ tasya sāntara tvam manda tvam vilambaḥ nairantaryam tu pāṭavam kṣipra tā tām imām gatim abhindat nairantaryeṇa kurvat api sannikṛṣṭam āśu prāpnoti na viprakṛṣṭena tulya kālam kim tu viprakṛṣṭam cireṇa iti yathā uktam diś rāgena sa antara grahaṇam na syāt prāptau jñāne adhikasya ca bahis varti tvāt indriyasya upapannam sa antara grahaṇam iti ced atas uktam adhiṣṭhānāt bahis na akṣam kim tu adhiṣṭhāna deśaḥ eva indriyam kutas tad cikitsā ādi yogataḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.11–1,1.4.13^1	 sati api ca bahirbhāve na śaktiḥ viṣaya īkṣaṇe yadi ca syāt tadā paśyet api unmīlya nimīlanāt yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlita nayanaḥ api rūpam paśyet unmīlanāt asti bahis indriyam iti tatra vārttikakāraḥ sa antara grahaṇāt iti hetum vikalpya dūṣayati yat tāvat iti sa antara tā khalva prāpti sāhacaryāt aprāptim lakṣayati hetu arthasya pratijñā arthena akṣipra tvāt amedena tat uktam na pratijñā arthāt bhidyate iti hetu pratijñāpada vācya tvena bhedam upacarya akṣepya ākṣepaka bhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tasya vyavadhāyaka tvāt iti rūpavataḥ aprasāda svabhāvasya kuḍya ādeḥ iti arthaḥ yat tu prasāda svabhāvam tejaḥ tat na gṛhyate kim tu tasya rūpa mātram visphārita akṣaṇa dṛśyate tad āśrayam ca dravyam sādhayiṣyate na ca guṇaḥ dravyasya antaram mā bhūt gandha ādibhiḥ antaram dravyasya mā na bhūtām ca nirantare dravye sva guṇābhyām antarita tvāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.13^2	 na ca āpāta janma ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā dravya anumānam pratīkṣate yena rūpa jñāna anumitam dravyam indriyarthayoḥ dravyayoḥ antaram syāt api ca rūpa mātram agṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantram gandha ādi vat gṛhyamāṇam katham antarā sva āśrayam anumāpayet ākāśa ādīnām āśraya aṇam agrahaṇāt tasmāt viṣakta avayava tejaḥ dravya apratyakṣa tva samāropa mātreṇa dūṣaṇam vakṣyamāṇam tu anyathā siddha tva dūṣaṇam pāramārthikam draṣṭavyam atha abhāvaḥ antara śabda vācyaḥ iti na asmākam mūrta dravya abhāvāt anyat ākāśam asti iti bhāvaḥ dūṣayati sa svatantraḥ cakṣuḥ viṣayaḥ na bhavati indriyam ca artham ca antarā abhāvaḥ grāhyaḥ tena saha arthasya grahaṇam sa antara grahaṇam na ca indriya arthayoḥ madhyate kasyacid saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇam asti yat tantraḥ ayam abhāvaḥ gṛhyeta iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.14^1	 syāt etat mā bhūt āntarālikam saṃyuktam vā samavetam vā viśeṣyam gṛhyamāṇam eva tu rūpa ādi viśeṣyam iti tad tantraḥ ayam abhāvaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena rirūpayiṣyate tatas ca sāntara grahaṇam upapatsyate iti atas āha tena saha upalabdhau= iti pratīyate hi tvac ādibhiḥ api indriyaiḥ prāpya kāribhiḥ auṣṇya abhava viśeṣaṇa śiṣirataram pāthaḥ na ca indriyāṇām atra aprāpya kāritā tasmāt anaikāntikam anvaya abhyupagamena etat uktam anvaya abhāve tu viruddham iti bhāvaḥ na ca taijasam rūpam antaram yena sa antara grahaṇam syāt iti āha na ca anyā gatiḥ ati yathā ca etat tathā upapāditam adhastāt ye tu sāntaraḥ iti grahaṇam iti hetum āhuḥ tān prati dūṣaṇam āha yaiḥ api iti anyathā siddha tve hetum āha śarīra iti śarīra avacchinnāḥ khalvātmānaḥ śarīra āyatanāḥ śarīram eva ātmānam abhimanyānāḥ arthān anubhavanti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.14^2	 tatra yaḥ eva śarīra asaṃbaddhaḥ iti anubhūyate tam eva sāntaraḥ iti manyate indriya saṃbandhaḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt śarīra saṃbandhena tasya sparśa ādau na sa antaratva abhimānaḥ iti arthaḥ hetu antaram dūṣayati yat api iti saṃbandha mātreṇa iti mātra grahaṇam saṃbandha catuṣṭaya vyāpti artham tat yathā indriyeṇa arthasya saṃbandhaḥ indriya avayavaiḥ arthasya artha avayavaiḥ indrayasya indriya avayavaiḥ artha avayavānām na ca etat niryatā vinā pṛthu agra tām bhavati iti pṛthu agra tā sūcitā yathā varti deśe piṇḍitam api tejaḥ prasarpat prāsāda udaram vyāpnoti tat kasya hetoḥ pṛthu agra tvāt iti svabhāvataḥ prasarat api na sva parimāṇa anuvidhāyinam pratyayam ādhatte kim tu viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyinam viṣaya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇāḥ hi pratyayāḥ na indriya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇāḥ tat idam uktam viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyī pratyayaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.15	 aparam api hetum dūṣayati yat punar iti deham artham ca antara avasthitasya pṛthivī ādeḥ saṃyukta saṃyoga alpīyaḥ tvam bhūyas tvam ca apekṣamāṇasya iti khagānām ca upari upari saṃcaratām dūra antika bhāvaḥ bahu latamāloka avayava bhāgānām saṃyukta saṃyoga alpa tva bhūyaḥ tvābhyām avagantavyaḥ sa ca tādṛś āloka avayavī pratyakṣaḥ anyathā na rūpa mātreṇa tad anumānam śakyam iti uktam na ca khagānām upari upari saṃcaratām dūrantika pratyayaḥ syāt na ca patati patatriṇī iha prāptaḥ na iha iti bhavet tasmāt anyathā siddhiḥ eva saha antareṇa grahaṇāt iti vat atra api dūṣaṇam iti draṣṭavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.16^1	 aparam api hetum dūṣayati yat punar iti yugapad grahaṇam asiddham tad abhimānaḥ tu anyathā siddhaḥ acintyaḥ hi tejasaḥ lādhava atiśayena vega atiśayaḥ yat udaya giri śikharam ārohati eva mārtaṇḍa maṇḍale bhavana udareṣu ālokaḥ iti abhimānaḥ laukikānām tādṛśam cākṣuṣam api tejaḥ iti krameṇa api gacchat yugapad tatra tatra lakṣyate na ca ekasmāt eva karmaṇaḥ yugapad durāntika saṃyogāḥ bhavanti iti yuktam tat hi sva kārye janayitavye sva āśraya pratyāsattim apekṣate anyathā madhura āsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattam yojayet vega ākhya saṃskāra jam api karmana sahasā śaram antarāla deśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati tasmāt mithyā eva yaugapadya abhimānaḥ iti codayati katham punar iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.16^2	 asti hi śākhā candramasoḥ grahaṇe yaugapadya abhimānaḥ na ca ayam asati bādhake mithyā iti vaktum śakyaḥ saḥ ayam abādhitaḥ bodhaḥ avabodhayati aprāpya kāritām cakṣuṣaḥ iti arthaḥ pariharati idam iti indriyam yadi agatvā anāgatam artham gṛhṇīyāt kim asya kuḍya kaṭādi āvaraṇam apakuryāt yena tadā āvṛtam na gṛhṇīyāt gatau tu sparśavatā prasāda rahitena sā eva asya pratibaddhā iti na prāpnoti viṣayam aprāptam ca na gṛhṇāti prāyogaḥ tu cakṣuḥ śrotre prāpya sva viṣaye kāryam kurutaḥ janaka tve sati tad aprāpta avajanaka tvāt yat janakam sat yat aprāptau yat na janayati tat tad prāptau= eva tat janayati yathā kumbha janakaḥ kumbhakāraḥ mṛdaḥ aprāptau= akurvan kumbham tad prāptau= eva karoti tathā ca etat tasmāt tathā iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.17^1	 yukti antaram āha dūra antika anuvidhānam iti dūre na upalabhyate antike ca upalabhyate aprāpteḥ aviśeṣeṇa dūre api upalambhaḥ syāt anupalambhe vai antike api na syāt prāptau tu dūram gacchat prakṣīṇam sat prāptam artham na gṛhṇāti ataijasam taijasam api abhibhūtam na gṛhṇāti yathā ulkā prakāśam madhyandine anabhibhūtam tu mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam gṛhṇāti eva iti codayati viṣayībhāvāt iti yogyaḥ hi tādṛśaḥ indri ya kṣaṇaḥ sva kāraṇāt upajātaḥ pariṇataḥ vā arthakṣaṇaḥ ca yayoḥ aprāptayoḥ eva grahaṇa grāhya bhāvaḥ vyavahita viprakṛṣṭau ca na tau tādṛśau tat kim apratīyamāna prāpti kalpanayā iti arthaḥ pariharati tat ca na evam iti niṣatsyete hi kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāmau bhāvānām 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.17^2	 tena sthema bhājām bhāvānām sva rūpa yogya tā vā mahat tva ādiḥ viṣayībhāvaḥ sahakāri sākalyam vā jñāna upajananam prati pariśiṣyate tatra sva rūpa yogya tā mātram ced āsthīyeta tadā yat eva avyavahitam sannihitam sat ajanayat vijñānam viprakṛṣṭam api vyavahitam api tat eva iti tathā eva tena jñānam janayitavyam asti hi tasya tadā api svarūpa yogya tā iti sahakāri sākalyam tu prāptiḥ eva tasmāt na saṃbandham antareṇa viṣayībhāvaḥ iti sūktam sandigdhaḥ pṛcchati atha prāpya kāritvaḥ iti ayam abhisandhiḥ kulāla ādau prāpya kāriṇi dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ vyavahitaḥ ca na karoti iti tasmāt aprāpya kāriṇi ca ācaskānta ādau dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ vyavahitaḥ ca lauham maṇiḥ ākarṣati tasmāt tatra pramāṇam vaktavyam iti uttaram indriya tvam eva pramāṇam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.17^3	 tat eva pañca avayava upapannam āha prāpya kārī iti yadi tu kaścid dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam ubhdāvayet tvac ādīnām aprāpya kāri tvāt iti tu pratyāha atha punar na kiñcid iti pṛcchati atha iti yogya tayā eva hi kāraṇāni sva kāryam kurvanti prāptiḥ tu sva rūpyogya tā prayuktām vyāptim upajīvati na tu asyāḥ svābhāvikam vyāpaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ uttaram saḥ api iti sahakāri sākalyam tāvat na prāpteḥ atiricyate iti uktam kevalam sva rūpa yogya tā vaktavyā sa ca vyastānām api asti iti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyaḥ api kārya utpāda prasaṅkaḥ ayaskānta maṇeḥ api cakṣuṣaḥ iva vṛtti bhedaḥ eṣitavyaḥ anyathā vyavadhāna vipra karṣayoḥ api lauha ākarṣaṇa prasaṅgāt 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.17^4	 na ca vyavadhāna vipra karṣa abhāva sahitaḥ lauham ākarṣati vyavadhāna viprakarṣayoḥ tu tad abhāva abhāvaḥ na ākarṣati saṃpratam prāpteḥ eva tatra tatra kārya utpādam prati upayogasya vidita svāt yogya tā mātrasya ca upādheḥ apākṛta tvāt yathā ca dravya atiriktaḥ tad dharmaḥ prāptiḥ tathā agreni vedayiṣyate tasmāt sarvam avadātam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti yat api kṛṣṇasāra anugraha upaghātābhyām darśana adarśanāt iti tatra ucyate tad adhiṣṭhānam indriyam iti adhiṣṭhāna anugraha upaghātābhyām tasya anugraha upadhātau yathā kūṣmāṇḍa latā secana= chedanābhyām tad phalasya anugraha upaghātau atas eva bahis nisṛtā api acchinna mūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthāḥ na chinna mūla iti siddham 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.18^1	 pṛcchati atha jñāna iti pratyakṣa samākhyāta lakṣaṇa anuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata eva etat jñānam eva iti loke sākṣātkāri jñāna hetoḥ pratyakṣa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ uttaram sukha ādi vyudāsa artham tat eva hi lakṣaṇa vāyam ucyate yasya lakṣya anapekṣaḥ ati vyāpti avyāpti vyudāsaḥ lakṣaṇa padebhyaḥ eva pratīyate lakṣya anurodhena tu lakṣaṇa vyavasthāpane anyonya āśraya tvam agatiḥ vā iti bhāvaḥ sukha ādīnām vijñāna abhinna hetu ja tvena vijñāna tvāt aśakyam vyāvartanam iti ced na abhinna hetu jatva asiddhaḥ na khalu yā eva candana sparśa jñānasya utpattau sāmagrī sā eva sukhasya api iti asti hi śīta ārtasya api candana indriya saṃyogāt śīta sparśa jñānam iti tadvat eva asya sukham api bhavet 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.18^2	 avāntara sāmagrī bhede api indriya artha manaskāra ja tvāt jñāna jātīya tvam iti ced na kiñcid kāraṇa abhede api kārya bhedasya anākasmika tva upapatteḥ tad artha tvāt ca kāraṇa bheda anusaraṇa prayāsasya na ca upādāna abhedāt abhedaḥ iti yuktam bhinnānām api jñānānām eka samanantara pratyaya upādāna tvasya bhavabhdiḥ abhyupagata tvāt api ca upādāna abhedaḥ ca kutaścid kāraṇa bhedāt kārya bhedaḥ ca iti kaḥ virodhaḥ atas eva asmākam abhede api upādānasya piṭharasya auṣṇya apara ākhyasya ca vahina saṃyogasya pūrvarūpa ādi pradhvaṃsānām kāraṇānām bhedāt bhinna jātīyāḥ jāyante gandha rūpa rasa sparśāḥ iti siddhāntaḥ tasmāt artha pravaṇebhyaḥ jñānebhyaḥ tad apravaṇa tayā bhinna jātīyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ yathā sva muna kūla vedanīya tva ādibhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ anyonyam api bhedavantaḥ tīvra saṃvega tayā pramitsā anapekṣa mānasa pratyakṣa pravedanīyāḥ iti ramaṇīyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.19^1	 syāt etat asati api indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātrāt eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ svapna antike darśana atyatra api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tatra api jñānam asti iti tat eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ kāraṇam klupta sāmarthyāt indriya artha sannikarṣasya tu jñāna mātra upayogāt anyathā siddhau bhāva abhāvau= iti tat ayuktam svapna antike sukha duḥkha utpādasya asiddheḥ tat jñānasya artha jñānasya iva mithyātvāt yathā hi tatra kāminī smṛti viṣaryāsaḥ eva mupalabdha cara tad janma sukha smaraṇa viparyāsaḥ sukha duḥkha buddhi utpādaḥ eva ca atra dharma adharma upayogaḥ na tu su sa duḥkha utpāde na ca asati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñānam anyat manoratha ādi vā tādṛśam sukha bhedam vidhatte yādṛśaḥ viṣaya upabhoga janmā sati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātram eva tasya hetuḥ jñāna hetuḥ tu sukha bhedasya anutpādāt iti api uktam eva viṣaya sākṣātkāraḥ tad utpāda hetuḥ na viṣaya jñāna mātram iti ced 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.19^2	 hantar iśvarasya api asti tatrabhavataḥ yoga ṛddhi saṃpannānām ca mahā dhiyām samasta vastu sākṣa ātmāraḥ iti teṣām api sukha duḥkha utpāda pracayaḥ prasajyet asatyām pratipakṣa dhāraṇāyām tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ api sukha duḥkha utpāda hetuḥ eṣitavyaḥ sa ca sati api artha sākṣātkāre na asti siddhānām iti na teṣām sukha duḥkha utpādaḥ api ca caram a bhāvi kāraṇam gṛhītvā pūrva bhāvināmakaraṇa tva āpādane tantu ādīnām api paṭa ādīn pratyakāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ saṃyoga bhedāt eva tādṛśa paṭāt patteḥ tantu ādīnām ca saṃyoga bhedaḥ eva upayogāt tad sahitasya tu tad kāraṇa tvam sannikarṣasya api ālocana sahitasya iti samānam yathā āhuḥ padārtha vidaḥ stragādi abhiprata viṣaya sānnidhye satīṣṭa upalabdhi indriya artha sannikarṣa dharma ādi apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ saṃyogāt yad anugraha abhiṣvaṅga nayana ādi prasāda janakam at padyate tat sukham iti tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.20	 iha dvayī pratyakṣa jātiḥ avikalpikā sa vikalpikā ca iti tatra ubhayī api indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyabhicāri iti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītā api sva śabdena upāttā tatra vipratipatteḥ tatra avikalpikāyāḥ padam avyapadeśyam iti sa vikalpikāyāḥ ca vyavasāya ātmakam iti tatra vyapadeśaḥ viśeṣaṇam upalakṣaṇam vā nāma jāti ādi tat karma vyapadeśyam viśeṣyam iti yāvat tat yathā ḍitthaḥ ayam gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ ayam kamaṇḍalu mān ayam gacchati ayam iti sarvam hi sa vikalpakam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena vastuṣu pravartate avidyamānam vyapadeśyam yasmiḥ tat avyapadeśyam jāti ādi svarūpa avagāhi na tu jāti ādīnām mithas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi iti yāvat 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.21^1	 tatra nāma rahitam avikalpakam na asti iti ye vipratipadyante tat matam apacikīrṣu rūpanyasyati bhāṣya kāraḥ yāvadartham vai nāmadheya śabdāḥ sarve arthāḥ sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra nāmadhaya anvitāḥ na asti saḥ arthaḥ yaḥ kadācid kvacid kathañcid nāmadheyena viyujyate tat anena nāmadheya tādātmyam arthānām pratijānīte atra hetum āha taiḥ artha saṃpratyayaḥ iti arthāḥ hi pratīyamānām nāmadheyairūpetāḥ tad sāmāna adhi karaṇyena avagamyante gauḥ iti arthaḥ aśvaḥ iti arthaḥ iti na ca upāya tayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam ghaṭate na hi cakṣuḥ ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyam rūpa ādi anubhavati na api jñāyamānaḥ upāyaḥ upeya sāmānā adhikaraṇmanubhavati na hi bhavati dhūmaḥ ayam vahinar iti kim tu dhūmaḥ ayam dhūma tvāt vahinamān iti api ca aśabda upāye anumeya ādau na śabda saṃbhedena adhigamaḥ bhavet asti tu 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.21^2	 tasmāt taiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ saha samāna adhikaraṇasya arthasya pratyayaḥ yatas iti tasmāt nāmadheya ātmānaḥ arthāḥ kim ca gavā ādiṣu ṣaḍja ādiṣu ca śabda apakarṣe artha pratyaya apakarṣāt tad utkarṣe tu artha pratyaya utkarṣāt pratyayasya ca pratyetavya utkarṣa adhīna utkarṣa tvāt nāmadheya utkarṣeṇa arthasya utkarṣaḥ arthasya tādatmyam gamayati tat idam samaḥ prayojanam saṃpratyayaḥ iti samadhikaḥ pratyayaḥ iti arthaḥ asti artha saṃpratyayaḥ nāmadheya sāmānādhikaraṇyena na tu etāvatā nāmadheya ātma tā sidhyati asti hi purovarti dravya sāmānādhikaraṇyena rajata pratyayaḥ na ca etāvatā śuktiḥ rajata ātmikā bhavati iti atas āha artha saṃpratyayāt ca vyavahāraḥ tatas ca visaṃvādāt pramāṇam sat nāmadheya tādatmyam sādhayati arthānām iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.22	 tat evam sāmānyatas arthānām nāmadheya tādātmyam vyutpādya prakṛte yojanayati tatra idam indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam viṣaya jñānam rūpam iti vā rasaḥ iti vai evam rūpa ādi artha sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati bhavatu kim etāvatā api iti atas āha rūpa rasa śabdāḥ ca viṣaya nāmadheyam kim etāvatā api iti atas āha tena vyapadiśyate jñānam uktam api vyapadeśam savya ākhyānam āha rūpam iti jānīte rasaḥ iti jānīte iti tathā ca arthānām nāmadheya ātmaka tvāt tad gocaram ālocanam api nāmadheya gocaram iti arthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānam śābdam prasajyate iti na śabda pramāṇaka tayā śābdam api tu śabde jātam śābdam śabdaḥ ca atra viṣaya tvena janakaḥ artha tādātmyāt tathā ca na avikalpakam śabda rahitam asti iti tātparya arthaḥ tathā ca āhuḥ na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.23–1,1.4.24	 bālaka mūka ādīnām api jñānam śabda anuvyādha vat eva anādi śabda bhāvanā vaśāt yat avocat ādyaḥ karaṇa vinyāsaḥ prāṇasya ūrdhvam samīraṇam sthānānām abhighātaḥ ca na vinā śabda bhāvanām iti tat asya nirākaraṇam lakṣaṇa gatena ālocana jñāna avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena sūcitam iti parīkṣā parvaṇi vacana arham api subhāṣita ruci tayā tad vilambam asahamānaḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ eva āha atas eva āha avyapadeśyam iti iti tena sūcite api arthe avyapadeśya padam ca ujayati yat idam anuma yukte śabda artha saṃbandhe artha jñānam na tat nāmadheya śabdena vyapadiśyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.25^1	 ayam abhisandhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabda ātmaka tvam rūpa ādīnām abhidhīyānam śabdabrahma ātmaka tvam vocyeta śreyamāṇa gauḥ ityādi pada bheda ātmaka tvam vā na tāvat ādya kalpaḥ na salvasmad ādi samasta darśana patha ativṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpa ādīnām asti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ laukikānām śrūyamāṇa śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmya prasādhane anupayukta śabda saṃbandhasya bāla mūka ādeḥ rūpa ādi jñāneṣu na asti śrūyamāṇa śabda gandhaḥ api prāk eva tu tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam na ca teṣām api prāc bhavīya śabda bhāvanā anugamena tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti sāṃpratam na khalu rūpa ādi ātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpa ādi vaiśadya ena avaiśadyam saṃbhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.25^2	 yugapad vaiśadyā vaiśadya rūpa viruddha dharma yogena bheda prasaṅgāt veśadye tu vyutpanna vat avyutpannaḥ api śabdaiḥ vyavaharet na tu saṃbandha grahaṇa pekṣeta na ca tādātmyāt anyat vācaka tvam śabdānām yatra saṃbandha graha apekṣā bhavet na ca tādātmye api kalpita bhedānām vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ tathā sati na sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ bheda kalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaprathā ca iti tasmāt avyutpannānām asti śabda rahitam rūpa ādiṣu nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam iti na kevalam abyutpannānām vyutpannānām api asti iti āha gṛhīte api ca śabda artha saṃbandhe iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.25^3	 ārddhektaḥ eva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirāsāya saṃbandha grahaṇa svarūpam āha astha arthasya sāsnādi mat rūpasya ayam gakara āt ya ukāraḥ nāmadheyam iti iti karaṇaḥ jñāna parāmarśa pradhānaḥ tathā ca yaḥ ḍitthaḥ nānā deśa kāla avasthā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍa bhedaḥ saḥ ayam iti sannihita deśa kālaḥ iti arthaḥ na tu ayam piṇḍaḥ ḍittha śabdaḥ iti pratyayaḥ autsargikam hi śabdānām artha paratvam kvacid punar iti ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ tat apa udyate yatra api saṃbandha pratipādanam abhedena ayam ḍitthaḥ iti tatra api śabdaḥ vācya tva paraḥ na svarūpa paraḥ yathā gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yoga paraḥ na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya go tvam bhavati 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.25^4	 tasmāt bhinnayoḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandha grahāt tad mūla tvāt ca śabda vyavahārasya na śabda puraḥsaram api jñānam śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam ātmanaḥ arthasya avagamayati yat tu śabdān upāye api jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvam bhavati tad gṛhīta saṅketasya prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocanena śabda saṃsarga rahitena ālocite artha mātretasya artha bhedasya śabda bhedena saṃbandhāt śabda viṣayaḥ saṃskāraḥ prabodhyate prabuddhaḥ śabda smṛtim janayati tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyāḥ api śabda puraḥsarāḥ jāyante yathā āhuḥ yat saṃjñā smaraṇam tatra na tat api anya hetukam piṇḍe eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñām smārayitum kṣamaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.26	 tasmāt vyutpannasya api nāmadheya smaraṇāya pūrvam eṣitavyaḥ vinā eva nāmadheyam artha pratyayaḥ tat idam uktam gṛhīte api śabda artha saṃbandhe asya arthasya ayam śabdaḥ nāmadheyam iti yadā tu saḥ arthaḥ gṛhyate nāmadheya rahitaḥ nāmadheya smaraṇāt pūrvam avikalpena tadā pūrvasmāt avyutpanna avasthāyām artha jñānāt na viśiṣyate iti yatas na viśiṣyate tasmāt tad artha jñānam tādṛś eva bhavati nanu para pratipādana ādi lakṣaṇa vyavahārāya sva rūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yad artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tat avagacchāmaḥ artha vyapadeśa ākāram iti katham ca artha ākāram bhavati yadi artha vyapadeśayoḥ nā bhedaḥ tasmāt punar api tādātmyam prasaktam iti atas āha tasya tu iti artha ākāram eva tu jñānam artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ pratīyamānam pareṇa upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.27	 tat evam artha jñāna kāle sa na samākhyā śabdaḥ vyāpriyate pratīyamāna tayā vyavahāra kāle tu para pratyāyana kāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇa tayā tat anena gopāla avi pāla ādīnām saṃjñā niveśanam tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahāra utkarṣa hetuḥna artha utkarṣa hetuḥ iti api sūcitam bhavati tasmāt avikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena asya eva avikalpakasya śabda anuvyādha rahita tā sūcitāḥ iti āśayavān upasaṃharati tatmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.28	 tat etat bhāṣyam vārttikakāraḥ tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe tat ca indriya artha iti viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyi jñānam iti śabda ātma tām apāroti cākṣuṣam hi rūpa jñānam rūpaḥ eva niyatam na śabde pravartate evam śrautram api śabdaḥ eva niyatam na rūpa ādau pravartate yadi punar idam śabda ātmakam rūpa ādi bhavet śrotra jam jñānam śabda grāhī iti rūpa ādau= api pravarteta apravartamānam vā vidhurayati rūpa ādīnām śabda ātma tām api ca śrūyamāṇa śabda ātma tve rūpa ādīnām teṣām api śravaṇa grāhya tvam iti andhaḥ api rūpu gṛhṇīyāt asti hi tasya śrotram ca śabda jñānam ca evam badhiraḥ api śabdam gṛhṇīyāt asti hi tasya locanam ca rūpa jñānam ca aśabdaḥ abhāvaḥ iti ca vivakṣita viparīta āpattiḥ śabda abhāvasya arthasya śabda tvāt aśabda tve vā saḥ eva asya arthaḥ śabdāt bhinnaḥ prasajyate evam abhāvaḥ api arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ syāt tathā ca na abhāvaḥ śabdasya sattvāt tathā ca artha anuvidhāyi vijñānam na bhavet asti ca tasmāt na śabda ātmānaḥ arthāḥ iti tad utpatti kālaḥ iti prāthamyena śabda anuvyādham vyāvartayati 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.29	 eka deśi vyākhyānam āha apare tu iti indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yat indriya gāti jñānam tat api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa upetam iti pratyakṣam prasajyate iti tad nivāraṇāya avyapadeśya padam apadeśaḥ hetu vacanam tat eva tad ābhāsebhyaḥ viśiṣṭam vyapadeśaḥ tasya kāryam hetu pratyāyana dvārāḥ anumeya jñānam vyapadeśyam na vyapadeśyam avyapadeśyam aliṅga ubhdavam iti anumānam vyāvartitam iti arthaḥ tat eka deśi matam dūṣayati tat ca na evam iti nanu indriya gati jñānam api indriya artha sannikarṣāt liṅgāt utpannam iti atas āha na hi anumeyasya iti na etat indraya artha sannikārṣāt upajāyate kim tu tad jñānāt atas eva atīte api dhūma ādau liṅge tad smaraṇa mātrā t eva anumeya jñāna bhavati na ca sannikarṣa padasya mukhya tve saṃbhavati jñāna lakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ upasaṃharati atas iti imam ca vārttika grantham abudhyamānāḥ indriya gati jñāna nivṛtti artham indriya viṣayeṣu iti padam sūtre adhyāharanti iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.30	 krama prāptasya avyabhicāri padasya tātparyam brūvāṇaḥ bhāṣyasya api tātparyam āha grīṣme marīcayaḥ iti iti yadi api sāmānya lakṣaṇena eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tad apekṣam ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇam anyathā anumāna ādi padeṣu api abhicā ādi padam upādeyam syāt tathā api siddhe satya ārambhaḥ niyama arthaḥ dvayī hi pramāṇānām gatiḥ kiñcid sattā mātreṇa pramāsa adhanam yathā pratyakṣam na hi cakṣuḥ ādīnām grahaṇam upayujyate api tu sattā eva anumāna ādīna tu sva jñānena pramāsā dhanāni na khalu a gṛhītam liṅgam vā śabdaḥ vai āgama sahitam sādṛśyam vā yathā viṣayam ādadhāti pramām tatra anumānasya pramopa jananāt prāk eva artha avi abhicāra grahaṇam apekṣate na anyathā tatas pramā sidhyati iti śabda ādau tu yadi api pramopa jananam prati na artha avi abhicāra graha apekṣā tathā api śakyam ati rohita artha mantra madhya patitasya drāk iti eva pratīyamāna arthasya api sṛṇya iva jarbharī turpharītū 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.31^1	 iti evamādeḥ mantrasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā sāmānyatas artha avyabhicāri tvam grahītum autsargikam hi śabdānām artha paratvam atas eva nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa sahāyāḥ tatas artham avadhārayanti evam yathā mudgastambaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti āpta vākya śravaṇāt eva mudga stamba sādṛśya jñānasya anupajanita phalasya api śakyam tad artha avyabhicāri tvam niścetum pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasya atyanta parokṣa svarūpa ulambhaḥ eva tāvat pramopa jananāt prāk durlabhaḥ prāk eta tu tasya artha avi abhicāri tvam yadi api ca saṃvedana prāmāṇya pakṣe api tad saṃvedanam manasā sulabham tathā api na tanmātram pramāṇam api tu asādhāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣa sahāyam iti tad sahāyasya tasya parokṣa tvam eva tena pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phala avyabhicāreṇa eva avyabhicāra jñānam na svarūpataḥ iti etat pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam asādhāraṇam pratyakṣasya rūpam ādarśayitum avyabhicāri pada upādānam atha vā pratyakṣa avyabhicāraḥ eva anumāna ādya vyabhicāre kāraṇam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.31^2	 na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ avyabhicarita pratyakṣa gṛhīta pakṣa dharma tākam tarka sahāya pratyakṣa gṛhīta avinābhāvam ca anumānam vyabhicārati iti yat tu bādhita viṣayam sat pratipakṣitam ca anumānam tat api yadi api prathamam vyāpti grahaṇa doṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam tathā api khaṇḍana uttara kālam saḥ api pratīyate tathā ca vyāpti grāhi pratyakṣam tatra api vyabhicāri iti evam āgamaḥ api sākṣāt kvacid pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakaḥ tat vyabhicāreṇa eva vyabhicarati āgama vyabhicāreṇa eva upamāna vyabhicāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ tat evam pratyakṣa avyabhicāre pramāṇānām avyabhicāraḥ asti iti pratyakṣasya eva viśeṣaṇam avyabhicāri padam cakāra na itareṣām pramāṇānām na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ tad mūlam pratyakṣam avyabhicāri tāni ca vyabhicārīṇi iti saḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ pratyakṣasya yathā āha mīmāṃsā vārttikakāraḥ pratyakṣa avyabhicāreṇa sva lakṣaṇa balena ca prasiddha avyabhicāritvā at na anumānam parīkṣyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.32–1,1.4.33	 iti tasmāt suṣṭhūkam grīṣme marīcayaḥ iti bhāṣyam tat pratiṣedha artham idam ucyate avyabhicāri iti pṛcchati kim idam iti uttaram yat atasmin= iti etat ca upapāditam dvitīya sūtre punar dūṣayati tat ca na evam iti pṛcchati kasmāt uttaram arthasya iti tat eva sphorayati yat tat iti atra ca na nirvikalmakam bhrāntam kim tu sa vikalpakam iti āha tān= tu marīcīn iti indriyeṇa ālocya marīcīn uccāvacam uccalataḥ nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paścāt tatra upaghāta doṣāt viparyeti sa vikalpakaḥ asya pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ jāyate iti tasmāt vijñānasya vyabhicāraḥ na arthasya iti yathā āhuḥ nirukta kārāḥ na eṣa sthāṇoḥ aparādhaḥ yat enam andhe na paśyati puruṣa aparādhaḥ sa bhavati iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.34	 avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñānam api vyudastam no khalu saṃśaya jñānam vikalpyamāna vastu gocaram tad rūpam vastu prāpayati aprāpayat ca upadarśitam katham saṃvādam asaṃvādakam ca katham avyabhicāri tasmāt avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñāne niraste sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avadodha artham upādīyamānam vyavasāya ātmaka padam saṃśaya jñāna pratyakṣa tāpa akaraṇam anvācinoti tat yathā edhāna āhaṛtum araṇyam gaccha śākam api āneṣyasi iti śāka ānayanam anvācīyate na ca tat eva asya preṣituḥ vi dhitsitam tathā iha api vyavasāya ātmaka padam sākṣāt sa vikalpakasya vācakam tathā hi vyavasāyaḥ viniścayaḥ vikalpaḥ iti anarthāntaram saḥ eva ātmā rūpam yasya tat sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam tat etat ati sphaṭa tvāt śiṣyaiḥ gamyate eva iti bhāṣya vārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātam api asmābhiḥ trilocana gurunnīta mārga anugamana unmukhaiḥ yathānyāyam yathāvastu vyākhyātam idam īdṛśam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.35^1	 syāt etat na vyavasāya ātmakam pratayakṣam bhavitum arhati abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam hi tat na ca indriya arthābhyām labdha janma vijñānam artha avabhāsam śakyam abhilāpena yojanayitum na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi artha ātmanaḥ vā tathā satya vyutpannasya api vyutpanna vat vyavahāraḥ syāt iti uktam na ca abhilāpaḥ artha asaṃsparśaḥ saṃvedana dharmaḥ artheṣu tad niyojanāt tasmāt arthāt upajāyamānam jñānam artham eva ādarśayet na abhilāpam na hi rūpāt jāyamānam pratyakṣam rasa sahitam etat ādarśayati tasmāt abhilāpa saṃsarga anapekṣam abhilāpa saṃsargiṇam ādarśayat vikalpa vijñānam vikalpa vāsanā utthāpitam aniyata artha grāhi mānasam ātmīyam utprekṣā lakṣaṇam vyāpāram tiraskṛtya anubhava prabhava tayā anubhava vyāpāram darśanu puraskṛtya pravartamānam anubhava tayā abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ tat siddham etat yad artha sāmarthya labdha janma na tat śabda kalpanā anugatam yathā nirvikalpakam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.35^2	 artha sāmarthya labdha janmāraḥ ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ iti prasaṅga sādhana viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ śabda kalpanā anugata tvasya hi pratiṣedhyasya viruddham tat ananugata tvam tena artha sāmarthya ja tvam vyāptam tasya upalabdhiḥ tad ananugata tvam utthāpayantī tad anugata tvam virūṇat hi iti atha eṣām pratyayānām pratyakṣam abhi lāpa anugata tvam aśakya apahnavam hanta bhoḥ na artha sāmarthya ja tvam iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ tathā hi yat abhilāpa kalpanā anugatam na tad artha sāmarthya jam yathā īśvara pradhāna ādi vikalpa vijñānam tathā ca ete vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ niṣedhyam artha sāmarthya ja tvam tad abhilāpa kalpanānanugata tvena vyāptam tat viruddham ca sat anugata tvam iti na ca sandigdha vyatirekitā artha sāmarthyena hi tat utpadyamānam artha rūpam anukuryāt na śabda rūpam na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi tad ātmānaḥ vā iti uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.35^3	 asaṃbaddha rūpa anukāre tu vijñānasya sarva rūpa anukāreṇa sarva sarva jñāta āpattiḥ ati saṅketa vaśāt śabdānām artha saṃbandhena artha upalabdhau tad smaraṇāt tad saṃsṛṣṭa vedanam iti ced yatra tarhi te kṛta saṅketāḥ tat eva smārayet etān tatra eva ca te kṛta saṅketāḥ yat anugatam sāmānyam na ca tat dṛṣṭam kim tu sva lakṣaṇam darśana gocaraḥ tat eva hi parama artha sat vijñānasya kāraṇam na tu sāmānyam sarva sāma arthya yahitam hi tat alīka tvāt tasmāt yat dṣṭam na tena śabdānām saṃbandhaḥ yena ca saṃbandhaḥ na tat dṛṣṭam api ca dṛṣṭasya śabda vācya tve darśanāt iva vahinaruṣṇaḥ iti vākyāt api pratīyeta tathā ca śabdāt api tasmin pratīte śīta apanopana prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya viṣayauliṅga śabdau vastu bhūta sāmānya vat ca sva lakṣaṇam tādṛśam ca tad darśanasya kāraṇam iti nirvikalpakena prathama akṣa tad nipāta janmanā jātimat vastu vedanāt tatra upalabdha cara saṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.35^4	 tathā ca tad śabda abhidheya jāti viśiṣṭa dravya avagāhi indriya artha sannikarṣa janmā vikalpa pratyayaḥ gauḥ ayam iti evam ākāraḥ jāyate iti ced yathā āhuḥ nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇam tathā tatas param punar vastu dharmaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yayā buddhyā avasīyate sā api pratyakṣa tvena saṃmatāḥ iti tat na piṇḍa vivekena jāti ādeḥ avikalpakena agrahaṇāt na hi jāti jāti bhantau vā kriyā kriyāvantau va guṇa guṇinau vā tad samavāyaḥ vā vivekena cakāsati na ca vivekena apratibhāsamānaḥ śakyāḥ mithas yojayitum kṣīra udaka vat atad vedinā tasmāt ekam avibhāgam sva lakṣaṇam anādi vikalpa vāsanā samāropita jāti ādi bhedam tathā vikalpyate iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ api ca parama artha sat vastu dvaya vedane api kutas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ na hi aṅgulyau= eka vijñāna viṣayau mithas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvam āpadyete 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.36^1	 viśeṣaṇa kha lu upa kārakam upakāryam ca viśeṣyam na anyathā tayostabhdāvaḥ na ca eka vijñāna samārūḍhayoḥ jñāpyajñāpaka bhāvaḥ vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā saṃbhavī samāna kālayoḥ tayorūbhayoḥ api paurvāparya niyamāt api ca vastu niveśe jāti ādīnām upādhīnām ekasya vastunaḥ sattvam ca dravya tvam ca pārthiva tvam ca vṛkṣa tvam ca śiṃśapā tvam ca upādhayaḥ iti dūrāt eka upādhi viśiṣṭasya grahe sarva upādhi viśiṣṭa graha prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ upakāra garbhaḥ bhavati patana dharmaṇaḥ hi badarasya uttarasya kuṇḍamadharam pratayā sannam apatana dharmakam badaram vidadhat ādhāraḥ tadvat iha api dravyeṇa jāti ādīnām upādhīnām upakartavyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.36^2	 na ca śakti antarairūpa karoti śakti antara pakāre api śakti antaraukalpanāyām anavasthāpātāt tasmāt svabhāvaḥ eva sva kāraṇa adhīna janmā dravyasya sa tādṛśaḥ yena bahūnām upādhīnām upakaroti iti vācyam tathā ca sattva upakāra samarthem tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravya tva ādi upakāra samarthaḥ api saḥ eva asya svabhāvaḥ iti tad svabhāva avacchinnāḥ sattva vikalpakena parama artha sat dravya avagāhinā sarve eva dravya tva pārthiva tva vṛkṣa tva śiśa pātu ādayaḥ viṣayīkṛtāḥ iti vikalpa antarāṇām ānarthakyam yat āha yasya api nānā upādheḥ dhī grāhika arthasya bhedinaḥ nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakya bhinna ātmanaḥ grahe sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.37–1,1.4.38	 eka upakārake grāhye na upakārāḥ tatas apare dṛṣṭe tasman= adṛṣṭāḥ ye tad grahe sakala grahaḥ iti asmākam tu anādi vikalpa vāsanā upādānāḥ vikalpāḥ yat ca gṛhṇanti yat ca adhyavasya nita tayā ūrūbhayoḥ api anya nivṛtti rūpa tayā avastu tvāt matāgapi na paramārtha sat vastu gāhante pāramparyeṇa tu vastu pratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaḥ ca na visaṃvādayanti lokam atas vastu sabhdauva aviniveśāt vikalpānām na pauna rūkti am asti api ca ālocite vastuni indriyeṇa tad anantara utpannam śabda smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram indriyam arthaḥ ca na sa vikalpikām api dhiyam upajanayitum arhataḥ yathā āha artha upayoge api punar smārtam śabda anuyojanam akṣadhīrya di apekṣeta saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.39	 na ca yat eva ālocanam ajījanat indriyam tat eva smaraṇa sahakāri vikalpa pratyayam ādhatte na ca smṛtiḥ vyavadhāyikā sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt yatas yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddhe rūpa yoga aviśeṣataḥ sa paścāt api iti no khalu atītam bhavati gocaraḥ akṣasya na ca agocare sahasreṇa api upāyaiḥ etat pravartitum arhati na ca smṛtiḥ atīta viṣayān anubhūta pūrvam vartamānam gocarayitum arhati tad gocara tve ca andhānām api rūpa sākṣātkāra prasaṅgaḥ yathā āha tena syāt akṣa apāye api netra dhīḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.40–1,1.4.41	 iti tat evam nāma jāti guṇa karma kalpanāḥ pratyakṣa tvena parāḥ tāḥ dravya kalpanā api daṇḍī iti viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca saṃbandham laukikīm sthitim gṛhītvā saṅkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā na ca etāvantam vyāpāra kalāpam vicāraka nivartanīyam indriya jñānam sahate tasya sannihita viṣaya balena utpatteḥ avicāraka tvāt jāti guṇa kriyāvatām ca etat na saṃbhavati eva rūpa viveka saṃbandhayoḥ apratibhāsanena ghaṭanā yogāt kṣīrodaka vat atad vedinā iti uktam tasmāt na tad vikalpam pratyakṣam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.42^1	 atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam artha sāmarthya jatvā abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhā sattvayoḥ virodhaḥ iti tatra brūmaḥ syāt virodhaḥ yadi sva lakṣaṇam eva arthaḥ na tu etat asti upapādayiṣyati hi parama artha santam jāti ādimantam artham sthema bhājam abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam tena tat janitam jñānam artha sāmarthya jam ca abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam ca iti na virodhaḥ tathā ca prasaṅga sādhanasya sandigdha vyatirekitā na ca dravya ādi abhinnam jāti ādi bhinnam kalpayantaḥ vikalpāḥ na artha sāmarthya janmānaḥ iti sāṃpratat dravyāt api hi bhedaḥ sādhayiṣyate teṣām yathā ca bhede api teṣām tad vācakānām sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā upapāditam adhastāt na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍitthaḥ ayam iti abheda kalpanādarthasya vikalpānām anartha ja tvam iti yuktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.42^2	 uktam etat avyapadeśya pada vyākhyāna avasare yathā na śabda abhedena arthayoḥ eka indriya jñāna saṃsargi tā kim tu prathamam ālocitaḥ arthaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān saṅketa grahaṇsamaya vartinīm ātmanaḥ avasthām smārayan tad kāla bhāvinam śabdam api smārayati avarjanīya tayā na tu indriya ja vikalpa utpādam pratyasti upayogaḥ kaścid śabda smaraṇasya anyathā bāla mūka ādīnām na indriya jaḥ syāt vikalpaḥ śabda smaraṇa abhāvāt saṅketa samaya varti avasthā smaraṇam tu upayujyate vastunaḥ tadānīntanedāni intana avasthā bhedavataḥ ekasya indriya jena vikalpena akalanāt śabdaḥ tu saṃpāta āyātas na niveśayati ātmānam indriya je vikalpe yathā āha devadatta ādi śabdana hṛdaya sthena yaḥ smṛtaḥ cakṣuṣā api saḥ eva ayam piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.43–1,1.4.44	 anena hi piṇḍasya pūrva apara avasthā vartinīm eka tām indi yaja vikalpa gocara tvena darśayati na tu śabda niveśanam api tathā saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇā api pratyakṣa tvam na bādhate saṃjñinaḥ kutas sā taṭa avasthā na rūpa ācchādana kṣamā na artha indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatte iti arthaḥ na ca prāc avasthā smaraṇa sāpekṣa tayā na indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam vikalpasya iti sāṃpratam yatas na kiñcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarvaṃsaṃbhavaḥ iti bhavantaḥ api āhuḥ anyathā āloka manaskāra sāpekṣam artha indriyam nirvikalpakam api na janayet yat tu prathamam na ajījanat tat smaraṇa sahakāri virahāt na hi na ajījanat kuśūla stham bījam aṅkuram iti na samavahita kṣiti ādi sahakāri grāmam api asya ajanakam bhavati na ca janakatvā janakatva lakṣaṇaḥ viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ bheda hetuḥ iti upapādayiṣyate kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.45^1	 syāt etat atīta avasthā na indriya gocaraḥ tasya vartamāna arthe niyamāt na ca vartamānaḥ arthaḥ smaraṇa gocaraḥ smaraṇasya anubhava janita saṃskāra udbodha janmanaḥ pūrva anubhava gocaram prati niyamāt tasmāt bhinna viṣaya tayā na indriya sahakāritā smaraṇasya na hi rūpa viṣayāḥ sahasram api nayana pradīpa ādayaḥ śabda viṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritām āpadyante iti tat kim bhavatām yatra gandha jñāna anantaram cākṣuṣam rūpa jñānam jāyate tatra gandha jñānam na samanantara pratyayaḥ tatra api hi cakṣū rūpa viṣayam na gandha viṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitum arhati bhinna viṣaya tvāt eva atha anvaya vyatireka nibandhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na samāna viṣaya tvam anuvidhīyate iti ucyetra tat asmākam api samānam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.45^2	 nanu atīta avasthā viśiṣṭa tvam asya na indriya sannikṛṣṭam iti katham pratyakṣam tat kim yat indriya saṃbaddham tat pratyakṣam tathā satya ākāśa paramāṇu ādayaḥ api tad saṃyuktāḥ iti te api pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran tasmāt yat eva indriya jasya jñānasya gocaraḥ tat pratyakṣam na tu indriya saṃbaddham nanu asaṃbaddham indriyam katham tatra jñānam janayati tat ca jñānam katham pratyakṣam pratyakṣam ced katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti lakṣaṇam pratyakṣam vyāpnoti asya eva pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇena āvyānāt mā bhūt arthasya pūrva kāla vartitāḥ indriya gocaraḥ tathā api smaraṇa sahakāriṇā saṃskāra sahakāriṇa indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa upajanitam tad indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam na bhavati tathā ca na avyāpakam asya lakṣaṇam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.46^1	 nanu pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam katham ekam viṣaya bhedāt pārokṣyā pārokṣya lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargāt ca tathā hi tat iti pārokṣyam idam iti ca sākṣātkāraḥ na ca viruddha dharma saṃsarge api ekatvam trailākyasya ekatva prasaṅgāt viṣaya bhedaḥ ca pūrva deśa kāla apara deśa kāla saṃbandhayoḥ ekasya virodhāt yathā hi ekasmin padmarāga maṇau gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāvaḥ vyavacchidyate yadi punar nam vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvaḥ na paricchidyeta tasya svābhāva vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt tad abhāvauvinābhāvinaḥ ca puṣparāga ādayaḥ iti te api sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.46^2	 yadi punar na vyavacchidyaran saḥ eva puṣparāgāt yatmā iti tad avinā bhāvī padmarāga abhāvaḥ padmarāgaḥ ca syāt iti durghaṭam āpadyeta evam tasya eva pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāva vyavaccheda krameṇa apara deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandha abhāva avyabhicārī tathā ca na pada deśa kāla saṃbandha svabhāvaḥ tathā api yadi asau tad deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anya svabhāvaḥ bhavet tathā sati saḥ eva bhavet na bhavet ca iti durghaṭam āpadyeta tasmāt pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anyaḥ apara deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ iti siddhaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.47^1	 atra ucyate yadi parokṣyā pārokṣya dharma bhedāt pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam bhidyeta hanta bhoḥ tat iti api vikalpaḥ bhidyeta saḥ api hi parokṣaḥ ca aparokṣaḥ ca vikalpaḥ ca avikalpaḥ ca arthe parokṣaḥ vikalpaḥ ca sva ātmani tu avikalpaḥ aparokṣaḥ ca tasmāt viṣaya bhodāt virodhaḥ iti ced na tu iha api tat ekam jñānam tasya eva ekasya vastunaḥ pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe parokṣam aparokṣam vā para deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ iti kaḥ virodhaḥ yaḥ api kāla deśa saṃbandha bhedena viṣaya bhedaḥ uktaḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ yatas yuktam yat padmarāga svarūpa grahe tad abhāvaḥ vyavacchidyate iti svābhāva vyavaccheda ātmaka tvena bhāvānām tat avyavacchede svarūpa agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt kasmāt punar puṣparāga ādayaḥ vyavacchidyante padmarāga abhāvauvinā abhāvāt iti ced atha etat abhāva avinā bhāva jñānam kutastyam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.47^2	 tayoḥ kadācid api tādā tmi ena anupalambhāt iti ced yatra tarhi tādātmyam upalabhyate na tatra tad abhāva avinābhāvaḥ tathā ca pūrva apara deśa kāla saṃbaddhaḥ tādātmyena anubhūyamānaḥ indriya jena vikalpena padmarāgaḥ na bhinnaḥ bhavitum arhati tasmāt parva apara deśa kālau tad saṃndhau vā kāmam bhidyeyātām paraspara abhāva avina abhāvāt tayoḥ ekadā api tādātmyena apratibhāsanāt na tu tad āliḍri gata svabhāvaḥ padmarāga maṇi  tasya tābhyām anya tvāt na ca anyasya bhedaḥ anyasya bhedam āpādayati atiprasaṅgāt na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāve api pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśa ātmanaḥ vikalpasya bhāvāt anindriya jaya tvam iti sāṃpratam tathā satya vikalpakam api kāma āturasya kāminīm bhāvayataḥ tad viṣayam indriya artha sannikarṣam vinā api dṛṣṭam iti nīla ādi anubhāva ātmānaḥ api avikalpakāḥ anindriya jāḥ prasajyeran 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.47^3	 yadi tu nīla ādi anubhavānām kāminī anubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣam brūyātaḥ tadā asmākam api anindriya jebhyaḥ vikalpebhyaḥ utprekṣā vyāpārebhyaḥ asti indriya jānām darśana vyāpārāṇām bhedaḥ na ca vikalpa gataḥ darśana vyāpāraḥ anubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpa kopa ādhiḥ iti yuktam sarvāḥ eva hi indriya jāḥ buddhayaḥ vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyaḥ a mahamikayā paraspara anapekṣāḥ ekam artham avagāhamānāḥ udayante vyayante ca na tu amūṣām anyonyam anugamya anugantṛtām īkṣāmahe tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa labdha janmānaḥ vikalpāḥ darśana vyāpārāḥ na anyaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyamaḥ na ca śabda pratyakṣayoḥ vastu gocara tve sati api pratyaya abhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedena pārokṣya apārokṣya bheda upapatteḥ na ca vahina saṃyoga janmā śīta apanodaḥ vahina jñānāt bhavitum arhati na ca eka upādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhi antara viśiṣṭa tad graha prasaṅgaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.47^4	 svabhāvaḥ hi dravyasya upādhibhiḥ viśiṣyate na tu upādhayaḥ va taiḥ viśiṣṭa tvam vā tasya svabhāvaḥ na ca yat svabhāva saṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ tathā satya saṃbandhi tvam eva na hi tat eva tena saṃbadhyate api ca rūpa jñānam viṣaya grahaṇa dharma nānā paramāṇu viṣayam na paramāṇu svabhāvaḥ tad svabhāva tve vā teṣām sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaiḥ eva te paramāṇavaḥ viditāḥ syuḥ na ca asaṃbaddhāḥ eva sva jñānena rūpa paramāṇavaḥ viṣayāḥ tasya iti vācyam asaṃbaddhasya viṣaya tve ati prasaṅgāt svabhāvaḥ eva artha jñāna bhedayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ yad arthaḥ viṣayaḥ jñānam ca viṣayi iti ced hanta upādhi upādhim atoḥ api svabhāvaḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ astu tathā api vijñāna arthavat na svarūpa abhedaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāma nirākaraṇe tu svabhāva atiriktam saṃbandham upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt na eka upādhi anvita grahaṇe sakala upādhi anvita pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.48	 yat ca eka vijñāna gocarayoḥ na viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ iti tatra brūmaḥ bhinna jñāna gocara tve api na asau saṃbhīti na hi viśeṣaṇa jñānam viśeṣya aviṣayam viśeṣyam avacchettum arhati evam viśeṣya jñānam api viśeṣaṇā viṣayam kena sva viṣayam avacchindyāt tayoḥ paraspara vārtā anabhijña tvāt tābhyām vāsanā tatas mānasa pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ākaraḥ utpadyate na tu asti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vāstavaḥ iti ced astu tāvat vāstavā= āstava cintā kariṣyate hi iyam upariṣṭāt yaḥ tu bhavatām asya mānasa tve prayāsaḥ sa varam indriya jatvaḥ eva bhavatu tathā sati darśana vyāpāra tvam asya sākṣāt samarthitam bhavati itarathāḥ hi nirvikalpa kopadhānam kalpyeta 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.49	 nanu avicārakam indriya jñānam katham viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ādi sakalam saṃkalayet hanta bhoḥ kim mānasam api jñānam saṃkalayitum arhati saṃkalayati manasaḥ tad kāraṇasya sarva viṣaya tvāt iti ced yadi pūrvakam vijñānam manaḥ katham tasya sarva viṣaya tā asmākam tu manaḥ sarva viṣayam api acetana tayā na vicārakam tasmāt ātmā eva sakala jñāna tad janita vāsanā dhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca yathā āha ātmani eva sthitam jñānam sa hi boddhā atra gamyate smaraṇe ca asya sāmarthyam sandhāna ādau ca vidyate sa salu indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocya jātimantam saṃmugdham artham udbuddha saṃskāra samupajāta pūrva piṇḍa anusmṛti sahāyaḥ prāk eva cakṣuṣā vikalpayati gauḥ ayam iti yathā āha karaṇam ca indriyam buddheḥ kartā ca ātma sa cetanaḥ sa ca smṛti samartha tvāt sarva arthān kalpayiṣyati 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.50	 tena eka vijñāna vedya tve yadi api jñāpi ajñāpaka bhāva rūpaḥ upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ na asti tathā api tad artha ālocana anugata smaraṇayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi vijñānam pratyutpādaka tvam eva upakāraka tvam asti arthau hi rūpa rūpi bhāvena sthitau= api na āpāta janmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau api tu sva rūpa mātreṇa na hi yāvat asti tāvat grahītavyam tena tad eka deśa grahe api na apramāṇa tā sa vikalpakam tu ukta sāmagrī janma jāti ādi rūpa tayā dravyam ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścāt jāyamānam api indriya artha sannikarṣa prabhava tayā pratyakṣam bhavati eva akramasya api ca krama vat sahakāri bheda samavadhāna vaśāt krameṇa kārya karaṇam upapādayiṣyate tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ sva gocare pratyakṣāḥ avyabhicāri tve sati indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvāt yaḥ yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣaḥ yathālocanam tathā ca etat tasmāt tathā iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.51^1	 tasmāt sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha artham vyavasāya ātmaka padam iti siddham tat asya sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthasya anvācīyamānaḥ vyavacchedaḥ tad vyavacchedya pratipādana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣyā an vācīyamānam eva vyavasāya ātmaka padasya artham āha dūrāt cakṣuṣā iti na ca etat mantavyam iti bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuḥ codayati na saṃśayasya iti nanu sati indriya artha sannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūmaḥ iti vā reṇuḥ iti vā jñānam utpadyamānam katham anindriya jam iti atas āha na hi iti kasmāt mānasaḥ iti atas āha saṃśītiḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.51^2	 saṃpūrvaḥ hi śīj bhāva pratyaya antaḥ viśeṣa apekṣe vimarśe vartate sa ca eka adhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mithas viruddhau dharmau= āropayan anyatarat na avadhārayati tathā ca adhikaraṇa mātra samarpaṇam indriya javyāpāraḥ manasā tu smaraṇa sahakāriṇā eva puruṣaḥ saṃśete atas eva visphārita akṣāḥ saudāminī saṃpātāt sakṛt ālocya kañcid samāna dharmavantam dharmiṇam samandhakāre sandigdhe tasmāt mānasaḥ eva eṣa saṃśayaḥ na tu indriya jaḥ iti arthaḥ tat etat pariharan na ca etat ityādi bhāṣyam vcācaṣṭe tat ca na evam kasmāt saṃśayasya iti ubhayam tu iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.51^3	 tu śabdaḥ manaḥ mātra nimitta tvam vyavacchinatti tat anena cakṣuṣā hi ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam paśyan samāna dharmāṇam dharmiṇam na avadhārayati viśeṣataḥ sandigdhe tasmin= iti arthaḥ indriyeṇa upalabdham sannikṛṣṭam sannikarṣa pūrvaka tvāt uparladheḥ manasā upalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥ sahāyena iti arthaḥ atra bhāṣyam yat ca tad indrayāna vadhāraṇa pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam tad viśeṣa pekṣam vimarśa mātram saṃśayaḥ na parvam iti anavadhāraṇa śabdaḥ ayam saṃśaya jñāna vācakaḥ sva kāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣe prayuktaḥ upacāreṇa 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.51^4	 uparata indriya vyāpārasya hi saṃśaya jñāna darśanāt sati api indriya vyāpāre saṃśayaḥ na indriya jaḥ iti ca udakaḥ abhimanyate tad anayoḥ saṃśaya jñānayoḥ madhye yat tad indriya avadhāraṇa pūrvakam indriya artha sannikarṣa pūrvakam manasā anavadharaṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ na pūrvam yat uparata indriya vyāpārasya saṃśaya jñānam dṛṣṭānta tayā hṛdi sthitam śaṅkituḥ iti arthaḥ tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe tatra yat indriya artha iti indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ ca asau= anavadhāraṇam ca iti karmadhārayaḥ tad pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.52	 nanu smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram asya kāraṇam na indriyam iti atas āha tasya hi iti upapāditam etat adhastāt yathā smaraṇam na indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatte iti pūrvam tu iti dṛṣṭanta tayā pūrva tvam syāt etat manaḥ eva indriya anapekṣam bāhye pravartate iti abhyupeyam anyathā ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti jñānam nirnimittam syāt na tāvat indriya jam āntare jñāne cakṣuḥ ādīnām apravṛtteḥ na api anumāna ādiṣu antar bhavati liṅga ādi abhāvāt tasmāt mānasa bheva idam yadi ca ghaṭa ādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena katham ghaṭam iti bhavet jānāmi iti eva syāt na ca artha nirupaṇam antareṇa jñāna rūpa nirūpaṇam tasmāt bāhya abhyantara viṣayam manaḥ tathā ca sarve eva saṃśayaḥ mānasaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha bhāṣya kāraḥ sarvatra ca pratyakṣa viṣaye iti yadi api ayam īdṛśaḥ anuvyavasāyaḥ mānasaḥ tathā api andha badhira ādīnām abhāvāt tat pūrvam vyavasāya utpattau cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaṇīyam anyathā andha badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca saṃśaya jñāna utpāde api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ apekṣaṇīyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ tat idam tasya hi ityādinā vārttikena vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.53^1	 avyāpaka tvena lakṣaṇa ākṣepa param bhāṣyam ātma ādiṣu iti āti tat vyācaṣṭe indriya artha iti codayati katham punar iti pariharati indriya iti mā bhūt indriya sūtre pāṭhaḥ tat hi bāhya indriya lakṣaṇam āntaram ca manaḥ iti atas āha pṛthak ca iti na ca sukha ādau pramāṇa antaram asti tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt saddhim pratyakṣa tvam iti āha pratyakṣāḥ ca iti nanu na ete prameyāḥ sva saṃvedana siddha tvāt tat kim atra prameya arthena pramāṇena iti atas āha na ca teṣām iti nanu uktam sva saṃvedana tayā na pramā karma bhāvaḥ eṣām iti atas āha na ca anyā gatiḥ iti saṃvedana tvena hi teṣām sva saṃvedana tā na ca ete saṃvedanam iti uktam adhastāt iti bhāvaḥ ākṣepanupasaṃharati tasmāt iti bhāṣye ca ātmā ādiṣu sukha ādiṣu iti nitya anitya abhiprāyam varga dvayam ātma sukha duḥkha tva ādayaḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ ca sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ iti tat idam uktam dignāgena na sukha ādi prameyam vā manaḥ vā astu indriya antaram 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.53^2	 na ca tat saṃbhavati ghrāṇa ādi sūtreṇa vibhāga pareṇa niṣedhāt iti bhāvaḥ samādhi bhāṣyam indriyasya vai sataḥ iti tad vyāci khyā suḥ gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ ca evam iti ākṣeptuḥ uttaram indriya artha iti samādhātāḥ āha na eṣa doṣaḥ iti ākṣeptuḥ anuśaya bījam udghāṭya dūṣayati yat tu sūtre iti na idam vibhāga param ghrāṇa ādi sūtram api tu lakṣaṇa param tatra ca indriyam api manaḥ na lakṣitam vaidharmyāt iti arthaḥ vaidharmyam āha vaidharmyam iti tatra pramāṇayati sarva viṣayam tu iti vaidharmya antaram dūṣayati bhautika iti kāryasya hi viśeṣau bhautika tva abhautika tve bhūta kāryam bhautikam yat bhūta kāryam na bhavati tad abhautikam bhūta kārya tva pratiṣedhaḥ ca tad anya kārya tvam gamayati viśeṣa niṣedhasya viśeṣa antara abhyanujñāna hetu tvāt itarathā tu akāryam eva ucyeta na tu abhautikam iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.53^3	 tasmāt akāryasya manasaḥ abhautika tvam kārya dharmaḥ viruddham iti arthaḥ api ca vaidharmyāt manaḥ vat śrotram api na vaktavyam iti āha śrotre ca iti śaṅkate sva arthaḥ iti bhūtāni hi ghrāṇa ādīni śrotra antāni manaḥ tu na bhūtam iti vaidharmyam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti tat ca na iti darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāraḥ yathā svārthikaḥ na kaścid api pratyayaḥ iti arthaḥ ākṣepa hetum anubhāṣate yat purar iti dūṣayati na na asti iti tat adena sati ca indriya artha sannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam yat ca aparam vaidharmyam ghrāṇa ādibhyaḥ manasaḥ uktam bhāṣya kāreṇa tat api siṃha avalokanena dūṣayati sa guṇānām iti ghrāṇa ādīni yathā sva sva guṇena gandha ādinā bāhyam gandha ādi bodhayanti na evam sva guṇena śabdena śrotram bāhyam śabdam bodhayati tat manaḥ vat śrotram api ghrāṇa ādi sūtre na paṭhitavyam iti arthaḥ bhāṣya ukteṣu madhya abhimatam vaidhamyam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.53^4	 bhūta tva abhūtatva lakṣaṇam vaidharmyam na bhautika tva abhautika tva grahaṇena śakyam vaktum iti avadhāraṇa abhiprāyaḥ nanu yugapad jñāna anutpatteḥ jñāna kāraṇam manoḥ asti iti avagamyate na punar asya indriya tvam api tabhdāvān avagame ca na indriya artha sannikarṣa jam sukha ādi jñānam śakyam vaktum iti atas āha tantra antarā iti tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvam iti tantram śāstram tat anena manasaḥ ca ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam etat dūṣitam dignāgenaa niṣedhāt upāttam ced anyā indriya rutam vṛthā iti tat dūṣayitum upanyasyati na śeṣa iti tat dūṣayati na tantra yuktī iti sarvasya tantra antare loke ca siddha tvāt avaktavyatāyām sva matam iti na asti vacana liṅgam hi mata ajñānam na ca ananumate niṣedha mātram śakyam vaktum abhāvasya bhāva nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ siddham artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti prakṛtamusaṃharati tat iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.54^1	 tat evam lakṣaṇa padāni vyākhyāya vimṛśati samastam iti abhimatam āha samastam iti āha bhāṣya kāraḥ hetum āha yasmāt iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utu annam jñānam avyabhicāri iti hi pratayakṣa lakṣaṇam anavayavena samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam śakyam eva lakṣayitum na khalu ayamasau= aśvaḥ iti jñānam indriya jam śabda jam saṃbhavati tat hi dravya gocaram vā ucyeta vācya tva gocaram vā vācya tva viśiṣṭa dravya gocaram vā tatra dravyam aindriyakam eva na śābdam iti aśakyam hi jñānam vyavacchettum anabhimatam ca 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.54^2	 vācya tva gocaram tu jñānam śābdam eva anyathā hi aśruta śabdaḥ api āraṇyakaḥ aśvam eva indriya sannikarṣāt aśva śabda vācyaḥ iti gṛhṇīyāt vācya tva viśiṣṭa dravya jñānam api śābdam eva vahni viśiṣṭa dhūma jñānam iva anumānikam anyathā tat api aindriyakam iti na tad nirākaraṇāya yatna antaram āstheyam atha na vācya tvam nāma mīmāṃsakānām iva kiñcid ati indriyam api tu saṅketa mātram etat asmāt idam pratyetavyam iti tathā api śabdaḥ eva atha ayam api aindriyakaḥ eva tatra guru padiṣṭā gāthā paṭhitavyā śabda ja tvena śābdam ced pratyakṣam ca akṣa jat mataḥ spaṣṭa grahaṇa rūpa tvāt yuktam aindriyakam hi tatas 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.55	 iti tasmāt na ubhaya ja jñāna nivāraṇāya avi apadeśya padam vyavasāya ātmaka padena tu sa vikalpake jñāne avaruddhe nirvikalpakasya apratyakṣatā mā prasāṃkṣīt iti tad avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena nirvikalpake api śabda saṃbheda nirākaraṇam anvācitam iti śābda iti uktam evam avyapadeśya padena nirvikalpake avaruddhe sa vikalpakasya indriya jasya apratyakṣa tvam mā prasāṃkṣīt iti tad avarodha arthena vyavasāya ātmaka padena saṃśaya jñāna pratyakṣa tva nirākaraṇam anvācitam iti saṃśaya iti uktam 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.56^1	 anvayam darśayitvā vyatirekam āha yadi iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti heyāḥ triśat koṭīḥ gaṇayati tatra iti dvipada parigraheṇa daśa indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam dhravam kṛtvā jñāna ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ jñānam ca ghavam kṛtvā avyapadeśya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena tistraḥ evam avyapadeśya padam dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena dve koṭī avyabhicāri vyavasāya tmaka saṃbandhe daśamī iti tripada parigraheṇa api daśa eva indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyapadeśya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ jñānam avyapadeśyam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi pada saṃbandhena dve koṭī avyabhicārya vyapadeśya padayoḥ tu vyavasāya ātmaka pada saṃbandhe koṭiḥ ekā indriya artha sannikarṣa avyapadeśya pada dhrauvye avyabhicārya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhe koṭi dvayam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmaka padayoḥ tu dhruvayoḥ indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena jñāna padena ca pratyekam saṃbandhe koṭi dvayam iti tri pada parigraheṇa daśa koṭayaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.56^2	 catuṣpada parigraheṇa pañca indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi ekaika saṃbandhe dve koṭī avyapadeśya padam tyakatvā para koṭiḥ jñāna padam tyaktvā ca aparāḥ indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam tyaktvā tu pañcamī pṛcchati kasmāt pañca pada parigraheṇa ekatri śattama koṭi parigraheṇa itarāḥ koṭayaḥ vyavacchidyante na hi atra tad vyavaccheda vācakaḥ kaścid asti śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram viśeṣa iti viśeṣa pratividhāna prastāve śeṣa niṣedha upanyāsaḥ dṛṣṭānta lābhāya eka deśa abhyupagamaḥ ekatriśat koṭiṣu ekatriṃśattamī koṭiḥ eka deśaḥ iti arthaḥ śeṣa vidhānam vā iti vā śabdaḥ iva arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.57^1	 tat evam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam samarthya vāsubandhavam tāvat pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati apare punar iti lakṣaṇam vyācaṣṭe tatas arthāt iti yat tadoḥ nitya saṃbandhāt yasya arthasya yat vijñānam vyapadiśyate yadi tatas eva tabhdavati na artha antarāt vyapadeśa asaṃbandhinaḥ tat pratyakṣam atas eva vyapadeśa asaṃbandhinaḥ artha antarāt śukti rūpāt rajatena vyapadiśyāmānam śukti jñānam na pratyakṣam vyapadeśaka an utpatteḥ vyapadeśakasya rajatasya tatra asaṃbhavāt etasya pratyakṣa ābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddhā iti tām upekṣya anumāna vyāvṛttim āha etena iti kutas na hi tatas eva vyapadeśakāt eva vahneḥ tat vijñānam anumānam bhavati kim tu yatra vahniḥ asti tatra tatas ca yatra tu dṛṣṭa mātraḥ eva vahneru upa ramāt uparataḥ dhūmaḥ tatra anyatas ca tabhdavati smaryamāṇāt dhūmāt asati vyapadeśake vahnau tatas arthāt iti atra hi artha viśeṣaṇam tatas iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.57^2	 tad saṃgataḥ ca eva kāraḥ ayoga vyavacchede vartate yathā ca etra dhanardharaḥ eva iti tena yatra eva tad ayogaḥ tat apratyakṣam iti arthaḥ tat etat lakṣaṇam dūṣayati atra artha grahaṇam anarthakam na hi jñāna vyapadeśaḥ ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati śaṅkate avadhāraṇa arthaḥ iti ayoga vyavacchedena etat avadhāraṇam viśeṣaṇa ca tatas iti viśeṣaṇa saṃgataḥ ca ivakāraḥ ayogam vyavacchinatti asati ca artha pade kasya idam viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇa saṃgataḥ na eva kāraḥ ayogam vyavacchindāt iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti tat na iti tatas iti sarva nāmnaḥ sannihīta viśeṣya apekṣa tvāt anyathā abhidhāna aparyavasānāt yasya tat vyapadiṣyate iti vyapadeśa saṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyate eva iti sidhyati eva viśeṣaṇa tvam abhyupetya tvad avadhāraṇa mātre api adoṣaḥ iti manyamānena abbhakṣaḥ inyudāhṛtam anya vyavacchede apihi tat eva anyat vyavacchidyeta yat virodhi na punar anya mātram yathā āhuḥ niyamaḥ tad virodhāt ca kalpate na avirodhinaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.58^1	 syat etat tatas iti ucyamāne yatas tatas syāt tathā ca anumāna ādi api liṅga jñāna ādeḥ tatas upajāyate iti pratyakṣam prasajyeta iti tad nivṛtti artham arthāt iti vaktavyam na hi tat arthāt jāyate api tu pratyakṣam eva iti atas āha etaneni yasya tat vyapadiśyate iti apekṣya tatas śabda sāmarthyena anumāna ādi vyudāsaḥ api pratyuktaḥ yat ca tatas śabdasya vyāvartya antaram uktam tat api dūṣayati yat punar etat iti yadi yasya vyāpadiśyate jñānam tat pratyakṣam tatas ghaṭaḥ iti api jñānam pratyakṣam prasajyeta tat api hi ghaṭasya vyapadiśyate na tu tatas ghaṭāt bhavati tasya vicāra asahatayā parama artha sattva abhāvena saṃvṛti satas vijñānam prati kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt tena tad nirākaraṇāya tatas iti uktam tat etat na budhyāmahe katham apakṣiptam iti śaṅkate yadi iti rūpa ādi paramāṇavaḥ eva nirantara utpādāḥ paramārtha santaḥ bhinnāḥ sva vijñānasya avikalpakasya janakāḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.58^2	 teṣām tu nānātvam svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpaka pṛṣṭha bhāvinī ghaṭaḥ iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tān eva rūpa ādīn ekodaka āharaṇa ādi kriyā kāriṇaḥ bhedinaḥ iva darśayantī saṃvṛtiḥ iti ucyate nirākaroti na hi rūpa ādibhyaḥ iti anuśaya bījam udghāṭayati atha api iti nirākaroti manomodaka iti bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kim etāvatā api iti atas āha sarvam ca iti yad saṃvṛti tvena bhavatām abhimatam yat ca avikalpakam tat sarvam sva viṣayāt bhavati tasmāt tatas grahaṇam saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham anarthakam mā bhūt saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham mithyājñāna nivṛtti artham bhaviṣyati iti codayati nanu ca mithyājñānam atasmāt api bhavati yathā purovarti dravyam idam iti vyapadiśyate rajatam iti na na tu śuktiḥ iti tena yadi api sāmānya rūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam tatas ca tabhdavati tathā api yena viśeṣaṇa rūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatas tabhdavati iti atasmāt api iti uktam tasmāt tatas eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam na ca evam mithyājñānam tat hi tatas catatas ca bhavati iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_1,1.4.58^3	 pariharati na hi atasmāt āropitāt rūpāt tatra asataḥ tat mithya jñānam bhavati kim tu tatas bhavati yasya sāmānya rūpasya vyapadiśyate idam iti tatas eva samāropitam tu tajatam asya viṣayaḥ dṛśyamāna ākāra tayā tat idam uktam atasmiḥ tat bhavati iti evam ca lakṣya pada mātra avaśeṣāt lakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ iti āha tatas grahaṇam iti tathā ca ati vyāptiḥ iti āha tathā ca iti abhyupetyata dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadi api etat iti yatas bhavati jñānam sa grāhyaḥ arthaḥ kāraṇam grāhakam ca vijñānam kāryam tayoḥ ayugapabhdāvāt vartamāna ābham jñānam atīte mithyā iti na pratyakṣam syāt tad samāna kālayoḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt tatas arthāt iti na asti iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate nāśa utpādau= iti kṣaṇika tvāt bhāvānām kāraṇa saya nāśaḥ kāryasya utpādaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ tathā api kāraṇasya grāhyatā bhinna kālasya api sva sadṛśa jñāna janakam eva tasya tajānam grāhya tvam na anyat yathā āha bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhyatām viduḥ hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam iti
