NVTṬ_3,2.3.1^1	 siddhānti āha sādhya sama tvāda hetuḥ iti vṛttayaḥ hi vṛttimataḥ bhinnaḥ tena tāsām nitya tve api na vṛttimān kauṭa sthvāt cyavate tathā ca pratyabhijñāta ātmā eva pratyabhijñānāt nityaḥ syāt na tu antaḥkaraṇam buddhi saṃjñakam na hi tad pratyabhijñāne prakāśa taiti arthaḥ kriyā anādhāra tvāt ca karaṇasya iti pradhāna kriyā anādhāraḥ karaṇam pradhāna kriyā ca iyam upalabdhiḥ svatas yad ādhārā pratīyate sa karttā na karaṇam tathā ca pratyabhijñāna ādi upalabdhyā tad ādhāraḥ karttātmā sidhyati nityaḥ na tu karaṇam iti arthaḥ kriyā mātra abhidhānena śaṅkate sva kriyetan pridhāna kriyām ālambya nirākaroti satyam bhavati iti nanu yadi bheda vivakṣayā kartṛ ādi śabda vṛttiḥ abheda vivakṣayā ca kāraka śabda pravṛttiḥ katham tarhi karttā kārakam karaṇam kārakam ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyam bheda abheda vivakṣayoḥ viruddha artha tvāt iti ataa āha kāraka śabdena api iti nābheda vivakṣā viśeṣāṇām kim tu sāmānya vivakṣā bhidyate iti bhedaḥ na bhedaḥ abhedaḥ iti sāmānyasya abhidhānāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.3.1^2	 tathā ca sāmānya vivakṣayā pravṛttaḥ śabdaḥ tad bheda abhidhānāt bheda vācinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam pratipadyamāna itaretara vyāvṛtte viśeṣe apādāna ādau pravarttate anyasya kāraka viśeṣasya kāraka śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt pūrvavat iti dvitīya adhyāya uktam kāraka viśeṣasya lakṣaṇam smārayati codayati yadi anya kāraka iti kārakāṇām upādānena khalu pravarttitaḥ karttā kārakāṇi upādatte tasmāt itara aprayojya tvam asya asiddham iti arthaḥ pariharati na prayujyate phalasya prayojaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.3.1^3–3,2.4.1	 na aprayujyamānam karttāram brūmaḥ api tu kārakā prayojyam na ca phalam kārakam iti arthaḥ upetya pratyabhijñānam antar karaṇe tasya iti pratyakṣam ced pratyabhijñānam na ekatve kim tu anumānam tatas yat yat pratyabhijñāyate tat tat ekam iti na nidarśanam asti na hi tasya ekatvam anyatas niścitam atas pratayabhijñānāt na api aneka tvam dṛṣṭam tathā ca asādhāraṇa tayā hetvā bhāsā eti arthaḥ pratyabhijñāna svarūpa avadhāraṇe ca sati viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ buddhi anitya tva sādhanāt iti śeṣam nigadena eva vyākhyātam cetanā adhyavasāya abhedaḥ buddhi lakṣaṇe asmābhiḥ vicāritaḥ vṛttimataḥ avasthānāt vṛtti avasthāna prasaṅga eti sūtra arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.5–8.1^1	 ākṣeptuḥ vacanam mama api evam kasmāt na iti samādhātuḥ vacanam na kāraṇa bhede dṛṣṭa tvāt iti kāraṇa bhedehi sati ekasya kartuḥ yugapad anekam kāryam dṛṣṭam sāṅkhyānām ca antaḥkaraṇam kartṛ vyāpakam ca iti sarva vyāpakena antar karaṇena adhiṣṭhitāni indriyāṇi yugapad eva kāryāṇi kuryuḥ asmākim tu antaḥkaraṇasya karaṇa tvāt eka indriya grāhye api na yugapad kārya utpāda eti viśeṣaḥ gati abhāvāt ca pratiṣiddham vibhunaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya ayugapad grahaṇam na liṅga antareṇa anumīyate iti bhāṣyasya gataya bhāvāt ca vibhunaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya iti pratīka m anūdya tasya artham āha prāpti arthasya gamanasyāḥ bhāvāt iti na cā ayugapad pratyaya utpattau pramāṇam asti yena pramāṇena pratiṣiddham api pratyaya ayaugapadyam pratipadyate tasmāt vibhuni antaḥkaraṇe avaśyaṃbhāvi pratyaya yaugapadyam na ca etat dṛṣṭam tasmāt antaḥkaraṇam aṇu iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.5–8.1^2	 nanu dīrghām śaṣkulīm bhakṣayataḥ pañcānām api jñānānām yugapad utpādaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti kaḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya vibhu tve yugapad utpādaḥ prasajyeta iti atas āha na ca yugapad pratyaya utpattau= iti ati śīghra tayā yugapad utpāda abhimānaḥ na tu tatra yaugapadyam bhāvikam iti arthaḥ puruṣaḥ jānīte na antar karaṇam iti sva mata samādhāna param bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yasya punar vṛttiḥ vṛttimatoḥ iti yat api sāṃkhyāḥ ācakhyuḥ viṣaya antara vyāsakte antaḥkaraṇe cakṣuḥ ādi saṃbandhasya api ajñāna dantaḥkaraṇa vṛttiḥ jñānam iti tad nirākaraṇa param bhāṣyam etena viṣaya antara vyāsaṅga eti tat anubhāṣya vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe etena iti tatra iti na iti asya upajīvyam āha puruṣaḥ jānīte na antaḥkaraṇam iti hetunā viṣaya antara vyāsaṅgaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya pratyuktaḥ vyāsaktaḥ hi sa bhavati yaḥ jānīte na ca antaḥkaraṇam jānīte kim tu puruṣaḥ iti tasya īdṛśa vyāsaṅgaḥ na antaḥkaraṇasya anyādṛśaḥ tu antaḥkaraṇasya vyāsaṅgaḥ na niṣidhyata eti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.9.1^1	 codya bhāṣyam ekam antaḥkaraṇam nānā vṛttayaḥ iti tat vyācaṣṭe ekam antaḥkaraṇam nānā vṛttayaḥ iti na etat iti samyak ācaṣṭe jānīte saṃcakṣāṇakaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ saṅkhyā hi samīcīnā buddhiḥ tayā varttate iti sāṃkhyaḥ etat uktam bhavati yadi api vṛttayaḥ nānā pratibhānti tathā api bhrāntiḥ iyam antaḥkaraṇāt ekasmāt abhinnānām nānātva anupapatteḥ tasmāt sphaṭikasya yathā ekasya api tāpiccha japākarṇikāra ādi kusuma upadhāna bhedāt bhedaa aupādhikaḥ evam antaḥkaraṇa maṇeḥ api svacchasya indriya praṇāḍikayā tad tad artha uparaktasya aupādhikam nānātvam vṛttiḥ iti ca pratyayaḥ iti jñānam iti ca ākhyāyata eti arthaḥ tat etat dūṣayati na anekāntāt iti yaḥ api vṛtīnām aupādhika bhedam āha tena api upādhayaḥ arthāḥ ājānataḥ bhinnāḥ vaktavyāḥ tathā ca bhedasya dvidhā darśanāt anekāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na eka arthasya sādhakaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.9.1^2	 na hetu abhāvāt iti bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yathāśruti sūtraḥ iti na kevalam sādhana abhāvaḥ bādhakam ca atra asti iti āha vikalpa anupapatteḥ ca iti na para pakṣasya pratiṣedha mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asti iti āśayavān pṛcchati atha bhavatām iti uttaram jñānānām krameṇa iti syāt etat pratyaya nānātva abhimānaḥ bhaviṣyati hetuḥ ekatve vṛttīnām eka tvam vṛttīnām nānātva abhimāna viṣaya tvāt sphaṭika vat iti tasmāt na hetu abhāvaḥ iti atas āha eka aneka viṣaya tvāt ca pratyaya nānātva abhimānasyaeka aneka viṣaya adhigatiḥ katham iti nānātva abhimānaḥ api dṛṣṭāntavat asādhakaḥ na aikāntika tvāt tat evam antarā parakīyām āśaṅkām nirākṛtya punar api vṛtti bhedam sādhayati yaḥ ca ayam abhinnaḥ iti yadi artha upadhāna bhedāt prayayeṣu bhedaḥ na ajānata stataḥ ekasmin= arthe na pratyaya bhedaḥ pratyaya upadhāna bheda abhāvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.9.1^3	 kaścid deśayati sphaṭikaḥ iti pariharati nairantarya darśanāt iti nīlī dravya lepasya api sa antara tvam nīlaḥ sphaṭikaḥ iti sākṣātkāra anumeyam iti bhāvaḥ itas api pratyaya bhedaḥ iti āha yasya ca pratyaya abhedaiti pramāṇasya bhedaḥ pratyaya lakṣaṇa kārya bheda unneyaḥ na asati pratyaya bhede bhavitum arhati śaṅkate viṣaya bhedāt iti etat uktam bhavati prātisvikaḥ api bhedaḥ viṣayāṇām yadi pramāṇa bheda hetuḥ hantā etasya ānantyena pramāṇānām anantaḥ bhedaḥ syāt na tu tri tvam tasmāt avāntara sāmānyam viṣayāṇām āstheyam na ca tat api sva rūpa mātra niṣṭham viṣayāṇām saṃbhavati ekasmin= api pramāṇānām saṃplavāt tasmāt pratyaya bheda upahita sāmānyāḥ viṣayāḥ tri tve vyavatiṣṭhamānāḥ pa pramāṇam api tri tve vyavasthāpayanti sāmagrī traya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ ca pratyayāḥ trayaḥ bhavanti 
NVTṬ_3,2.9.1^4	 tathā ca tri viṣaya tvāt pramāṇāni trīṇi tat idam uktam viṣaya bhedāt iti nirākaroti tat na iti pramāṇa abhede sāmagrī traya abhede taduna vidhāyinām pratyayānām abhedāt na hi pratyaya bhedām antareṇa sāmagrī bhedaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum tasmāt pratyaya sāmagraya bhede api viṣaya bhedān adhigateḥ na viṣaya bhedaḥ tritva adhigamaḥ vā pratyaya bhedam antareṇa iti śaṅkate viṣaya tādātmyāt iti ced pratyaya pratyeta vayayoḥ abhedāt upapannaḥ pratyaya bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ nirākaroti tat na iti api ca pratyaya abhede prakāravat tva abhāvāt yathā adhyavasyati buddhiḥ tathā cetayate puruṣaḥ iti vyāghātaḥ kutas aprakāravat tvāt bhinnaḥ hi prakāravān bhavati na abhinnaḥ iti arthaḥ antaḥkāraṇasya buddheḥ pratyayānām abhede buddhiḥ tam pratyayam upalabhate iti virodhaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.10.1–3,2.10.2^1	 tat evam sva matena sāṃkhya pakṣam dūṣayitvā bauddhaiḥ yat sāṃkhya rāddha ante dūṣaṇam uktam tat dūṣayitum bauddha matam upanyasyati sphaṭika anyatva abhimāna etat imamṛṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇika vādyāha iti sphaṭikepya para apara utpatteḥ kṣaṇika tvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ yat sat tat sarvam kṣaṇikam yathā śarīram tathā ca sphaṭikaḥ iti jarantaḥ bauddhāḥ śarīrasyā ca ca kāla paripāka vaśena sthaulyasya hrāsasya ca darśanāt pratikṣaṇam sūkṣmaḥ pariṇati bhedaḥ anumīyate sa ca antarā vināśaā iva iti yasya api sphaṭika ādeḥ tādṛśam sthaulī aṃhrāsaḥ vāna dṛśyate tasya api sattvena śarīra vat eva pratikṣaṇam vināśa utpādau= anumīyete iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.10.1–3,2.10.2^2	 syāt etat yadā eva upacaya apacayau śarīrasya dṛśyete tadā eva utpāda vināśau bhaviṣyataḥ pūrvam tu tad prabandha kalpanāyām kim pramāṇam iti ataa āha yaspaya khalu pratikṣaṇam iti asya prayogaḥ pratikṣaṇam anyat ca anyat ca iti paṭasya kuṅkuma ādi dravya saṃyoge satyante aruṇima lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate na ca asya aruṇimā pratikṣaṇa bhāvi iti atas uktam bāhya pratyaya abheda īsati iti abhinnaḥ hi śarīra upacaya hetuḥ pratidinam upayujyamānaḥ anna pāna pracathoyathā pākaja utpattau= auṣṇya apekṣaḥ vahni saṃyogaḥ bāhyaḥ pratyayaḥ kāraṇam paṭe ttu rāga utpattau kuṅkuma dravya saṃyogaḥ sāṃpratikaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.11.1–3,2.11.2	 siddhānta sūtram niyama hetu abhāvāt yathādarśanam abhyanujñā tat etat vyācaṣṭe tat idam upacaya apacayā iti na hi dhūma darśana anumitaḥ vahniḥ kvacid pravartta taiti adṛśyamāne api dhūme parvata tva mātreṇa parvata antare api vahnim anuminvate anumātāraḥ iti arthaḥ śaṅkate yatra upalabdhiḥ iti kṣaṇika tvam pūrva apara bhāga vikala kāla kalā mātra āba sthāyi tvam na ca tādṛśam kṣaṇika tvam naiyāyikāṃnām kvacid api saṃmatam iti na siddha sādhanam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti satyam iti kasmāt punar asmad abhimatā eva kṣaṇika tā na sidhyati upacaya apacaya prabandha darśanāt iti ataa āha upacaya apacaya prabandha darśanam ca anyathā bhavat iti caḥ hetu arthaḥ śaṅkate tulyam iti nirākaroti nāsādhanāt iti ekānta niścayam vinā na sādhanam dūṣaṇam tu sandeha āpādanena api iti saḥ ayam sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.12.1–3,2.12.2^1	 uttara sūtram avatārayati atha avaśryam sādhanam vaktavyam iti na utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ utpatti vināśa kāraṇam jñāpakam avayava upacaya apacayau na kṣaṇika pakṣe yujyete niranvaya utpāda vināśayoḥ upacaya apacaya pratayayā abhāvāt iti upacaya apacayāt patti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti upacaya apacayau ca tau= utpatti vināśa kāraṇe ca iti karmadhārayaḥ utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti asya vyākhyāna antaram āha athavā kāraṇam iti samavāyi kāraṇam hi kāryāt pūrvam ca kārya kāle ca iti loka siddham tat ca etad kṣaṇika tve anupapannam iti arthaḥ eka kāla anubhāvinī anubhavaḥ prāptiḥ eka kāla prāpte iti arthaḥ bhinna loka maryādaḥ śaṅkate ādhāra ādheya bhāvasya iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.12.2^2	 nirākaroti na anekāntāt bhavatām api rāddha ante rūpam sa pratidham kāryam ādhāra vat ca yadi tu rūpam api anādhāram manuṣe tatas te sva siddhānta vyākopaḥ iti āha sparśaḥ tad āśrayaḥ iti ca vyāghātaḥ iti sarva tad eka kāla anubhāvi siddham bhavati iti śaṅkate siddhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kṣaṇikeṣu api iti kāryasya anādhāra tva prasaṅgena na hi kṣaṇika tve kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na sidhyati satu siddhaḥ kṣaṇika tva pakṣe api iti kāraṇa vināśa sama kāla tvena kārya utpādasya kārya kāraṇayoḥ samāna kāla tvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.12.2^3	 nirākaroti na hetu artha aparijñānāt iti etāvatā prayāsena tvayā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kṣaṇikānām samarthyate na ca ayam akṣaṇika tve hetuḥ api tu ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ sa ca aśakya sādhanaḥ kaḥ nu khalu ayam kāraṇa vināśaḥ kāraṇa abhāvaḥ vā vināśa kāraṇa sānnidhyam vā pūrvasmin pakṣe kārya kāraṇayoḥ kutas samāna kālatā uttarasmin= api utpannasya paścāt vināśa kāraṇamānnidhye api kutas sataḥ kṣaṇika tā na ca utpadyamāna tā vinaśyat tayoḥ tulya kāla tvam anubhava virodhāt kāryasya ca tadā eva utpadyamāna tve kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvaḥ savya dakṣiṇa śṛṅga vat iti bhāvaḥ api ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ api sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha tulādhārasya iti ye avayava karmaṇī lāsollāsau na tayoḥpa kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ yat tva vaya vi karmana tatra yaugapadyam na api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eka tvāt iti arthaḥ guru tva aprayatna saṃyogāḥ unnateḥ iti vidhārakaḥ prayatnaḥ tulādhārasya tad apekṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa yuktaṃsaṃyogaḥ guru tvam ca tad saṃyukta avayava antara varti kāraṇam unnateḥ tulāvayavasyaanavateḥ api dravyam guru tva vat suvarṇa ādi parimayimāṇam tad saṃyoga anugṛhītaḥ rajju tulā saṃyogaḥ kāraṇam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^1	 codayati na na asti śīta uṣṇa sparśa bhedasya iti pariharati sa tu nimitta antarāt iti punar codayati ap tejaḥ vayavānupraveśaḥ na yuktaḥ iti sva gatāḥ mahābhūta viśeṣāḥ tad avayavāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥte hi parasparataḥ viśiṣyante iti viśeṣāḥ pariharati na yuktam iti yadi pratikṣaṇam anya tva mātreṇa viśeṣaḥ tatas kāṣṭha kṣaṇānām api bhūmi aśma loha vat viśeṣa upalambhaḥ syāt yathā hi kāṣṭha kṣaṇāt akasmāt loha kṣaṇāḥ bhidyante evam kāṣṭha kṣaṇa antarāṇi api iti tasmāt pārthiva tve api svatas viśeṣau= āstheyau yatas bhūmi aśma ādibhyaḥ vyāvarttante na vyāvarttante ca kāṣṭha kṣaṇa antarebhyaḥ kāṣṭha kṣaṇaḥ tasmāt eva viśeṣāt akṣaṇika tve api kāṣṭha bhūmi aśma lohānām upapanna auttarettaraḥ viśeṣaḥ iti vṛthā kṣaṇika tva kalpanā iti asādhanam bhū svabhāvaḥ kṣaṇika tva siddhau= iti arthaḥ dūṣaṇa antaram āha viruddhaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ uttarottara viśeṣa darśanāt iti bhavatām kila bhūtānām anyonya vyāvarttakam lakṣaṇe khara sneha auṣṇya īraṇa ātmakāni bhūtāni iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^2	 kharā pṛthivī snehaḥ udakam uṣṇam tejaḥ īraṇam samīraṇaḥ gatimān iti yāvat tathā utpāde tu kāṣṭa bhūmi aśma lohānām aṅgī kriṣamāṇe ekam eva khara uṣnne khara uṣṇa īraṇa ātmakam syāt iti saṃkīrṇa tvā dbhūta lakṣaṇa vyāghātaḥ iti kaṭhinam iti kharām pṛthivīm upalakṣayati asmat pakṣe tu na vyāghātaḥ iti āha yasya punar iti na kevalam pṛthivī ādi lakṣaṇena virudhyate api tu śīta uṣṇa sparśa bhedena nānā tvasya sādhanena pūrva uktanā api iti āha viruddhaḥ ca ayam iti pṛcchati katham uttaram ekasya viśeṣa abhyupagamāt yena eva viśeṣeṇa pūrvasmāt nānātvam abhyupagatam śīta uṣṇa ādinā bhedena tena eva samprati eka tvāt iti arthaḥ siddhāntam abhyupetya iti pūrveṇa hetunā yaḥ abhyupagataḥ arthaḥ tad virodhi tayā viruddha eti arthaḥ śaṅkate atha manyase na viśeṣa mātram iti mā bhūt rūpam sa pratigham upādānam iti rūpasya ekasya nānātvam iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti na abhiprāya iti yaḥ tu avayava anupraveśe deśayet uṣṇa jale vahni sparśavat rūpa grahe api syāt ayaḥ golakā eva iti taṃpratyeka deśi matena parihāram āha 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^3	 jale agni rūpa grahaṇa prasaṅstu iti tat dūṣayati tat na iti yuktam madhyandine savitṛ prakāśena ulvaṇena mandaḥ ulkā prakāśaḥ abhibhūyate sajātīya tve sati ulbaṇa tvāt toya rūpam tu na ulbaṇam na ca sajātīyam abhāva svara tvāt tejaḥ tu bhāsvaram tasmāt na abhibhavaḥ iti arthaḥ parama artha parihāram āha api tu tejasaḥ cāturvidhyāt kim cit udbhūta rūpa sparśam tejaḥ bhavati yathā savitṛ prakāśaḥ śaradi divā kiñcid anudbhūta rūpa sparśam yathā cākṣuṣam tejaḥ kim cit udbhūta rūpam anudbhūta sparśam ca yathā pradīpa prabhāyām tejaḥ kim cit anudbhūta rūpam anudbhūta sparśam yathā ca uya gatam tejaḥ yathā vā niśīthe nidāgha samaye tejaḥ yatas medasvinaḥ svidyanti iti pratijñā artham yathāsambhavam vikalpya dūṣayati yā ca iyam pratijñā iti atha varttamānam sphaṭikam abhyupagamya yat atītam sphaṭika antaram tat pakṣīkṛtya vartamānāt tat anyat iti sādhyate nirākaroti evam sati iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^4	 yadi liṅgam sva sattā jñānābhyām namakam tadā sati api jñāne atīta dharmasya sattā na asti iti na gamakam iti bhāvaḥ yadi punar sva jñāna mātreṇa gamakam liṅgamucyeta tadā dūṣaṇa antaram āha varttamānāt ca iti tad virodhi āśraya vināśa anuvidhānena vinaśyati iti virodhi iti guṇa abhiprāyam guṇaḥ hi virodhipanā guṇa antareṇa nāśyate āśraya nāśeca iti sarva sādhāraṇam āśraya grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam tena asamavāyi kāraṇa nimitta kāraṇa vināśena api yathāsambhavam unnetavyam iti śaṅkate vinaśyat avasthā iti mā bhūt pradīpaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ vinaśyat avasthe tu dravye karma utpannam utpatti anantaram eva apavṛjyate atas īdṛśam karma dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhaviṣvatī iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na karmaṇaḥ iti karma apalāpa nibandhanaḥ hi ayam kṣaṇika bādaḥ tad abhyupagame na bhavitum arhati sthirāt dravyāt āgantuka karma sahitāt eva kārya utpāda upapatteḥ iti nirākaraṇa antara māhaanabhyupagamāt ca iti tādṛśasya api karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇika tvasya asmābhiḥ tathā hi dravyasya vinaśyattā karma utpādaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^5	 aya dravyasya vināśaḥ na ca kāraṇa utpāda samaye kārya utpādaḥ iti dravya vināśa anantaram karma nā śa eti siddham kṣaṇa dvaya avasthānam karmaṇaḥ iti śaṅkate vināśa hetu abhāvāt iti ced ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ sva kāraṇāt ayam bhāvaḥ vinaśvaraḥ jāyate avinaśvaraḥ vā vinaśvaraḥ ced vināśam prati na hetum apekṣeta na hi nīlam sva kāraṇāt utpannam nīlatve hetum apekṣate tasya eva tādrūpyat avinaśvaraḥ ced tathā api na asya hetu śataiḥ api śakyaḥ vināśaḥ kartum na hi nīlam utpanne pītam śilpi śatena api śakyam kartum api ca ayam vināśaḥ bhāvaspaya kāraṇaiḥ āthīyamānaḥ bhāvāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā jāyate abhinna tve bhāvaḥ eva asau= iti vinaṣṭaḥ bhāvaḥ prāgvat upalabdhi artha kriye kuryāt na ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ kāraṇa bhede sati sambhavati abhedaḥ tantu saṃyoga bhedebhyaḥ hi paḥ jāyate tantu vibhāgāt vā tantu vināśāt vā paṭa abhāvaḥ iti kāraṇa bhedaḥ bhāvāt bhinna tve tu jāyatām abhāvaḥ bhāvasya kim āyātam na hi kramelaka utpādane pīlavaḥ nivartante abhāvena bhāvaḥ tirodhīyate iti ced 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^6	 na tirodhānasya api bhāvāt abhede pūrvavat upalabdhi ādi prasaṅgaḥ bhede api tirodhānasya anyasya utpāde anyasya na kim cit utpannam vinaṣṭam ca iti bhāva tādavasthyāt pūrvavat upalabdhi ādi prasaṅgaḥ api ca yadi eṣām dhruva bhāvi na tatra teṣām hetu antara apekṣā yathā kṛpāṇasya ayaḥ maya tve dhruva bhāvī ca kṛtakānām bhāvānāṃva vināśaḥ iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ dhruva bhāvitā hi pratiṣidhyamāna hetu antarā apekṣa tva viruddha tad nirapekṣa tva vyāpta upalabdhā sā iha pratīyamānā nirapekṣa tvam upasthāpayantī hetu antara apekṣa tām pratikṣipati ye hi hetu antara apekṣaḥ na te dhruva bhāvinaḥ yathā vāsasi rāga ādayaḥ kusumbha ādi saṃyoga sāpekṣāḥ na avaśyam bhāvinaḥ iti tasmāt abhāvasya sarva upākhyā rahitasya kalpitasya kriyā anupapannā iti abhāvam karoti iti karoti kriyāyāḥ abhāvena sambandha anupapatteḥ naña asambandhaḥ bhāvanam karoti iti yathā āha na tasya kim cit bhavati na bhavati eva kevala miti tasmāt vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt utpanna mātre eva bhāvaḥ vinaśyati iti siddhaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^7	 tat etat nirākaroti na vikalpa anupapatteḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ yat tāvat vikalpitam sva hetubhyaḥ bhāvāḥ vinaśvarāḥ avinaśvarāḥ vā jāyante iti tatra brūmaḥ kim punar idam vinaśvara tvam bhāvānām abhimatam āyuṣmataḥ kim vināśa svabhāva tvam āho vināśa arha tvam nityebhyaḥ vyāvṛttaṃrūpam na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ paraspara parihāravatoḥ bhāva tad nāśayoḥ tādātmya anupapatteḥ tādātmye ca vināśa vat bhāvaḥ api dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu varteta iti sādhu kṣaṇika tvam samarthitam atrabhavatā bhāvānām nitya tvam upapādayatā bhāva samaye vā vināśaḥ api bhāva ātmā asti iti atyanta abhāvaḥ bhāvasya bhavet iti suṣṭhavadātam tattvam bhāvānām na ca bhāvaḥ eka kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ nāśaḥ dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu iti sāmpratam prathama dvitīya lakṣaṇa avaccheda lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargeṇa bhedāt dvitīyam tu kalpam anumanyāmahe nanu evam vināśa arhāḥ ced bhāvāḥ sva kāraṇāt utpannāḥ hanta udaya anantaram eva apavṛjyeran na apavṛjyante vināśa arhāḥ api paṭa ādayaḥ tantu vināśāt vā tantu vibhāgāt vā sva kāraṇa adhīna janmanaḥ vinaṅkṣyanti 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^8	 na hi taṇḍu palāḥ pacelimāḥ iti vinā eva dahana salila saṃyoga pracaya bhedam viklidyanti kāṣṭhāni vā bhidelimāni iti kuṭhāra abhighātam antareṇa dalanti yaḥ manyate te eva taṇḍulāḥ pacelimāḥ ye samartha dahana udaka piṭha rasa habhuvaḥ tad anantaram hi pulākāḥ prādurbhavanti yad anantaram hi na prādurbhavanti na te pacelimāḥ iti tasya uttara makṣaṇikā artha kriyām upapādayantaḥ vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt vinaśvarāṇām utpatteḥ sva kāraṇāt na vināśa kāraṇa apekṣā bhāvānām iti yuktam kevalam bhāvāt anyasya akāraṇattvam bruvāṇaḥ paryanuyojyaḥ bhavān kim akāraṇa tvāt nāśasya nāstitvam rocayate kim vā nityatām tatra uktam sākṣāt dūṣaṇam vārttika kṛtā bhavatām śākyānām pakṣe akāraṇam dvidhā nityam vyoma śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vā tuccham asmākam tu nitmayā iva bhavat abhimatasya tasya tucchasya abhāvasya anaṅgīkārāt asmad abhimatasya bhavadbhiḥ anaṅgīkṛta tvena na asti iti adhyāropya rāśiḥ ekaḥ uktaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^9	 utpannasya vināśaḥ iti sarva janīnam tad viparītam bhavat pakṣe prāpnoti nanu astu bhāva abhāvayoḥ saha avasthānam kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha tatas ca bhāvānām iti śaṅkate atha avināśi tvāt iti prayojana kṣatiḥ iyam yat akāraṇa tve vināśasya eṣa doṣaḥ iti na tu doṣa bhayena sphuṭatara pramāṇa bādhitam kāraṇa tvam vināśasya śakyam aṅgīkartum iti bhāvaḥ gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ siddhāntī pṛcchati vināśaḥ na vinaśyati iti kutas etat ca udakaā āha vinaṣṭānām iti siddhāntī bauddha matamālambya āha na hi vināśa abhāvaḥ iti yasya paṭa abhāvaḥ eva tucchaḥ tasya tad abhāve kā kathā tasya tucchāt api tucchatara tvāt iti bhāvaḥ sva matam āsthāya āha api ca vināśaḥ kāraṇavān= ca iti śeṣam su bodham yat api akāraṇa tve kāraṇam uktam bhāvāt bhinnaḥ ced abhāvaḥ janyetāḥ bhāva tādavasthyam iti tatra ucyate na abhāvasya utpāde bhāvasya aparā nivṛttiḥ kim tu abhāva utpādaḥ eva tad nivṛttiḥ katham anyasya utpāde anyasya nivṛttiḥ atra svabhāva bhedaiḥ uttaram vācyam ye paraspara parihāra avasthitayaḥ te sva hetubhyaḥ jāyante 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^10	 na hi svatas anyasya aṅkuraspaya vahniḥ na kāraṇam iti anya tva aviśeṣāt bhasmanaḥ api na kāraṇam iti svabhāva bhedena tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyama samarthanam paraspara parihāra sthiti niyame api tulyam yathā ca utpādasya purastāt akhila sāmarthya rahitasya aṅkura prāgabhāvasya upakāram kim cit akurvantaḥ api bīja ādayaḥ aṅkuram ārabhante tad utpādasya eva tad prāgabhāva nivṛtti rūpa tvāt evam tad abhāva hetavaḥ api bhāva rūpe akiñcitkarāḥ api tad abhāvam ādadhati na ced bhāva rūpe kim cit kṛtam tad abhāva hetubhiḥ atha bhāvaḥ prāk iva svābhāva samaye kasmāt na svarūpa upalambha artha kriye karoti atha utpādāt prāk iva utpannaḥ aapi aṅkuraḥ kasmāt upalambha artha kriye karoti utpatteḥ prāc aṅkuraḥ na āsīt tena na akārṣīt utpannaḥ tu asti tasmāt karoti iti ced hanta bhāvaḥ api yadā āsīt tadā akārṣīt tadānīm tu vinaṣṭaḥ iti na asti tena na karoti yathā ca bhāva utpādaḥ eva tad prāgabhāvasya na astitāḥ evam abhāva utpādaḥ eva bhāvasya na astitāḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^11	 upajana apāya dharma tayā bhāva abhedaḥ vināśasya tatas na sat asat rūpa tayā dvairāśyam viśvasya iti ced kaḥ ayam upajanaḥ yadi sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ sattā samavāyaḥ vā saḥ abhāve na asti atha svarūpa pratilambhaḥ tathā api tāvat mātrasya sāmye api avāntara bhedena dvairāśya upapattiḥ tasmāt yathā sattvasya sāmye api dravya guṇa karmāṇi tena tattvena anyonyam bhidyante evam prameya tva abhidheya tva kāraṇa vat tvena aviśeṣe api tadbhiḥ saha asa tām sattā ta dviraha rūpa bhedāt bheda eti siddham yā api dhruva bhāvitāḥ vināśasya tatra brūmaḥ dhruva bhāvi tvena vināśasya hetu antara anapekṣa tvam bruvāṇaḥ na ahetuka tvam vaktum arhati hetu antara nirākaraṇe hetu mātrā nirākaraṇāt viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā phalaka tvāt api ca dhruva bhāvi tvam asiddham anaikāntikam vā idam bhāvān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim ghaṭa santānāt sabhāgāt kapāla saṃtatiḥ dhruva bhāvinī na vā 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^12	 na cedn na vināśaḥ api ghaṭasya dhruva bhāvī na khalu visabhā gakṣaṇa utpādam antareṇa ghaṭa vināśam īkṣāmahe māṃsacakṣuṣaḥ tathā ca asiddhāḥ dhruva bhāvitāḥ vināśasya atha dhruva bhāvinī tasyām eva tarhi visabhāga saṃtatau dhruva bhāvinyām mudgara ādi hetu apekṣā iti anaikāntikam dhruva bhāvi tvam na anapekṣa tva vyāptam iti na hetu antara apekṣi tvam niṣeddhum arhati iti tat etat yaśca akāraṇa vināśedoṣaḥ sa ca aparihāryaḥ iti anena vārttikena sūcitam evam tāvat anya tve sādhye doṣaḥ uktaḥ iti yadi api kṣaṇika tvam api pūrvam uktam dūṣitam ca tathā api kṣaṇikā abhidhānam tava anya param anya tvam eva tu tatra pradhānam idānīm tu kṣaṇika tvam eva pradhāna tayā sādhyam iti etāvatā prakaraṇa bheda eti viśeṣaṇam siddhānta virodhi iti yadi anāśu vināśinaḥ api ke cana bhāvāḥ bhaveyuḥ tatas viśeṣaṇam āśu vināśinā eti kalpeta tathā ca siddhānta virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ matvarthīyaḥ iti kṣaṇikaḥ iti atas iniṭhanau= iti matvarthīyaṣṭhan anantareṇa vināśena viśiṣyamāṇā eti upalakṣyamāṇaḥ sarva anta kālam iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^13	 pūrva apara bhāga vikala kāla kalā ekā jyotiḥ vidyā asiddhā sarvāntya kālam iti saṃjñā mātram na tu vāstavam vāstavī ca kṣaṇikatā abhimata iti pakṣa vacanam dūṣayitvā hetum dūṣayati ye api iti atra ādi grehaṇena sattva kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ veditavyāḥ tatra yat sat tat sarvam kṣaṇikam yathā ghaṭaḥ san= ca vivāda adhyāsitaḥ śabda ādiḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ sattā mātra anubandhi tvāt kṣaṇika tvasya katham punar sattā mātra anubandha siddhiḥ kṣaṇika tāyāḥ  ucyate sattvam nāma artha kriyā kāri tvam bhāvānām na anyat na hi asti sambhavaḥ san= ca bhāvaḥ na ca artha kriyām karoti iti tathā hi sa sarvajñasya vijñānasya ālambana pratyayaḥ bhavet na vā na ced na asti sarvajñaḥ vā na sarvajñaḥ tasya eva ajñānāt ālambana pratyayaḥ ced katham na artha kriyām karoti iti na ca sattā sāmānyam nāma asti kim cana na api tad samavāyaḥ yatas san= iti ucyate tad sadbhāve vā na bhāvatām sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ pa santaḥ bhaveyuḥ teṣām sāmānya ādhāra tva anabhyupagamāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^14	 pramāṇa grāhya tā api pramāṇa viṣaya tā pramāṇam pratyālambana pratyaya tvam eva tat ca artha kriyā kāritvāt na anyat iti siddham artha kriyā kāri tvam eva sattvam iti tat ca krama ākramābhyām vyāptam tṛtīya prakāra virahāt tathā hi bhāvānām tāsu tāsu artha kriyāsu krama ākramau paraspara parihāravantau cakāstaḥtathā ca kramākrama ātmakam prakāra antaram api yat i īdṛśābhyām eva anubhūtau= asitābhyām krama ākramābhyām karambitam aṅgīkriyate tatas dṛśyamānayoḥ api kramākramayoḥ paraspara saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ karambitāvena hi kramākramau= imau= api iti dṛśyamānaḥ kramaḥ akrama ātmakaḥ akramaḥ ca krama ātmakaḥ pratibhāseta na ca tathā pratibhāsate etena pratyakṣam eva paraspara parihāravantau krama ākramau paricchindat sarvatra eva anayoḥ saṃkaram pratikṣipati yadi kva cit api anayoḥ tādāmyam bhavet iha api tau= eva kramākramau iti saṃkīrṇau gṛhyeyātām tasmāt anayoḥ iha saṃkara anupalambhaā iva deśa antare kāla antare ca saṃkaram niṣedhati 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^15	 tādātmya niṣedhe ca dṛśya tva viśeṣaṇāt anupalabdheḥ dṛśyamāna stambha tādātmyena svayam adṛśyānām piśāca ādīnām dṛśyānām ca plavaṅga ādīnām aviśeṣeṇā pratiṣedhāt yathā āha viśeṣaṇam ca avācyam iti anevaṃbhūta krama yaugapadya vyatirekavatī prakāra antare krama yaugapadye eva na bhavataḥ na hi śabda abhedena vastunaḥ api abhedaḥ mā bhūt go śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena vāc ādīnām api viṣāṇi tva prasaṅgaḥ syāt etat mā bhūtām krama yaugapadye astu anyaḥ eva kramākrama abhidhānaḥ krama yaugapadyābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ yama āsthāya bhāvāḥ sthirāḥ api artha kriyāyāyām upayokṣyante na tu eṣām prakāra antara vat artha kriyā api piśācāyamānā eva tathā ced kim naḥ chinnam dṛśyamānāḥ tu anubhūta avasitāḥ paraspara vyāvṛtta krama yaugapadya rūpa prakāra dvaya samāliṅgita rūpā artha kriyā na prakāra antarāt bhavitum īśate na ca prakāpara antaram api 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^16	 tathā hi yatra yat prakāra pratiṣedhena yat itara prakāra vyavasthā niyamaḥ tatra na prakāra antara sambhavaḥ yathā nīla prakāra pratiṣedhena ānīla prakāra vyavasthāyām pīte asti catayoḥ anyatara prakāra niṣedhe anyatara vyavasthā niyamaḥ niṣidhyamāna prakāra aviṣayīkṛte sarvatra kārya kāraṇe iti viruddha upalabdhiḥ niṣidhyamāna prakāra antara sambhava viruddhaḥ hi dvayoḥ anyatara niṣadhena anyatara vyavasthā aniyama eti prakāra antara asambhavāt bhāvānām artha kriyā krama ākramābhyām vyāptā tau ca sthirāt nivarttamānau= artha kriyām api vyāvartayataḥ vṛkṣatā iva nivartamānā śiṃśapā tu amārāt dṛśyamānāt eka śilā āmayāt bhūbhṛt kaṭakāt iti pratibandha siddhiḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^17	 tathā hi na tāvatā avadakṣaṇikaḥ krameṇa arthākriyām karttum arhati svena hi rūpeṇa bhāvāḥ artha kriyāyām upayujyamānāḥ dṛśyante yat vastu yad kārya anvaya vyatirikā anu vihita bhāva abhāvam tat vastu tad kārya prasava samartham rūpam ca tasya kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatirekam iti rūpam eva samartham tat ca dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu iva prathame api kṣaṇe sat iti dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa janya kārya kalāpam prathamaḥ eva kṣaṇe niṣpādayet samarthasya kṣepā yogāt iti nākṣaṇikasya krama vat vyāpāra tā prasajyate 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^18	 syāt etat samarthaḥ api krama vat sahakāri yogāt krameṇa karoti iti tad avuktam vikalpa asaha tvāt kim asya sahakāriṇaḥ kam cit upakāram ādadhati na vā ādadhānāḥ vā bhāvāt bhinnam abhinnam vā tatra bhinna upakāra ādhāne bhāve satya nutpattarupakāre ca sati utpatteḥ evam kāryasya upakāraḥ eva janakaḥ na janakaḥ bhāvaḥ na ca upakāra sahakārī bhāvaā iva kāryasya janakaḥ na upakāra mātram iti vācyam upakārasya upakāra antara janane anavasthānāt ajanane tu saha kāri bhāva abhāvāt abhinna upakāra ādhāne ca bhāvaḥ eva janayet sa ca prāk api āsīt iti sahakāri vaiyarthyam anupakāraka tve vā sahakāriṇaḥ na bhāvena apekṣyeran= iti utpanna mātraā iva bhāvaḥ kāryam utpādayet yadi manyate anupakārakāḥ api bhavanti sahakāriṇaḥ yatas taiḥ saha bhāvaḥ kāryam karoti na ca bhāvena na apekṣyante taiḥ vinā kāryasya anutpatteḥ iti nanu svarūpeṇa ced kārya janakaḥ bhāvaḥ na kasmāt na ima anantareṇa janayati tebhyaḥ prāk api svarūpa sadbhāvāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^19	 sahakāri rūpeṇa vā janaka tve sahakāriṇaḥ eva janakāḥ na janakaḥ bhāvaḥ na ca ubhaya bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt artha kriyā bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekasmāt ca vyabhicārāt ubhaya adhīna tā iti sāṃpratam bhāve satya nud pādāt kāryasya vyabhicāreṇa carama bhāvi nimitta sahakāri samavadhāne sati bhāvāt eva sahakāri samavadhānasya eva carama bhāvinaḥ vyabhicāreṇa kāraṇatva avadhāraṇāt etena etat nirastam yat āhuḥ eke sva hetoḥ vilamba kārī bhāvaḥ jātaḥ iti na utpanna mātraḥ karoti iti sā hi bilamba kāritāḥ asya svabhāvaḥ sahakāri samavadhāna kāle api asti na vā asti ced tadā api na kuryāt na asti ced katham svabhāva nāśe bhāvaḥ na naṣṭaḥ atha asya vilamba kāri tā na svabhāvaḥ katham utpanna mātraḥ na kāryam kuryāt iti tasmāt na krameṇa artha kriyā bhāvanām na api yaugapadyena tasmāt yāvat kārya tena akṣaṇikena prathame kṣaṇe sampāditam tābat sarvam dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu sampādayet tāvat kārya sampādana svarūpasya dvitīya ādiṣu api kṣaṇeṣu bhāvāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^20	 na ca sampāditam śakya sampādanam iti yada dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu sampādayati tad prathama kṣaṇe sampāditāt anyat iti kramāḥ eva āvarttante iti tatra ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ yugapad kṛta kṛtyasya vā dvitīya ādiṣu karttavya abhāvāt na artha kriyā sāmarthyam asti iti asattvena kṣaṇika tva āpattiḥ tasmāt akṣaṇike sattva vyāpakayoḥ krama ākramayoḥ anupalambhāt vyāpaka an upalabdhyā nivarttamānam sattva makṣaṇikāt kṣaṇika tvena vyāpyate iti pratibandha siddhiḥ nīlam eva na anubhūtau= asitam samāropita akṣaṇika bhāva makṣaṇikam tādṛśa nīla svarūpa upalambha eva tatra akṣaṇike krama yaugapadya anupalambhaḥ yathā bhū tala svarūpa ulambha ā iva samāropita dṛśyat tvasya ghaṭasya anupalambhaḥ bhū talam ca tathā utpannam ghaṭa abhāvaḥ na tu abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid vigrahavān asti yaḥ pratipatti gocaraḥ syāt api vyavaharttavyaḥ param syāt etat kṣaṇikobhāvaḥ artha kriyā janaka svabhāvaḥ na vā na ced asan= eva tad janaka svabhāvaḥ ced kim asya saha kāribhiḥ utpanna mātram eva bījam aṅkuram janayet 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^21	 nanu utpannaḥ bīja kṣaṇaḥ samarthaḥ janayati eva aṅkuram kutas samarthasya utpattiḥ samarthasya utpattiḥ pūrvasmāt bīja kṣaṇāt tarhi tad santāna vartinām sarveṣām bīja tva aviśeṣāt aṅkura janana sāmarthyam iti kusuma anantara labdha janma mātram eva bījam aṅkuram janayet mā evam pūrva pūrva kṣiti bīja pavana ādi kṣaṇa samavadhāna utpanna atiśaya vat uttara kṣaṇa paramparā labdha janmā antyobī jakṣaṇaḥ samarthaḥ samartha kṣiti ādi lakṣaṇa saha bhūḥ anapekṣaā iva aṅkurañjanayati na ca asya kṣiti ādi sahabhuvaḥ tad anapekṣasya api taiḥ vinā karaṇe tad eka sāmagrī adhīnasya tad abhāve abhāvāt na vā sahakāritā kṣiti ādīnām taiḥ eva saha aṅkura jananāt teṣām api kāryāt pūrva bhāvasya niyamataḥ aviśeṣāt tanmātra tvāt eva ca kāraṇa tāyāḥ na vā anapekṣāṇānam api pratyekam kārya antara ārambhaṇam tanmātrasya tebhyaḥ upalabdheḥ tatra eva sāmarthya niyamāt na ca kṛta karaṇa tayā itareṣām akriyā sahakriyāyām kṛtam iti asambhavāt na ca sva kāraṇa labdha sannidhayaḥ bhāvāḥ prekṣāvantaḥ śakyam idam asmāsu ekena api kartum kṛtam naḥ sarveṣām sannidhānena iti ālocya nivartitum īśate 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^22	 na casva kāraṇa bheda mātram kārya bheda hetuḥ api tu sāmagrī bhedaḥ tasmin sati kārya bheda upalabdheḥabhinna abheda sāmagri iti na kārya bheda prasaṅgaḥ paraspara samavadhānam ca upasarpaṇa pratyayebhyaḥ kṣiti ādīnām iti na ca kṣaṇikasya artha kriyā virodhāt asādhāraṇa tā hetoḥ na ca sādhya dharmiṇi dṛśyamāne śabda ādau vyāpti sādhanāt eva sādhya siddheḥ asādhana aṅgam hetu vacanam na khalu sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ dṛśya mātra viṣayā bhavitum arhati śakyam hi śaṅkitum pareṇa adṛśya m āmanānām sattva makṣaṇikāt na vyāvarttitam tvayā iti sattvam anaikāntikam kṣaṇika tva sādhanaḥ iti tasmāt yat dṛśyam adṛśyam vā tat sarvam kṣaṇikam iti darśanīyā vyāptiḥ nanu evam api śabda ādeḥ vivāda āspadī bhūtasya vyāpti darśana balāt eva siddhā kṣaṇikatā iti tad avastham eva asādhana aṅga tvam hetu vacanasya mā evam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^23	 asati api śaśaviṣāṇa ādau yat sat dṛśyam adṛśyam vā tat sarvam kṣaṇikam iti yathā sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ na ca śaśa viṣāṇa ādayaḥ api bhavanti kṣaṇikāḥ evam sati api vivāda āspadī bhūte śabda ādau vyāpti siddha vapi na sidhyati kṣaṇika tā tena avaśyam darśayitavyam eteṣām kṣaṇika tva sādhanāya sattvam iti na asādhana aṅga tā hetu vacanasya iti atra ucyate na sattvam kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhau= aṅgam asādhāraṇa tvāt saṃdigdha vyatireki tvāt vā tathā hi krama ākramābhyām vyāptam sattvam tad anupalambhena akṣaṇikāt vyāvarttate evam tat eva sa apekṣa tva anapekṣa tvābhyām vyāptam tad anupalambhena kṣaṇikāt api vyāvarttate tasmāt gandhavat tva vadasādhāraṇam sadasā dhana aṅgam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^24	 tathā hi antakṣaṇa prāptāni kṣiti pavana pāthaḥ tejaḥ bījāni samarthāni prāgbhāva niyatāni niyata carama utpādānām avani jala anala aṅkurāṇām kāraṇam bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyante tāni amūni paraspara anapekṣāṇi vā janayeyuḥ sa apekṣāṇi vā nanu nirapekṣāṇi eva antyakṣaṇa prāptāni kṣiti ādīni uttarasmin puñje janayitavyaiti uktam tat kim anabhyupagata vikalpena sa apekṣāṇi nirapekṣāṇi ca iti tat kim idānīm samartha bīja kṣaṇa janakaḥ api bīja kṣaṇaḥ anapekṣaā iva oṃm iti ced 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^25	 nenu evam sarve eva bīja kṣaṇāḥ nirapekṣāḥ sva kārya upajanaḥ iti kṛtam saha kāribhiḥ nanu uktam na ete prekṣāvantaḥ kim tu sva pratyaya adhīna niyata saṃnidhayaḥ na vyavadherīśate iti tat ki m ayam kṛṣīvalaḥ api na prekṣāvān  prekṣāvān yatas prayatnena kusūlāt avatārya bījam āvapati bhūmau parikarṣitāyām kṣiti ādi sahabhuvaḥ eva bīja kṣaṇasya atiśaya utpāda paramparāyāḥ aṅkura prasava sāmarthyāt kuśūla sthāt tu sahasreṇa api varṣaiḥ aṅkura anutpāde tatra avapati iti ced atha kim ayam na sva saṃtāna mātra prabhavaḥ samarthaḥ bīja kṣaṇaḥ tathā ced katham saṃtāna antaram na apekṣeta sva kārye nanu apekṣate eva kim tu tu sva utpāde na punar sva kārye tatra tasya anapekṣa tvam upeyate na tu sva utpāde nanu utpattau= api asya jāgarti sva saṃtāna varttī pūrvaḥ eva nirapekṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ evam tasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ sva saṃtatipatita eva anapekṣaḥ jāgarti upajananaḥ iti kuśūla nihita bījaḥ eva syāt pa kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ kṛtam asya kṛṣi karmaṇā duḥkha bahulena 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^26	 tasmāt paraspara apekṣāṇām eva antya kṣaṇa prāptānām kārya janaka tvam akāmena api upeyam api ca antyakṣaṇa prāptam bījam anapekṣya aṅkura avani pavana pāthaḥ tejāṃsi janayet kim yena eva rūpeṇa aṅkuram janayati tanā eva tad itarāṇi api kim vā rūpa antareṇa na tāvat tena eva kṣiti ādīnām aṅkura svābhā vya āpatteḥ na khalu bhavatām kāraṇa abhede bheda vat kārya bhavitum arhati kārya bhedasya akasmika tva prasaṅgāt yathā uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva ayam eva hi bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ vā yat viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca iti na api sāmagrī bhedaḥ tasyāḥ api abhedāt anyathā sahabhāva niyama abhāvāt sva kāraṇāt āsāditaḥ kaścid eva svabhāva bhedaḥ ekaḥ tādṛśaḥ yasmāt nānā kāryāṇi jāyante tasmāt na akasmika tvam kārya nānā tvasya na api atiprasaṅgaḥ tādṛśasya tasya asārvā trika tvāt na ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedaḥ yena kāraṇa bheda abhedau= anupatetām kārya bheda abhedau tasmāt yathā kebhyaḥ kaścid eva bahubhyaḥ kāryam ekam jāyate tathā ekasmāt eva kutaścid bahūni janayiṣyante kāryāṇi iti ced 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^27	 mudhā eva tarhi nānā deśa vṛttiḥ ekaḥ avayavi sāmānya saṃyoga ādiḥ arthaḥ tapasvī bhavatā āyāsitaḥ na hi nānātve api deśānām tad āśritaḥ sāmānya ādiḥ arthaḥ nānā bhavitum arhati tasya tebhyaḥ abhinna tvāt rūpa antareṇa bījam aṅkurāt itareṣām kṣiti ādīnām janakam tathā hi bījam aṅkurasya upādānam tad sāra bhāga vikriyayā aṅkurasya utpatteḥ kṣiti ādiṣu tu janayitavyeṣu sahakāri pūrve tu kṣiti ādayaḥ kṣiti ādīnām yathāsvam upādānāni tad vikriyayā tad utpattiḥ iti ced atha sahakārita upādānate kim ekam tattvam nānā vā ekam ced katham rūpa antareṇa janakam nānātve tayoḥ bījāt bhedaḥ abhedaḥ vā bhede katham bījasya janaka tvam tābhyām eva aṅkura ādīnām utpatteḥ abhede vā katham na bhedaḥ bījasya bhinna tādātmyāt tayoḥ vā eka rūpa tvam eva tādātmyāt tasmāt aṅkurāt bhinne kṣiti ādau janayitavye tad upādānam pūrvam eva kṣiti ādi sama samaya bhāvi bījena apekṣyate evam bījam api sama samaya bhāvyā iva sahakāri kāraṇam kṣiti ādibhiḥ apekṣyate na anyathā kārya bheda siddhiḥ iti anicchatā api abhyupeyam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^28	 na ca anupakārakam apekṣā gocara eti bhavadbhiḥ eva upapāditam na ca kṣaṇikasya upakārakatava saṃbhavaḥ anyatra jananāt tasya abhedya tvāt na ca sama samaya bhāvinoḥ janya janaka tvam asti savya itara viṣāṇayoḥ iva tasmāt sva saṃtāna mātrāt eva kārya utpāda prasaṅgāt kārya bheda anupapatteḥ ca anupakāriṇī apekṣā virahāt ca kṣaṇikasya api sa apekṣasya anapekṣasya vā na artha kriyā saṃbhavinī iti asādhāraṇa sattvam na kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhau= aṅgam atha mā bhūt asādhāraṇa tā sattvasya iti anupakārakeṣu api kārya karaṇāya apekṣā abhyupeya te teṣām api kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatireka tvāt na tu anena krameṇa akṣaṇikaḥ api bhāvaḥ anupakārakān api sahakāriṇaḥ kramavataḥ kramavatā eva kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatirekān apekṣiṣyate kariṣyate krama vat sahakāri vaśaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi samarthasya api apekṣaṇīyā sannidheḥ kārya kṣepa aupapatsyate na ca etāvatā sahakāri samavadhānāt eva utpattimataḥ kārya siddhiḥ kṛtam eṣām rūpeṇa iti vācyam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^29	 tad sahitāt eva tatas utpatti darśanāt rūpe sati api anutpādāt samavadhāne sati utpādāt eva kārya sva samavadhānam eva hetuḥ na punā rūpam api iti ced tat kim idānīm rāsabha ādi tulya tā bīja rūpasya oṃm iti ced atha kasmāt gardabha ādīn antareṇa iva bīja rūpam vinā api na aṅkuraḥ jāyate tad samavadhānasya tad kāraṇa tvāt iti ced tad sama badhāne kāraṇe katham tat niveśi rūpam api na kāraṇam na ca āvarjanīya tayā tad niveśaḥ samavadhāna mātrasya bīja rūpam antareṇa api tatra tatra bhāvāt viśeṣaḥ tu samavadhāne rūpam eva bīja ādīnām tasmādya tha ubhaya adhīna nirūpaṇā vyāptiḥ ayoga vyavacchedena vyāpake nirūpyate vyāpye bhāvaḥ eva vyāpakasya na abhāvaḥ iti vyāpye punar anya yoga vyavacchedena vyāpaka ā iva bhāvaḥ vyāpyasya na anyatra iti evam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api ubhaya adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ api kāraṇe ayoga vyavacchedena nirūpyate kārya utpādasya purastāt bhāvaā iva kāraṇasya na abhāvaḥ iti kārye punar ayoga vyavacchedena kāraṇaḥ eva sati bhāvaḥ na anyasmin= iti anubhava anusārāt niścīyate 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^30	 tathā eva hi laukika parīkṣakāṇām saṃpratipatteḥ na ca kāraṇa tā eva sattā kim tu svarūpam nīla ādeḥ anubhūta avasitam tat hi tena eva rūpeṇa svābhāva vyavacchinnam tāsu tāsu artha kriyāsu upayujyate na punar artha kriyā kāritā evava tu arūpam mā bhūt aneka artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ aparyāyeṇa rūpa bhedaḥ tasmāt yadi asti sarvajñaḥ tatas sva rūpeṇa eva sanbhāvaḥ tad jñānasya ālambana pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati atha tu na asti tathā api tad rūpaḥ janitvā āpātataḥ akiñcitkaraḥ api paścāt kutaścid nimittāt āsādya sahakāri pratyayān tāsu tāsu artha kriyāsu upayokṣyate tat siddham etat kṣaṇikasya api krama ākramābhyām yathāyogam artha kriyā upapatteḥ vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ asiddheḥ saṃdigdha vyatirekam anaikāntikam sattvam śākyānām kṣaṇika tve sādhye bhāvānām asmākam tu anyathā siddham asiddha prabhedaā iva iti na ca janakatvā janaka tva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ nānātve hetuḥ bhavitum arhati janakatvam nāma na vastu svabhāvaḥ api tu tad dharmaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^31	 dharmaḥ ca dharmiṇaḥ vastutas bhidyate na ca anyasya bhedaḥ anyasya bhedāya ala m ati prasaṅgāt anyat tva aviśeṣe katham tasya eva dharmaḥ iti ced atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ eva uttaram vācyam yathā anya tva āviṃśeṣe api kāryam dhūmaḥ hutabhujaḥ eva na bījasya iti uktam na ca kṛtaka tvam api kṣaṇikattve hetuḥ anyathā siddheḥ sa hetuke vināśe tad upapatteḥ ca na ca utpatti vināśayoḥ tādātmyam bhāvasya atyanta abhāva prasaṅgāt iti uktam tat idam uktam vārtika kṛta tā te api asiddhāḥ anyathā siddhāḥ viruddhāḥ vā bhavanti iti ahetavaḥ iti antyakṣaṇa viśeṣa darśanam pūrva kṣaṇa dharma tvena asiddha tvāt asiddham sattva kṛtaka tve anyathā siddhe viruddha tvam ca sarvasya eva hetoḥ kṣaṇika tve sādhye tathā hi sattvam kṛta kattvam vā traipa lokya vyāvṛtta tayā ananugatam deśataḥ kālataḥ vā na sādhanam tasya aśakyāvinā abhāva jñāna tayā liṅga bhāva abhāvāt anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhena vā avinābhāva grahasya ekasmin kṣaṇe aśakya tvāt tasmāt deśa kāla anugatam sattvam kṛtaka tvam anyat vāhetūkartavyam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^32	 tat ca vidhi rūpam vā bhavatu anya vyāvṛtti rūpam vā nānā kālam ekam akṣaṇikam kṣaṇika tvena sādhyena virudhyata eti uktam viruddhā vā iti ante viśeṣa darśana ādityasya tu viruddha tvam anantaram vakṣyati upetya viśeṣavat tve siddha tvam anaikāntika tvam āhapaḥ upetya vetan hetorisiddha tva viruddha tve darśayitum āha ante viśeṣa iti darśana adarśana laṇasya hetoḥ anyathā siddha tā iti āha yaḥ api ayam hetuḥ iti bhāva abhāvayoḥ tadvat tvāt iti saṃyoga abhāva abhāvayoḥ iha buddheḥ bhāvavat tvāt iti arthaḥ pradīpasya deśa antare utpādaḥ iti etat api na budhyāmahe iti kṣaṇikasya pradīpasya yadi saṃtāna mātra prabhava tvam nibaddham deśa antare kārya utpādaka tvam tatas sarve eva pradī pakṣaṇāḥ deśa antare pradīpam utpādayeyuḥ na ke cana pradhana udaraḥ eva iti athoḥ pasarpaṇa pratyaya vaśāt praghana udarāt anyatra api kāryam utpādayanti nūnapa sarpaṇa pratyayaḥ pradīpe kam cit upakāram ādhatte na vā na tāvat ādhatte kṣaṇasya abhedya tvena upakṛtānupakṛta tva asambhavāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^33	 anādhāne ca saha kāri bhāva abhāvāt anupakārakaspaya sahakāri tve ati prasaṅgāt iti bhavatām eva giraḥ na ca viśiṣṭa pradī pakṣaṇa jananam eva upakāraḥ sahakāriṇām tasya pūrvasmāt eva upādānāt upapatteḥ sahakāri anapekṣaṇāt na khalu tasya iva tad kāraṇasya api upakārakāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ bhavitum arhanti evam pūrveṣām api pradīpakṣaṇānām pūrva pūrva pradīpa mātra sāmarthya bhuvā na sahakāriṇā kiñcid ādhīyate iti sarve eva ekasmin pradhānam kāryam kuryuḥ deśa antare vā yadi punar anupakāriṇaḥ api kārya anuvihita bhāva abhāva tayā kṣaṇikena pradīpena kārya kriyām pratyapekṣyante tad akṣaṇika pakṣe api tulyam iti saṃkṣepaḥ vipañcitam ca etat asmābhiḥ brahya tattva samīkṣā nyāya kaṇikābhyām iti uparamyate na kila ākāśe patataḥ loṣṭa ādeḥ iti loṣṭa śyena ādeḥ tulya gurutvavatām dravyāṇām ekasya guru tva prayatna kṣepāḥ kāraṇam 
NVTṬ_3,2.13–14.1^34	 tathā hi saudhasya upari sthena puruṣeṇa bhūmau carantam pārāvatam uddiśya yadā adhas śyenaḥ kṣipyate tadā śyenasya pārāvata jidhṛkṣā janitaḥ prayatnaḥ guru tvam ca kṣepaḥ ca aśutara patana hetavaḥ akṣiptasya tu guru tva prayatnau= āśupatana hetū aprayatamānasya guru tva mātram patana hetuḥ iti aulūkya mate api na doṣaḥ iti atas āha ekaḥ ca saṃskāraḥ iti ayugapad kālāḥ pratyayāḥ eka viṣayāḥ iti ucyamāne ghaṭa paṭa ādi pratyayāḥ pradīpa ādi pratyayāḥ ca kramavantaḥ eka viṣayāḥ prasajyeran= ityataā āha vipratipannāḥ iti samāna śabda vācya tvāt iti anekāntar bhavanti hi samāna śabda vācyāḥ pratyayāḥ akṣaḥ akṣaḥ iti na ca samāna viṣayāḥ devanā ādīnām tad vipayāṇām bhedāt atas āha tad pratyaya sāmānādhikaraṇye sati iti tathā api pradīpa pratyayaiḥ eva anekāntaityataḥ āha avyutthāyi iti vyutthātum bhramitum śīla prasya iti vyutthāyi bhrāntam iti yāvat abhrānta tvam ca asya kṣaṇika tva sādhana nirākaraṇena draṣṭavyam avyutthāyi tat pratyaya sāmānādhikaraṇyena eva siddhe samāna śabda vācya tvam prapañcaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.15.1–3,2.16.1	 bhāṣyam guṇa antara prādurbhāva eti dravyam tāvat sat eva guṇaḥ api san kevalam anudbhūtaā āsīt ekaḥ ca udbhūtaḥ guṇaḥ tatra yaḥ udbhūtaḥ tirobhavati pūrva guṇasya nivṛttau tirobhūtau guṇa antaram utpadyatetat bhavati iti arthaḥ atra tu pratiṣedhaḥ iti kṣīra avayavāḥ eva hi kṣīra vināśe sati utpanna pāka jāḥ vilakṣaṇam dravyam utpādayanti yadi tu sarvam kāryam sat eva kāraṇa vyāpārāt prāk api vyarthaḥ kāraṇa vyāpāraḥ abhivyakteḥ api kāryāyāḥ sattvāt asattve vā yathā sā eva na satī kriyate evam kārya antarāṇi api iti vipañcitam ca etat asmābhiḥ nyāya kaṇikāyām 
NVTṬ_3,2.17.1^1	 abhyanujñāya ca niṣkāraṇam iti vināśa utpādavat tvāt samāna dharmāt saṃśayaḥ dadhi kṣīrayoḥ vināśa utpādauvakāraṇau dṛṣṭau kumbhasya ca utpāda vināśau sa kāraṇakau tat iha sphaṭike vināśa utpādau sa kāraṇau niṣkāraṇau vā iti saṃdehaḥ tat yadi sa kāraṇau= eva iti pramāṇataḥ niścīyate tatas vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ sphaṭikasya kumbha vat vināśaḥ na asti iti niścīyate tat idam uktam bhāṣya kāreṇa na punar yathā vināśa kāraṇā prāvāt iti niradhiṣṭhānam ca iti dharmiṇam āśritya tad samāna dharmāḥ dṛṭāntaḥ bhavati sphaṭika utpāda vināśau ca dharmiṇau tad samāna dharma tayā kṣīra dadhi vināśa utpādayoḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena bhavitavyam na punar sphaṭika utpāda vināśau dharmiṇau gṛhyete tasmāt na tad samāna dharma tayā dṛṣṭāntau bhavataḥ iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.17.1^2	 yadi tu dravya samavāyāt iti ucyeta tatas toya ādi paramāṇu visamavetaiḥ rūpa ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ syāt iti atas āha vyāpaka iti tathā api ātma tva sāmānyena anekāntaḥ atas āha guṇa tve sati iti tathā api ātma parimāṇena anekāntaḥ atas āha pratyakṣatayā iti asmad ādīnām iti śeṣaḥ guṇa tva ādi viśeṣaṇa yogāt prāc vyāpaka grahaṇasya upayogaḥ asmad ādi pratyakṣa tvāt iti ucyamāne sāmānya samavāyābhyām anekāntaḥ syāt atas āha jātimattve sati iti āśrita tvāt iti atra api jātima tve sati pratyakṣat tve ca iti anuṣañjanīyam anityā buddhiḥ pratyakṣa tvāt iti urcyamāne manasā vyabhicāraḥ atas āha ayogi iti tathā api ātmanā vyabhicāraḥ atauktam karaṇa bhāve sati iti hāna ādi buddhiḥ karaṇam bhavati śabdaḥ ca pratyaye karaṇam atrā pi jātimattve satī iti anuṣañjanīyam tena na gandha tva ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.18.1	 cintā antaram avatārayati idam tu cintyate iti nanu ātma parīkṣāyām ātma guṇa tvam buddheḥ vyavasthāpitam tat kasmāt punar parīkṣyata eti atas āha bhāṣya kāraḥ prasiddhaḥ api iti yadi api ayam arthaḥ parīkṣitaḥ tathā api avāntara viśeṣa parijñāna artham punar parīkṣyate iti arthaḥ codayati vārtatika kāraḥ na guṇa iti pariharati anitva tve sati iti vimṛṣya siddhāntī pakṣam gṛhṇāti sannikarṣa utpattar iti codayati adrākṣam iti etat na iti pariharati smṛtau= api iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.19.1^1	 deśayati astu tarhi iti pariharati yugapad iti yad karaṇa tvena anumitam tat karaṇa tvam apodya na kartṛ bhavitum arhati iti arthaḥ yugapad jñeya anupalabdhyā yat samadhigatam iti bhāṣyam ākṣipati viśeṣaṇa upādānāt iti samādhatte na sarvasya iti punar ākṣipati evam api iti viśiṣṭasya karaṇasya jñāna guṇa tva niṣedhaḥ karaṇa antarasya jñāna guṇa tvam āpādayati na ca ātmā karaṇam iti arthaḥ samādhatte anayasya upapatteḥ iti etat eva vivṛṇokti anavasthita tvāt iti pramātā eva kadā cit pramāṇam kadā cit prameyam iti arthaḥ puruṣa antareṇa puruṣa antaram paricchinatti iti yādṛśaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ tādṛśaḥ avamapi iti puruṣa antareṇa prasiddhena puruṣa antara paricchedaḥ iti pṛcchati yadi na karaṇasya kaspaya tarhi iti uttaram jñasya vaśitvāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.19.1^2–3,2.21.1	 kartuḥ svātantryāt iti arthaḥ kartṛ karaṇa ādi samavadhāne hi caitanyam kartari eva dṛṣṭam na karaṇa ādau yathā mṛd daṇḍa cakra salila sūtra kulāla samavadhāne kartuḥ eva kulālasya na tu mṛd ādīnām iti vaśī jñātā vaśyam karaṇam iti bhāṣyam tad anupannam jñātuḥ api kva cit vaśya tva darśanāt yathā devadattam kaṭam kārayati yajñadattaḥ iti atas āha na ca ayam jñātarī iti yadi tu kaścid jñāna guṇam manaicchet tam prati bhāṣyam jñāna guṇa tve ca iti tat vyācaṣṭe jñāna guṇa tvā iva iti ghrāṇa ādi sādhanasya iti bhāṣya vyācaṣṭe yathā ca jñātuḥ iti tathā ca mantuḥ mati sādhanam yat tat manaḥ karaṇam atha tat api kasmāt cetanam na bhavati iti atas āha ubhayoḥ iti vibhu ca antaḥkaraṇam jñānam antaḥkaraṇa antara rahitam iti śeṣaḥ atha manaḥ antaḥkaraṇam apaśyan= codayati tad ātma guṇa tve pariharati na prasaṅgaḥ iti vikaraṇa dharmā iti bhāṣyaṃ api iti viśiṣṭam karaṇam dharmaḥ yasya sa vikaraṇa dharmāḥ asmad ādi karaṇa vilakṣaṇa karaṇaḥyena vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa sūkṣma ādi darśī bhavati iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.22.1	 yadi punar ityādi bhāṣyam pūrayitvā vyācaṣṭe yadi punar iti na utpatti iti na atra pramāṇam apadiśyate pratyuta bādhakam pramāṇam asti iti arthaḥ vyākhyāna antaram āha ayugapad utpattau vā iti vyākhyāna antaram āha ayugapad utpattau vā iti vyākhyāna antaram āha videha iti śarīra vṛtti tve hi manasaḥ sarvam jñānam śarīra āyatanasya ātmanaḥ bhavet yadā tu manaḥ eva na asti tadā indriya artha sannikarṣasya ātmanaḥ ca śarīrāt bahis api bhāvāt videha pratyaya utpāda prasaṅga eti antaḥkaraṇa pratyākhyāne ca iti yadi api sarvāṇi api jñānāni na yugapad upajāyante tathā api smṛtīnām avaśyam yugapad utpāda prasaṅgaḥ iti pūrvasmāt asya viśeṣaḥ vyākhyāna antaram āha yadā ca indriyam ātmā ca arthena yugapad saṃbaddhau= iti asati indriya manaḥ sannikarṣe vyabhicāriṇām kāraṇa tva kalpanāyām vinigamanā hetoḥ abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.23.1–3,2.24.1	 vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca avasthāne tad nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ atra pūrva pakṣa sūtre cakāraḥ pūrva pūrva pakṣa sūtra apekṣayā iti āha tad ātma guṇa tvaḥ iti atas parasya nigadaā iva vyākhyānam yad anantaram apavṛjyate puruṣaḥ sā antyā buddhiḥ sthiti hetu abhāvāt vinaśyati iti sthiti hetū dharma adharmau tayoḥ abhāvāt iti atha tayoḥ abhāvaḥ kasmāt iti atas āha kālāt antya sukha duḥkha upabhogākalam prāpya iti arthaḥ atha vā sva janitāt saṃskārāt eva antyāyāḥ buddheḥ vināśa eti āha saṃskārāt vā saṃskārasya tu sthiti hetu adṛṣṭa abhāvāt vināśaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ pṛcchati katham kālāt uttaram yāvanti asya janmanaḥ iti caramasya dehasya iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.25.1–3,2.26.1	 deśayati yadi kāraṇasya iti atra tāvat ekaḥ parihāraḥ iti ekaḥ pradhānaḥ parihāraḥ parihāra antaram tu eka deśi matena apradhānam iti arthaḥ api ca na smṛtayaḥ yuga pad utpadyante paricchedaka tvāt gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabda jñāna baditi āha pariccheda tvāt ca iti eka deśi parihāram āha apare tu iti dūṣayati etat tu na samyak iti na hi manaḥ kva cit āśritam iti na kva cit samavetam saṃyoga mātram tu ati prasaktam iti arthaḥ na api vṛttiḥ sva kārya sāmarthyam iti śarīraḥ eva manaḥ sva kāryam karoti na anyatra iti śarīra āśritam manaḥ iti ucyate iti etat api na asti indriya artha sannikarṣasya manaḥ kāryasya śarīrāt bahirbhāva ādi ti arthaḥ tam imam ākṣepam samādhatte atra brūmaḥ iti yena ātmanā yat śarīram karma upārjitam tad saṃyuktasya manasaḥ vaiśeṣika jñāna ādi lakṣaṇa kāri tve na tad asaṃyuktasya iti śarīra āśrita tve manasaḥ na anyat iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.27.1–3,2.31.1	 codyam sādhya tvāt ahetuḥ parihāraḥ smarataḥ śarīra dhāraṇa upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ punar ca udyam na tat āśu gati tvāt manasaḥ parihāraḥ na smaraṇa kāla aniyamāt bhāṣyam nintā prabandhaḥ smṛti prabandhaḥ kasya cit eva arthasya liṅga bhūtasya cihna bhūtasyā sādhāraṇasya iti yāvat cintanam smaraṇam ārādhitam siddham cihnavataḥ smṛti hetuḥ bhavati iti itas ca śarīra saṃyoga apekṣam eva manaḥ smṛtiḥ hetuḥ na itarathā iti āha śarīra saṃyogān apekṣā eti ātma preraṇa yadṛcchā jña tābhiḥ ca na saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.32–33.1–3,2.32–33.2^1	 dūṣayati vyāsakta manasaḥ pāda vyathanena saṃyoga viśeṣeṇa samānam prātibhavat iti smṛti utpādasva purastāt praṇidhāna ādīnām smṛti kāraṇānām asaṃvadanāt ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt saṃskāra apekṣāt smṛtīnām yugapad utpāda prasaṅgaḥ prātibhavat iti ākṣepaḥ samādhānam āha sataḥ smṛti hetoḥ iti adṛśyamānam api karaṇam tat kramaḥ ca kārya utpāda krameṇa anumīyate iti prātibham api puruṣa karma viśeṣa apekṣāt ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt upajāyamānam na akāraṇam na ca ākrama vat iti pradhāna bhūtām upapattim avatārayitum pṛcchati bhāṣya kāraḥ prātibham idānīm iti atra uttaram āvilam datvā śaṅkate hetu abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced uttarasāram āha na karaṇasya iti yadi avi kva cit vraścanasya yugapad dāru dvaya saṃyoge yugapad chidā dvayam bhavati tathā api vraścana avayava bhedāt karaṇa bhedaunneyaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.32–33.2^2	 atha vā karaṇa antarāṇi yugapad kāryāṇi kurvantu pratyaya karaṇantu krameṇa eva pratyayān karoti iti atra na vyabhicāraḥ tat uktam pratyaya paryāyaḥ iti tasmāt karaṇam ekam na kva cit api yugapad kāryāya alam iti karttā punar ekaḥ api karaṇa bhede yugapad bahūni kāryāṇi karoti iti āha na jñātuḥ vikaraṇa dharmaṇaḥ deha nānā tve pratyaya yaugapadyāt iti vividham karaṇam dharmaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe vārttikakāraḥ na ca ayam niyamaḥ iti yogī khalu ṛddhau prādurbhūtāyām sa indriyāṇi śarīrāṇi teṣu teṣu lokeṣu nirmāya mukta ātmanām ādāya manāṃsi mokṣāya tvaramāṇaḥ yugapad karma upārjitān sukha duḥkha bhedāt na dviṣan na raktaḥ bhuṅkte tat asya ekasya api karaṇa bhedāt yugapad jñānāni bhavanti iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.32–33.2^3	 ayam ca dvitīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñāna saṃskṛta ātma pradeśa bhedasya ayugapad jñāna utpādakasya avasthitā iti yatra ātma pradeśaḥ asya jñānāni nānā viṣayāṇi jātāni tad saṃskārāḥ ca tatra eva avasthita śarīrasya tat anena śarīra antargatasya manasaḥ tatra pradeśe saṃyogaḥ upapāditaḥ tat idam āha vārttikakāraḥ yadi ca jñāna samaveta ātma pradeśena sannikarṣāt iti atas ca avyāpaka tvāt aparihāraḥ ācārya deśīyānām tu smṛti yaugapadya prasaṅgam āha avasthita saṃskārāḥ samāna deśāḥ iti ayuktam kutas ātma predaśānām a dravya antara tvāt sarva saṃskārāṇām samāna deśa tve pratyayaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ aparihāryaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.32–33.2^4	 na hi ātmanaḥ ghaṭasya iva pradeśāḥ tatas anye sambhavanti kim nāma ātmā eva sa ca ekaḥ eva iti sarve eva ātma varttinaḥ samāna deśāḥ iti arthaḥ tat idam uktam bhāṣya kāreṇa ātma pradeśānām adravya antara tvāt ekārtha samavāyasya aviśeṣe sati smṛti yaugapadyaspaya pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ iti śabda saṃtāne tu iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa bhāṣyam tuśabdaḥ śaṅkām nirākaroti tat etat bhāṣyam vārtikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe saṃskāra pratyāsattyā iti pṛcchati kā pratyāsattiḥ iti uttaram na brūma eti niṣpradeśa tve api ātmanaḥ saṃskārasya api avṛtti tvam upapāditam tena śabda vat sahakāri kāraṇasya sannidhāna āsannidhāne kalpete eva iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.34.1	 saṃprati buddhiḥ eva kim icchā ādi samāna adhikaraṇā na vā iti vicāryate tatra sa ākhya darśana vaināśikānām vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ tad vipratipattim āha puruṣa dharmaḥ jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyatu iti puruṣa caitanyam ekam eva kūṭastha nityam sat tad tad artha ākāra pariṇata buddhi tattva pratibimba vibhrama vaśāt bhinnam iva upajana apāya dharmakam vijñānam iti ca vṛttiḥ iti ca ākhyāyate icchā dveṣa ādayaḥ tu vastutas upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya iti darśanam tat pratiṣidhyate jñasya icchā dveṣa nimitta tvāt ārambha nivṛttyoḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.34.2–3,2.35.2	 prativṛtti añcati iti sa ca ātmā ca iti pratyagātmā tasmin etat uktam bhavati jñāna sāmānādhikaraṇyena upalabdheḥ anyadīyānām icchā ādīnām anyasya apratyakṣīkaraṇāt tad karaṇe vā maitra gatānām api caitreṇa grahaṇa prasaṅgāt aantaḥkaraṇa vṛttīnām ca guṇa antarāṇām nitya apratyakṣa tvāt ātma āśritāḥ eva icchā ādayaḥ na antaḥ karaṇa āśrayāḥ iti atra antare labdha avakāśaḥ bhūta caitanikaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate tad liṅga tvāt icchā dveṣayoḥ pārthiva ādyeṣu apratiṣedhaḥ yadi yasya ārambha nivṛttī tasya icchā dveṣau yasya ca etau tasya caitanyam hantāya ātam anena krameṇa bhūta caitanyam asmad abhimatam bhūteṣu eva kāya akāra pariṇateṣu ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.36.1	 para śu ādiṣu iti asya tātparyam āha vārtikakāraḥ paraśu ādiṣu iti bhūta caitanikaḥ tad liṅga tvāt iti hetum sva pakṣa sidhdi artham anyathā vyācaṣṭe ayam tarhi iti śarīreṣu avayava vyūha bheda darśanāt ca loṣṭa ādiṣu śarīra ārambha kānām aṇūnām pravṛtti bhedaḥ anumīya tetatas ca icchā dveṣau tābhyām caitanyam iti trasam jaṅgamam viśarāru asthiram kṛmi prabhṛtīnām śarīram sthāvaram sthiram śarīram deva manuṣya ādīnām tat hi cirataram vā dhriyate tat etat dūṣayati kumbha ādi mṛd avayavānām iti kumbha ādi ārambhikāṇām mṛdām vyūha bhedāt ārambha darśanāt adarśanāt ca sikatānām ārambha nivṛtya uranaikānta tvam 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.1–3,2.37.2^1	 tat evam bhūta caitanya sādhanam dūṣayitvā tebhyaḥ anyasya caitanye sādhanam āha niyama aniyamau tu tad viśeṣakau tayoḥ icchā dveṣayoḥ niyama aniyamau viśeṣakau ayam eva ca icchā dveṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat bhūta āśraya tvam anayoḥ vyāvartya tad itara āśraya tva vyavasthitiḥ tatra aniyamam tāvat āha jñasya icchā dveṣa nimitte pravṛtti nivṛttī spandāspandau na sva āśraye na icchā dveṣayoḥ āśraye kintarhi prayojye para śvādau= āśraye tatra prayujyamāneṣu eva bhūteṣu pravṛtti nivṛttī syātām na sarveṣu prayojakeṣu api śarara ādiṣu iti sā iyam aniyama upapattiḥ sārvatrika tvam aniyama eti etat uktam bhavati na śarīram icchā jñāna dveṣa ādhāraḥicchā ādi janita spanda ādhāra tvāt para śu ādi vat iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.2^2	 tat evam aniyame bhedakam vyākhyāya niyamam vyācaṣṭe yasya tu cārvākasya darśane jña tvāt bhūtānām icchā dveṣa nimitte ārambha nivṛttī sva āśraye śarīra ādau tasya cārvākasya yathā bhūtānām guru tva ādi guṇa antara nimittā pravṛttiḥ patana ādi lakṣaṇā tasya eva guru tva ādeḥ guṇa antarasya pratibandhaḥ ādhāra dravya saṃyogena tasmāt nivṛttiḥ apatana ādikāḥ sā bhūtamātre bhavantī niyamena vyāptāḥ na tu śarīra upagṛhīteṣu eva bhūteṣu evam bhūtamātre jñāna icchā dveṣa nimitte pravṛtti nivṛttī sva āśraye syātām 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.2^3	 etat uktam bhavati ye ye pṛthivī ādi dharmāḥ te te yāvat pṛthivī ādi bhāvinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā guru tva ādayaḥ jñāna icchā ādayaḥ api ced pṛthivī ādi dharmāḥ taiḥ api avaśyam yāvat pṛthivnaya ādi bhāvibhiḥ bhavitavyam na tu ghaṭa ādau dṛśyante tasmāt na pṛthivī ādi dharmā jñāna ādayaḥ iti atra ca bhāṣya kṛtā sārvatrika tva prasaṅga vivakṣayā niyama śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ asārvatrika tva vivakṣayā tu aniyama śabdaḥ vārttika kṛtā tu prayojyaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam vivakṣitvā prādeśike niyama śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ sārvatrike tṛkta niyama rūpa avadhāraṇa abhāvāt aniyama śabda eti vivakṣā bheda āśrayāt avirodhaḥ iti yaḥ tu niyamam mada śaktyā vyabhicārayet yathā kila kiṇva ādayaḥ pariṇāma viśeṣavantaḥ madirā bhāvam āpannā madayanti evam kāya ākāreṇa pariṇatāni pṛthivī ādīni cetayante na anyathā tena ghaṭa ādiṣu aprasaṅga eti tam pratyāha eka śarīre ca iti yathā madirā avayaveṣu pratyekam eva mada śaktiḥ asti na punar samudāya mātra samavāyinī evam śarīra avayaveṣu api pratyekam eva caitanyena bhavitavyam 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.2^4	 na ca vaiyātyāt kāya samudāya āśrayam eva caitanyam na avayava āśrapayam iti śakyam āsthātum tricatur āvayava= chede api caitanya upalambhāt tasmāt avayavānām pratyekam caitnye śarīra ekasmin bahavaḥ cetanāḥ syuḥ bhavatu kim naḥ bādhyate iti ced na viruddha abhiprāya tvena svatantrāṇām na kiñcid api kāryam jāyeta na ca bahūnām eka abhiprāya niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kākatālīya nyāyena syāt eka abhiprāya tvam na punar asya niyamaḥ dṛṣṭa caraḥ iti prasiddha tvāt dūṣaṇam etat upekṣya pratyaya vyavasthā anumānam na bhavet iti dūṣaṇam uktam 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.2^5	 ekasmin śarīre pratyayānām paraspara pratisandhānam paśyāmaḥ na śarīra antaraḥ iti vyavasthā sā iyam yadi ekasmin śarīre ekaḥ eva cetanaḥ na ca asau śarīra antare tatas bhavet na anyathā iti arthaḥ kvacid pāṭhaḥ pratyaya vyavasthāna anumānam syāt iti sa sugamaḥ eva niyama aniyamau= iti yat uktam tatra anumānam eva sūcayati bhāṣya kāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca anya guṇa nimittaḥ pravṛtti viśeṣaḥ iti hita ahita prāpti parihāra hetuḥ parispandaḥ pravṛtti viśeṣaḥ saḥ ayam prayogaḥ trasa sthāvara śarīreṣu pravṛttiḥ sva āśraya vyatirikta āśraya guṇa nimittā pravṛtti viśeṣa tvāt paraśu ādi gata pravṛtti viśeṣa vat iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.37.2^6	 na kevalam śarīrasya pravṛtti viśeṣaḥ anya guṇa nimittaḥ bhūtānām api tad ārambhakāṇām pravṛtti viśeṣaḥ anya guṇa nibandhanaḥ eva iti āha tad avayava vyūha liṅga eti na indriya arthayoḥ vināśe api jñāna avasthānāt iti ca samānaḥ iti yathā hi indriyā arthayoḥ vināśe api jñāna avasthānāt na indrinaya arthayoḥ guṇaḥ jñānam evam bālya kaumāra yauvana vārddhaka avasthāsu śarīra vināśe api jñāna avasthānāt na śarīra guṇa ujñānam iti arthaḥ api ca jñasya icchā dveṣa nimitta tvāt ārambha nivṛttyoḥ iti atra ārambha nivṛtti śabdena na pravṛtti nivṛttita mātram abhimatam asmākam api tu hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthaḥ spanda viśeṣaḥ tam imam pravṛtti viśeṣam avijñāya tvayā pravṛtti sāmānyena pratyavasthitam iti apratipattiḥ te nigraha sthānam iti āha bhāṣya kāraḥ kriyā mātram iti tad vārtikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe anyathā abhidhānāt ca ayuktam iti śeṣaḥ syāt etat yathā ukta hetu tvāt ityādayaḥ vakṣyamāṇa sūtra gatāḥ hetavaḥ bhūta indriya caitanya pratiṣedhe api samānāḥ iti kasmāt manaḥ mātre caitanyam pratiṣidhyate na bhūta indriyama nasam iti atas āha bhūta indriya manasām iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.38.1–3,2.38.2^1^1	 yathā ukta hetu tvāt pāratantryāt akṛta abhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ yathā ukta hetu tvāt iti vyācaṣṭe icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam iti atas ātma lakṣaṇāt prabhṛti tad lakṣaṇa parīkṣā paryavasānam yāvat uktam tad saṃgṛhyate atra ca hetu śabdena icchā ādi sūtram su saṃgṛhītam bhāva pratyayena hetu tva viṣayā parīkṣā upalakṣitāḥ vārttikam yathā ukta hetu tvāt iti darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha grahaṇāt iti evamādīnām hetūnām ukta hetu tvam tasmāt iti yojanāḥ tat anena bhāṣya gata prabhṛti padārthaḥ vivṛtaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.38.1–3,2.38.2^1^2	 tanu ete yathā uktāḥ hetavaḥ paraiḥ pratiṣiddhā iti atas āha apratiṣedhāt vāc nyātreṇa pratiṣiddhā na vastutas iti arthaḥ dhāraṇa preraṇa vyūhana kriyāsu yathāyogam śarīra indriyāṇi paratantrāṇi bhautika tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti manaḥ ca paratantram karaṇa tvāt vāsi ādi vat iti kasyacid prayatna vaśāt pravartante caitanye punar svatantrāṇi syuḥ tathā ca pāratantrya prasādhaka anumāna virodha eti arthaḥ yaḥ tu kaścid abhyupeta veda prāmāṇyaḥ puruṣam acetanam phala bhāginam abhyupagamya śarīra ādīnām caitanyam rocayate tam prati teṣām acaitanye hetum āha 
NVTṬ_3,2.38.2^2	 akṛta abhyāgamāt ca upadeśa phalam hi kartari kartṛ apa īkṣita upāya ta abhidhāna lakṣaṇa tvāt upadeśasya yathā aha sma atra bhagavān jaiminiḥ śāstra phalam prayoktari tad lakṣaṇa tvāt iti upapāditam ca etat asmārbhividhiḥ vidhāyakaḥ iti atra antare svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti ca kartṛ abhiprāya phala avagamāt atra eva ātma nepada smaraṇāt yaḥ eva karmaṇaḥ kartā saḥ eva tad phalasya bhoktā iti sarvaiḥ āstika patha anusāribhiḥ abhyupeyam śarīra ādīnām caitanye cetanasya svātantryāt taā iva karmaṇaḥ kartāraḥ na ca eteṣām bhasmasāt bhūtānām āmuṣmika phala śālitā sambhava etya ātmanaḥ acetanasya tad bhāgita abhyupagantavyā tathā ca taiḥ śarīra ādibhiḥ karma kṛtam puruṣeṇa bhujyate iti śāstra pratikṣipta akṛta abhyāgama kṛta nāśa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ acaitanye tu śarīra ādīnām deha ādi atiriktasya ca puruṣasya caitanye puruṣaḥ svātantryāt kartā tad prayojya tayā śarīra ādīni tad sādhanāni iti tad sādhanasya sva kṛta karma phala upabhogaḥ iti na śāstra vyākopaḥ na api prekṣāvat pravṛtti virodha eti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.39.1	 atha ayam siddha upasaṃgrahaḥ upasaṃhāraḥ iti arthaḥ upapatti padārtha vyākhyānam apratiṣedhāt iti bhāṣyam kāyasya bhedāt vināśāt iti apratisaṃhitam iti pūrvedyus arddha kṛtānām aparedyus parisamāpanā dṛṣṭā mayā ārabdham mayā eva parisamāpanīyam iti pratisandhāya apratisandhāne tu na parisamāpayeyuḥ parisamāpane vā caitra ārabdham api maitraḥ parisamāpayet yatas svayam ārabdhāt parārabdham avyāvṛttam aviśiṣṭam svasya api para tvāt apariniṣṭham ca karma jātam syāt tathā hi vaiśya stome vaiśyaḥ eva adhikārī na brāhmaṇa rājanyau evam rājasūye rājā eva na brāhmaṇa vaiśyau evam soma sādhanake yāge brāhmaṇaḥ eva adhikṛtaḥ na rājanya vaiśyau śūdrakaḥ ca anadhikṛta eva iti pariniṣṭhā sā buddhi saṃtati mātre na syāt kutas sat lakṣaṇānām sarveṣām eva trailokya vailakṣaṇyena bhedāt anya apoha sāmānyasya ca vyāvartita tvāt iti arthaḥ apratisaṃhita tve hetum āha smaraṇa abhāvāt iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.40.1–3,2.41.1	 tri kāla vyāpinī jñānaśaktiḥ eva jñasvābhāvyam tat ca ākāśa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttam tri kālavyā api svarūpam eva ātmanaḥ smṛti hetūn ām ayaugapadyāt iti etat siṃha avalokita nyāyena pṛcchati anantara sūtram avatārayitum smṛti hetūnām iti tātparya abhidhāna puras saram sūtram avatārayati smṛti kāraṇānām iti p r a ṇ i d h ā n a n i b a n d h ā b h y ā s a l i ṅ g a l a k ṣ a ṇ a s ā d ṛ ś y a p a r i g r a h ā ś r a y ā ś r ita sambandha ānantarya viyoga eka kārya virodha atiśaya prāpti vyavadhāna sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa bhaya ūrthi tva kriyā rāga dharma adharma nimittebhyaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.41.2^1	 bhāṣyam su smūrṣayā manasaḥ dhāraṇam iti teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu prasakta stha manasaḥ tatas nivāraṇam iti athaḥ su smūrṣita liṅga anucintanam vā sākṣāt vā dhāraṇam tad liṅge vā prayatna eti arthaḥ nibandhaḥ khalu iti yathā atra eva pramāṇa dayaḥ arthāḥ eka grantha upāttāḥ anyonya smṛti hetavaḥ ānupūrvyā vā yathā pramāṇa padārtham smṛtvā prameyam smarati itarathāḥ vā yathā nigraha sthānānām pramāṇānām smṛtvā prameyam smarati nibandhasya vyākhyāna antaram āha dhāraṇa iti dhāraṇā śākham jaigīṣavyādi proktam tad kṛtā jñāteṣu eva vastuṣu nāḍī cakra hṛd puṇḍarīka kaṇṭha kūpa nāsā agra tā lulalāṭa brahmarandhra ādiṣu smartavyānām bīja saṃsthāna astra ābharaṇa bhṛtām ca devatānām upavikṣepaḥ samāropaḥ tathā tatra devatāḥ samāropitāḥ tāḥ tad tad avayava grahaṇāt smaryante iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.41.2^2	 abhyāsa janitaḥ saṃskāraḥ ātma guṇaḥ atra abhyāsa śabdena ucyate tena ādara pratyayau= api saṃgṛhītau bhavataḥ tayoḥ api abhyāsa vat saṃskāra ādhāna dvāreṇa eva smṛti hetu tvāt api ca smṛti kāraṇānām na asamāveśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ nena saṃskāreṇa smṛti hetūnām sarveṣām eva praṇidhāna ādīnām samāveśaḥ eva nibandha ādibhiḥ tu yathāyogam samāveśa asamāveśa āvūhanīyau= iti ayatra tā aupalabdham liṅgam punar iti saṃyoginaḥ udāharaṇam dhūmaḥ agneḥ iti samavāyinaḥ udāharaṇam kuḍya ādi vyavahitāyāḥ goravya vahita pratyakṣam viṣāṇam gavā saha asti viṣāṇasya samavāye iti samavāyi viṣāṇam uktam na tu tad gavi samavāyi goḥ eva sva avayave viṣāṇa ādau samavāyāt eka artha samavāyī iti asya eka arthasya samavāyaeka artha samavāyaḥ sa yasya asti saḥ eka artha samavāyi iti arthaḥ tat etat udāharaṇam yathā pāṇiḥ pādasya iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.41.2^3	 ekasya khalu atra avayavinaḥ samavāyaḥ pāde ca pāṇau ca tau pāṇi pādau= eka artha samavāyavantau tatra ekena eka artha samavāyavatā pratyakṣeṇa apratyakṣaḥ ekaḥ smaryate iti yadā tu ekasminnerthe samavāyaḥ iti arthaḥ tadā rūpam sparśasya iti udāharaṇam khābhāvikā vinābhau= a yuktam liṅgam sa aṅketikam tu cihnam iti viśeṣaḥ grāmaṇīḥ nāyakaḥ yadi api sarvatra praṇidhāna ādau sambandhaḥ saṃplavate tathā api praṇidhāna ādi parihāṇyā sambandha antare go balīvarda nyāyena sambandha śabdaḥ vartate na ca sambandha śabdena sarva saṃgrahāt anarthakam itara pada upādānam iti vācyam uktam atra bhāṣya kṛtāḥ anyatra vākya lāghavam na adriyāte sūtrakāraḥ iti śiṣya dhī prasādaḥ ca evam bhavati viśiṣya abhidhānāt iti ānantaryāt iti brāhme hi muhūrte prabodha anantaram utthānam tatas mūtram tatas śaucam tatas sukha prakṣālana danta dhāvana ādīni iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.41.2^4	 viyogāt iti śokam upalakṣayati tatas api śoka viṣayasya smarati eka kāryāt iti yathā saptadaśa avarāṇām ṛddhi kāmānām ekam satram kāryam tatra ekam yajamānam dṛṣṭvā yajamāna antaram smarati atiśāyāt yathā brahmacārī upanayana vidyā vinaya atiśaya utpādakam ācāryam smarati prāpteḥ tu yathā prārthakaḥ yatas anena miṣṭam annam prāptam prāptavyam vā tam abhīkṣṇam smarati icchā snehaḥ sa tu bhrātṛ ā ādiṣu dveṣaḥ pratikūle dāra ādau tābhyām api ca tat viṣayam smarati kriyayā kāryeṇa iti arthaḥ dharmāt pava deva abhyāsa janitena dharmeṇa jātim smarati pūrvikām evam jāta mātrasya sukha ādi sādhana smaraṇam dharma adharmābhyām draṣṭavyam nanūnmāda ādayaḥ api smṛti hetavaḥ loka siddhāḥ tat kim te api na uktā iti atas āha nidarśana mātram ca idam smṛti hetūnām iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.42.1^1	 tat evam siṃha avalokitam samarthya prakṛtā athām eva buddhau vicāram ārabhate anityāyām ca buddhau= iti dravya āśrita tvāt iti ucyamāne api cakṣuḥ ādi gataiḥ rūpa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ atas āha vyāpaka dravya āśrita tvāt iti tathā api ātma tva ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ atas āha jātimat tva īsatī iti tathā api vibhu tvena parimāṇenā na īkāntaḥ atas āha asmad ādi pratyakṣa tve sati iti karma ādi santāna viṣayāḥ buddhayaḥ āśutara vināśinyaḥ atra yadi prakāśaka tvāt iti ucyeta tatas ātmanā anekāntaḥ atas āha karaṇa tve sati iti tathā api manaḥ śrotra ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ atas āha pratyartha iti ekā buddhiḥ eka viṣayāḥ na viṣaya antara viṣayāḥ evam anyāḥ api buddhayaḥ sva viṣaya mātre parva vasitāḥ na manaḥ śrotra ādi tathā nānā viṣaya tvāt tasya iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.42.1^2	 nanu pratyartha niyatattvam avyāpakam yugapad aneka artha sannikarṣe sati nānā viṣayā api ekā buddhiḥ upajāyate atas āha pratikṣaṇa karmaṇaḥ arthasya apūrvasya utpattau satyām tad kāryātāḥ buddheḥ ayuga pad utpattau kāraṇa krama anuvidhānāt kārya kramasya pratyakṣa buddheḥ viṣaya kāraṇa tvāt ekaikaḥ ca asau viṣayaḥ krama utpādavān kāraṇam iti kramavatīnām buddhīnām sarvāsām eva siddham pratyartha eka aniyata tvam niyamaḥ ca tad jātīya karma antara apekhayā na tu dravya apekṣayā tena karma buddheḥ dravya ādi viṣaya tve api prati artha niyama avirodhaḥ pratyartha niyata tva viśeṣaṇa yogāt ca prāk ātmanā anaikāntika tva āśaṅkāyām karaṇa tvam viśeṣaṇam iti prayoga antaram āha atha vā iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.42.1^3	 sukha tva ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tvam mā bhūta daḥ uktam guṇa tva īsati iti rūpa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāra nivṛtti artham uktam abāhya iti avasthita grahaṇe api pratyakṣa nivṛtteḥ dhvaṃsinī iti yadi api śakyam vaktum sparśa ādi buddhiḥ ekā eva tāvantam kālam avasthitāḥ vyavadhāna ādināḥ atha sannikarṣa vināśāt vinaṅkṣyati nimitta kāraṇa vināśaḥ api kārya vināśa hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ apekṣā buddhi vināśāt dvi tva vināśa vat iti tathā api kṣaṇika tve hetu antarāt eva siddhe buddhīnām abhyuccaya mātra tayā etat draṣṭavyam tathā hi kṣaṇa vidhvaṃsi vastu viṣaya buddhi kṣaṇika tva samarthanena eva sthāyi vastu viṣaya buddhi kṣaṇika tva samarthanam api sūcitam sthira gocarāḥ buddhayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ buddhi tvāt karma ādi buddhi vat iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.42.1^4	 buddhiḥ eva smartrī grahītrī ca iti ātma bhāvam buddhau= āropya śaṅktate smṛteḥ avatiṣṭhate iti ced iti nirākaroti na atas eva iti na hi buddhiḥ smartrī yena tad abhāve smṛtiḥ na utpadyeta api tu ātmā sa ca nityaḥ buddhi sadbhāvaḥ tu smṛti virodhi iti arthaḥ atha yadi buddhiḥ na asti kutas tarhi smṛtiḥ utpadyate na hi akāraṇam kāryam bhavati na ca ātma mātram kāraṇam mā bhūt ātmanaḥ nitya tvena smṛti utpādaḥ api nityaḥ tasmāt smṛti utpādaḥ api liṅgam buddhi avasthānaḥ iti atas āha anyatas ca tad bhāvāt iti syāt etat buddhi jaḥ saṃskāraḥ ced smṛti hetuḥ atha yāvat saṃskāram smṛtiḥ syāt atas āha tatas praṇidhāna ādi iti na saṃskāraḥ asti iti etāvatā smṛtiḥ api tu tad prabodhāt prabodhaḥ ca kādācid kaḥ kādācid ka tvāt praṇidhāna ādeḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.43.1–3,2.44.1	 buddhi sthairya vādi āha yadi anavasthāyinī iti dūṣayati na virodhāt iti buddhi mātrasya sthāyi tvam pratijñāya vidyut saṃpāta jātāyāḥ ghaṭa ādi buddheḥ anavasthāyitvā abhidhānam viruddham iti arthaḥ avyakta grahaṇasya anyathā siddha tvam ca āha avyakta grahaṇasya iti dharmi grahaṇa hetoḥ bhedāt avyaktaḥ ca yaḥ dharmi grahaṇe hetuḥ sāmānya mātravantam dharmiṇam gṛhṇāti tad vaśāt avyakta grahaṇam yaḥ tu sāmānya viśeṣavantam tad vaśāt vyakta grahaṇam iti arthaḥ dharmiṇam tu anāśritya sve viṣaye grahaṇānām tad asambhavāt vyakta tvāt iti arthaḥ dharmiṇam anāśritya iti avidvān śaṅkate loka virodhaḥ iti ced iti dharmi grahaṇam āśritya nirākaroti na anyathā iti doṣa antaram āha anaikāntika tvāt ca iti vārtti kavya ākhyānena eva bhāṣya vyākhyā 
NVTṬ_3,2.45–46.1	 śarīra iti pūrvam hi bhūta indriya manasām caitanyam sākṣāt nirākṛtam upakṣepāt tu śarīrasya saṃprati tu śarīrasya eva sākṣāt caitanyam nirasyate iti tātparyabhedāt apunaruktam vastutas tu paunarukti aparihāram bhāṣya kāraḥ prakāra antareṇa prakaraṇa ante vakṣyati tad guṇa tvam tatra upalabdhyā sidhyati abādhitayā iti śeṣaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.47.1–3,2.49.1	 na kāraṇa anucchedāt cetanāyāḥ śarīram asyāḥ kāraṇam tat ca anucchinnam saṃskārasya tu kāraṇasya ucchedaḥ iti draṣṭavyam tat ca na pāka ja guṇa antara utpatteḥ iti na ātyantikaḥ paramāṇau vā piṭhare vā rūpa abhāva eti arthaḥ tat evam ātyantikān ātyantika tvam vaidharmyam utkvā sa pratidvandvi tvāsa pratidvandvi tvam vaidharmya antaram āha itas ca pratidvandvi siddheḥ pāka jānām tat vyabhicāra udbhāvanena caitanyasya yāvat śarīra bhāvitva apratiṣedhaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.50.1–3,2.52.1	 pratyaya vyavasthā prasaṅgāt yathā devadattasya jñānam na yajñadattaḥ pratisaṃdhatte kim tu devadattaḥ eva iti vyavasthā evam ekasmin śarīre avayava antara jñānam avayavinaḥ vā jñānam na pratisaṃdhatte iti arthaḥ dṛṣṭānta sūtram iti na kara caraṇa ādayaḥ cetanāḥ śarīra avayava tvāt keśa nakha ādi vāt iti dṛṣṭānta artham sūtram iti arthaḥ tvac paryanta tvāt iti śarīra avayava tvam keśa nakha ādīnām hetuḥ asiddhaḥ indriya āśraya tvam śarīra lakṣaṇam tat yatra śarīram samavetam tena indriya āśrayeṇa avaśyam bhavitavyam tvac paryantaḥ ca avayava samūhaḥ tathā na tu keśa nakha ādayaḥ tādṛśāḥ iti na śarīra avayavāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.53–55.1–3,2.57.1	 rūpa ādīnām tu itaretara vaidharmyam ananu saṃhitam ca śarīra guṇa tvena ananvitam iti arthaḥ na hi yeṣām cākṣuṣa tvarāsana tva ādi rūpa vaidharmya yogaḥ te na śarīra guṇāḥ iti dṛṣṭam avyāvṛttam ca śarīra guṇānām tādṛśa vaidharmya darśanāt tasmāt aśarīra guṇa tva anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt vaidharmya mātram etat bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣā pratyakṣa śarīra guṇa vaidharmyam mānasa pratyakṣa tvam anvaya vyatireki tu cetanāyāḥ śarīra guṇa tva sādhanam na bhavati api tu tad anya guṇa tva sādhanam iti arthaḥ viśeṣa pratiṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā hetu tvāt iti ye hetavaḥ iti bahuvacanam hetu eka deśa vivakṣayā na śarīra guṇaḥ cetanā ayāvat dravya bhāvi tvāt iti ucyamāne saṃskāreṇa anekāntaḥ iti atas uktam nimitta antara abhāva eti tathā api pāka jena guṇena anekāntaḥ iti atauktam virodhi guṇa adarśane ca iti śarīra vyāpi tvāt iti na sādhanam iti prasaṅgaḥ hi na sādhanam hetobhāvāt yathā āhuḥ asti prasaṅgaḥ na prasaṅga sādhanam iti bāhya karaṇa apratyakṣa tvāt iti na ca guru tva ādibhiḥ anekāntar teṣām khalva pratyakṣa tvam eva na tu bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣa tvam iti bhāvaḥ manaḥ svarūpa parīkṣāyām bhāṣya vārttike nigadena eva vyākhyāte saṃsthāpanam sthānam 
NVTṬ_3,2.58–60.1^1	 manasi vicāryamāṇe kaḥ sambandhaḥ śarīra utpatti nimitta vicārasya iti ataa āha manasaḥ khalu iti manaḥ eva adhikaraṇa vicāreṇa api parīkṣyate iti na asambandhaḥ śarīra utpatti nimitta vicārasya paritas īkṣā parīkṣā sā ca svarūpataḥ ca sambandhitaḥ ca śarīram ca manaḥ sambandhi tad adhikaraṇa tvāt manasaḥ tasmāt manasaḥ eva parīkṣā yā śarīrasya iti arthaḥ utpatti sama kālam iti samam iva samam utpatti anantaram iti arthaḥ kaḥ evam āha na dadāti iti yadi samagram bhavati tatas utpatti anantaram dāsyati evati arthaḥ vipacyamānaḥ karma āśayaḥ iti sva phalam bhojayan= iti arthaḥ yāni vā prāṇi antarāṇi tasya karmaṇaḥ samāna upabhogāni iti tat yathā kiṃnara tva nirvarttanīyam karma strīpuṃsa bhogyam strīpuṃsayoḥ anyatara karma pratibandhe phalam na dadāti iti yāni prāṇi antarāṇi sneha viṣayāḥ bhrātṛ ādayaḥ tasya karmaṇaḥ bhāgīni iti karma phalānām annādya aśva grāma ādīnām bhāgi tvāt karma bhāgīni iti ucyante teṣām prāṇipanām karmabhiḥ abhāgya ādi śabda vācyaiḥ pratibandhāt iti tasya vā karmaṇaḥ sahakāri dharma adharma lakṣaṇam nimittam na asti iti ayam arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.58–60.1^2	 dṛṣṭānām sevā ādi karmaṇām vyabhicārāt grāma ādi lābhe adṛṣṭam kāraṇam kalpanīyam yathā āhuḥ tat ca eva tatra kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti dṛṣṭam sevā ādi ca kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti viṣayiṇā tat viṣayam adṛṣṭam upalakṣayati te ca grāma ādayaḥ tasmāt adṛṣṭāt upajāyamānāḥ antarā vighna nāśāya devatā namaskāra ādi janitam api dharmam apekṣante tasmāt prāra bhavīyena dharmeṇa sva phala nirvarttanāya dharma antaram sahakāri apekṣyate sahakāriṇām ca vaicitryāt pratibandha apagama hetoḥ api sahakāritva avirodhaḥ tena karmaṇaḥ sahakāri nimitta abhāvāt pratibaddham adṛṣṭam phalam na janayati iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.58–60.1^3	 tasya vā karmaṇaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇasya garīyasā karma antareṇa pratibandhāt phalasya anārambhaḥ evam sva karmaṇām sahakāri nimitta abhāva pratibandhau= utkvā samāna upabhoga sattva antara karmaṇām api sahakāri nimitta abhāva pratibandhau darśayati sattva antara karmaṇām ca iti rūpa ādimat tvāt iti ucyamāneparamāṇubhiḥ anekāntar syāt atas āha bāhya karaṇa grāhya tve sati iti indriya grāhya tve satī iti etāvatā eva siddhe indriya grāhya rāśeḥ bāhya karaṇa grāhyam rāśi antaram iti etāvat mātra vivakṣayā bāhya karaṇa grāhya tve sati iti uktam 
NVTṬ_3,2.61–62.1–3,2.63.1	 sikata ādi dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya sama tayā eva puruṣa artha kriyā apasāmarthī a ādityasya hetoḥ anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam api pratyuktam sikata ādīnām api katham cit puruṣa artha hetu tvāt tad sargaḥ puruṣa guṇa pūrva kaiti uktam mā bhūt vā puruṣa guṇa pūrvaka tvam sikata ādi sargasya tathā api śarīrasya utpatti ādi paribhāvayantaḥ sikata ādibhyaḥ vaiṣamyam vīkṣamāṇāḥ tad vilakṣaṇkāra kaṇa tvam eva pratiṣadyāmahe tathā ca sidhyati puruṣa guṇa nimitta tā iti āha viṣamaḥ ca ayam upanyāsaḥ iti nanu mātā pitarau na sākṣāt śarīra utpattau kāraṇam iti atas āha mātā pitṛ śabdena lohita retasī iti anubhavanīye iti bhavya geya ādi pāṭhatkartari kṛtyaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.64.1–3,2.65.2	 itas api vaiṣamyam iti āha tathā āhārasya pūrva sūtra pratīkena pūrayati utpatti nimitta tvāt iti prakṛtam kalalara kaṇḍa māṃsa peśya ādayaḥ lohita retasoḥ śarīra ārambhakayoḥ pariṇāma bhedāḥ prāptau ca aniyamāt dampatyoḥ saṃyogaḥ prāptiḥ tasyām aniyamaḥ śarīra utpādasya tasmāt dṛṣṭasya vyabhicārāt asti tat adṛṣṭam yatas śarīra sargaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.66.1	 pārśva sthaḥ śaṅkate sarva ātmabhiḥ iti nanu yadīyena adṛṣṭena yat śarīram upāttam tat tasya eva bhoga āyatanam na aniyamaḥ iti atas āha na ca puruṣa gataḥ iti ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa jau hi dharma adharmau sannikarṣaḥ ca manasaḥ sarva ātmabhiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti sarveṣām eva dharma adharmau na punar kaspaya cit eva asādhāraṇau= iti arthaḥ asya uttaram śarīra iti uktena eva abhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate tad sthatā eka puruṣa stha tā kutas iti ced uttaramān sva saṃyoga iti punar pṛcchati saṃyoge kṛtaḥ niyamaḥ iti yathā eva ekena ātmanā manaḥ saṃyuktam evam ātma antaraiḥ api evam yathā ekena manasā saṃyuktam evam anontarā epi iti na ātma manaḥ sannikarṣe asti viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram na manaḥ niyama hetu tvāt iti adṛṣṭa nibandhanaḥ hi manaḥ niyamaḥ manaḥ niyama nibandhanaḥ ca adṛṣṭa niyamaḥ anādi tvāt ca bīja aṅkura vat anyonya āśrayaḥ na kṣatim āvahati iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.67.1^1	 tat evam ātma guṇa nibandhane śarīra sarge vyāvasthā darśitāḥ ye tu menire na karma nibandhanaḥ śarīra sargaḥ api tu prakṛti ādi nibandhanaḥ prakṛtayaḥ hi svayam eva dharma adharma rūpa nimitta anapekṣāḥ sattva raja stamaḥ tayā pravṛtti śīlāḥ sva sva vikāram ārabhante pratibandha apagama mātre tu dharma adharmau= apekṣante tat yathā kṛṣa vilaḥ kedārādām pūrṇāt kedāra antaram apūrṇam āpiplāvayiṣu raṣām setu mātram kedāram āplāvayanti evam āplāvayanti prakṛtayaḥ api vikārān iti yathā āhuḥ animittam aprayojakam prakṛtīnām āvaraṇa bhedaḥ tu tatas kṣetrika vat iti tān pratayā āha etena niyamaḥ pratyuktaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.67.1^2	 etena karma sāpekṣāṇām bhūtānām śarīra sarge aniyama abhidhānena tad nirapekṣāṇām vyatireka mukhena aniyamaḥ pratyuktaḥ niyamaḥ vyāptiḥ sādhāraṇa vigrahavat tvam sarva ātmanām aniyamaḥ tu avyāptiḥ kasya cit ātmana kim cit śarīram kasyacid kiṃcid iti prakṛti nibandhane hi śarīra sarge tasyāḥ eka tvāt sarva ātma sādhāraṇyāt ca na śarīrāṇām asti asādhāraṇye hetuḥ bhūta grahaṇam tu prakṛti upalakṣaṇa artham na kevalam akarma nimitte śarīra sarge sādhāraṇa vigrahavat tvam doṣaḥ api tu mokṣaḥ api na syāt iti darśayitum sva pakṣe mokṣam upapādayati upapannaḥ ca iti sāṃkhya pakṣe tu na mokṣaḥ syāt iti darśayati karma nirapekṣeṣu iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.68.1^1	 śaṅkate tat adṛṣṭa kāritam iti ced iti upabhogva śabda ādi a darśanam prakṛti puruṣa bheda adarśanam vā adṛṣṭam ucyate tat kāritam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti etasmin= iti yathā prāc adarśanam evam nirodha samādheḥ paścāt api adarśanam iti apravṛktaḥ api punar saṃsaret iti arthaḥ śaṅkām utthāpya dūṣayati caritārtha cā iti nanu na śabda ādi upabhogam puruṣa artham brūmaḥ yena caritārtha tā syāt api tu puruṣa bheda darśanam tat ca adya api na bhavati iti ārabhate śarīram iti deśayati puruṣa arthena ca hetunā iti caḥ avadhāraṇe puruṣa arthena eva iti arthaḥ pariharati
