NVTṬ_3,2.68.1^2	 tasya ca akaraṇāt iti caḥ tu arthe deśya nivṛttau yad artham śarīrāṇi ārabhate tat na kṛtam anyat tu kṛtamitikim kena saṃgatam iti arthaḥ śaṅkate didṛkṣā viśeṣaḥ iti darśanam hi nañā paryudastam atas tad mūlām didṛkṣām brūte sā ca apavarge na asti tasmāt na apavṛktaḥ saṃsarati iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na prāk iti etat uktam bhavati didṛkṣā hi buddhi āśrayā nāsatyām buddhau= asti prakṛti pariṇāmaḥ ca buddhiḥ tathā ca satyām didṛkṣāyām buddhiḥ buddhau satyām didṛkṣā iti paraspara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ na ca anāditā parihāraḥ sṛṣṭi ādau dvayoḥ abhāvāt 
NVTṬ_3,2.68.1^3	 asmākam tu pralaya samaye dharma adharma saṃskṛtaḥ asti ātmā manaḥ ca iti viśeṣaḥ satkāryam ādāya śaṅkate sarva śaktimat tvāt iti nirākaroti na apavarga abhāva prasaṅgāt iti śliṣṭam vibhajate didṛkṣā vat nānātva darśanam api asti iti na tad artham prakṛte pravṛttiḥ tathā ca na saṃsāraḥ ta pradhvaṃsaḥ ca apavarga abhāvāt na asti iti apavarga abhāva eti arthaḥ etat eva sphuṭayati vidyamāne ca nānātva darśane tad artham pradhānasya prayuktiḥ ayuktā tatas saṃsāra abhāvāt tad pradhvaṃsaḥ apavargaḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ tam eva apavarga abhāvam tad virodhi saṃsāra sattve darśayati 
NVTṬ_3,2.68.1^4–3,2.69.1	 yadā ca nānātva darśanam iti nidāna anucchede nidāninaḥ na ucchedaḥ iti arthaḥ punar vikalpam darśayati ajñānam adarśanam iti ca iti viveka jñāna abhāvasya tulya tvāt iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham iti apare tvā arhatā adṛṣṭam paramāṇu guṇam varṇayanti pārthivānām aṇūnām manasaḥ ca sva guṇa prayuktam tat śarīram āviśati tat ca svakā deva adṛṣṭāt pudgalasya sukha duḥkha upabhogam sādhayati na tu pudgalaspaya dharmaḥ adṛṣṭam iti sāṃkhya vat teṣām api punar tad prasaṅgaḥ apavarge etat upapādayati paramāṇu guṇasya iti api ca asmin darśane prāyaṇam na syāt iti āha manaḥ karma nimittattvāt iti asmad darśane tu upapadyate prāyaṇam iti āha vartamāna śarīra ārambhaka karma āśaya kṣaye tu bhaviṣyat deha antara ārambhaka karma āśaya antarāt apasarpaṇam manasaḥ iti yuktam prāyaṇam ubhaya hetuḥ iti upasarpaṇa apasarpaṇa hetuḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_3,2.70.1–3,2.71.2	 nanu bhavatu saṃyoga anucchedaḥ kim naḥ bādhyata etyataḥ āha śarīrasya nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ ca prāyaṇa anupapatteḥ saṃyoga avyucchedāt iti arthaḥ nanu sat akāraṇam nityam iti katham sa kāraṇa śarīre nityam bhavet iti atas āha iti atva prasaṅgaḥ iti prāyaṇa anupattim brūmaḥ vināśānupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ yādṛcchike akāraṇake prāyaṇa bhedaḥ na syāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca prāyaṇa bhedaḥ kaścid garbhasya eva praiti kaścid jāta mātraḥ kaścid kumārakaḥ ityādiḥ iti akāraṇasya nityam sattvam asat tvam vā syāt gagana vat tat kusuma vat iti arthaḥ akāraṇa tva āditi asya hetoḥ anaikāntika tvena pratyavatiṣṭhate aṇu śyāma tāvat iti 
NVTṬ_3,2.72.1–3,2.72.2	 nirākaroti etat ca na iti pramāṇena aviṣayīkṛtam akṛtam pratyuta pratyakṣa āgama viruddham iti yāvat tasya abhyāgapraḥ abhyupagamaḥ tad prasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ na ca paramāṇu śyāma tāpya kāraṇā pārthiva rūpa tvāt lohita ādi rūpa vat iti anumānena tasya api pākaja tvā abhyupagamāt iti bhāvaḥ yathā śruti vā sūtra arthaḥ akṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phala upabhoga prasaṅgāt iti yathā khalu paramāṇu guṇaḥ eva nityaḥ śarīra ādi ārambhakaḥ tathā asau nitya tvāt na kena cit kriyate tasya akṛtasya eva phalam puruṣaiḥ upabhujyate tatas ca ayam āstikānām vihita niṣiddha pravṛtti nivṛtti nicayaḥ anarthakaḥ śāstra praṇayanam ca api anarthakam bhavet iti bhāvaḥ etat ca ati vistṛtam bhāṣye tasya arthaḥ nigada vyākhyātaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.1.1–4,1.1.2	 atha manaḥ parīkṣā anantaram uddeśa lakṣaṇa krama anurodhena pravṛttiḥ parīkṣitum yuktāḥ sā kasmāt na parīkṣyate iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇāya sūtram iti āha manasaḥ anantaram iti pravṛttiḥ yathā uktā asya śeṣaḥ tathā parīkṣitā yathā lakṣitā tathā parīkṣitā iti arthaḥ pṛcchati kim punar iti prameyam ātma ādi manontam parīkṣitam na punar pravṛtteḥ svarūpam vā kāryam vā parīkṣitām iti bhāvaḥ uttaram yāvat dharma adharma āśrayam iti eka dravyā iti ekasmin= eva ātmani varttataityarthaḥ avasthitā na tu buddhi ādi vat a aśutara vināśinī iti arthaḥ ātma samavāyāt iti kāryatve sati iti draṣṭavyam viśeṣaṇam tena na sāmānya viśeṣābhyām vyabhicāraḥ prāyaṇa ādi iti ādi śabdena sukha ādi kṣayaḥ apavargaḥ ca gṛhyate saṃsāra apavarga hetu bhūta ātma sadbhāva asadbhāvābhyām iti śeṣaḥ evamādi uktam iti ādi grahaṇena ātma samavetā pravṛttiḥ na tu pṛthivī ādi āśraya iti darśayati 
NVTṬ_4,1.2.1–4,1.2.2^1	 pravṛtteḥ anantarāḥ tarhi doṣāḥ parīkṣyantām iti atas āha tathā doṣāḥ uktāḥ iti śeṣaḥ pravṛtti tulya tayā pravṛti parīkṣayā eva tāvat doṣāṇām sattvam parīkṣitam iti arthaḥ kārya rūpa pravṛtti tulya tām āha buddhi samāna āśraya tvāt iti abhīṣṭa viṣaya anucintana prabhavāḥ khalu ime doṣāḥ na anucintana buddhi vyadhikaraṇāḥ bhavitum arhanti tathā sati caitrasya abhīṣṭa viṣaya anucintane maitrasya rāgaḥ pravartteta tasmāt buddhi samāna āśraya tvāt ātma guṇāḥ ātma guṇa tvāt ca kārya pravṛtti tulya tayā pravṛtti parīkṣayā eva ttāvat doṣāḥ parīkṣitāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.2.1–4,1.2.2^2	 idam ca pravṛtti tulya tvam aparam doṣāṇām iti āha saṃsārasya anādi tvāt iti etat ca uktam vīta rāga janma adarśanāt iti anena tathā uddeśa parīkṣā apareṇa dvitīya sūtreṇa yat teṣām doṣāṇām parīkṣitam tat āha samyak jñānā cca iti syāt etat guṇa tvesati ātma guṇāḥ iti siddhyati tat eva tu kutas iti atas āha kāryatva īsatī iti indriya antaram manaḥ iti mānasa pratyakṣaiḥ ca ātma tva sukha tva ādibhiḥ anaikānti tvam mā bhūt atas uktam kāryatve sati iti viśeṣaṇam acākṣuṣa pratyakṣa tvāt iti atra api kāryatve satī iti viśeṣaṇam anuṣañjanīyam 
NVTṬ_4,1.3–4.1^1	 tat evam bahu parīkṣitam doṣāṇām yat tu kim cit doṣāṇām aparīkṣitam asti tat parīkṣitum upakramate prarvatanā lakṣaṇāḥ iti uktam tathā ca mānādayaiti rāga dveṣa mohāḥ eva doṣāḥ na ca māna ādayaḥ teṣu antarbhavanti buddhi vyapadeśa bhedāt pravarttanā lakṣaṇa tvam tu teṣām api asti tasmāt ati vyāpaka tvāt na lakṣaṇam etat yuktam yukta tve vā lakṣaṇa sūtre māna ādayaḥ api doṣavat paṭhanīyāḥ iti pūrva pakṣaḥ siddhāntavādyāha na upasaṃkhyāyante saṃgṛhīta tvāt iti rāga dveṣa mohānām sāmānya trayāṇām kāma ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ tathā ca upapannaḥ buddhi vyapadeśa bhedaḥ saṅgrahaḥ ca iti bhāvaḥ asvavastu ādāna icchā svāmi dāna pūrvikā spṛhā 
NVTṬ_4,1.3–4.1^2	 punarbhava prārthanā tṛṣṇā hetu bhūtā pravṛtti dvāreṇa punarbhava pratisaṃdhānasya iti pramāṇa viruddhā iti anyāyena iti arthaḥ parasya jñāteḥ mama api etat iti buddhiḥ abhiniveśaḥ tad pratiṣedha abhiprāpayaḥ jñāni piśācasya īrṣyā iti ucyate amarṣa lakṣaṇaḥ dveṣaḥ iti nanu kṛta apakārasya yā asahiṣṇu tā saḥ amarṣaḥ iti dveṣasya eva viśeṣaḥ iti uktam katham dveṣa sāmānyam ucyataityataḥ āha asahiṣṇu tā duḥkhasya duḥkha sādhanānām ca iti mithyāpratipatti lakṣaṇaḥ mohaḥ iti saṃśayopi hi yathābasthite padārthe ayathā bhāva pratipatti bhavati vyavasthitam hi vastu avayava sthita tayā gṛhṇāti saṃśayaḥ evam paṇḍita māninaḥ mīmāṃsaka durdurūḍhasya abhimānaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.5.1–4,1.6.1	 eki yonayaḥ hi rūpa ādayaḥ na ca eṣām eka tvam yadi punar tatra rūpa ādīnām paraspara bheda siddhaye kaścid kāraṇa bhedaḥ āsthīyate sa rāga ādiṣu api samānaḥ iti bhāvaḥ ārya prajñā iti bhāṣyam ārāt tattvāt yātāḥ āryā āryā ca asauprajñā ca iti ārya prajñā samyak bodhaḥ sambodhaḥ na asati nidāna ucchede nidāninām ucchedaḥ iti rāga dveṣayoḥ nidāninoḥ ucchedāya tad nidāna tvam mohasya darśayati sati ca artha antara tva eti teṣām mohaḥ pāpīyān kutas na amūḍhasya itara utpatteḥ amūḍhasya itara utpattiḥ na bhavati yatas iti atra arthe na amūḍhasya itara utpatteḥ iti uktam mohāt viṣayasya sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ duḥkha sādhana tā anusmṛtiḥ ca saṅkalpaḥ rañjanīyāḥ kopanīyāḥ iti kartari kṛtyaḥ bhavya geya ādi pāṭhāt vārtikam mūḍhomuhyati iti mūḍhaḥ iti moha vāsanāvān bhavatu nidāna ucchedāt ucchedaḥ nidāninaḥ nidānasya kutas ucchedaḥ iti atas āha tatu a jñānāt ca iti pratipakṣa abhyāsāt nidāna uccheda etyarthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.7–8.1–4,1.10.1	 na doṣa lakṣaṇa avarodhāt iti tathā abhāvaḥ tad jītāya tvam atathā bhāvaḥ atat jātīya tvam anaikāntika tvam āha nimitta naimittika upapatteḥ ca iti utpāda ucchedau pretyabhāvaḥ na ca ātmanaḥ nityasya tau staḥ tasmāt asmin darśane na yuktaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ vaināśikānām tu sattva utpāda nirodhābhyām yuktaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ pretya iti lyab mukham vyādāya sva piti iti vat draṣṭavyaḥ tathā ca bhūtvā prāyaṇam iti bhavana prāyaṇayoḥ samāna kartṛka tvam api upapannam iti pūrva pakṣaḥ pūrva abhyasta sūtre ātma nitya tva vyavasthāpanāt sattva utpāda ucchede ca kṛta hāna akṛta abhyāgama doṣeṇa abhyudaya niḥśreyasa artham apravṛttiḥṛṣi upadeśa anarthakya prasaṅgaḥ ca sva deha indriya buddhi saṃvedanā sambandha utpāda vipa nāśau nityasya ātmanaḥ janma prāyaṇe tathā ca upapannaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.11–13.1	 pretyabhāva vicāra prastāvena idam aparam vicārayati yā iyam pretayotpattiḥ nāma sā katham iti ced atra hi prāvādukānām nānāvidhāḥ vipratipattayaḥ santi tatra abhimatam tāvat pakṣam gṛhṇāti vyaktāt iti agre vipratipattīḥ nivārayiṣyati śarīra indriya viṣaya upakaraṇa ādhāram iti eka vat bhāvena napuṃsaka tvam pratyakṣa gṛhīta sambandha prabhavam anumānam pratyakṣepi upadiśati pratayakṣa mūlaka tvāt iti nanu bhavatu śarīram pṛthivī ādi ca vyaktam mahattva aneka dravyavat tva rūpa viśeṣebhyaḥ tad mūla kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ katham vyaktāt iti atas āha tad sāmānyāt iti rūpa ādimad sāmagrī pūrvakam gavā ādi śarīram iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.14.1–4,1.15.1	 atas param prāvādukānām tairthikānām ca darśanāni upanyastāni kāni cit pratiṣidhyante tatra kāni cit abhyanujñāyanta iti tatra tāvat eke prāhuḥ abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ kutas na ananupamṛdya prādurbhāvaḥ yatas tasmāt iti arthaḥ viśyam hi śūnyatāyāḥ eva jāyate evam kila śrūyate asat eveda sagre āsīt iti atas eva adya api asataā iva janma dṛśyate na sataḥ tat kasya hetoḥ abhāvaḥ tasyāḥ kāraṇam iti upalakṣaṇam ca idam na anupamṛdya prādurbhāvāt itidvaasataḥ utpāda abhiti api draṣṭavyam tasmāt asat upādānam viśvam iti siddham tatra siddhāntīpa gūḍha abhisandhiḥ āha upamṛdya prādurbhavati iti vyāghātaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.16.1^1	 tad abhisandhim avidvān pūrva pakṣī dūṣayati na atīta anāgatayoḥ kāraka śabda prayogāt iti upamṛdya prādurbhavati iti bhāktaḥ eṣa prayogaḥ na mukhyaḥ iti arthaḥ bhinnasya kumbhasya kapālāni iti tu yadi api na sākṣātkāraka śabdaḥ tathā api ṣaṣṭhyā sambandha abhidhānāt tasya kriyām arbha tvāt kriyāyāḥ ca kārakanā antarīyaka tvāt pāramparyeṇa kāraka śabda tā draṣṭavyā pṛcchati kaḥ punar aṅkureṇa bīja upamarda arthaḥ kā punar bhaktiḥ yayā yogāt upasaṃgṛhṇāti bījam aṅkuraḥ iti bhavati prayogaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram anantara utpatti arthaḥ upamardya īpamardayoḥ api ānantaryam anayoḥ api iti etat sāmānyam iti arthaḥ punar api gūḍha abhisandhiḥ eva siddhāntī uktam smārayati atra uktam iti abhiprāyam udghāṭayati yat api idam ucyate iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.16.1^2	 na aupacārikam prayogam vyāsedhāmaḥ kāraka śabdānām kintu yathā bhaviṣyan= aṅkuraḥ samprati asat na bījam upamṛd gāti evam bīja abhāvaḥ asanna aṅkuram karoti iti brūmaḥ tat idam āha api tu asataḥ kāraṇāt utpattiḥ na yuktā iti nanu uktam upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt iti anena ānantaryam bīja vināśa aṅkura utpādayoḥ sūcitam bīja vināśa anantaryāt ca aṅkura utpādasya bīja vināśa kārya tvam iti atas āha yat punar etat ānantarya sāmarthyāt iti ananya prayuktam ānantaryam kārya kāraṇa bhāva sādhanam idantu vyūha ānantarya prayuktam iti na abhāvasya kāraṇa tvam gamayitum arhati iti arthaḥ yadi vyūha antara kāryaḥ aṅkuraḥ atha kasmāt avinaṣṭe pūrva vyūhe na bhavati iti atas āha na ca avinaṣṭe iti nanu yadi bīja avayava vyūha antaram aṅkura utpāda hetuḥ na bījam kasmāt aṅkura arthinaḥ kṛṣīvalā bījam upādadata eti ataa āha evam ca iti bīja avayava upādāne avarjanīya tayā bījam āgacchat aśakya pratyākhyānam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.17.1	 tat evam artham pariśodhya atra eva arthe sūtram yojayati asya ca arthasya iti na vinaṣṭebhyaḥ bījebhyaḥ aṅkurasya aniṣpatteḥ bīja vināśaḥ ced aṅkura utpāda hetuḥ atha vinaṣṭe bīje tad avayaveṣu paraspara vicchinneṣu asati teṣām vyūha antare kasmāt aṅkuraḥ na bhavati bhavati tu sati teṣām vyūhe tasmāt vinaṣṭebhyaḥ aṅkura anutpatteḥ asati vyūhe na bīja nāśaḥ kāraṇam iti sūtra arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.18.1^1	 krama nirddeśāt iti asya hetoḥ asmad pakṣe api apratiṣedhaḥ tatra api ānantaryasya tulya tvāt tathā api vinigamanāyām kaḥ hetuḥ iti atas āha abhāvaḥ ced aṅkura utpāda kāraṇam syāt anupākhyeyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ na hi ananvaya vinaṣṭayoḥ śāli yava bījayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ asti yena ekasmāt śālī aṅkuraḥ na anyasmāt iti kaḥ nu khalvabhāvānām asti ājānataḥ bhedaḥ iti api ca kāraṇānām śakti bhedāt kāryāṇi bhinna śakti yuktāni yadā tu kāraṇānām abhedaḥ tadā kutas ta= chektīnām bhedaḥ tathā ca kāryāṇi bhinna śaktīni na syuḥ iti āha ananvitam ca kāryam sarvābhiḥ iti yat api asataḥ utpādāt abhāvasya upādāna tvam tat api kāryāṇām bhinna tvena bhinna śaktika tvena ca prayuktam 
NVTṬ_4,1.18.1^2	 tad prāc abhāvānām svābhāvika bheda virahāt api ca prāc abhāvānām anādi tvena kārya utpādasya api anādi tva prasaṅgaḥ bhāva rūpa kāraṇa sahakāri tvam tu abhāvasya na niṣidhyate asmad abhimatasya upākhyeyasya ataeva pākaja ādīnāṃrūpa ādīnām pūrvarūpa ādi dhvaṃsa nimitta tvam api upeyate śrutiḥ tu pūrva pakṣa abhiprāyāḥ tathā ca siddhānta śruti antaram sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti katham asataḥ sat jāyeta iti śūnyatā vivartaḥ viśva prapañca eti tu darśanam asat khyāti a nirvacanīya khyāti nirākaraṇena apākṛtam api ca śūnya tve khyātuḥ abhāvāt khyātarebhāvaḥ tasmāt na śūnyatā upādānaḥ tad vivartaḥ vā viśva prapañcaḥ iti siddham 
NVTṬ_4,1.19.1^1	 atha aparaḥ āha īśvaraḥ kāraṇam puruṣa karma aphalya darśanāt mā mūdayam nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ śūnyatā upādānaḥ api tu brahma upādānaḥ bhaviṣyati brahma evahi prapañca rūpeṇa pariṇamate mṛttikā iva ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādi bhāvena na ca evam nitya tva vyāghātaḥ pariṇāme api tattva avighātāt tad lakṣaṇa tvāt ca nityatāyāḥ yat āha ayasmin= tattvam na vihanyate tat api nitya am iti ekam darśanam aparam ca brahma eva anirvacanīyānādi a vidyā upadhānāt nāma rūpa prapañca bhedena vivarttate sukham iva ekam aneka maṇi kṛpāṇa ādi bhedāt na ekavidha pratibimba bhedena iti tat etat darśana dvayam anena sūcitam 
NVTṬ_4,1.19.1^2	 īśvaraḥ brahma īśana ayogāt cetanā śaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ ca īśanā sā ca asti brahmaṇi iti brahma śvaraḥ kāraṇam jagataḥ śrūyate hi tadā aikṣata bahusyām prajāyeya ityādi sā ca iyam śrutiḥ cetanasya jagat kāraṇa tām āha na ca abhāvaḥ vā pradhānam vā paramāṇavaḥ vā cetayante nanu jīvāḥ eva cetanāḥ tad karma nimittaḥ nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ bhaviṣyati kṛtam atra bhagavatā īśvareṇa iti atas uktam puruṣa karmā phaldarśanāt iti puruṣaḥ ced cetayena evam niṣphalam karma ārabheda niṣphalam vidvān pravarttamānaḥ katham cetanaḥ nāmadva tasmāt purūṣa karma aphalya darśanāt īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.20.1–4,1.20.2^1	 tat etat darśana dvayam apākaroti na puruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ ida mātra ākūtam na tāvat mṛttikā iva nāma rūpa prapañca rūpeṇa brahma pariṇamate tat hi sarva ātmanā vā pariṇamate eka deśena vā tatra sarva ātmanā pariṇāme tattva vighātāt anitya tvam ekedeśena pariṇāme sāvayava tvāt tat eva anitya tvam atha tatvena anugatasya pariṇāmaḥ tat ca brahma na tarhi brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ na ca nirbhāgasya ekasya sva samvedana pratyakṣasya viparīta jñāna gocara tva sambhavaḥ sāmānyatas grahe rūpa viśeṣa agrahe ca tad anya rūpa āropeṇa vibhramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śuktikā ādau na tu jātu śukti rūpam vidvāna rajatam iti viparyasyati 
NVTṬ_4,1.20.2^2	 na ca niraṃśe sva saṃvedana pratyakṣe brahmaṇi tad svarūpa āgrahaḥ sāmānya grahaḥ vā bhavati tasmāt īśvaraḥ jagat bhedena vivartataitya yuktam nimittam tu syāt īśvaraḥ jagataḥ sa ced anapekṣaḥ eva jagatkāraṇam iti ucyate tatra idam upatiṣṭhate napuruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ iti asya vyatirekam āha vārtikakāraḥ īśvaraḥ ced kāraṇam bhavet iti eka rūrpam kāryam syāt iti āha īśvarasya iti karmaṇi īśvaraḥ anīśvaraḥ syāt tathā ca tad kāraṇāni na īśvareṇa prayujyanta eti anekāntaḥ vakṣyamāṇaḥ hetuḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.1–4,1.21.2^1	 tat evam īśvara upādānattvam ca brahma vivarta tvam ca nirapekṣa īśvara nimitta tvam ca nirākṛtpaya abhimatam pakṣam gṛhṇāti tad kārita tvāt ahetuḥ paramāṇu upādānasya jagataḥ puruṣa karma apekṣaīśvaraḥ nimitta kāraṇam yat ca tena apekṣaṇīyam puruṣa karma tat api īśvara nimittakam eva na ca yat apekṣyate tasya animita tvam iti upadiṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt īśvara kārita tvāt puruṣakārasya tad sahāya īśvaraḥ nimitta kāraṇam jagata iti asya pakṣasya nirākaraṇe puruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ iti ahetuḥ nirapekṣa īśvara nimitta kattva nirākaraṇe hetuḥ eva iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam guṇa viśiṣṭam ātma antaram iti guṇān īśvarasya jñāna ādīn upapādayiṣyati vārttikakāraḥ ātma kalpa āditi atra ātma prakārāt ātmajātīyāt iti yāvat saṃsāra vadbhyaḥ ātmabhyaḥ viśeṣam āha adharma iti nanu asya karma anuṣṭhāna abhāvāt kutas dharmaḥ tathā ca aṇima ādikam aiśvaryam kārya rūpam vinā eva karmaṇā iti akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅga etyataḥ āha 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^2	 saṃkalpa anuvidhāyī ca asya dharma eti pravarttayatu kim etāvatā iti atas āha evam ca sva kṛta abhyāgamasya ālopena iti mā bhūt bāhya anuṣṭhānam saṃkalpa lakṣaṇa anuṣṭhāna janita dharma phalam asya aiśvaryam jagat nirmāṇa phalam iti na akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅga eti arthaḥ syāt etat prayojanam vinā na prekṣāvatām pravṛttiḥ na ca prāpta sakala prāptavyasya asti prāpaṇīyam kim cit īśvarasya tasmāt kṛtam asya jagat nirmāṇena iti ataa āha āpta kalpaḥ ca iti mā abhūt asya bhagavataḥ sva arthaḥ para anugraha artham jagat nirmāṇe pravartsyati iti arthaḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha ayam yathā pituḥ apatyānām ayam pitā svāpatyānām yathā pitā iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^3	 dārṣṭa antike yojayati tathā pitṛ bhūtaḥ īśvaraḥ iti nanu ātma antarāṇi anittya jñāna yogīni dṛṣṭāni tad vailakṣaṇyāt īśvara ūna ātma jātīyaḥ bhavitum arhati iti atas āha na ca ātma kalpāt iti yadi api ātma antarāṇi anitya jñāna yogīni ayam ca nitya jñāna ādi yuktaḥ tathā api ātma jātīyaḥ eva budvyādi guṇa yogi tvāt anyathā toya ādi paramāṇūnām atoya tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ nitya rūpa ādi yogāt karaka ādi gatānām rūpa ādīnām anitya tva upalabdheḥ iti yadi ca ayam buddhi ādi guṇaiḥ na upākhyāyena pramāṇa abhāva anupapannaḥ eva syāt iti āha buddhi ādibhiḥ ca iti syāt etat yadi kāruṇyāt īśvaraḥ jagat nirmāṇe pravarttate hanta bhoḥ sukhinam eva sṛjet na tu duḥkhinam 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^4	 na ca kṣetrajña gata dharma adhamra sahakāri tayā nirmāṇa vaicitryam vācyam dharmasya tad anadhiṣṭhitasya sva kārya akaraṇena kāruṇikena tad adhiṣṭānā yogāt tasmāt sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedena jagat vaicitrya darśanāt na anukampā prayuktaḥ īśvaraḥ karoti iti atas āha sva kṛta abhyāgamālopena pravartamānasya iti ayam abhisandhiḥ kāruṇikaḥ api ayam ātma antara atiśāyita mahimā api na vastūnām sāmarthyam anyathā kartum pārayati tasmāt adharmeṇa utpattimatā na īśvara prabhāvāt api nityena bhavitum yuktam na ca sva phala virodhinā phalam apradāya vinaṃṣṭum api śakyam atas kṣetrajñānām niyatim alaṅghayatā īśvareṇa na adharmaḥ śakyaḥ anadhiṣṭhātum tasmāt kāruṇikaḥ api ayam vastu svabhāvam anuvidhīyamānaḥ dharma adharma sahakārī jagat vaicitryam vidhatte tat idam uktam sva kṛta abhyāgamālopena pravarttamānasya iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^5	 puruṣaiḥ yat karma kṛtam tad phala abhyāgamālaḥ pena pravarttamānasya iti arthaḥ vārtikaḥ īśvara prakriyā iti prakriyā prakaraṇam īśvara nimitta tva vicāra eti arthaḥ atha vidyamānaḥ pratibandhāt na pravarttayati iti sukhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravartayitavye adharmaḥ puruṣa arthasya pratibandhakaḥ evam duḥkhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravarttayitavye adharmaḥ puruṣa arthasya pratibandhakaḥ evam duḥkhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravartayitavye dharmaḥ iti arthaḥ na ca ayam hetuḥ tasmāt nivarttate iti ayam eva acetana tva lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ kṣīrān na nivarttate iti arthaḥ parispandaḥ kriyā sā mūrti anuvidhāyinī na amūrte sarva gataḥ īśvare saṃbhavinī iti manvānaḥ śaṅkate 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^6	 kriyānāveśāt akāraṇam iti ced iti aparispandāḥ api jñāna cikīrṣā prayatnāḥ ākhyāta pada vācya tayā bhavanti kriyā īśvara eti abhisaṃdhinā parihāraḥ na vikalpa anupapatteḥ yadā ca yugapad anekāni dravyāṇi saṃhanyate tadā sādhāraṇa kārya vyāvṛttebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ iti asādhāraṇam kāryam ekaikasya tantu dvaya saṃyogasya dvi tantukam tasmāt vyāvṛttebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ saha sādhāraṇasya eva kāryasya paṭa lakṣaṇasya utpādāt iti arthaḥ na kevalam utpanna kriyeṣu kriyā uparata audravya utpādaḥ kva cit anutpanna kriyeṣu api dravyeṣu avasthita saṃyogebhyaḥ pūrva dravya uparatau dravya antara utpādaḥ iti āha eka avayava vibhāge tu iti tuśabdena pūrvasmāt utpanna uparata kriyā viśeṣaḥ darśitaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^7	 kim akriyāvatām eva ārambhaḥ na iti āha kāni cit punar iti anyatara karma jān nodanāt saṃyogāt nivṛtte karmaṇi itarasmin dravye karma nirvṛtti sama kālam eva dravyam ca utpadyate iti tat svābhāvyāt pravartta taitya duṣṭam iti cetanaḥ api ayam para anugraha svabhāvaḥ api vastu svabhāvam anurudhyamānaḥ karma āśaya anurodhena jagat vaicitryam vidhatte na ca avaśyam duṣkṛte puṃsām pravṛttim vihanti iti arthaḥ adya tve api cetanānām vicitra svabhāva tvam dṛṣṭram sat asat madhyamānām janānām atha nityam aiśvaryam dharma vaiyarthyam na tad dharmāt bhavati iti tatas ca īśvarasya aiśvaryam sva kṛta karma phalam veditavyam iti ayuktam bhāṣyam irtim bhāvaḥ pariharati nityam iti brūmaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^8	 tasya hi jñāna kriyā śaktī nitye iti aiśvaryam nityam aṇima ādikam tu anityam tat abhiprāyam ca bhāṣya kārasya dharma phala tva abhidhānam pratyātma vṛtti dharma adharma sannicaya adhiṣṭhānam dhṛti ātma vṛtti saṃkalpa anuvidhāyinaḥ īśvarasya dharmasya prayojanam iti abhyupetya īśvara dharmam etat uktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ paramārthataḥ tu na īśvarasya dharma sadbhāve pramāṇam asti nityābhyām eva jñāna kriyā śaktibhyām sakala kārya utpāda siddheḥ iti āśayavān āha na ca īśvare dharmaḥ asti iti buddhimat tvāt tarhi atma antaram iti ātma antaram śarīryantaram abhipretam iti sa ca śarīra saṃbandhaḥ varttamānaḥ keṣām cit yathā saṃsāriṇām keṣām cit atītaḥ yathā muktānām śuka prahlāda ādīnām 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^9	 tat anena īśvareṇa buddhimatā satā avaśyam bhāvyam śarīriṇā iti deśya arthaḥ na ātma antaram śarīryantaram iti arthaḥ kutas guṇa bhedāt nityāḥ ca id asya buddhi ādayaḥ kṛtam śarīra grahaṇena tad utpāda arthena iti bhāvaḥ nanu idam eva buddhimat kāraṇa adhiṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ pravarttante iti pakṣa dharma tā balāt tarka sahāyāt nitya buddhimat tvam asya siddhi ati iti arthaḥ pratyartha niyama asaṃbhavāt ityādinā tarkaḥ pramāṇa sahāyaḥ darśitaḥ evam tāvat guṇa bhedena aśarīri tvam īśvarasya darśitam na ca etasya śarīra yogaḥ vikalpam api sahataiti āha atha buddhimat tayā iti atīta anāgata varttamāna viṣayā pratyakṣā iti sākṣātkāravatī iti arthaḥ na punar akṣam āśritā nitya tvāt upalakṣaṇam ca etat na anumānikī ca iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^10	 na aindriyakī na aupamānikī iti api draṣṭavyam akliṣṭa iti kleśaḥ avidyā tad adūṣitā iti arthaḥ mūrttimat dravya sambandhi tvāt iti saṃyogi tvāt iti arthaḥ tathā ca na rūpa ādibhiḥ vyā abhicāraḥ tathā ca na rūpa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ etāvat abhipretam ācāryasya trayaḥ hi khalu bhāvāḥ jagati bhavanti prasiddha cetana kartṛkāḥyathā prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura toraṇa ādayaḥ prasiddha tad viparyayāḥ yathā paramāṇu ākāśa ādayaḥ sandigdha cetana karttṛkā yathā tanu giri mahīdhara ādayaḥ tatra prameya tvāt vādi vipratipatteḥ vā sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvecetana karttṛ tve saṃśayaḥ na ca pratyakṣa anupalabdhi mātram atra bādhakam bhavitum arhati svabhāva viprakarṣiṇām satām api pratyakṣa anupalabdheḥ paramāṇu ādīnām 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^11	 tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ tanu taru mahīdhara ādayaupādāna abhijña kartṛkā utpattimatvāt acetana upādāna tvāt vā yudutpatti mat a cetanā upādānakam vā tat sarvam upādāna abhijña pūrvakam yathā prāsāda ādi tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ tanu taru mahīdhara ādayaḥ tasmāt tathā iti na ca eṣām utpattimat tvam asiddham sāvayava tvena vā mahat tve sati kriyāvat tvena vā vastra ādi vat tad siddheḥ na ca etāvatā vaināśikānām karmaṇā cetanena mīmāṃsakānām kṣetrajñena cetanena cetana karttṛ tva siddheḥ pṛthivī ādīnām siddha sādhanam caitanye api teṣām upādāna anabhijña tvāt tad jña tve vā saḥ eva asmākam īśvaraḥ īdṛśam astu siddha sādhanam kaḥ he kleśam vinā na vāñchita siddhim icchet na ca sādhya hīnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^12	 paṭa ādīnām api upādāna abhijña kuvinda ādi karttṛka tvāt atas eva na viruddha tā hetoḥ evam hi sā bhavet yadi upādāna abhijñarttṛkāḥ paṭa ādayaḥ bhaveyuḥna ca etat pareṣām api sammatam syāt etad artha ākṣiptasya viśeṣasya śarīra ādimattva ādeḥ pramāṇa virodhāt viruddha tā yathā tṛṇa ādi vikāra kāri tvāt agni mat himam iti atra vahnima tva ākṣipta tṛṇa ādi vikāra upayukta vahni gata udbhūta uṣṇa sparśa viruddha śīta sparśasya pratayakṣeṇa upalambhāt bādhitaḥ viruddhaḥ hetuḥ tathā hi asya kṣiti ādi upādāna ādi viṣayam jñānam ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa śarīra ādi kāraṇakam na asati tasmin bhavati iti tat anena ākṣiptam tat ca atra pramāṇa bādhitam tad nivṛttau ca jñānam asya nirvatteta uṣṇa tva udbhūti nivṛttau= iva dāhakaḥ vahniḥ avaśyāyaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^13	 na avyāpaka nivṛttau= avyāpya nivṛttora yogāt kāraṇam ced avyāpakam kāryasya hanta hatā tarhi vyāpya vyāpaka saṃkathā bhavet etat yadi kṣiti ādi upādāna jñānam api asya kāryam syāt nityam tu tad abhyupeyate iti na śarīra ādi nivṛttau= api nivarttitum arhati avyāpaka nivṛtteḥ avyāpyasya anivṛtteḥ iti anyathā na aśvavān maitraḥ iti gomān api na syāt na ca buddhi ādīnām anityānām bahulam upalabdheḥ nityā buddhiḥ asambhāvinī iti sāṃpratam na hi pratyakṣāḥ pāthasīyāḥ himakaraka ādayaḥ tad gatāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ anityāḥ iti tad ārambhakaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ tad gataiḥ vā rūpa ādibhiḥ tathā bhavitavyam sat akāraṇa tayā tu nityatobhayatra api tulyā na ca śarīra ādi sahabhāvena jñānasya tatra tatra upalambhāt śarīra ādīnām jñānam vyāpyam iti yuktam 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^14	 svābhāvika sambandha śālitā hi vyāpya tā sā ca upādhi virahe bhavati asti ca śarīra ādi sahabhāve jñānasya upādhiḥ kāryatvam kāryam jñānam sva kāraṇam śarīra ādinā ativarttate nityam tu tat ativarttamānam api sāhitya upalambham na viruṇaddhi tasmāt yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpattimatvāt ghaṭa vat iti prayukte kaścid sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryāt pratyavatiṣṭheta yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt utpattimat tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ hanta tasmāt eva rūpa ādimatā tena bhāvyam na ced ayam ghaṭa sādharmyeṇa rūpa ādimān evam anityaḥ api mābhūt iti evam ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ utkarṣa sama jāti vādī parājīyate evam eva iva ādi utkarṣa sama jāti vādi tayā parājetavyaḥ sādharmya mātreṇa aprayojakena pratyavasthānāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^15	 tasya ca sarva anumāneṣu sulabha tayā sarva anumāna uccheda āpādaka tvāt syāt etat utpattimat tvam upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛ pūrvakatva mātra vyāptam ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam tāvat mātram eva pṛthivī ādīnām gamayet nitya sarva viṣaya jñāna vat kartṛ tvam tu kutastyam na hi tad dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dṛṣṭam atha rūpa ādi upalabdheḥ kriyā tvena cakṣuḥ ādi anumān api katham na hi cchidādayaḥ kriyā indriya ādi sādhanāḥ tāsām kuṭhāra ādi sādhana tvāt atha dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī a dṛṣṭam api indriya sādhana tvam pakṣa dharma tā balāt sidhyati 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.2^16–4,1.21.3	 rūpa ādi upalabdhi gatam hi kriyā tvam tat eva karaṇam gamayet yat upalabdhi nirvartana samartham na ca kuṭhāra ādayaḥ samarthāḥ iti pakṣa dharma tā balāt kuṭhāra ādi vilakṣaṇam adṛṣṭa caram api cakṣuḥ ādi upasthāpayati iti tat itaratra api samānam na hi ayaribheya aniyata diś deśa aindriya kānaindriya katrasa sthāvara ādi lakṣaṇa kārya utpāda yaugapadyam asat i sarva viṣaya jñāne tat nitya tvā ivā sūddhum arhati no khalu īdṛśam parameśvara vijñānam kārya śarīra ādi kāryam sambhavati śarīra ādi utpatteḥ prāc asya ācaitanyena tad prāk kāla kārya antara utpādāya īśvara antara kalpanā prasaṅgāt evam tad prāc tad prāk iti aneka alaukika kalpanayā varam buddhi nitya tvam kalpitam etena śarīra indriya nitya tva kalpanā api pratyuktāḥ etena yat eke bruvate sanniveśa ādimat sarvam buddhimat hetu yadi api prasidhyet sanniveśa ādeḥ eka kāraṇatā kutas 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^1	 iti tat api parihṛtam teṣām prasidhyet sarvajña nirākriyā manorathaḥ yadi piśita cakṣuṣaḥ paramāṇūn kṣetrajña an tad samavetān vā karma āśayān draṣṭum īśate na ca etat asti tasmāt atīndriya artha darśinaḥ asmad ādi bilakṣaṇāḥ bahavaḥ kalpanīyāḥ tad varam ekaḥ eva tādṛśaḥ kalpanā lāghavāya iti na ca kādācid ka paripāka adṛṣṭa vat kṣetrajña paramāṇu saṃyogāt eva tanu bhuvana ādi kārya upapatteḥ kṛtam cetana kartṛka tvena iti vācyam utpattimat tvasya upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛka tvena upādhi virahviṇaḥ svābhāvika pratibandha siddheḥ na ca avijñātānām indriya manasām jñāna utpāda sādhanānām anadhiṣṭhānasya ca vatsa vṛddhi nimittasya api ecatanasya kṣīrasya svātantryeṇa prakṛteḥ vane viṭapa ādīnām ca vinā prayatnam utpādasya darśanāt vyabhicāra eti sāṃpratam sarveṣām eva teṣām vivāda āspadībhūta tvena pakṣa nikṣepāt na ca śaśa śṛṅga astitāvat anupalabdhi virodhāt apakṣa dharmataḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^2	 dharmiṇaḥ darśana an arhvatayā bhagavataḥ tad virodha anupapatteḥ anyathā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt śṛṅgasya tu śaśa aśirovartinaḥ vatsa ādi gatasya iva darśana arhasya anupalabdhi nirākṛtasya sādhanān arha tvāt syāt etat na utpatti mātram svabhāva pratibaddham buddhi mat hetu tvena kim tu tad viśeṣaḥ yat dṛṣṭeḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛtabuddhiḥ utpadyate tasya ca dṛṣṭeḥ sā upajāyate yat buddhimat bhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāvam dṛṣṭam ghaṭa ādi ca tathā na tṛd pattimat mātram tanu bhuvana ādi api tasya sadbhāva asadbhāva anuvidhāna adarśanāt tat etena viśeṣeṇa upādhinā prayuktām buddhimat hetuka tva vyāptim upajīvat utpatti sāmānyam na tena svabhāva pratibaddham iti na tat gamayitum arhati iti anyathā dhūma prayuktām dhūmadhvaja vyāptim upajīvya pāṇḍutā ādeḥ kumuda kapotaka ādi gatāt api dhūmaketunā anumāna prasaṅgāt iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^3	 atra ucyate idam eva nipuṇataram bhavantaḥ nirūpayantu kim buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam viśeṣaḥ āho tad darśanam yadi pūrva pakṣaḥ sa buddhimat hetuka tvam tanu bhuvana ādīnām ātiṣṭhamānaiḥ abhyupeyate eva na hi kāraṇam kāryān anuvihita bhāva abhāvam anyaḥ vaktum arhati asvīkāt atha darśanam natarhi akriyā darśinaḥ kṛta buddhi saṃbhavaḥ yaḥ eva hi paṭaḥ anena buddhimat hetu envaya vyatireka anuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva tad kāryaḥ na tu vipaṇi vartī tad jātīyasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāna darśanāt adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatireka anuvinadhānam api tat jātīyam tathā iti ced hanta utpattimat ghaṭa ādi buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi iti anyat api tat jātīyam tanu bhuvana ādi tathā bhavat daṇḍena na parāṇudyate ghaṭajātīyam utpattimat buddhimat pūrvam iti ced nanu prāsāda ādi na tad hetukam bhavet aghaṭa jātīya tvāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^4	 atha yat jātīyam buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi dṛṣṭam tat jātīyam eva adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekam api buddhimat hetukam tat ki midārnīm kārya jātīyam prāsāda ādi buddhimat hetukam na dṛṣṭam yena utpattimat tanu bhuvana ādi tathā na syāt na khalu tad jātīya tve kaścid viśeṣa eti yat tu mṛd vikāra tvena valmīkasya ghaṭa ādi vat kulāla kārya tvam na bhavati tad kumbhakārasya pratyakṣa anupalambha virodhāt adṛśya cetana pūrvaka tve tu tasya upeyate eva syāt etat na utpatti mātram upādāna abhijña kartṛka tvena vyāptam api tu yat asmad ādi śakya jñāna upādāna ādi na ca tathā tanu bhuvana ādi utpattimat api tasmāt vyāpti virahāt na tad pūrvakam iti tat ayuktam utpattimat tva tad upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛ kattvayoḥ prathamam anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyāptau siddhāyām tad upādāna ādi śakya jñāna tva kalpanāyāḥ kārya jñāna viṣaye vyavasthāpanāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^5	 vyāpti balena jñāna sāmānya siddha aupakṣa dharma tā balena tat nitya tva siddhiḥ iti uktam tena upādheḥ anustriyamāṇasya anupalabdheḥ svabhāva pratibaddham utpattimat tvam buddhimat hetukattvena na ca svabhāva pratibaddham utpattimatvam sva saṃbandhinam atītyā api vartsyati iti śakyam śaṅkitum tathā sati sva bhāva hāni prasaṅgaḥ syāt etat na sarvajña pūrvakāḥ kṣiti ādayaḥ prameya tva satva ādibhyaḥ ghaṭa ādi vat iti anumānāni santi pratipakṣa sādhanāni iti sat pratipakṣa tayā prakṛtam anumāna ābhāsam atra ucyate kim anena sarvajña pūrvaka tvam niṣidhyate uta jñātṛ mātra pūrvaka tvam sarva grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham yadi pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ tadā eka deśa darśi pūrvaka tvam sādhitam syāt tathā cāpa siddhāntaḥ na ca śakyam api na hi asmad ādinā arvāk darśinā aśakyāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ kartum jñātṛ mātra pūrvaka tve tu niṣedhye ghaṭa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^6	 yat ca īśvaraḥ na adhiṣṭhātā paramāṇu ādīnām aśarīri tvāt mukta ātma vat aiśvaram jñānam na sarva viṣayam anityam ca jñāna tvāt asmad ādi jñāna vat iti anumānam tad pakṣa dharmatā siddhi artham īśvara siddhim tat buddhimat tvam ca apekṣamāṇam tad sādhaka pramāṇa viruddham ātmānam eva tāvat na āsādayitum arhati prāk eva tat viroddhum na hi āgama anumāne jagat kartṛ tva nitya sarva viṣaya buddhimattva vyatirekeṇa kevalam aśviram sādhayataḥ tathā ca tābhyām viruddham bhavat anumānam na utpatum arhati iti siddham buddhi vat icchā prayatnau= api tasya nityau sa kartṛka tva sādhana antargatau veditavyau jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāya lakṣaṇa tvāt kartṛ tvasya teṣām ca paraspara āvina abhāvāt anyatara siddhau= itarayoḥ siddheḥ tat evam utpattimatvāt eva pakṣa dharma tā sahāyāt evambhūta īśvara siddhiḥ iti uktam bhavatu vā tasmāt upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛka tva mātra siddhiḥ pariśeṣa anumānāt tu vyatireka siddheḥ viśeṣa siddhiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^7	 tathā hi tanu bhuvana ādi abhijñaḥ karttā na anitya asarva viṣaya buddhimān tatkartuḥ tad upādāna ādi anabhijña tva prasaṅgāt na hi evaṃvidhaḥ tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā asmad ādiḥ tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ ca ayam tasmāt tathā iti na ukhalu paramāṇu bhedān pratikṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca tasmāt tathā iti na ukhalu paramāṇu bhedān pratikṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca karma āśayān anyaḥ śaktaḥ jñātum ṛte tādṛśāt īśvarāt iti prapañcitam adhastāt para puruṣa samavetau= api dharma adharmau= adhiṣṭātum śaknoti sambandhāt na hi sākṣāt saṃyoga samavāyau= eva sambandhau saṃyukta saṃyogi samavāyasya api tad bhāvāt saṃyuktāḥ khalvī śveraṇa paramāṇu ādayaḥ taiḥ ca kṣetrajñāḥ tad samavetau dharma adharmau= iti saṃyukta samavāya uva vā kṣetrajñena īśvarasya saṃyogāt aja saṃyogasya api upapādita tvāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.21.4^8	 dharma adharmau paramāṇūn vā svadharma upagraham antareṇa api ca īśvaraḥ sva kārya abhimukhān kariṣyati viṣa vidyā vid iva viṣa śakalam kriyā ārambha abhimukham etena cetanā upādānattmapi vyākhyātam vārtika kṛtā tu upalakṣaṇa tayā cetata tvam hetuḥ uktaḥ utpattimatu a ādayaḥ api hetavaḥ ūhanīyāḥ imam ca nyāyam āmnāya aupodbalayati aetasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gāṃrgi dyāvāpṛthivī vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥa a dyāvāpṛthivī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ a atad aikṣata bahu syām prajāyeye ati ādiḥ smṛtiḥ ca bhavati ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ ayam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā a akāraṇa tvena ca īśvara jñāna nityatām darśayati śrutiḥ aapāṇi pādaḥ javanaḥ grahītā paśyati acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti akarṇaḥ sa vetti viśvam na hi tasya vettā tam āhuḥ agryam puruṣam purāṇaḥ a miti ādikāḥ etayā eva aśarīri tvam darśitam bhavati pariśiṣṭam tu vārttika kṛtā svayam eva prapañcitam iti uparamyate 
NVTṬ_4,1.22.1–4,1.23.1	 kaṇṭaka ādīnām saṃsthāna viśeṣavatām nimitta adarśanena animit tattām manu ānasyena eva dṛṣṭāntena śarīra ādīnām api saṃsthāna bhedavatām animitta tām manvānaḥ pūrvapakṣayati animittataḥ iti adṛśyamāna nimittānām śarīra kaṇṭa kāka ādīnām pakṣa nikṣepāt pakṣeṇa vyabhicāra anudbhāvanāt udbhāvane vā sarva anumāna ucchada prasaṅgāt sarvatra tasya sulabha tvāt ubhaya siddhena nimitta tad paṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntena saṃsthāna bhedavat tvāt kaṇṭaka śarīra ādīnām api nimittavat tvam iti siddhāntaḥ siddhānti eka deśi matam udbhāvya dūṣayati apare tu iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.24.1^1	 svayam vārtikakāraḥ kaṇṭaka ādīnām animitta tām vikalpya dūṣayati kaṇṭaka ādīnām animittam janma iti pratipādya pratipādaka nyāyasya iti pratipādyaḥ puruṣaḥ karma pratipādakaḥ ca puruṣaḥ kartā kartṛ karmaṇī ca kārake kārakam ca kriyāyāḥ nimittam iti pratipādya pratipādaka viṣayaḥ nyāyaḥ sa ca ayam animittam śarīra ādīnām janma iti pratijānānena anena abhyupeyate anyathā temūkatā eva syāt iti tat idam uktam sarvam ca amimittam pratipādayasi ca iti vyāhatam na kevalam pratipādya pratipādaka nyāya abhyupagamāditaḥ api iti āha vākya upādānāt ca iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.24.1^2	 pratipādana nimittam vākyam upādatse abhidhatseca animittam sarvam iti vyāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā api anyatara dharma asiddha eti anyatareṇa sādhya dharmeṇa animitta tva ākhyena asiddhaḥ animitta tvasya eva asiddheḥ nanu prativādinaḥ vāc nyātreṇa na siddham asiddham bhavati atiprasaṅgāt iti atas āha saṃsthāna viśeṣavat tvasya bhāvāt paṭa ādi dṛṣantena kaṇṭaka ādīnām sa nimittaka tvasya prāmāṇika tvena vāc nyātrāt asiddheḥ iti kasmāt punar pūrva pakṣaḥ svayam sūtrakāreṇa na nirākṛtaḥ iti atas āha bhāṣkāraḥ sa khalu ayam vādaḥ akarma nimitittaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.25.1	 anye tu manyante sarvam anityam utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti hetoḥ gaka tvam darśayitum pṛcchati kim anityam iti utaram yasya kadā cit bhāvaḥ hetu artham vivṛṇoti utpatti iti yat utpatti dharma karma nutpannam na asti tat utpannam ca asti vināśa dharmakam ca vinaṣṭam na asti avinaṣṭam ca asti tasmāt pūrva aparayoḥ kālayoḥ abhāvāt madhye ca bhāvāt siddham kadācid bhāva lakṣaṇam anitya tvam utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ sādhya dharmi rūpam pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaram bhautikam ca iti atra tāvat svayam vārtikakāra auttaram āha sarvam anityam iti sūtrasya dṛṣṭānta artha tvāt iti artha śabdaḥ nimitta vacanaḥ dṛṣṭānta nimitta tvāt sūtrasya pratijñā hetu upanyāsa parasya na dṛṣṭāntam vinā hetuḥ pratijñāta arthasya gamakaḥ yata etyarthaḥ etat eva vibhajate sarvam anityam iti nirākaraṇa antaram āha utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti cāyam iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.26.1–4,1.27–28.1	 siddhānti eka deśi matam upanyasya dūṣayati na anitya tā nitya tvāt iti parama siddhāntam sūtra uktam āha ayam khalu iti atha uccate na vayam sarvam anityam sādhayāmaḥ api tu yaspaya yasya anitya tā nāma asti dharmaḥ tat sarvam anityam iti tatas ca ākāśa ādīnām nitya tve api na asmad pakṣa kṣatiḥ iti tat etad siddha sādhanena dūṣayati anitya tā bhāvāt ca sarvam anityam iti na doṣaḥ iti yasya san dharmī svam tad yogāt anityaḥ syāt saḥ eva kadācid na asti iti atas āha anitya tvam nāma dharmaḥ saḥ asati dharmiṇi na bhavati iti syāt etat utpatti vināśa dharmaka tva avagatau= anitya tā yogāt ghaṭa ādi bhavatu anityam tena eva dṛṣṭāntena sattvāt ākāśa ādayaḥ api bhaviṣyanti anityāḥ iti deśayati atha punar iti pariharati tasya api uttara pada siddhau tad padārthasya nitya tvasya siddheḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.29.1–4,1.31.1	 ayam aparaḥ ekāntaḥ sarvam nityam kasmāt pañcabhūta nitya tvāt pañcabhūta ātmakam khalu etat go ghaṭa ādi kāryam upalabhyate vyapadiśanti hi mṛd ghaṭaḥ sṛt śarīram iti bhūtāni ca nityāni teṣām ucchedasya naiyāyikaiḥ anabhyupagamāt tena bhūtānām go ghaṭa ādīnām nityatā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ bhautikāni bhinnāni na hi parama sūkṣmāḥ paramāṇavaḥ go ghaṭa ādayaḥ paramāṇu vat teṣām atīndriya tve sarva agraha prasaṅgāt iti uktam dvitīye adhyāye tasmāt grahaṇa agrahaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāta yogāt anve bhautikāḥ bhūtebhyaḥ tathā ca teṣām utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ na nitya tvam bhūnitya tve api iti siddhāntam āha na utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti bhūta sārūpyeṇa tādātmyam manyamānaḥ punar api pūrva pakṣa vādyāha tad lakṣaṇa avarodhāt go ghaṭa ādīnām bhūta nitya tvena nitya tva apratiṣedhaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.32.1	 bhūta sāmyam go ghaṭa ādīnām bhūta kārya tve api upapadyamānam na bhūtātmaka tvam avagamaya ti iti āśayavān āha na utpatti tad kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti api ca yadi utpatti vināśau na bhāvānām vastu santau katha prekṣāvatām abhimata utva patti kāraṇe anabhimata vināśa kāraṇe ca tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ iti āha utpatti vināśa kāraṇa iti api ca avyāpakaḥ hetuḥ iti āha śabda karma buddhi ādīnām ca avyāptiḥ avyāpakaḥ ca anaikāntaḥ uktaḥ pakṣaḥ hi sarvam nityam iti tasmin satva asattvābhyām anekāntaḥna ekaḥ sattva asattva lakṣaṇaḥ antaḥ asya iti anekānte iti tat etat vārttikakāraḥ vakṣyati artha dṛṣṭyā pakṣasya anta dvaye avasthānāt iti hetoḥ anta dvaye sattva asattva rūpe pakṣasya avasthānāt iti yojanā asati bādhake mithyātva kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ iti amum artham śaṅkā nirākaraṇābhyām āha svapna viṣaya ityādi bhāṣya uktam artham uktvā svayam vārtikakāraāha sarvasya ca iti yāvat yena pratipādyate iti pratipādanena kriyate iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham 
NVTṬ_4,1.33.1^1	 tat evam sāṃkhyānām matam apāsya svāyambhuvānām matam apākartum upanyasyati apare sarvam nityam iti anthāḥ varṇayanti trividhaḥ khalu ayam dharmiṇaḥ pariṇāmodharma lakṣaṇa avasthā rūpaḥ tad yathā suvarṇam dharmi tasya pariṇāmaḥ vardhamāna rucaka ādiḥ dharmasya tu lakṣaṇa pariṇāmaḥ anāgata ādi yadā khalu ayam suvarṇakāraḥ vardhamānakam bhaṅktvā rucakam racayati tadā vardhamānakaḥ varttamāna lakṣaṇam hittvā atīta lakṣaṇam āpadyete rucakam tu anāgata lakṣaṇam hitvā varttamāna tām āpadyate vattamānatā āpanna ā iva tu rucakaḥ nava purāṇa bhāvam āpadyamānaḥ avasthā pariṇāmavān bhavati 
NVTṬ_4,1.33.1^2	 nava purāṇa avasthāḥ ca varttamāna lakṣaṇa āśrayāḥ lakṣaṇa pariṇāmāḥ saḥ ayam trividhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ dharmiṇaḥ dharma lakṣaṇa avasthāḥ ca dharmiṇaḥ bhinnāḥ ca abhinnāḥ ca tathā ca te dharmya bhedāt nityāḥ bhedāt ca utpatti vināśa viṣa tvam iti ubhayam upapannam nanu yadi upajana apāya dharmaka tvam dharmiṇām hanta utpatteḥ prāk teṣā masa tvāt vināśāt ca ūrddhama sa tvāt katham sarva nitya tva siddhiḥ iti atas āha yat ca upajāyate tad prāk api upajanāt asti dharmi rūpeṇa iti śeṣaḥ tad nivṛttam api asti iti atra apipa dharmi rūpeṇa iti śeṣaḥ nirākaroti na vyavasthā anupapatteḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.33.2	 upajana apāyayoḥ svarūpataḥ kālataḥ viśeṣataḥ sambandhitaḥ anāgata tva ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati na tāvat bheda abhedaḥ paraspara parīhāra vyavasthita dharmau= ekatra samāviśataḥ tasmāt upajana apāya vyavasthāyai bhedam dharma lakṣaṇa avasthānām dharmiṇaḥ icchatā teṣām atitya tvam abhyupetavyam sāṃkhya vatsa kārya abhyupagamena tu nitya tva vyavasthāpane vārttikakāraḥ āha yat ca nivarttate tad nivṛttam api asti iti bruvāṇa eti sugamam 
NVTṬ_4,1.34.1–4,1.35.2	 ayam api anyaḥ ekāntaḥ bauddhānām sarvam pṛthak kasmāt bhāva lakṣaṇa pṛthaktvāt na rūpa ādi atiriktam dravyam nāma kim cit asti na api avayava atiriktaḥ kaścid asti avayavī iti sautra antikāḥ vaibhāṣikāḥ ca prapati pedire tān nirākaroti na aneka lakṣaṇaiḥ eka bhāva niṣpatteḥ anekavidhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sambaddhasya ekasya bhāvasya ghaṭa ādeḥ avayavinaḥ niṣpatteḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.36.1^1	 atha api iti api ca iti arthaḥ aṇu samūhe ca āgṛhyamāṇaḥ iti parama sūkṣma tvena atīndriya tvāt iti arthaḥ atha api etat anūktam iti api ca bhāva lakṣaṇa pṛthat kāt iti hetum utkā boddhena paścāt etat uktam kim tat uktam iti ataa āha na astyakaḥ bhāvaḥ yasmāt samudāya eti etat anūktam dūṣayati eka anupapatteḥ na asti eva samūhaḥ anūktam vivṛṇoti na asti ekaḥ bhāvaḥ yasmāt samūhe bhāva śabda prayogaḥ asya dūṣaṇam vivṛṇoti ekasya anupapatteḥ iti etataprapañcayati eka samuccayaḥ hi iti na asti ekaḥ bhāvaḥ iti yasya bhāvasya ekatva pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate samūhe bhāva śabda prayogaḥ iti bruvatā saḥ eva abhyanujñāyate nanu samūhaḥ abhyanujñāyate na tu ekaḥ bhāvaḥ iti atas āha eka samuccayaḥ hi samūhaḥ iti tat enana pratijñāyāḥ hetoḥ vyāghāta auktaḥ saṃprati pratijñāyāḥ hetunā vyāghātā eti a āha samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti ca iti vārttikam asya prayogaḥ iti kumbha śabdaḥ aneka viṣayaḥ iti pāramārthika aneka viṣayaḥ kālpanikam tu kumbhasya ekatvam na vāryate tathā ca eka padam iti eka padena vyabhicāraḥ tasya api pāramārthika aneka viṣaya tvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.36.1^2	 syāt etat ghaṭa ādi śabdebhyaḥ rūpa ādīnām budhna ādīnām ca bahūnām avagamāt katham ekārtha tā iti atas āha ādhāra ādheya bhāva iti yadi nānā artha tā api bhavati ghaṭa ādi śabdānām tathā api pratyekam eka tvam tad arthānām aśakyā pahnavam iti na pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ abhimata siddhiḥ iti upetya tu uccate aneka artha tvam api atra na sambhavati iti samūhe bhedasya ca anavasthāt iti yadi samūha mātram eva na tu ekam kim cit asti tathā sati ghaṭa lakṣaṇe samūhe bhedyamāne na alpataratama ādi bhedaḥ pratīyeta ghaṭa ādi kapāla śarkarā cūrṇa paramāṇūnām samūha tvena ananta avayava tvāt ayam mahān ayam alpaḥ alpatara eti vibhāgaḥ na syāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.36.1^3	 tasmāt anena tāratamyam samarthayamānena kva cit samūha nivṛttiḥ vācyāna ca asau= asamūham eka mantareṇa iti ekaḥ abhyupeya taiti arthaḥ uktam artham avidvān śaṅkate atha manyasaḥ iti rūpa ādīnām samudāyaḥ iti catvāri vādravyāṇi iti ca avāntara darśana bheda vivakṣayā draṣṭavyam ukta artha darśanena uttaram etasmin vai darśana eti atha anantam samudāyam pratipadyasaḥ iti nirākṛtasya api punar āśaṅkā āgama virodham āpāyitum eka anupapattau na aneka upapattiḥ iti yat tat anekam uktam etat tyājyam iti śeṣam bhāṣya vyākhyayā vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_4,1.37.1^1	 samprati śūnyatā vādinam utthāpayati ayam aparaḥ ekāntaḥ sarvam abhāvaḥ iti pratijñā atra hetuḥ bhāveṣu itaretara abhāva siddheḥ iti sarvam idam pramāṇa prameya pramiti rūpam abhāvaḥ tuccham bhāveṣu itaretarābhāva siddheḥ iti vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe asat pratyaya bhāva pratiṣedhābhyām bhāva śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt pramāṇa ādayaḥ khalu amī parasparān ātmaka tayā asat iti pratyayasya nañaḥ ca gocarāḥ iti anubhūyante atas tat vācinām śabdānām tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatas pramāṇa ādayaḥ asantaḥ anutpanna pradhvasta paṭa vat api ca amī bhāvāḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ vā nitya tve sarva sāmarthya rahitasya asattvam na hi nityam kva cit kārī aupayujyate krama akrama anupapatteḥ iti uktam anitya tve tu vināśa svabhāvāḥ ced dvitīya ādi kṣaṇā eva prathama kṣaṇe api na syuḥ sattve vā anāmī vināśa svabhāva aḥa tatsvabhāvat tve vā kṣaṇa antare api na vinaśyeyuḥ no khalu nīlam sva kāraṇāt upajātam jātu kāraṇa sahasraiḥ api śakyam pītam karttum iti vināśa svabhāvaka tvam akāmena api anityānām eṣitatyam 
NVTṬ_4,1.37.1^2	 tasmāt bhāvānām śūnyatā eva pāramārthikī kalpanayā tu avastu satyā santā eva avabhāsantaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ tathā ca sarve bhāvāḥ iti sarve bhāva śabdāḥ iti arthaḥ prayogaḥ ca sarva ībhāva śabdāḥ asat viṣayāḥ asat pratyaya pratiṣedhābhyām sāmānādhikaraṇyāt anutpanna pradhvasta paṭa śabda vat atra tāvat utsūtram bhāṣya uktam dūṣaṇa vārttikakāraḥ āha pratijñāpadayoḥ pratijñā hetvoḥ ca vyāghātaḥ iti abhinna vibhaktika tvam abhinna arthaka vibhaktika tvam na tu abhinna vibhaktika tvam eva bhinna vibhaktikānām api sāmānādhikaraṇyāt yathā caitraḥ paṭhati iti yathā ca na tvām tṛṇāya manyaḥ iti nāmati tad pratyayena bhavitum iti na hi atyanta āsan= irūpa ākhyam sarvam iti vā bhāvaḥ iti vā abhidhānaspaya gocaraḥ upapāditam hi dvitīya sūtraḥ eva yathā asat vā anirvacanīyam vā na khyāti gocaraḥ api tu sat eva sat antarātmanā tathā ca kutas atyanta asataḥ kalpanā gocara tvam api iti śeṣam bhāṣyaḥ iti pratijñā hetoḥ vyāghātaḥ bhāṣye prapañcitaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.38.1–4,1.38.2^1	 utsūtra mutkāḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ sautram dūṣaṇam vaktum āha sūtreṇa ca abhisambandhaḥ dūṣaṇasya na svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām sarvam abhāvaḥ iti na asti kasmāt svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām svabhāvaḥ dharmaḥ dravya ādīnām sat ādiḥ atha vā svabhāvaḥ svarūpam bhāvānām yena amī bhāvāḥ svabhāvāt vyāvarttante yat vā asan= iti pratyayasya gavya śva ātmanā iti viśeṣaṇāt agaurityasya gām parihṛtya aśva ādibhiḥ saṃbandhāt go bhāva siddheḥ evam aśva ādiṣu api iti svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām na abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ na svabhāva siddheḥ iti sūtram anūdya vārttikāraḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa vyākhyāyam praśna pūrvakam tātparyam asya darśayati pūrva sūtrasya iti kaśca svabhāva etyādinā siddhaḥ bhāvaḥ iti antena sūtrasya vyākhyāna trayam bhāṣya kārīyam vārttikakāraḥ darśayati sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ samānaḥ nitya tva ādiḥ iti arthaḥ praśna pūrva kamasat pratyaya pratiṣedha sāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāvasya upapādayati 
NVTṬ_4,1.38.2^2	 katham tarhi iti asat śabdaḥ khalva bhāva viśeṣaṇam sa deva abhidhatte śukla guṇa viśiṣṭe paṭe varttate tathā ca asat pratyaya abhidhānayoḥ upapannam bhāva vācinā padevana sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti arthaḥ bhāvaḥ ca kaścid nityaḥ kaścid anityaḥ tatra nityasya artha kriyā kāri tvam upapāditam kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅgaḥ eva anityaḥ api na vināśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ kim tu sva kāraṇāt ayam sat svabhāvaḥ jātaḥ kāraṇa antarāt tu vinaśyati yatu uktam nīlam śakyam na pītam karttum iti tatra brūmaḥ śakyaḥ eva nīlaḥ paṭaḥ pītaḥ karttum āma śyāmaḥ ghaṭaḥ vahni saṃyogāt raktaḥ atha nīla tvam na pīta tvam śakyam kartum nanu bhāvaḥ api na abhāvaḥ karttum śakyaḥ iti yathā eva kumbha adhikaraṇe śyāma rakta tve paryāyeṇa bhavataḥ evam kapāla adhikaraṇau kumbha bhāva abhāvauviti adoṣaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.39.1–4,1.39.2	 svabhāva siddheḥ iti yat uktam tadā ākṣipati śūnya vādī na svabhāva siddhiḥ āpekṣika tvāt sarve evam hi bhāvāḥ bhinna svabhāvāḥ bhinna tvam ca teṣām anya apekṣam tathā hi nīlam bhinnam pīta ādi apekṣayā na tu svabhāvataḥ evam hrasva tva dīrgha tva parattva apara tva pitā putra tva ādayaḥ paraspara apekṣāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ yat ca parāpakṣam tat na svābhāvikam yathā japā kusuma apekṣam sphaṭikasya rakta tvam iti ākṣepa arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.40.1^1	 samādhatte vyāhata tvāt ayuktam tat vyācaṣṭe yadi iti nanu yadi anena krameṇa ubhaya abhāvaḥ bhavati bhavatu siddham eva naḥ samīhitam iti atas āha apekṣāyām anapekṣāyām ca iti parimāṇa bhedaḥ hi dīrgha tvam hrasva tvam ca sa ca bhāvānām autpattikaḥ kevalam tasya atiśaya an atiśayau paraspara grahaṇa adhīnau tathā hi ikṣuyaṣṭeḥ veṇu yaṣṭitaḥ hrasva tvam pūrva saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam anatiśayaḥ veṇu yaṣṭeḥ dīrgha tvam atiśayaḥ para saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam tat ca idam pratiyogi nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇam na tu pratiyogi adhīna utpatti iti na vastu dharmaḥ ayam para apara apekṣaḥ bhinna tvam ca bhedaḥ sa ca vastu viśeṣaṇam na utpattau vastu antaram apekṣate kim tu sva nirūpaṇe 
NVTṬ_4,1.40.1^2	 evam pitṛ tvam api vyavasthitā janaka śaktiḥ eva sā janya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇā na tu tad adhīna utpattiḥ vipañcitam ca etat asmābhiḥ brahma tattva parīkṣāyām paratva aparatva ādayaḥ tu apekṣā buddhi nimitta tayā para apekṣā utpattikāḥ api lokayātrām vahantaḥ na śakyāḥ pratyākhyātum na ca etāvatā tad adhikaraṇam bhāvaḥ na nirapekṣaḥ iti sarvam avadātam syāt etat apekṣā mātram eva dīrgha tva ādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti kṛtam eṣām vastu svabhāvena iti ataa āha svabhāva siddhau ca asatyām iti apekṣā sāmarthyam apekṣā prayojana yogaḥ svayaṃvārtikakāraḥ dūṣaṇāni āha sarvathā ca ayam vyāhate iti nigada vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.1^1	 uttara sūtra avatāra param bhāṣyam atha ete saṃkhyā ekānta vādāḥ saṃkhyāḥ ekāntaḥ yeṣu vādeṣu te tathā uktāḥ atha śūnyatā vāda anantaram te parīkṣyanta eti arthaḥ tatra prathamam brahmādvaitam utthāpayati sarvam ekam kutas sat aviśeṣāt idam asya ākūtam na tāvat ayam nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ prakāśāt bhinnaḥ san prakāśitum arhati jaḍasya svayaṃprakāśa asaṃbhavāt na ca prakāśa yonagāt prakāśate iti yuktam na khalva antareṇa prakāśena asya kaścid yogaḥ saṃbhavati viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ iti ced na tatra akiñcitkarasya viṣayi tvā sambhavāt na ca arthe jñānam phapa valam janayati iti sāṃpratam atīta anāgatayoḥ arthayoḥ tad asaṃbhavāt na ca na tayoḥ viṣaya bhāvaḥ tasmāt jñānāt bhinnasya nāma rūpa prapañcasya na prakāśa sambhavaḥ iti jñānasya eva ayam vivarttaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ na ca prakāśa ātmanaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva udaya vyaya dharmiṇaḥ paraspara vyāvṛttāḥ santu iti sāṃpratam 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.1^2	 tad vyāvṛtti grahe pramāṇa abhāvāt sā hi yadi atas vaya āvartate tad ubhaya grahe gṛhyate na ca vijñānāni vilakṣaṇāni sva rūpa mātra avasthitāni paraspara vārttā anabhijñāni jñāna antaram api grahītum utsahante prāk eva svasmāt vyāvartayitum na ca niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa grahaṇa kāraṇakaḥ vyāvṛtti grahaḥ sva kāraṇena sama samaya utpādaḥ bhavitum arhati tādṛśoḥ savya itara viṣāṇa vat kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt na ca ekam vijñānam kṣaṇikam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhītvā paścāt niṣedham gṛhṇāti iti yuktam kṣaṇikasya ākramasya kramavat vyāpāra ayogāt na ca ekam vijñānam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhṇāti atha jñāna antaram niṣedhati iti yuktam caitra gṛhīte api tasmin yaitrasya niṣedha jñāna prasaṅgāt na ca jñāna svarūpa grahaḥ eva asya niṣedha grahaḥ iti sāṃpratam evam hi sa bhavet yadi svarūpa tad anya vyāvavṛttyoḥ eka tvam bhavet tatra vyāvṛtti svabhāvaḥ vā bhāvaḥ bhāva svabhāva vā vyāvṛttiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.1^3	 tatra pūrvasmin kalpe vyāvṛtteḥ tuccha tvāt tad svabhāvāḥ bhava abhedāḥ tucchāḥ syuḥ tatas ca vacaḥ bhaṅni antareṇa śūnya bāda prasaṅgaḥ uttarasmin= tu kalpe vidhi rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti vidhi rūpa tayā ca te vyāvarttanta iti na vyāvṛttāḥ bhāvāḥ parasparam paramārthataḥ tat idam uktam sat aviśeṣāt iti anādya nirvacanīya avidyā nibandhanam tu bhāvānām bhedam na vyāsedhāmaḥ na ca jñātuḥ api jñānāt bheda grāhakam asti pramāṇa muktāt eva viśeṣāt tasmāt na jñeyānām parasparataḥ ca jñānāt ca bhedaḥ na api jñātuḥ jñānāt asita bhedaḥ nā api jñānānām anyonyasya tasmāt prakāśaḥ eva svayam prakāśaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ ānada ghanaḥ a na adya vidyā upadarśita vividha vicitra nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ brahma iti advaita siddhiḥ atas eva śrutayaḥ bhavanti aekam eva advitīyam brahma na iha nānā asti kiñca na mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati a iti evam ādikāḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.1^4	 tat evam aikāntikam eka tvam upanyasya dvi tvam aikāntikam āha sarvam dvedhā kutas nitya anitya bhedāt na hi nitya anityābhyām anyaḥ rāśiḥ asti yam āśritya padārthāḥ tri tva ādike vyāvatiṣṭheran= iti mata antaram āha sarvam tredhā tat eva darśayati jñātā jñeyam jñānam iti jñaptiḥ api jñāyamāna tvāt jñeyān na atiricyate iti bhāvaḥ mata antaram āha sarvā caturdhā darśayati pramātā pramāṇam prameyam pramitiḥ iti yadi pramitiḥ nāma tattvam pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ bhinnam na āśrīyate pramāyāḥ pradhāna kriyāyāḥ abhāvāt katham pramātṛ ādayaḥ katham ca pradhākriyām antareṇa eka vākya tā syāt kāraka vaiciśyam vā pramāyāḥ phala tva avasthāyāḥ upari prameya vyapadeśam na vārayāmaḥ na ca etāvatā tattva antaram na bhavati iti evam yathāsambhavam anye api iti prakṛti puruṣau= iti vā pañca skandhāḥ iti vā paśu pāśa tad uccheda īśvarāḥ iti vā ityādayaḥ tatra parīkṣām saṃkhyā ekānta tā nirākaraṇa rūpa antām darśayati sūtreṇa 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.2–4,1.41.3^1	 saṃkhyā ekāntā siddhiḥ kāraṇa anupapatti upapattibhyām anavayavena sarvam ced ekam dvedhā tredhā caturdhā ca iti pratijñā arthaḥ tat atiriktam sādhanam vācyam na hi sādhyam eva sādhanam bhavati tathā ca sādhanasya tad atirekāt na sekhyā ekānta siddhiḥ na ca kim cit api sva saṃvedanam asti jñāna pradīpa ādīnām api para saṃvedya tvāt yathā ca jñāna atiriktaḥ api arthaḥ viṣayaḥ tathā vijñāna vāda nirāsa avasare vakṣyate na ca vijñānāt arthasya bhedaḥ aśakya grahaḥ tathā hi nīlam upalabhaḥ iti anuhaṅkāra āspadam aśveta ādi rūpam nīlam pratayā ātmam anubhava gocaraḥ evam nīla ādīnām api parasparam 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.3^2	 anyathā ghaṭam ānaya iti deśitaḥ nayane nimīlya śayīta śayīthāḥ iti deśite toyam āharet kasya cit kutaścid katham cit vivecaka abhāvāt na ca anirvacanīyānādya vidyā nibandhanaḥ ayam bheda vyavahāraḥ iti sāṃpratam anirvacanīya khyāteḥ pūrvam eva nirākṛta tvāt tasmāt sarva jana saṃvedana siddhaḥ ayam bheda pratyayaḥ na kāraṇa mukha nirīkṣaṇena yuktaḥ nirākartum api tu spaṣṭa dṛṣṭāt kāryāt bheda pratyaya lakṣaṇāt tādṛśam tad kāraṇam kalpanīyam yādṛśena tad kāraṇena prapañca pratyayaḥ apratyūham utpadyeta tat ca pratyakṣam eva 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.3^3	 tathā hi tat nīlam paricchindat pīta ādibhyaḥ asya bhedam paricchinatti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tā lakṣaṇāt indriya artha sannikarṣāt nīlam hi nīlam iti anubhavan pīta ādikam ca pīta ādikam iti anubhavan smaran vā śaknoti niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa tayā samākalayitum rūpa mātreṇa agṛhīta paraspa bhedam api na hi tat na bhedena prathataiti abhedena pratheta na yena anayoḥ nīla pītayoḥ gṛhīta svarūpayoḥ avadhya vadhimadbhāvaḥ na syāt tathā ca tau gṛhītvā pratyakṣeṇa śakyaḥ anayoḥ bhedaḥ grahītum iti asāṃpratam etat aanyonya saṃśrayāt bhedaḥ na pramā antara sādhanaḥ tasmin= idam na ayamayam iti bhedam vinā nadhīḥ a 
NVTṬ_4,1.41.3^4–4,1.42.2	 etena pramātuḥ api pramāyā bhedaḥ vyākhyātaḥ pramātāraḥ ca anekavidha sukha duḥkha upabhoga vyavasthānāt badhira andhakāṇa ādi kovida jālma saṃsāri mukta vibhāga upapatteḥ ca bhedavantaḥ anumīyante ekasmin= aparyāyeṇa viruddha dharma saṃsarga asaṃbhavāt kalpanayā kathañcid saṃbhāvyamānaḥ api ayam gomaya pāyasīyanyām āvahati tat evam pratyakṣa virodhāt anupapanna arthāḥ śrutaya aekam eva advitīya a mityādyāḥ prathamām vṛttim ullaṅghya jadhasyām avalambante ayajamānaḥ prastara a aādityaḥ vai yūpa a ityādi vat iti yat āha bhagavān jaiminiḥ aguṇavādaḥ tu itia atad siddhiḥ iti aca iti tasmāt na advaitam iti sādhyāt sādhanasya bhedena ca saṃkhyā antara ekāntāḥ api apahṛta arthāḥ iti uktam atra pūrva pakṣa vādyāha na kāraṇa avayava bhāvāt tat vyācaṣṭe kāraṇasya sādhya avayava bhāvāt ekasya dvaya ādīnām vā kaścid eka deśaḥ sādhanam tathā ca na saṃkhyā antaram na ca sādhana bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.43.1–4,1.43.2^1	 nirākaroti niravayava tvāt ahetuḥ avayava bhāvāt iti yadi sādhyasya kaścid avayavaḥ bhavet na saṃkhyā ekāntaḥ syāt iti sarvam ekam iti etasmin pratijñā arthe na kim cit apavṛjyate vyāvarttate yatas tad sādhanam syāt iti arthaḥ atha kasmāt na sādhyam eva hetuḥ iti ataa āha ātmani ca iti caḥ hetau api ca ete saṃkhyā ekāntāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa virodhāt mithyā vādāḥ iti āha te khalu ime saṃkhyā ekāntāḥ iti khalu śabdaḥ samuccaye prakra koṭara pāṇi ādi viśeṣa kāritaḥ yoḥ atha bhedaḥ sthāṇu puruṣa ādiḥ tad pratyākhyānena iti arthaḥ atha viśeṣa kārita artha bheda abhyanujñānena vartante tathā api ekānta tvam jahati eka tva ādi saṃkhyāyāḥ anaikāntika tvam iti arthaḥ atha sāmānya kāri tā eti saṃkhyā mātram aṅgīkriyate na punar asnayā aikāntika tvam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.43.2^2	 tat asmākam abhimatam eva iti āha tathā api na kim cit bādhyate iti ye api āhuḥ sattā sāmānyam eva tattvam bhedāḥ tu kālpanikā iti tān pratyāha na ca bhedam antareṇa iti yat āhuḥ anirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śaśa viṣāṇava aditi syāt etat pretyabhāva parīkṣāyām kaeṣām avasaraḥ yat ete ekānta vādāḥ parīkṣyanta eti atas āha te iti advaita ādiṣu ekānteṣu pretyabhāvaḥ na tāttvikaḥ bhavet api tu kālpa nikaḥna kevalam pretyabhāvaḥ api tu ṣoḍaśa api padārthāḥ tasmāt eteṣām yat tattva jñānam tasya praviveka artham jñeya pravivekena jñāna praviveka eti tad artham ete parīkṣitāḥ iti tat anena prabandhena pretyabhāvaḥ parīkṣitaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.44.1^1	 atha uddeśa krama anurodhāt phalam idānīm parīkṣyate tatra agnihotra ādīnām phalam anantara bhāvi kāla antara bhāvi vā iti saṃśayaḥ etat uktam bhavati karma anantaram duḥkham ca loka paṅkti ādi ca upalabhyate praśaṃsanti hi laukikāḥ dhārmikaḥ ayam sādhutamaḥ iti tat kim etāvat eva asya phalam astu atha āmuṣmikam svarga ādi iti kim prāptam svarga ādi phala tve karmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇa akāraṇa tvāt cira nivṛtte tasmin= tad utpatteḥ apūrva kalpanāyām ca pradhāna aṅga apūrvāṇi bhūyāṃsi kalpanīyāni na ca tāni utpanna mātrāṇi janayanti phalam iti tad sahakāryantarāṇi kalpanīyāni iti adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravāt tad anantara dṛṣṭa phala ābādhanāt ca na asyāḥ abhuṣmikam phalam svarga ādi api tu anantara dṛśyamānam eva 
NVTṬ_4,1.44.1^2	 tatra api duḥkha phala tve upadeśa vyāghātāt loka paṅkti lābha khyāti ādikam eva phalam tat ca sukha hetu tayā katham cit svarga ādi padena ucyate dṛṣṭaḥ hi sukha hetau svarga pada prayogaḥ loke yathā candanam svargaḥ sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svargaḥ iti prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ svarga padasya tāvat artha vādataḥ ayat na duḥkhena saṃbhinnam na ca grastam anantaram abhilāṣā upanītam ca tad sukham svaḥpada āspadaḥ am iti sukham prati vācaka tvam avadhāritam 
NVTṬ_4,1.44.1^3	 na ca tad vācaka tvena eva candana ādau tad prayoga upapattau= aneka artha tva kalpanā apa yuktāḥ yat āhuḥ anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti tasmāt mukhyaḥ ayam svarga śabdaḥ ukta bhede sukhe tathā ca svarga kāmaḥ iti atra mukhya artha saṃbhave na upacarita artha tā yuktāḥ na ca aneka adṛṣṭa kalpanā bhayān mukhya artha parityāgaḥ nyāyyaḥ pramāṇa siddhe niyoga paryanuyoga anupapatteḥ yathā ahuḥ aśruti siddhi artham aśrutā upalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyam na tu śruta śaithilyam ādaraṇīya am iti tathā apramāṇavanti adṛṣṭāni kalpyāni su bahūni api a 
NVTṬ_4,1.44.1^4	 na ca anantara dṛśyamānam loka paṅkti ādi homa ādi anuṣṭhāna phalam api tu tad upalambha phalam adāmbhikānām pracchannam anutiṣṭhatām api loka paṅkya ādeḥ abhāvāt tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na sadyas kāla antara upabhogya tvāt iti bhāṣyam tathā pravṛttyā saṃskāraḥ dharma adharma lakṣaṇaḥ janyate iti na eṣa puruṣa saṃskāraḥ snāna ādi janyā eva boddhavyaḥ api tu puruṣa dharma tā mātreṇa saṃskāraḥ iti ucyate paramārthataḥ tu ayam dharmaḥ puruṣa āśrayaḥ api karmaṇā phale janayitavye tasya avāntara vyāpāraḥ iti vārtikam sadyas tāpa ādi phaletaña tidguṇa saṃvijñānaḥ ayam bahuvrīhiḥ tāpādi iti tena loka paṅkti ādikam ucyate 
NVTṬ_4,1.45–47.1	 svargaḥ phalam śrūyate iti ayuktam svarga kāmaḥ iti svargasya puruṣa viśeṣaṇa tvena śravaṇāt asādhya tvāt ataāha deśitayā ca kriyayā na anarthikayā śravitavyam āpta upadeśaḥ khalu ayam upadeśyasya karmaṇaḥ abhimata upāyatām āha tatra karmaṇaḥ abhimata apekṣāyām puruṣa viśeṣaṇasya api apekṣita tvāt sādhya tvam iti siddham evam hi loka paṅkti ādiḥ agni hotra ādi anuṣṭhān a sādhyā bhavet yadi tad kāmasya svarga kāmasya iva agnihotra ādi anuṣṭhānam deśyeta na ca etat asti iti āha na ca tāpa ādi kāmaiti loka paṅkti ādi kāmaḥ iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham 
NVTṬ_4,1.48.1	 idam idānīm cintyate kim etat phalam utpatteḥ prāyasat vā sat vā sat asat vā anabhayam vā iti atra samasta pakṣa ākṣepeṇa phala abhāvam abhidhitsuḥ pūrvapakṣayati tat idam phalam niṣpatteḥ prāk na asat na sat na sat asat sat asat kasmāt na bhavati iti atas āha sat asatoḥ vairdhmyāt paraspara viruddha dharma tvāt dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ virodhāt iti arthaḥ atha anubhayam kasmāt na bhavati iti ataa āha na api ubhaya viparītam iti siddhānti āha prāk utpatteḥ utpatti dharma kamasat iti addhā 
NVTṬ_4,1.49.1–4,1.49.2	 nanu na asat utapadyate na sanniruddhyataiti ācakṣate sāṃkhyāḥ tat katham etat iti atas āha utpāda vyaya darśanāt prāc utpatteḥ utpatti dharmakam asat iti addhā kasmāt utpāda vyaya darśanāt yathā nitya svarūpāyāḥ citi śakteḥ na utpādaḥ na ca vyayaḥ evam phalasya api nityasya tau na syātām iti arthaḥ na hi sat pakṣaḥ iti satkārya pakṣa eti arthaḥ na kim cit jāyate iti na pratijñā vākyāt kiñcid tattva jñānam sambhavati kim cit ca saṃdeha ādi na vinaśyati iti ajñāna tiraḥ bhāvaḥ saṃśaya viparyaya tirobhāvaḥ kāraṇasya hi pradhānasya lakṣaṇam mahān lakṣyate hi mahatā pradhānam iti evam tasya api ahaṅkāraḥ tasya puṣṭiḥ sthūla tā iti arthaḥ paścāt bhavati iti kevala kāraṇa avasthāyāḥ paścāt iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^1	 yat ca uktam upādāna niyamāt iti tatra yadi puruṣasya upādāna niyamaḥ paṭa arthī tantūn eva upādatte na vīraṇam kaṭārthī vīraṇam iti tatas tad upādānānām tatra tatra kārye sāmarthya parijñānāt tat ca sāmarthyamānumānikam tat idam ucyate buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti tat asat bhāvi kāryam anena eva kāraṇena janyate na anyena iti anumānāt buddhi siddham eva iti arthaḥ atha asat kārya pakṣe tantavaa iva paṭasya upādānam na vīraṇa ādi iti ayam niyamaḥ na syāt iti brūṣe tat ayuktam asattva aviśeṣe api sva kāraṇāt utpannam kim cit eva cit kāryam janayitum samartham na anyat iti ayam svabhāva viśeṣāt upapadyate iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^2	 api ca satkārya pakṣe pradhāna upādāna tvāt viśvasya tasya ca abheda apavat kāraṇa ātmaka tvāt ca kārya jātasya sarvam sarva ātmakam iti idam ihanā idam idam idānīm na idam idam evaṃnedam iti niyamaḥ na syāt kasya citkutaścit viveka hetoḥ abhāvāt tasmāt asti rāsabhe api viṣāṇa miti tatra tasya asattvam bruvāṇaḥ sva siddhāntam bādhatā aiti āha asattvāt ca khara viṣāṇam na utpadyate iti bruvāṇa eti sattve ca asattve ca samāne yasya kāraṇam asti tat utpadyate iti guḍa jihvikā paramārtha taḥ tu asattve kāraṇa sāmarthya niyamāt utpatti niyamaḥ kalpate sarva ātmanā sarvasya sattvave tu na niyama hetuḥ asti iti ukta prāpayam 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^3	 deśayati atha asat kārye kim pramāṇam na hi anumānam asmin= arthe pramāṇam bhavitum arhati āśraya asiddheḥ na api pratyakṣam tena api asataḥ svātantryeṇa anirūpaṇāt iti bhāvaḥ vidita abhiprāyaḥ uttaram āha na asattvave na sattvave anumānam asti yathā asmākam āśrayā siddhi doṣāt asattve kāryasya na anumānam evam bhāve api kāryasya sattve na anumānam āśrayā siddheḥ eva kva tarhi anumānam iti ataa āha dharmiṇī a vipratipatteḥ anumānam asti iti yojanā tathā satya āśrayaḥ asi asiddhi ati iti arthaḥ punar pṛcchati kva iti yadi dharmiṇī a vipratipattiḥ kva tarhi vivādaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^4	 uttaram yat ubhaya iti dharmī adhikaraṇān sat kārya vādinām eva vādān vibhajate tān prati iti tantu mātram paṭaḥ iti tantubhyaḥ abhinnaḥ iti arthaḥ kārya ātmanā iti kāryam kāraṇāt bhinna abhinnam iti arthaḥ asat kārya pakṣaḥ tu sva abhimataḥ sphuṭa tvāt avāntara pratibandya bhāvāt ca na upanyastaḥ upapāditaḥ iti dvitīya adhyāye prāk upalabdhi kālāt iti kāraṇa vyāpārāt prāk iti arthaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣa śūnyatā mātra vivakṣayā turya ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ na tu prāgabhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ śakti viśeṣa avasthitāḥ iti kāraṇa vyāpārāt prāk iti śeṣaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^5	 atra siddha sādhanam vayam api bramahe sva vyāpārāt paṭa utpatti nimittāt prāktantavaḥ śakti viśeṣa avacchinnā aiva iti pareṣām satkārya sādhanam upanyasyati vidyamāna aṃbhi vyakti arthāḥ tantavaḥ tad arthinā niyamena upādānāt khanitra ādi vat yathā hi khanitram vidyamānam eva udakam mṛdapanayanena vyanakti iti tat etat dūṣayati vidyamānasya abhivyaktiḥ asati iti abhivyakti vat kārye api prasaṅgaḥ yathā avyakteḥ asatyāḥ eva utpādaḥ tathā kāryasya api asata patra utpāda eti arthaḥ khanitra ādi vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikala eti a āha yat api iti sā aprāptiḥ kutas bhavati iti vaktavyam iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^6	 prāptiḥ khalu saṃyogaḥ sa ca guṇaḥ guṇaḥ ca dravya vināśāt vinaśyet virodhi guṇa antarāt vā tatra tāvat āvaraṇa dravyam āvriyamāṇam vā udakam na vinaṣṭam yena tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ vinaśyet tatas tad virodhi guṇa antara utpādaḥ vaktavyaḥ saḥ eva ca saṃyoga virodhī guṇaḥ vibhāga eti ucyataiti arthaḥ prāpteḥ abhāvaḥ aprāptiḥ iti pakṣam dūṣayitvā paryudāsapakṣam āśaṅkya dūṣayati atha prāpteḥ iti punar śaṅkate atha bhinna deśa utpattim iti na ca vayam saṃyogam vibhāgam vā guṇam upemaḥ kim tu bhinna deśa utpannaḥ eva dravye vibhāgaḥ nirantara utpannaḥ eva saṃyogaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^7	 nirākaroti śrinna deśaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa upādānāt na bhinna deśa utpattiḥ vibhāgaḥ kasmāt utpanne utpannam iti bhinna deśa tayā bhinnam iti viśeṣaṇam hi sva anuriktam pratyayam viśeṣye janayati na tu anya anuraktam na khalu nīlam viśeṣaṇam utpale rakta pratyayam janayatu abhrāntasya iti arthaḥ api ca kṣaṇa bhaṅgam bhāvānām vyāsedhadbhiḥ asmābhiḥ bhinna deśa utpatteḥ pratiṣedhāt na bhinna deśa utpattiḥ vimāgaḥ śaṅkate kṣaṇika tvāt vibhāgasya iti utpadya hi indriya sannikarṣāt vibhāgena sva viṣayam jñānam janayitavyam na ca etāvantam kālam asau= asti kṣaṇika tvena utpanna apavargi tvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.50.1^8	 nirākaroti na sāmānya abhivyakti iti etat vibhajate pūrvam tāvat utpannaḥ vibhāgaḥ sāmānyam vyanakti iti sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ sattā samavāyaḥ vā utpattiḥ tad viśiṣṭaḥ utpannā eti ucyate yeṣām sāmānya graha puras saram viśeṣa jñānam tad mate na sāmānyam vyanakti tad uttara kālam ca sva pratyayam janayati iti uktam etat uktam bhavati na vayam bauddhāḥ iva pūrva apara kāla mātra avasthiti lakṣaṇām kṣaṇika tām vibhāga ādīnām ācakṣmahe kim tvā aśutara vināśa lakṣaṇām sā ca dvitra ādi kṣaṇa sthāyinām cira sthāyibhyova ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛtta ātmā śakyāvaktum iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.51.1–4,1.53.1	 deha ādyatiriktam ātmānam nityam para lokinam asantam manyamānaḥ āha āśraya vyatirekāt vṛkṣa phala utpatti vat iti ahetuḥ mūla seka phala utpādayoḥ eka vṛkṣa āśraya tvam karmaṇaḥ tu homa ādeḥ āśrayaḥ śarīram na ca āmuṣmikasya svarga ādeḥ śarīram āśrayaḥ tasmin= aṣṭe asya bhāvāt tasmāt āśraya vyatirekāt svarga ādeḥ vṛkṣa phala utpatti vat iti ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ svarga phala tve homasya ahetuḥ iti arthaḥ asti ātmā svagaupabhoga samarthaḥ śarīra ādi vyatiriktaḥ kartteti uṣa pāditam iti āśayavān āha prīteḥ ātma āśraya tvāt apratiṣedhaḥ astu svarga ādi ātma āśrayam tathā api avyāpakaḥ hetuḥ putra ādi phalebhyaḥ nivṛtteḥ iti deśayati na putra paśu strī paricchada hiraṇya anna ādi phala nirdeśāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.54.1–4,1.54.2	 pariharati tad saṃbandhāt phala niṣpatteḥ teṣu phalavat upacāraḥ svargaḥ api tāvat svarga tayā na kāmyate kim tu bhogya tayā evam sati kā eva kathā putra ādiṣu te api bhogya tayā eva kāmyante na tu svarūpam bhogyam iti tat sādhyam sukham bhogyam tasmāt putra ādi sambadhāt tad utpatteḥ sukha utpatteḥ teṣu yathā phala śabda prayogaḥ tathā teṣu putra ādiṣu iti arthaḥ sūtra artha kathanena eva bhāṣya vārtikevī ākhyāte 
NVTṬ_4,1.55.1^1	 phala anantaram duḥkha parīkṣaṇam tatra iyam parīkṣā bhavatu duḥkham bādhanā lakṣaṇam anubhūyamānam yat punar idam sukham pratyātmam anukūla vedanīyam tat katham duḥkham anubhava virodhāt śarīra indriya buddhayaḥ ca yadi duḥkha hetu tayā duḥkham kasmāt sukha hetu tayā sukham eva na bhavanti sā iyam ati bhīru tā sakala loka yātrā virodhinī yathā āhuḥ anaḥ hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ na upyante na hi bhikṣavaḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyanta aiti tasmāt māṃsa arthī iva kaṇṭakān uddhṛttya māṃsam aśnat na anartham kaṇṭaka janyam āpnoti iti evam prekṣāvān duḥkham uddhṛttya indriya ādi sādhanam sukham bhokṣyate santi ca vividha duḥkha parivarjana hetavaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ paridṛṣṭa sāmarthyā anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti abhiprāyavān pūrva pakṣī guḍajivhikayā saṃśayānaḥ iva pṛcchati tat kim idam iti siddhāntinaḥ uttaram anyaḥ iti āha sūtrakāraḥ iti tena eva abhiprāyeṇa pūrva pakṣī pṛcchati katham uttaram na vai sarva loka sākṣikam iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.55.1^2–4,1.55.2	 ayam tu duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśaḥ kimartham iti ataa āha bhāṣya kāraḥ duḥkha hāna arthaḥ kiṃbhūtasya duḥkha hānam iti atas āha janma maraṇa prabandhasya anubhavaḥ prāptiḥ tad nimittāt duḥkha upadeśa pariśīlanena nirviṇṇasya alaṃpratyayavataḥ atas eva duḥkham jihāsa tā eti yojanīyam sva abhiprāyeṇa pūrva pakṣī pṛcchati kayā yuktyā uttaram sarve khapalu sattva nikāyāḥ iti utpattiḥ sukha duḥkha hetu bhūtā viṣaya saṃpattiḥ tasyāḥ saṃsthānāni bhuvanāni ā satyaloka ādā ca avīceḥ iti etat uktam bhavati yadi duḥkha varjanena śakyate sukham upādātum tatas tādṛśam sukha mana kūla vedanīyam kaḥ prajñāvān prajahyāt na ca tādṛśam asti sukham kva cit api sarvasya duḥkha avinābhāvinaḥ kevalasya upādātum aśakya tvāt na hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam annam viṣam apahṛtya śakyam madhu mātram upādātum iti tasmāt na idam sukhasya pratyākhyānam api tu sukhaḥ eva duḥkha bhāvanam upadiśyate atra hetuḥ upādīyate ṛṣiṇā vividha bādhana ayogāt duḥkham eva janma utpattiḥ janmanaḥ utpattiḥ sā dukham eva bhāvayitavyā vividha bādhana ayogāt iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.56.1–4,1.57.1	 kasmāt punar duḥkham eva svarūpataḥ na bhavati iti atas āha na sukhasya api antarāla niṣpatteḥ na khalu ayam duḥkha uddeśaḥ duḥkha kayanam sukhasya pratyākhyānam itas ca duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam na sukhasya pratyākhyānam duḥkha uddeśena iti āha yasmāt idam me sukha sādhanam iti vedayan prārthayate sukha sādhanam tat ca uktāt bahu prakārāt bādhanā hetuḥ iti duḥkha bhāvanayā upadeśanam iti kāmam kāmyam kāmayamānasya yadā kāmaḥ samṛdhyati saṃpannaḥ bhavati atha anantaram enam puruṣam aparaḥ kāmaicchā kṣipram bādhate svarga ādi prāptau= api sva rājya ādi kāmayate evam tad prāptau prājāpatya ādi iti asya icchā tad upāya prārthana ādinā duḥkhena prabādha taiti arthaḥ samantāt udanemi yathā bhavati tathā bhūmim labhati iti yojanā 
NVTṬ_4,1.58.1–4,1.58.3^1	 nanu ayam yadi api antarāle sukhāni anubhavati tathā api duḥkha saṃbhedam ākalayan anupadiṣṭaḥ api svayam eva nivartsyati kṛtam asya duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśena iti atas āha duḥkha vikalpe sukha abhimānāt ca śāstra niṣṭhānām vivekinām khalu vividha bādhana anuṣaṅgāt anavayavena sukha mātram duḥkham eva iti viniścayaḥ akṣi pātra kalpāḥ hi te tad yathā iṣī kātūla samparkāt api akṣipā atra dūyate na gātra avayava antarāṇi tathā mṛdu citta tayā vivekinaḥ dūyante avivekinaḥ tu praṇaya kalaha kupita kuraṅga śāba locana aṅganā lakta karasa ārdra poda pallava pātam api śirasi rahasi sukham abhimanyamānāḥ dhana pulaka kañcu ka āñcita tanavaḥ sāndra ānanda aśru pluta nayanāḥ nirvṛṇvanti iti tān pratyayam upadeśoḥ athavā aniti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.58.1–4,1.58.3^2	 jāyasva mriyasva ca iti saṃdhāvatī iti punar jāyate punar mriyate janitvā mriyate mṛtvā jāyate tat idam saṃdhā vana vyāpāra pracayaḥ iti arthaḥ codayati kasmāt duḥkham janma iti na ucyate iti yadi duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśaḥ janmani evam sati eva kāraḥ kimarthaḥ iti arthaḥ pariharati janma vinigraha arthīyaiti vinigrahaḥ vinivṛttiḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ pravartata eti janma vinigraha arthīyaḥ yathā ca matu arthīyaiti etat uktam bhavati janma duḥkham eva iti bhāvayitavyam na atram anāk api sukha buddhiḥ kartavyā aneka anartha paramparāyām apavarga pratyūha prasaṅgāt iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.59.1–4,1.59.2	 duḥkha uddeśa anantaram apavarga auddiṣṭaḥ lakṣitaḥ ca iti śeṣaḥ sa pratyākhyāyate ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ ṛṇa anubandhāt iti asti hi ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet anapākṛtya mohena mokṣam icchan vrajati adhas ṛṇa traya apākaraṇena eva vayaḥ samāpteḥ mokṣa niveśa kṣaṇaḥ na asti iti apavarga abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ kleśa anubandhāt na asti apavargaḥ na anucchinna nidānaḥ saṃsāraḥ śakyaḥ ucchettum iti arthaḥ pravṛtti anubandha ādityasya apīyam eva vyākhyā 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^1	 evam pūrva pakṣayitvā siddhāntam upakramate atra abhidhīyate yattau= at ṛṇa anubandhāt iti jāyamānaḥ iti asya pradhāna artha tā anupapattyā guṇa śabda tvam sādhayitum dṛṣṭānta lābhāya ṛṇa śabdasya prathamam guṇa śabda tvam āha pradhāna śabda anupapatteḥ iti tat vyācaṣṭe ṛṇaiḥ iti na ayam pradhāna śabdaḥ iti ṛṇavān iva asvatantraḥ teṣu teṣu karmasu na adhikārī iti nindā tad abhāve tu svatantra eti praśaṃsā evam jāyamānaḥ iti guṇa śabdaḥ na mukhyaḥ iti kasmāt punar na mukhyaḥ iti ataa āha mātṛtaḥ jāta mātrasya eva anadhikārāt kasmāt anadhikāraḥ iti atas āha arthinaḥ śaktasya ca adhikārāt kasmāt arthinaḥ iti atas āha karma vidhau= agni hotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ityādau kāma saṃyoga śruteḥ na ca bālakaḥ sukha duḥkha prāpti parihāra kāmaḥ api vivekena svarga putra paśu anna ādi kāmayate iti śaktasya ca pravṛtti iti na hi aśakanīyam artham aśaktam prati vedaḥ āpta upadeśa rūpaḥ vidhātum arhati 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^2	 na ca bālakaḥ śaktaḥ avidvat tva ādinā atas eva tiryak deva ṛṣi paṅgu śūdraṣa ārṣeyāṇām anadhikāraḥ sāmarthya abhāvāt na kevalam vaidikaḥ ayam īdṛśaḥ vyavahāraḥ api tu laukikaḥ pīti āha na bhidyate ca ayam laukikāt tat vyācaṣṭe laukikaḥ tāvat iti upapannā anavadya vādī iti upapannam pramāṇena anavadyam punarukta doṇa anapekṣitam upadeṣṭavyam yat na bhavavati tat iti arthaḥ nyāya prāptam imam artham liṅga darśanam upodbalayati iti āha gārhasthya liṅgam ca mantra brāhmaṇam karma abhivadati iti gārhasthyasya liṅgam patnī yasmin karmaṇi tat tathā uktam apatni avekṣitam ājyam bhavati a apatnyaḥ udgāyanti a akṣaume vasānau= agnim ādadhīyātā a miti evamādi tat anena gārhasthyāt pūrva avasthā tāvat ṛṇānubaddhā na bhavati iti uktam saṃprati uttara avasthā api na ṛṇā anubaddha iti āha yadā ca arthinaḥ adhikāraḥ tadā arthi tvasya avipariṇāme jarā maryavāda upapattiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^3	 tena yudaktam ṛṇa apākaraṇena vayaḥ paryavasānāt nasti mokṣa avasaraḥ tad apākṛtam bhavati avipariṇāma padārtha vyākhyānam na nivartate iti turīyasya iti asya vyākhyānam caturthasya iti prāyeṇa pañca saptati varṣeṣu ativāhiteṣu artha tṛṣṇā tanūbhavati atyanta saṃyoge tu jarayā hava iti anarthakam mṛtyunā vā iti anena eva siddheḥ iti śeṣaḥ yadi ucyate aśakta tā upalakṣaṇam etat jarayā havā mṛtyunā vā iti tena kasya ānarthakyam iti ataa āha aśaktaḥ vimucyata eti etat api na upapadyate iti syāt etat yadi api gṛhasthasya yajña ādi vidhāna antarāṇi santi tathā api jāyamānaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇaiḥ iti vākyam bālasya api yajña ādi vidhāsyati iti etām śaṅkām vimarśa pūrvam apākaroti atha api vihitam vā anūdyeta kāmāt vār athaḥ prakalpyeta iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^4	 na tāvat jāyamānaḥ havai iti śakye vidhi vibhaktiḥ asti tena siddhānuvādaḥ svarasataḥ pratīyate yadi tu tasya arthasya siddhiḥ vākya antarāt vā pramāṇa antarāt vā katham api na kalpeta tatova avacanāni tu apūrva tvā aditi nyāyān dvidhi tvam asya kalpyeta santi tu śataśas tad artha vidhāyakāni vākyāni vibhaktimanti iti kaḥ jātu asya sva icchā mātreṇa vidhi tvam kalpayet tasmāt vihita anuvacanam eva nyāyyam iti jāyamāna śabdaḥ jaghanya vṛttiḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ syāt etat jāyamāna śabdaḥ anupacārita arthaḥ svabhāvataḥ mātuḥ udarāt vibhāgam āha sa katham cit anuvāda anurodhapena jaghanya vṛttiḥ kalpanīyaḥ tad varam mukhya artha anurodhena vidhānam eva kalpyatām evam sati śrutiḥ anurodhitā bhavati asti ca bālakasya api phala utpādana yogya tā tad ā ātmanaḥ phalam prati samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt tena yadi api jāta mātrasya phala sādhana anuṣṭhāna yogya tā na asti tathā api phala utpādam prati yogyatā asti phalena ca prayojanam na tad sādhanena iti ataa āha phalasya sādhanāni hi prayatna viṣayaḥ na phalam iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^5	 ayam abhisandhiḥ vidhiḥ hi sva vyāpāre kartṛ tayā puruṣam niyuṅkte prayatnaḥ ca asya vyāpāraḥ sambhavati viṣaye na śakyaḥ nivarttayitum iti sva viṣayam apekṣate na ca asya sākṣāt phalam viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati uddeśyatā mātreṇa tu bhavet na etāvatā prayatnaḥ asya nirvṛṇoti yāvat ayam sākṣāt abhinirvartanīyam na prāpnoti tad upāyasya sākṣāt abhinivarttanīyaḥ iti phala uddeśa pravṛttasya puruṣa prayatnasya nirvṛṇoti yāvat upāyaḥ viṣayaḥ na ca bālakasya tad upāyam aviduṣaḥ tatra sāmarthyam asti asamarthaḥ ca akartā katham ātmānam prayatnena vyāpnuyāt avyāpnuvan= ca katham adhikārī iti jāyamāna śabdaḥ jaghanya vṛttiḥ eva nyāyyā eti siddham vihitam ca jāyamānam iti ṛṇa vākyāt prāk vidhīyate ca ṛṇa vākya arddhvam iti arthaḥ yat uktam tatra hi pravrajyā vidhīyate iti tat amūṣyamāṇaḥ āha pratyakṣa vidhāna abhāvāt iti ced 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^6	 śaṅkām nirākaroti na pratiṣedhasya api vidhāna abhāvātas śaṅkām vibhajate pratyakṣate iti parama āptaḥ hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ anukampayā bhūta upadeśāya pravṛttaḥ yat gārhasthyam eva āśrayamam upadiśati tatas avagacchāmaḥ na santi āśrama antarāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ hitāni iti arthaḥ atas eva āhuḥ aaika āśramyam tu ācāryāḥ pratyakṣa vidhānāt gārhasthi asya iti a nirākaraṇam vibhajate na pratiṣedhasya iti smṛti itihāsa purāṇāni tāvat avivādam vidadhati cāturāśramyam upalabhyante yadi pratyakṣayā śrutyā pratiṣidhyante tatas tad virodhena audumbarī sarva veṣṭana vat tatra apramāṇāni syuḥ na ca tad pratiṣedhaḥ śruteḥ sākṣāt avagamyate tasmāt smṛti ādi vihitam cāturāśramyam apratiṣiddham śrutyā na śakyam parityaktum iti arthaḥ na ca avidhānena tad pratiṣedha anumānam iti āha adhikārāt ca iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^7	 gārhasthya upadeśasya adhikārāt tasya eva vidhānam na āśrama antarasya na tu āśrama antara abhāvāt na hi vyākaraṇam śabdam vyutpādayat pramāṇa ādi abhāvam ākṣipati api ca mā bhūt pratyakṣa vidhānam śrutau sa sādhana apavarga abhidhānāni cāturāśramya abhidhānāni ca pratyakṣāṇi upalabhyante vacanāni tāni apūrva tvāt vidhānāni apavargasya sa sādhanasya cāturāśramyasya ca bhaviṣyanti iti āha ṛc brāhmaṇam ca apavarga abhidhāyi abhidhāyate iti mṛtyumiḥ param karmabhyaḥ iti karma parityāgam apavarga sādhanam sūcayati amṛta tvam iti ca apavargaḥ darśitaḥ sūcitam karma tyāgama pavarga sādhanam śruti antareṇa viśadayati na karmaṇā na prajaya iti pareṇa nākam iti nākam iti avidyām upalakṣayati avidyātaḥ param iti arthaḥ nihitam guhāyām iti laukika pramāṇa agocara tvam darśayati tamasaḥ parastāt iti avidyā tamaḥ tasya parastāt 
NVTṬ_4,1.60.1^8	 āditya varṇam iti nitya prakāśam iti arthaḥ tad anena īśvara praṇidhānasya apavarga upāyatavam uktam ṛcaḥ udāhūtya brāhmaṇam udāharati atha brāhmaṇāni iti yajñaḥ ityādinā gṛhastha āśramaḥ darśitaḥ tapaā iva iti vānaprastha āśramaḥ brahmacārī iti brahmacarya āśramaḥ eṣām abhyudaya lakṣaṇam phalam āha sarve eva ete iti caturtha āśramam āha brahma saṃsthaḥ iti tathā akratuḥ iti kratuḥ saṃkalpaḥ kāmayamāna uva yaḥ āsīt saḥ eva atha akāmayamānaḥ bhavati akāmayamānaḥ kāmam pariharan tad parihāra siddhau saḥ akāmayan= tasya vyākhyānam niṣkāmaḥ iti ātma kāmaiti kaivalya upeta ātma kāmaḥ tad prāptyā āpta kāmaḥ bhavati na tasya prāṇaḥ iti śāśvataḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tatra yat uktam iti aparām api cāturāśramya abhidhāyinīm śrumim āha ye catvācaḥ iti itas ca phala arthinaḥ eṣa jarā maryavāda etya āha phala arthinaḥ ca iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.61.1–4,1.61.2	 pṛṣṭvā sūtam paṭate katham samāropaṇāt ātmani apratiṣedhaḥ ātmayagnīnām samāropaṇa adṛṇa anubandhana apavargasya apratiṣedhaḥ tat enana cchalena pratyakṣa vidhānam pravrajyāyāḥ api darśitam eṣaṇa avyutthitasya viparyastu buddheḥalamābhireṣaṇābhiḥ anartha hetubhiḥ iti kṛtabuddheḥataḥ eva nivṛtte phala arthi tve samāroṣaṇam ātmani agnīnām vidhīyate iti evam brāhmaṇāni iti yadā eṣaṇābhyaḥ vyutthitasya pravrajyā vidhānam tadā tad abhidhāyīni brāhmaṇāni upapannāni iti arthaḥ
