NVTṬ_4,1.62.1^1	 pramṛte khalu yajamāne yajña pātrāṇi yajamānasya śarīre yathāvayasavam nidhāya antya iṣṭiḥ kriyate tatra jarā āmarye karmaṇi aviśeṣeṇa kalpyamāne sarvasya pātra caya antāni karmāṇi iti prasajyeta maraṇa paryantāni karmāṇi iti prasajyeta iti arthaḥ nanviṣyate eva pātra caya anta tvam karmaṇām iti ataa āha tatra eṣaṇā vyutthānam iti tasmāt na aviśeṣeṇa kartuḥ prayojakam phalam bhavati iti phala abhāvaḥ iti asya sūtrau= apayavasya aviśeṣeṇa phanasya kartṛ prayojanaka tva abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ tad anena eṣaṇā vyutthāna śruti virodhāḥ darśitaḥ tat evam cāturāśramyasya śrutiḥ uktāḥ saṃprati smṛti ādayaḥ api cāturāśrayamyasya upadeśakāḥ santi iti āha cāturāśramya vidhānāt ca iti śaṅkate tat apramāṇam iti ced jagat nirmātuḥ parama kāruṇikasya sarvajñasya atrabhavataḥ parameśvarasya āgamaḥ bhavatu pramāṇam āpta ukta tvāt manu vyāsa ādīnām tu āptatva aniścayāt kayam tad praṇītānām prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram pramāṇena iti syāt etat 
NVTṬ_4,1.62.1^2	 bhavatu vedena abhyanujñānāt itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇyam dharma śāstrāṇām tu manu ādi praṇītānām kutas prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti atas āha aprāmāṇye ca iti sarva jana parigrahāt teṣām apiprāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ buddha ādi smṛtayaḥ tu veda ninditaiḥ mleccha ādibhiḥ parigṛhītāḥ na tu āryaiḥ iti na tāḥ pramāṇam bhavitum arhanti iti arthaḥ draṣṭṛ pravaktṛ sāmānyāt ca aprāmāṇya anupapattiḥ yaḥ eva vedasya draṣṭrāraḥ anuṣṭhātāraḥ ca tad arthasya te eva itihāsa ādīnām pravaktāraḥ prācetasa kṛṣṇadvaiyāyanam anuprabhṛtayaḥ api ca vaidikāni karmāṇi smārtīm itikartavyatām apekṣante smārtani ca vaidikāni mantra ādīni iti sarvam etat apramāṇye dharma śāstrāṇām na upapadyate yadi api ca manu ādayaḥ api dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya śāli tayā anubhūya api upadiśanti iti saṃbhavati tathā api veda mūlaka tvam eva itihāsa purāṇa ādinām yuktam tathā hi avedaḥ akhilaḥ dharma mūlam smṛti śīle ca tad vidām yaḥ kaścid kasya cit dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.62.2	 sa sarvaḥ abhihitaḥ vede sarva jñāna mayaḥ hi saḥ ityādibhiḥ sva vacana prapañcaiḥ ātmā baddhapāḥ vedaḥ eva arpitaḥ taiḥ iti atha ayam itihāsa ādi gocaroḥ athaḥ kasmāt pratyakṣa pratītena vedena na ucyata iti tad anabhidhānāt avagacchamaḥ nūnam ayam anabhimataḥ vedānām kartuḥ iti nirākṛtaḥ api ayam punar nirākriyate dārḍhya artham viṣaya vyavasthānāt ca iti anena 
NVTṬ_4,1.63.1	 yat api uktam kpaleśa anubandhasya avicchedāt iti tat dūṣayati suṣuptasya svapna adarśane kleśa abhāvāt apavargaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe suṣuptasya khalu iti loka siddha tayā suṣupta avasthā udāhṛtā mahāpralaya avasthāyām api kleśa muktāḥ eva ātmānaḥ kevalam asau na loka siddhā iti na udāhṛtāḥ etāvān= tu muktā avasthāyām viśeṣaḥ yat asyām kleśa vāsanā api na asti suṣupta avasthāyām pralaya avasthāyām ca kleśa vicchede api tad vāsanā asti iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.64.1–4,1.66.2	 na pravṛttiḥ pratisaṃdhānāya hīna kleśasya dehinaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe kṣīṇeṣu rāga dveṣa moheṣu sati api na pravṛttiḥ sva pratisaṃdhānāya upapāditam idam asmābhiḥ yathā doṣa tuṣa avanaddhāḥ karma tandulāḥ janmāṅkurāya kalpante na kevalāḥ iti arthaḥ śaṅkate karma vaiphalyā iti vaiphalye śāstrasya karmaṇām phala sādhana tā pratipādakasya aprāmāṇya prasaṅga eti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti na karma vipākā iti vipāka phalam tasya pratisaṃvedanam bhogaḥ pūrva pakṣa bādi āha na kleśa saṃtateḥ svābhāvika tvāt siddhānti eka deśī brūte prāk utpatteḥ abhāva anitya tva vat svābhāvikepya nitya tvam dadhi ādeḥ utpatteḥ prāk kṣīra ādiṣuyaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya anitya tva vat iti yojanā 
NVTṬ_4,1.67.1–4,1.67.2	 aparaḥ tu eka deśī bhāvam eva dṛṣṭāntayati iti āha aṇu śyāma tā anitya tva vat ha yat etat śyāmam rūpam tat annasya iti āgamaḥ pārthivānām paramāṇūnām śyāma tām anādi māhaan= apadena mṛdaḥ abhidhānāt iti bhāvaḥ atra prathamam eka deśinam dūṣayati sataḥ khalu iti dvitīyam eka deśinam dūṣayati anādiḥ aṇuśyāma tā iti hetvaśrāvāt na yuktam aṇu śyāma tā kāryā pṛthivī rūpa tvāt lohita ādi vat iti pratyuta anitya tā hetuḥ asti puruṣa yatna ja lohita apadi rūpa vailakṣaṇyena tvaspavayā prayatna pūrvakatva mātreṇa anāditva abhidhānam iti na āgama virodhaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.68.1^1	 tat evam saṃśaya pramāṇa prameyāṇi parīkṣitāni prayojana ādayaḥ api yatra saṃśayaḥ tatra evam uttarottara prasaṅga etayati deśena parīkṣitāḥ iti ṣoḍaśa api pramāṇa ādayaḥ parīkṣitāḥ teṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ iti uktam tatra api prameya tattva jñānam sākṣāt niḥśreyasa hetuḥ itareṣām tu tattva jñāna aṅgatayā iti uktam idam iha idānīm parīkṣyate kiṃpratyekam ātma ādīnām prameyāṇām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ uta aho kasya cit eṣām eka deśasya iti tām imām parīkṣām avatārayati bhāṣya kāraḥ kim nu khavalu bhoḥ yāvantaḥ viṣayāḥ prameyāṇi tāvatsu pratyekam iti pratiprāṇabhṛt bhedam yāvantaḥ ātmānaḥ yāvanti ca indriyāṇipa ca iti arthaḥ pārśva sthaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇam pṛcchati kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ uttaram na tāvat ekaikatra iti samudāya eka deśābhyām anupapatteḥ pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti ayuktam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntam āha mithyājñānam vai khalu mohaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.68.1^2	 vaiśabdaḥ khalu pūrva ṣakṣa akṣa māyām khalu śabdaḥ hā iti arthe ayuktaḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ yasmāt mithyājñānam mohaḥ iti na tattva jñānam ajñāna nivṛtti mātreṇa niḥ śreyasā upayogi api tu saṃsāra nidāna uccheda dvāreṇa dṛṣṭena eva na ca tattva ajñānam saṃsāra hetuḥ api tu mithyājñānam tad ucchinda t virodhi tayā tattva jñānam apavarga hetuḥ iti bhavatu etat tathā api pūrva pakṣasya kim āyātam iti atas āha tat ca mithyājñānam yatra viṣaye pravartamānam iti sva sambandhinaḥ hi ātma ādayaḥ viparyayeṇa paricchinnāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ iti tat viṣayam eva mithyājñānam apaneyam na ātma ādi antara viṣayam jñānam tena tatra mithyājñānam mā nivartiṣṭa nivartatām vā sva ātma ādi dṛṣṭāntena na tu tasya saṃsāra nivṛttim pratyupayogaḥ yasya tu upayogaḥ tatra tattva jñānam duṣkaram iti pṛcchati kim punar tad mithyā jñānam santi khalu vādinām nānā vipratipattayaḥ ke cit āhuḥ vidhūta vividha nāma rūpa prapañca upaplava viśuddha vid ānanda ghanā dvaita brahma sākṣātkāraḥ tattva jñānam iti 
NVTṬ_4,1.68.1^3	 anye tu sattva puruṣa anya tā khyātim dharma mudgala nairātmya jñānam iti apare śarīra indriya ādyani tva vyatirikta nitya ātma darśanam iti vṛddhāḥ tat evam vipratipatteḥ praśnaḥ uttaram anātmani ātma grahaḥ aham asti iti mohaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ na tāvat advaita ānanda ghana ātma jñānam tattva jñānam bhedasya pratyakṣa siddhasya asati bādhake apahnotum a śakyatvāt na ca prakāśa ānandau= ātma dharma atiriktau= ātma svabhāvau bhavitum arhataḥ satyam vijñānam ānandam brahma iti śrutiḥ ānanda caitanya śakti abhiprāpayā bhedaḥ eva ca tadvat tayā katham cit sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate abhede tu ānanda vijñānayoḥ tad padayoḥ paryāyatayā saha prayoga anupapattiḥ na ca prakṛṣṭa prakāśaḥ savitā iti atra prakṛṣṭa prakāśayoḥ abhedaḥ aprakāśasya api prakarṣa sambhavāt aprakṛṣṭasya api khadyota ādeḥ prakāśa sambhavāt tasmāt yat kim cit etat sattva puruṣa anya tā khyātiḥ tu sattvasya eva prakṛteḥ asambhavāt ayuktā satkārya vāda mūla tvāt pradhāna sadbhāvasya tad nirākaraṇena eva nirākaraṇam 
NVTṬ_4,1.68.1^4	 dharma pudgala nairātmye tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nitya ātma sadbhāva kathanena nirākṛte tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam anātmani ātma grahaḥ aham asmi iti mohaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ iti atas eva sarvasya evam ātma āśīḥ kṛmeḥ api mā na bhūvam bhūyāsam iti saḥ ayam īdṛśaḥ abhiniveśaḥ śarīra ādīnām ātma tvena adhyavasyataḥ bhavati na ātma tattva viduṣaḥ sa khalu ahi nirlvaya nīmi vāhiḥ tatas vyatiriktam śarīra ādi paśyan na tatra snihyati sneha virahāt na tapyate na api anuśocati iti atattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāram darśayitvā tattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāra nivṛttim āha yaḥ tu duḥkham iti tat evam uktena prakāreṇa moha tattva jñānayoḥ saṃsāra apavarga hetu bhāvaḥ yasmāt tasmāt mokṣamāṇaiḥ pretyabhāva phala duḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati ityādi pūrva upasaṃhāraḥ āsevamānasya abhyaḥ syataḥ bhāvayate iti paryāya kathanam bhāvanā dārḍhyepadarśana artham artha gatim pariśodhyātra arthe sūtram paṭhati doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,1.68.2	 śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ anūdyate śāstra tātparya saṃgrahaḥ dvitīya sūveṇa anūdyatā etyarthaḥ kim nu khalu bho iti bhāṣyam tad anupapannam yatas na viṣaya mātra jñānam apavarga hetuḥ api tu prameya tattva jñānam iti ataa āha vārtikakāraḥ tatra viṣaya antarāṇām iti yāvantaḥ viṣayāḥ iti na viṣaya mātra abhiprāyam api tu prameya abhiprāyam iti arthaḥ sugamam anyat vārtikam 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.1	 śarīra ādiṣu anātma sva ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti uktam tatra prathamam kasmin= ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti apekṣāyām āha prasaṃkhyān a ānupūrvyā tu khalu prasaṃkhyānam samādhi jam tattva jñānam tat ca viṣaye sukaram iti tatra eva prāthamikasya prathamam prayatnaḥ yuktaḥ sūtram doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.2^1	 cakāram anukta samuccāya artham vyācaṣṭe karma nimitta tvāt i taretara nimitta tvāt ca samuccyaḥ anuktasya iti śeṣaḥ tatra saṃkalpa nimitta tvāt iti vibhajate mithyā saṃkalpebhyaḥ iti yadi api anubhūta viṣaya prārthanā saṃkalpaḥ tathā apitasya pūrva bhāgaḥ anubhavaḥ grāhyaḥ prārthanāyāḥ rāga tvāt tena mithyā anubhavaḥ saṃkalpaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu ekasmāt mithyājñānāt kutas kārya vaicitryam iti atas āha rañjanīya kopanīya mohanīyebhyaiti bhavya geya ādiṣu pāṭhāt karttari kṛtyaḥ mohanīyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ mithyājñāna saṃskāraḥ karma nimitta tvam rāga ādīnām vibhajate karma ca iti nikāyena jātiḥ upalakṣyate itaretara nimitta tvam rāga ādīnām āha itaretarā iti syāt etat bhavanti anityāḥ kleśāḥ tathā api yat eṣām nirvarttakam mithyājñānam tasya nivṛtti hotoḥ abhāvat saā iva kleśa anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ iti atas āha 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.2^2	 sarvam iti āsaṃkalpānām iti api ca anādiḥ kleśa saṃtatiḥ iti uktam kutas sarva aime ādhyātmikāḥ bhāvāḥ iti ātmānam adhikṛtya pravartamānāḥ śarīra indriya ādayaḥ bhavanti āpadhyātmikāḥ iti atha yadi anādīnām api nivṛttiḥ hantā anutpatti dharmakāṇām api nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha na ca evam satya nud patti dharmakam kim cit iti rāga ādīnām utpatti dharmakāṇām eva vyaya dharmaka tva abhyupagamāt iti arthaḥ nanu mā bhūvat mithyā jñāna nimittā rāga ādayaḥ mithyājñāna anivṛttau ye punar amī karma nimittāḥ teṣām kutas nivṛttiḥ na ca karma nivṛttau rāga ādi nivṛttiḥ rāga ādimataḥ karma nivṛtteḥ abhāvāt tasmāt na mokṣaḥ iti atas āha karma ca nikāya nirvartakam tattva jñāna kṛtāt mithyājñāna rūpa saṃkalpa vighātāt na rāga ādyutapatti nimittam bhavati 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.2^3	 sarva rāga ādīnām mityājñānam eva nimittam karmāṇi tu nikāya niyamena rāga ādīn pravartayanti iti karma nimitta tvam uktam iti bhāvaḥ nanu yathā rāga ādayaḥ sati api karmaṇi mithyājñāna nivṛttyā nivartante evam sati api karmaṇi mithyājñāna nivṛttyā phalam api mā bhūt iti atas āha sukha duḥ kha saṃvittiḥ phalam tu bhavati iti vārttikam yāvat jīva saṃyoge hi jarayā ha vā iti anarthakam iti mṛtyunā vā iti anena eva gata artha tvāt iti anuktvā bhāṣya uktā dvitīya yuktiḥ abhihitā vārtika kṛtā yasmāt svayam aśaktasya iti anena yajña sādhana tvāt iti yajña kartṛ tvāt iti arthaḥ etat eva sphaṭayati yasmāt yajamānaḥ yajña aṅgam bhavati yathā āha bhagavāna jaiminiḥ puruṣaḥ ca karma artha tvāt iti saṃkalpa ādi apekṣam karma rāga ādi kāraṇam iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.2^4	 yat jātīyasya janmanaḥ yat karma kāraṇam tad janma ucitām eva mithyājñāna vāsanām abhivyanakti iti tad dvāreṇa rāga ādīnām kāraṇam bhavati codayati sukha ādīnām iti yathā mithyājñāna sahāyam karma rāga ādi hetuḥ evam tat sahāyam phala hetuḥ iti carama dehasya tatu ajñānavataḥ sat api karma phala kāraṇam na syāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na niraprekṣa tvāt iti karma āśaya prapañcam ucchettum amūḍhaḥ api asaktaḥ api adviṣṭaḥ api mūḍhaḥ iva saktaḥ iva dviṣṭaḥ iva tad phalam bhuṅkte iti rāga ādi anapekṣam karma sva phalam janayati tena asau phala ūṣa bhogaḥ na bandha hetuḥ mūḍha ādīnām bandha hetuḥ mūḍha ādīnām bandha hetu phala upabhogaḥ sa catādṛśaḥ rāga ādi sahāyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kriyate na rāga ādi nirapekṣaiḥ iti avadātam iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.3^1	 tat evam saṃśaya pramāṇa prameyāṇi parīkṣitāni prayojana ādayaḥ api yatra saṃśayaḥ tatra evam uttarottara prasaṅga etayati deśena parīkṣitāḥ iti ṣoḍaśa api pramāṇa ādayaḥ parīkṣitāḥ teṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ iti uktam tatra api prameya tattva jñānam sākṣāt niḥśreyasa hetuḥ itareṣām tu tattva jñāna aṅgatayā iti uktam idam iha idānīm parīkṣyate kiṃpratyekam ātma ādīnām prameyāṇām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ uta aho kasya cit eṣām eka deśasya iti tām imām parīkṣām avatārayati bhāṣya kāraḥ kim nu khavalu bhoḥ yāvantaḥ viṣayāḥ prameyāṇi tāvatsu pratyekam iti pratiprāṇabhṛt bhedam yāvantaḥ ātmānaḥ yāvanti ca indriyāṇipa ca iti arthaḥ pārśva sthaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇam pṛcchati kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ uttaram na tāvat ekaikatra iti samudāya eka deśābhyām anupapatteḥ pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti ayuktam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntam āha mithyājñānam vai khalu mohaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.3^2	 vaiśabdaḥ khalu pūrva ṣakṣa akṣa māyām khalu śabdaḥ hā iti arthe ayuktaḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ yasmāt mithyājñānam mohaḥ iti na tattva jñānam ajñāna nivṛtti mātreṇa niḥ śreyasā upayogi api tu saṃsāra nidāna uccheda dvāreṇa dṛṣṭena eva na ca tattva ajñānam saṃsāra hetuḥ api tu mithyājñānam tad ucchinda t virodhi tayā tattva jñānam apavarga hetuḥ iti bhavatu etat tathā api pūrva pakṣasya kim āyātam iti atas āha tat ca mithyājñānam yatra viṣaye pravartamānam iti sva sambandhinaḥ hi ātma ādayaḥ viparyayeṇa paricchinnāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ iti tat viṣayam eva mithyājñānam apaneyam na ātma ādi antara viṣayam jñānam tena tatra mithyājñānam mā nivartiṣṭa nivartatām vā sva ātma ādi dṛṣṭāntena na tu tasya saṃsāra nivṛttim pratyupayogaḥ yasya tu upayogaḥ tatra tattva jñānam duṣkaram iti pṛcchati kim punar tad mithyā jñānam santi khalu vādinām nānā vipratipattayaḥ ke cit āhuḥ vidhūta vividha nāma rūpa prapañca upaplava viśuddha vid ānanda ghanā dvaita brahma sākṣātkāraḥ tattva jñānam iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.3^3	 anye tu sattva puruṣa anya tā khyātim dharma mudgala nairātmya jñānam iti apare śarīra indriya ādyani tva vyatirikta nitya ātma darśanam iti vṛddhāḥ tat evam vipratipatteḥ praśnaḥ uttaram anātmani ātma grahaḥ aham asti iti mohaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ na tāvat advaita ānanda ghana ātma jñānam tattva jñānam bhedasya pratyakṣa siddhasya asati bādhake apahnotum a śakyatvāt na ca prakāśa ānandau= ātma dharma atiriktau= ātma svabhāvau bhavitum arhataḥ satyam vijñānam ānandam brahma iti śrutiḥ ānanda caitanya śakti abhiprāpayā bhedaḥ eva ca tadvat tayā katham cit sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate abhede tu ānanda vijñānayoḥ tad padayoḥ paryāyatayā saha prayoga anupapattiḥ na ca prakṛṣṭa prakāśaḥ savitā iti atra prakṛṣṭa prakāśayoḥ abhedaḥ aprakāśasya api prakarṣa sambhavāt aprakṛṣṭasya api khadyota ādeḥ prakāśa sambhavāt tasmāt yat kim cit etat sattva puruṣa anya tā khyātiḥ tu sattvasya eva prakṛteḥ asambhavāt ayuktā satkārya vāda mūla tvāt pradhāna sadbhāvasya tad nirākaraṇena eva nirākaraṇam 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.3^4	 dharma pudgala nairātmye tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nitya ātma sadbhāva kathanena nirākṛte tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam anātmani ātma grahaḥ aham asmi iti mohaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ iti atas eva sarvasya evam ātma āśīḥ kṛmeḥ api mā na bhūvam bhūyāsam iti saḥ ayam īdṛśaḥ abhiniveśaḥ śarīra ādīnām ātma tvena adhyavasyataḥ bhavati na ātma tattva viduṣaḥ sa khalu ahi nirlvaya nīmi vāhiḥ tatas vyatiriktam śarīra ādi paśyan na tatra snihyati sneha virahāt na tapyate na api anuśocati iti atattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāram darśayitvā tattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāra nivṛttim āha yaḥ tu duḥkham iti tat evam uktena prakāreṇa moha tattva jñānayoḥ saṃsāra apavarga hetu bhāvaḥ yasmāt tasmāt mokṣamāṇaiḥ pretyabhāva phala duḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati ityādi pūrva upasaṃhāraḥ āsevamānasya abhyaḥ syataḥ bhāvayate iti paryāya kathanam bhāvanā dārḍhyepadarśana artham artha gatim pariśodhyātra arthe sūtram paṭhati doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.1.4	 śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ anūdyate śāstra tātparya saṃgrahaḥ dvitīya sūveṇa anūdyatā etyarthaḥ kim nu khalu bho iti bhāṣyam tad anupapannam yatas na viṣaya mātra jñānam apavarga hetuḥ api tu prameya tattva jñānam iti ataa āha vārtikakāraḥ tatra viṣaya antarāṇām iti yāvantaḥ viṣayāḥ iti na viṣaya mātra abhiprāyam api tu prameya abhiprāyam iti arthaḥ sugamam anyat vārtikam 
NVTṬ_4,2.2.1–4,2.2.2	 śarīra ādiṣu anātma sva ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti uktam tatra prathamam kasmin= ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti apekṣāyām āha prasaṃkhyān a ānupūrvyā tu khalu prasaṃkhyānam samādhi jam tattva jñānam tat ca viṣaye sukaram iti tatra eva prāthamikasya prathamam prayatnaḥ yuktaḥ sūtram doṣa nimittam rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ saṃkalpa kṛtāḥ mithyājñānam saṃkalpaḥ tena viṣayīkṛtāḥ iti arthaḥ kāmāḥ kāmyāḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.3.1–4,2.3.2^1	 anye khalu avayavi saṃjñām nivartayantaḥ avayavinam eva pratyācakṣate tān pratyācakṣāṇaḥ āha tad nimittam tu avayavi abhimānaḥ nimittam danta tva ādi tad viśiṣṭāḥ viṣayāḥ saṃjñāḥ priyāyāḥ kāmukaḥ danta uṣṭha nāsikā ādīn avayavān anubhāvayantasyām saktaḥ bhavati vyañjanāni avayavinaḥ avayavāḥ taiḥ saha upalambhāt teṣām anuvyañjanam tad sādṛśyam tena tad ā āropaḥ tathā ca straiṇānām vyavahāraḥ dravat kanaka nirmala dyutiḥ anaṅga līlā eka bharma hebha kaṭa vibhrama stana bhara alasa aṅgī yadi priyā na parirabhyate tulita siddhaṃsaṃjīvinī sa hemahi kutas anyathā viṣama bāṇa bāṇa vyathām madana saritam enām gāhamānaḥ janaḥ ayam jaghana pulinanābhī maṇḍala āvarta ramyām mukha nalina sanāthām ullasat bhrulatā ūrmim cira viraha hutāśāya asam ujjhām cakāra vivekinaḥ tu aśubha saṃjñām bhāvayantaḥ prāhuḥ majja āmasthnām atha plīhnām yakṛtām śakṛtām api 
NVTṬ_4,2.3.2^2	 pūrṇāḥ snāyu śirā syūtāḥ striyaḥ carma prasevikāḥ ṛṣayaḥ api ūcuḥ sthānāt bījāt upaṣṭambhāt niṣpandāt nidhanāt api kāyam ādheya śauca tvāt paṇḍitāḥ hi aśucim viduḥ aśubha saṃjñā bhāvanā prayojanam āha tāmasyabhāvayatā eti tat kim idānīm avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñayoḥ viṣayaḥ na asti aśubha saṃjñā viṣayaḥ eva paramasti iti ataa āha sati eva ca dvividha viṣayaḥ iti dvividha ā iva asau kāminī lakṣaṇaḥ viṣayaḥ tathā api rāga ādi prahāṇa artham avayava ādi saṃjñā gocara tvam parityajya aśubha saṃjñā gocara tvam asya upādīyate vairāgya utpādanāya iti arthaḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā viṣa saṃpṛktaḥ iti na hi viṣa madhunī paramārthataḥ na staḥ api tu vairāgyāya viṣa saṃjñā tatra upādīyataiti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.4.1	 tat evam sva matena prasaṃkhyāna upadeśam uktvā para abhimata prasaṃkhyānam nirākarttum upanyasyati atha idānīm artham nirākariṣyatā vijñāna vādinā avaya vi nirākaraṇam upapādyate artha viśeṣe khalu avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñe tatra artha mātrasya abhāvāt kutas avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñe tad nirākaraṇāya prathamam avayavī nirākriyate paścāt paramāṇuḥ tatas ca jñāna mātram artha rahitam siddham bhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ tatra saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt upapādanasya vicārasya saṃśayam prathamam āha vidyā avidyā dvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.4.2–4,2.6.1	 upalabdhiḥ vidyā anupalabdhiḥ ca avidyā sat ca upalabhyate yathā taḍāge toyam asat ca upalabhyate yathā maru marīcikāyām udakam sat ca na upalabhyate yathā cira nikhātam bhūmau nidhi ādi asat ca na upalabhyate yathā bhū tale dṛśyamāne tad tulya upalambhana yogyatas ghaṭa ādiḥ tat evam vidyā avidyā dvaividhyāt avayavini saṃśayaḥ yadi avayavi upalabhyate tathā api saṃśayaḥ atha na upalabhyate tathā api saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ tatra siddhāntī vakṣyamāṇam api avayavi nirākaraṇa hetum nirākariṣyāmi iti āśayavān āha tad asaṃśayaḥ pūrva hetu prasiddha tvāt avayavinaḥ vārtikakāraḥ tu svayam saṃśayam nirākaroti na vidyā avidyāt vaividhyam saṃśayasya kāraṇam iti pūrva pakṣa vādyāha vṛtti anupapatteḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.7.1	 vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati śākhā ādiṣu śākhā ādayaḥ vā vṛkṣaḥ iti laukikīm pratipattim anurudhyamānaḥ vikalpayati vārttikakāraḥ avayavāḥ avayavinī iti eka dravyaḥ ca avayavaḥ prāpnoti kutas eka avaya vi vṛtti tvāt bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha na ca eka dravyam dravyam avinaśyat ādhāram asti kṛtakasya nitya tva prasaṅgāt iti śeṣaḥ avayavi eka deśena iti avayavinaḥ yaḥ eka deśāḥ tena avayavaḥ avayavini varttataityarthaḥ na hi asya avayavinaḥ anye avayaveṣu eka deśāḥ avayavāḥ santi iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.8.1–4,2.9.1	 ekena avayavena ārabhyate iti satata utpatti prasaṅgaḥ saṃyogāya kila carama bhāvine avayava vyāpāraḥ tad nimittāni ca apekṣyante eka dravyasya utpattim prati na saṃyoga apekṣā iti yāvat avayavam avayavi utpadyeta iti avayavi anavaruddhaḥ na kadācid avayavaḥ dṛśyeta iti arthaḥ avayavi atirekeṇa varttamānaḥ avayavi upalabhyeta na ca asya ādhāra antam upalabhyate dṛśyamānaḥ ca avayavaḥ na adhikaraṇam asya iti bhavatā eva vādinā abhyupagatam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha nityaḥ ca syāt 
NVTṬ_4,2.10.1–4,2.10.2^1	 yaḥ tu manyate avayavānām dharma mātram avayavī na tu avayavebhyaḥ atyantam bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā bhinna tve gavāśva vat varma dharmi bhāva anupapatteḥ abhede api dharmi rūpavat tad anupapatteḥ ca tasmāt katham cit bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ ca katham cit dharma mātram avayavānām amayavī iti tam pratyāha na ca avayavi avayavāḥ na tāvat bheda abhedau paraspara abhāva ātmānau= ekatra samavetaḥ iti uktam na api ātyantike abhede dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ tasmāt yathā ātyantika bhede api keṣāñcid eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā keṣām cit eva dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ iti eṣitavyam tathā ca dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.10.1–4,2.10.2^2–4,2.11.1	 avayavī ca eka deśena avayave varttate iti avayava samūha mātram avayavī prāpnoti iti asya ayamaryaḥ avayave hi varttamānaḥ avayavī iti ucyate avayavi eka deśāḥ ced avayaveṣu varttante eka deśa ā iva tarhi avayavinaḥ te ca nānā itti avayava samūha mātram avayavī prāpnoti ekasmin= ca avayave eka deśe varttamānaḥ avayavī iti na tāvat avayavī kvacid avayave varttate iti tad eka deśānām tatra tatra avayave vṛtteḥ tāvat mātreṇa ca avayavinaḥ grahaṇam iti yatra eva asya eka deśaḥ varttate tatra eva grahītavyaḥ tathā ca ekasmin tantau paṭa eka deśaḥ varttate iti tantau= ekasmin paṭaḥ dṛśyeta iti arthaḥ siddhāntavādi āha 
NVTṬ_4,2.12.1^1	 eka deśanena ca avayavī na sva avayaveṣu varttataityatra pratijñā arthe avayava antara abhāvāt iti ahetuḥ kasmāt yadi api avayava antaram avayavinaḥ bhavati tathā api avayava antarāṇi avayavinaḥ avayava antareṣu varttante kim āyātam avaya vi vṛtteḥ iti eka śca anekatra varttate iti pratijñānānaḥ kim kārtsnyena kim eka deśena iti na anuyoktavyaḥ kasmātu bhayena kārtsnyena eka deśena vā nānātva eka artha samavāyinā ekasya avayavinaḥ vyāghātāt etat upajīvi āha yadi avayavī na eka deśena varttane na kārtsnyenaatha katham varttate iti śaṅkate rūpa antara anirddeśāt iti ced sa upahāsam dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā acitrāḥ tantavaḥ paṭam citram ārabhante iti naiyāyikaiḥ kila acitraiḥ tantubhiḥ citraḥ paṭaḥ ārabhyata eti abhyupeyate tat ca etat ayuktam na tāvat citram rūpam ekam paṭa samevatam sva vacana virodhāt nānā hi citram ucyate tat katham ekam iti tena yat uktam bhavati na anā ekam iti tat uktam bhavati citram ekam iti yat āhuḥ citram tat ekam iti ced idam citrataram mahat iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.12.1^2	 na ca nīla pīta ādayaḥ eva bahavaḥ avyāpya vṛttayaḥ citra pada āspadam iti sāṃpratam rūpādanām vyāpya vṛtti tvāt te amī vivāda adhyāsitāḥ nīla pīta ādayaḥ vyāpanīyāḥ āśraya vṛttayaḥ rūpa jātīya tvāt śukla paṭa gata rūpavat iti upapannaḥ upahāsaḥ yathā acitrāḥ tantavaḥ paṭam citram ārabhante iti nirākaroti na upalabhyamāna rūpa ādhāra tvāt avayavinaḥ rūpam nirddiśyatām iti bruvāṇena iti avayavaḥ asya asti iti avayavī avayavaḥ ca kāraṇam tat vā anavayavī kāryam iti kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagamaḥ kutas bhavati na ca prasaṅga sādhanam nāma kim cit asti pramāṇam tarkaḥ tu bhavet na ca ayam pramāṇena itikartavyatām vinā pramāṇam artham sādhayitum arhati iti arthaḥ yat api tvayā upahāsa abhiprāyeṇa paṭa rūpam citram dṛṣṭāntīkṛtam tatra abhiprāyaḥ tāvat tava yādṛśaḥ tādṛśaḥ vā sacanāt tāvat ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratibhāti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca vādi prativādinā ūḥ avivāda viṣayaḥ iti tad sādhanam vyartham tathā api upetya citravādam brūmaḥ tvām prati citram rūpam paṭa sambandhi tayā sādhayāmaḥ tvad abhiprāya vyāpta upahāsa nirākaraṇāya iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.12.1^3	 paṭasya citram rūpam iti anubhavaḥ eva atra ābādhitaḥ pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ bauddhaḥ sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati aneka tva prasaṅgaḥ iti śced iti nirākaroti citra śabdasya eka aneka viṣaya tvāt yadi nānā eva citramucyeta tatas syāt virodhaḥ kim tu ekasmin= api citra padam prayujyate tasmāt na ekatvena asya virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ deśakaḥ āha na ekasmin= adṛṣṭa tvāt ekasmin= citra grāhiṇaḥ anubhavasya adṛṣṭa tvāt puruṣa vivakṣā dhīna pravṛttayaḥ tu śabdāḥ kva nāma durlabhāḥ iti bhāvaḥ pariharati na abhyupeta hāneḥ iti na tāvat aneka pada paryāyaḥ citra śabdaḥ anekam citram iti aneka pradena sāmānādhikaraṇyam pratipattum arhvati paryāya śabdānām saha prayoga anupapatteḥ dṛśyate tu prayogaḥ anekam citram iti tasmāt yathā śuklāni nānā tathā citrāṇi nānā iti abhyupetavyam tathā ca ekam śuklam anabhyupagacchataḥ yathā śukla nānā tva abhyupagamaḥ hīyate evam eva ekam citram anabhyupagacchataḥ citra nātvā abhyupagamaḥ hīyata hati arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.12.1^4	 śaṅkā antaram āha atha anekam acitram iti nirākraroti evam api iti śaṅkate atha acitrāṇi iti pariharati evam ca na kim cit iti iṣyate eva asmābhiḥ yathā avayava samavetaiḥ sita harita lohita ādibhiḥ asamavāyi kāraṇaiḥ avayavini citram rūpam ārabhyate iti deśayati puṭa antara eti puṭa antaram pārśva antaram pariharati bhavatā evedem uktam iti ekaḥ api guṇaḥ ārabhate iti matvā śaṅkate citra pratyayaḥ tatra iti samādhate na prasaktaḥ iti nanu yat citrā citrābhyām ārabdham avayavinaḥ rūpam tat api pīta ādi vat niddiṃśyatām na ca śakya nirddeṣṭum tasmāt na asti iti atas āha etāvat iti anirvācyam api anubhūyamānam aśakya apahūvam yathā ikṣu kṣarīra ādīnām mā adharyasya antaram mahat iti arthaḥ na tāvat avayava rūpa ādayavavinaḥ grahaṇam yuktam iti na dravya antara rūpeṇa dravya antare cākṣuṣa tvam dṛṣṭam na khalu pṛthivī ādi rūpeṇa vāyuḥ cākṣuṣaḥ iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti avikalpitāḥ avicāritāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.13–14.1–4,2.15.2	 sarva agrahaṇam avayavya siddheḥ iti atra pratyavasthitaḥ pūrva pakṣī atha idam āha iti keśa samūhe taimirika upalabdhi vat tat upalabdheḥ ityādi sūtra bhāṣya vārtikāni pūrva pakṣa siddhāntayoḥ atirohita arthāni api ca ayam vṛtti vikalpaṃāśraya vyāghātāt ayuktaḥ iti āha avayava avayava prasaṅgaḥ ca evam āpralayāt atra trayaḥ pakṣāḥ saṃbhavanti yaḥ ayam avayaveṣu avayavi vṛtti vikalpa anupapattyā avayavinaḥ abhāva prasaṅga āpādyate saḥ ā pralayāt vā nivarttatā paramāṇoḥ vā na kva cit api nivarttate iti tatra prathama dvitīya vikalpau= āśritya idaṃsūtram yathā eva vṛtti vikalpaḥ sthūle ghaṭa ādau= avayaveṣu tad avayaveṣu iti tad abhāvāt pralaye vyavatiṣṭheta na ca tadā pralayaḥ sarva upākhyā virahitaḥ darśana viṣayaḥ saṃbhavati iti darśana viṣaya abhāvāt anāśrayaḥ vikalpaḥ ātmānam eva na labhate upalakṣaṇam ca etadā pralayāt iti ā paramāṇoḥ iti api draṣṭavyam paramāṇūnām api atīndriya tvena darśana viṣaya tva abhāvāt anāśrayatā vikalpasya tad avasthā eva tat idam uktam niravayavāt vā paramāṇutaḥ nivartteta iti atha api iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.16.1–4,2.17.2^1	 api ca iti arthaḥ api ca pralayam abhyupetya idam uktamā pralayāt iti vastutas tu na pralayaḥ aṇu sadbhāvāt niravayava tve pramāṇam āha niravayava tvam tu paramāṇoḥ iti atha anantaḥ eva ayam avaya vākya vivibhāgaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti atas āha param vā truṭeḥ truṭistra sareṇuḥ iti anarthāntaram jāla sūrya marīci stham trasareṇa rajaḥ smṛtam yadi truṭeḥ param dvi tri padake avayava vibhagaḥ na vyavatiṣṭhate tatas a vayava vibhāgasya anavasthānāt dravyāṇām asaṃkhyeya tvāt truṭi tva nivṛttiḥ truṭiḥ api sumeruṇā tulya parimāṇaḥ syāt na khalu ananta avayava tve kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ vārtikam yāvat vā pralayaḥ anivṛttiḥ vā iti pralaya paramāṇu pakṣe vikalpa nivṛtiḥ na asti darśana viṣayaḥ tu na asti iti anāśrayaḥ vikalpaḥ ananta avayava tve sarvasya vikalpa āghrāta tva iva darśana viṣaya abhāvaḥ iti anāśrayaḥ vikalpa eti arthaḥ saṃkhyā udāharaṇam 
NVTṬ_4,2.17.2^2	 iyantaḥ ca te paramāṇavaḥ saṃhatāḥ truṭi bhāvam āpadyante iti sāvayava tve tu paramāṇu śabdasya arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ kim uktam bhavati paramāṇuḥ iti parama tva viśiṣṭaḥ hi aṇuḥ paramāṇuḥ yatas kṣodīyaḥ na aparam asti iti yāvat tasmāt api ced kṣodīyaḥ anyat asti na eṣa parama tva viśiṣṭaḥ aṇuḥ iti arthaḥ atha bhinna parimāṇāḥ paramāṇu avayavāḥ tatas nyūna parimāṇāḥ iti yāvat tatas na paramāṇuḥ pratiṣidhyate paramāṇu avayavāḥ eva paramāṇavaḥ te ca anavayava tvāt akāryāḥ tvayā ca paramāṇu ārabdham kāryam paramāṇuḥ iti kṛtvā āropya vṛtti tri kalpena pratiṣidhyate iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.18.1	 atha idānīmānupalambhikaḥ tasya vyākhyānam sarvam na asti iti manvānam āha ākāśa vyatibhedāt tasya paramāṇoḥ niravayavasya anupapattiḥ sāvayatve tu vṛtti vikalpāt tad abhāvaḥ iti śūnyatā eva tattvam bhāvānām anāśritopi vikalpaḥ yathā loka pratīti kalpanā mātra nirmitaḥ tāttvikīm śūnyatām gamayati mithyājñānānām api tattva avagama hetutva darśanāt yathā dūrāt vanaspatau hasti pratyaya pravāhaḥ vanaspati tattva pratipatteḥ ddetuḥ yathā rekhā gavayaḥ vā gavayatva pratipatteḥ ityādi bahūt prekṣitavyam iti bhāvaḥ teda tat vārttikakāra udūṣayati ākāśa vyatibhedāt anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ iti abhidhānaḥ vyatiśreda artham praṣṭavyā eti 
NVTṬ_4,2.19–20.1	 antar bahis iti vacanam kāryasya kāraṇa antara vacanam iti kāraṇa antaram kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ tasya vacanam iti arthaḥ upetya paramāṇoḥ avayavān na tad vibhāgasya ākāśam kāraṇam iti ākāśa vyatibhedāt iti ākāśa hetukam vyatibhedam vibhāgam āha na ca ākāśam vibhajyamānayoḥ dravya antarayoḥ vibhāgasya kāraṇam api tu karma iti arthaḥ sarvatas avyavahitasya yasya madhye avayavāḥ na santi iti tat su piram iti sarvatas avyavahitaspaya nirantarasya avayavinaḥ sva avayava dvāreṇa etat uktam bhavati yasya avayavāḥ paritas nirantaram avasthitāḥ madhye ca na santi tat suṣiram iti yat mūrtimat tena sarveṇa sambadhyate mūrtimatā sarveṇa sambaddhat tvam sarvatatvam vadataḥ vārtikakārasya aja saṃyogasya abhyupagamaḥ prauḍhi vādatayā iti lakṣyate 
NVTṬ_4,2.21–22.1–4,2.24.1	 syāt etatākāśam ced sarva gatam tatas mūrtimatām dravyāṇām tena pratibandhāt gateḥ āvaraṇam vyūha antara āpādanam ca jala oghasya iva nāvādinā bhavet na ca asti tasmāt na sarva gatam iti atas āha avyūha aviṣṭambha vibhu tvāni ca ākāśa dharma arḥ yatas eva avyūha āviṣṭam bhāvataeva apratyūham vibhu tvam asya iti arthaḥ punar śūnyatāvādī pratyavatiṣṭhate mūrtimatām ca saṃsthāna upapatteḥ avayava sadbhāvaḥ caḥ tu arthaḥ siddhāntam nivarttayati yadi api mūrtimatām iti saṃbandhi tva mātreṇa upāttam sūtram tathā api hetu padatayā vārtika kāraḥ vyācaṣṭe sa avayavāḥ paramāṇa vomūrttimat tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti prayoga antaram āha saṃsthānavat tvāt iti sūtra antaram anuvṛtti sahitam paṭhati saṃyoga upapatteḥ ca iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^1	 paunaruktyam deśayati nanu idam iti pariharati na carita artham iti mūrtiḥ nāma avyāpinaḥ dravyasya ṣaḍvidham parimāṇam iti para mahva sva tva parama aṇu tve parama sūkṣmaḥ eva dravye vyavatiṣṭhete vyāpi tu gṛhītvā parama mahat tva parama dīrgha tvābhyām aṣṭavidham parimāṇam bhavati parama mahat tva parama dīrgha tvam ca sarva gata vyāpinī iti na mūrtiḥ asarva gata dravya parimāṇam mūrttiḥ iti pāramarṣaṃvacanāt saṃsthānam nāma pracaya ākhyaḥ saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa ādi vṛttiḥ ghaṭa tva ādi jāti vyakti hetuḥ iti saṃyogaḥ saṃyoga mātram na tu aprāpti pūrvikā prāptiḥ iti tasmāt apaunaruktyam tat etat śūnya tām atam apākaroti yat tāvat mūrtimat tvāt iti śūnyatā vādī pralaya antatva abhimānena āha atha tāvat iti siddhānti āha antaḥ niravayavaiti pralaya anta tvam adhastāt nikākṛtam iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^2	 nanu adhastāt nirākaraṇāt mā bhūt pralaya antaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāga antaḥ tu bhaviṣyati kim paramāṇu anta tā graheṇa iti āśaṅkate atha antaḥ vibhāgaḥ nirākaroti sa na yuktā eti na asati guṇini guṇaḥ asti iti arthaḥ etāvantaḥ ca kalpāḥ sambhavinaḥ tatra prathama kalpe anaikāntika tva vyāghātau dvitīye vibhāgasya anādhāra tva prasaṅgaḥ tṛtīye truṭeḥ ameya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti āha etāvat ca etat syāt iti paramāṇu anta tām vibhāgasya bruvat niravayavam mūrttimantam paramāṇum pratipadyasaḥ iti ananta tve tu truṭeḥ ameya tva prasaṅgaḥ vyāghātaḥ pralaya anta tve ca vibhāgasya anādhārat tva prasaṅgaḥ vyāghātaḥ sāvayava śabdasya arthaḥ samāna jātīya avayavam na kevalam tadāravdham api tu tad āśritam tantu ādi ārabdham paṭa ādi dravyam tantu ādi āśritam ca nanu evam api kutas sāvayava tvam iti atas āha 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^3	 avayavaḥ tad ādhāraḥ tasya samāna jātīya ārabdhasya kārya dravyasya ādhāraḥtasmāt sāvayava tvam kārya viśeṣaḥ tasmāt sāvayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ iti atibruvatā kārya viśaiṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ iti uktam bhavati kārya viṣeḥ ca paramāṇuḥ iti vyāhatam ānantye tu truṭeḥ ameya tva prasaṅgāt sā khalu anava yavasya kalpitasya parama sūkṣma tayā paramāṇu ākhyā tena paramāṇuḥ iti kim uktam bhavati anavayavaḥ akāryaḥ ca iti sa avayavaḥ iti kim uktam bhavati sāvayavaḥ kāryaḥ ca iti pratijñā padayoḥ vyāghāta eti arthaḥ atha mā bhūt trṛṭeḥ ameya tvam iti eka paramāṇu pūrvaka tvam paramāṇoḥ pratipadyase śeṣam ati rohita artham yadi dve dravya adhikṛtya abhidhīyate iti madhyasya hi paramāṇoḥ upayardhaḥ pārśva vartibhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ye saṃyogāḥ tatra madhyasya pūrveṇa paramāṇunā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ na asau madhyapaścima paramāṇu āśritaḥ evam madhyama paramāṇu saṃyogaḥ na eva madhyamapūrva paramāṇu āśraya eti 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^4	 eva manyatra api draṣṭavyam ṣaṣ api bhinna deśā eva iti samāna deśa tvam aṃsiddham atha paramāṇūnām sambandhinam paramāṇum madhyam adhikṛtya ucyate tad āśritāḥ hi saṃyogāḥ ṣaṭ api bhavanti iti tatra āha na kim cit bādhyate iti syāt etat saṃyoga samāna deśa tvena paramāṇavaḥ api saṃyuktāḥ samāna deśāḥ iti piṇḍasya aṇu mātra tva prasaṅga eti para uktam anuvadati yat punar etat iti tat dūṣayati tat na iti yatra yat samavetam sa tasya dośaḥ yathā rūpa ādīnām dravyam na ca paramāṇavaḥ kva cit samavayanti kim tu tad saṃyogāḥ tena deśavatām saṃyogānām astu samāna deśa tā na tu paramāṇū nām adeśa tvāt iti arthaḥ deśayati nanu kārya kāraṇe iti yathā iha kuṇḍe badaram iti yathā badaram kuṇḍa deśaḥ evam tad avayavāḥ tad avayavāḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^5	 na ca samavāyaḥ eva deśa deśi tva nibandhanam api tu saṃyogaḥ api na hi iha kuṇḍe badaram iha paṭe śukla tvam iti vā ādhārya ādhāra pratyayaḥ viśiṣyate tasmāt bahūnām dravyāṇām samāna deśattva darśana at na asiddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ tat dūṣayati etat anabhyupagamena pratyuktam dravyāṇām ekatra samavāyena samāna deśa tām vyāsedhāmaḥ na tu saṃyogena samavāyena hi samāna deśa tā sthaulya paripanthinī yathā gandha rasa rūpa sparśāḥ samāna deśāḥ na sthaulyam ārabhante tat kasya hetoḥ eṣām amūrtānām samāna deśa samavāyāt mūrtāḥ tu sparśavantaḥ samavāyena asamāna deśāḥ paraspara saṃyoginaḥ yadi sthaulyam ārabhante kim bādhyate tasmāt saṃyoginaḥ yadi sthaulyam ārabhante kim bādhyate tasmāt saṃyogena samāna deśa tā na pratiṣadhyate samavāyena tu pratiṣidhyate sā hi sthaulya virodhinī iti siddham 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^6	 abhyupetya evam uktam saṃyogāḥ samāna deśāḥ iti paramārthataḥ tu kuṇḍa badara saṃyogasya kuṇḍa badare āśrayaḥ tad avayava kuṇḍa badara saṃyogasya kuṇḍa badara avayavāḥ iti siddham saṃyogānām api bhinna deśa tvam iti āha na ca saṃyogāḥ api iti upasaṃharati ṣaṇṇām samāna deśa tvāt iti vākyam iti yat punaruktam diś deśa bhedaḥ yasya asti tasya ekatvam na yuktam iti paramāṇoḥ kila bhavat abhimatasya ekasya digbhāgāḥ ṣaṭ na ca ekasya diś bhāge bhedaḥ asti iti ṣaṣ eva paramāṇavaḥ etat dūṣayati kaḥ evam āha diś deśa bhedaḥ sti iti svarūpeṇa ekā diś sarva gatā ca na asyāḥ bhedaḥ asti iti arthaḥ yadi ekā eva diś kva tarhi paramāṇau= asmāt ayam paramāṇuḥ pūrvaḥ ayam paścimaḥ ityādayaḥ buddhi vyapadeśa bhedāḥ iti atas āha 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^7	 diś deśa bhedāḥ ca diśaḥ saṃyogāḥ eka tve api diśaḥ āditya udaya deśa pratyāsanna deśa saṃyuktaḥ yaḥ sā etarasmāt viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogāt paramāṇoḥ pūrvaḥpaḥ evam āditya astamaya deśa pratyāsanna deśa saṃyuktaḥ yaḥ saḥ itatasmāt viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogāt paramāṇoḥ paścimaḥ tau ca pūrva paścimau paramāṇū apekṣya yaḥ sūrya udaya astamaya deśa viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogaḥ sa madhvavatīm evam etayoḥ yau tiryak deśa sambandhinau madhyasya ārjavena vyavasthitau pārśva vartinau tau dakṣiṇa uttarau paramāṇū evam madhyandina varti sūrya sannikarṣa viprakarṣau pūrva saṃkhyā avacchinna tvam ca alpa tvam para saṃkhyā avacchinna tvam ca bhūyas tvam tasmāt ekasya api paramāṇoḥ paramāṇu antara saṃyogāḥ avyāpya vṛttayaḥ eva bhāgāḥ evam diśaḥ api ekasyāḥ api saṃyogāḥ eva bhāgāḥ saḥ ayam paramāṇoḥ ṣaṭkena yugapad yogaḥ mūrtta tva mātra prayuktaḥ na sāvayava tva prayuktā eti na sāvayava tvam gamayitum arhati iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.25.1^8	 tena yudacyate prasaṅga sādhanam paraiḥ yat nirayavam tat na ṣaṭkena saṃyuktam yathā vijñānam tathā ca paramāṇuḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ iti tat nirastam mūrta tva prayukta tvena ṣaṭka saṃyogasya sāvayava tvena vyāpteḥ asiddheḥ chāyā ātapa yogaḥ api paramāṇoḥ eka saṃyogasya avyāpya vṛtti tvena upapannaḥ nanu anavasthā na upapadyate iti uktam tat kutas iti atas āha bhāṣya kāraḥ anavasthāyām pratyadhikaraṇam dravya avayavānām ānantyāt kriyāvat tva ādīn ahetūn sarvathā vikalpya vārtikakāraḥ dūṣayati ye tu kriyāvat tvāt iti etena asiddhatvena na hi ghaṭa ādi kam avayavinam anabhyupagacchataḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ asti iti arthaḥ matupaḥ ca artha antare dṛṣṭa tvāt viruddhaḥ iti kriyā paramāṇoḥ artha antaram anicchataḥ matubh prayogaḥ viruddhaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.26.1	 vijñāna vādyāha yat idam bhavān buddhīḥ iti yadi paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ bhinnaḥ bhavet tantu ati nekeṇa gauḥ iva aśva atirekeṇa upalabhyeta na ca upalabhyate tasmāt paṭaḥ iti mithyā buddhiḥ iyam tantuḥ iti api mithyā buddhiḥ aṃśubhyaḥ bhedena anupalambhāt evam aṃśuḥ iti api tat anena krameṇa paramāṇuṣu api buddhyā vivicyamāneṣu yāthātmya anupalabdheḥ na bāhya vaḥ tu sthūlam vā kṣodīyaḥ vā asti iti sarvāḥ eva buddhayaḥ su a ākāram abāhyam bāhya tayā ālambamānāḥ mithyā bhūtāḥ iti nanu paṭa ādayaḥ sa avayavāḥ bhavantu evam paramāṇūnām tu anavayava tvāt buddhyā vivecanāt bhāvānām yāthātmya upalabdhiḥ iti ataa āha paramāṇavaḥ api bhāgaśas vi bhajyamānām tāvat yāvat pralaya eti bhavantu paramāṇavaḥ anavayavāḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ tu ṣaḍbhyaḥ buddhyā vivicyamānasya yāthātmyam upalabhyate iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.27.1	 tat etat dūṣayati vyāhata tvāt ahetuḥ iti yasya vivicyāmānasya yāthātmya anupalabdhiḥ tad kutaścit vivecanīyam avadhya bhāve tad anupapatteḥ tathā ca tena avadhipanā kva cit avasthātavyam anavasthāyām truṭeḥ ameya tva prasaṅgāt iti uktam tasmāt paramāṇuṣu vā tad saṃyogeṣu vā tena avasthātavyam tathā ca yatas vivicyate bhāvaḥ saḥ eva āspaya avadhiḥ yāthātmyena upalabhyata iti buddhyā vivicyamānasya sarva bhāva anupapattyāvyāghāta eti siddham dūṣaṇa antaram āha sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti pramāṇasya api bhāvāt tad gata tvena tad anupapattau sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.28.1–4,2.28.2	 tad āśraya tvāt apṛthak grahaṇam apṛthak grahaṇāt iti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ jāyate kim vilakṣaṇa vyavahāra abhāvaḥ uta bheda abhāvaḥuta tantu vyatirekeṇa deśa antare anupalambha eti na tāvat ādyaḥ tantavaḥ hi bhinna ābha buddhi vedyāḥ paṭaḥ tu abhinna ābha buddhi vedyaḥ iti na api dvitīyaḥ tantūnām aṃśu deśa tvāt paṭasya tantu deśa tvāt tasmāt tantubhyaḥ anyatra adarśanam apṛthak grahaṇam tat ca bhede api tad āśrita tvena upapadyamānam nābhā idam gamayitum arhati iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānām pṛthak grahaṇam atīndriyeṣu aṇuṣu yatra khalu avayava avayavinā vaindriyakau tatra pṛthak grahaṇam avivecakānām asphuṭataram atīndriyebhyaḥ a ṇubhyaḥ ānumānikebhyaḥ pratyakṣa dṛśyānām tad āśritānām avayavinām pṛthak grhaṇam iti ati sphuṭam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.29.1	 saṃprati aindriyake api avayave avayavinaḥ vivicyamānasya yāthātmyena pṛthak grahaṇam āha pramāṇataḥ ca artha pratipatteḥ iti yat asti paṭa ādikam avayavi dravyam yathā ca sva avayava samaveta tvena guṇa ādhāra tayā ca yat na asti śaśa viṣāṇa ādi yathā ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvena tat sarvam pramāṇataḥ upalabdhyā sidhyati sugamam bhāṣyam 
NVTṬ_4,2.30–31.1–4,2.30–31.2	 yat uktam pramāṇa upapatti anupapattibhyām na sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti tatra pratyavatiṣṭhate vijñāna vādī svapnava viṣaya abhimāna vat ayam pramāṇa prameya abhimānaḥ na khalu vāstavaḥ pramāṇa prameya bhāvaḥ kim tu anādi vāsanā nibandhana kalpanā adhīnaḥ yathā hi na svapne santi viṣayāḥ atha ca pratibhānti kalpanā matreṇa tathā ca sāṃvṛtena aparamārtha satā pramāṇa prameya bhāvena bāhya artha śūnyatā sidhyati parama artha satī pratyayānām dṛṣṭā mithyā pratyayānām api tattva pratipatti hetuta iti āveditam purastāt iti arthaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe vārttikakāraḥ yathā na svapne viṣayāḥ santi iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.32.1–4,2.33.1	 nanu svapna pratyayānāmaḥ tu evandharmaka tvam ye punar abhī jāgratyat prayāḥ stambhaḥ iti vā kumbhaḥ iti vā kim āyātam teṣām atyanta vailakṣaṇyāt iti ataa āha māyā gandharvaḥ iti jāgrat pratyayāḥ api evaṃvidhāḥ sahasraśas dṛśyante na ca ete stambha kumbha ādi pratyayāḥ tatas vilakṣaṇāḥ iti arthaḥ tat etat dūṣayati hetu abhāvāt asiddhiḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^1	 tat vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ svapna ante viṣaya abhimāna vat iti anta śabdaḥ avayava vacanaḥ api āśrita tva mātreṇa avasthāyām prayuktaḥ tena svapna avasthāyāḥ miti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati svapna jñānasya ayāthārthyam icchatā vā adhaka pantareṇa tad anupapatteḥ jāgrat pratyayaḥ asya bādhakaḥ vaktavyaḥna ca asau= asamīcīnaḥ tat bādhitum utsahate iti samīcīna tvam jāgrat pratyayasya abhyupagantavyam tathā ca jāgarita ante viṣaya upalabdhi vat iti anupapannam vārttikam khyātiḥ iti ced pratyaya tvam eva svapna udāharaṇa sahitam pramāṇa prameya abhimāna bhithyātve hetuḥ iti arthaḥ viparyaye ca sāmarthya abhāvāt iti pūrvam pratibuddhena iti viśeṣaṇam vivakṣitvā uktam adhunā tu anupalabdheḥ iti vivakṣitvā ucya taityayau naruktyam atra vijñāna vādī sva pakṣe pramāṇam āha na citta vyatirekiṇaḥ viṣayāḥ grāhya tvāt vedanā vat iti idam atra ākūtam 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^2	 vijñānasya hi bāhyoḥ atho grāhyaḥ bhavat nirākārasya sattā mātreṇa vā bhavet kāraṇa tvena vai eka sāmagrī adhīna tvena vā jñāna ahita phala ādhāra tvena vā na tāvat sattā mātreṇa anyasya anyaḥ viṣayaḥ sattā mātrasya viṣaya antareṣu bhāvāt sarve arthāḥ sarva viṣayāḥ iti sarva sarvajña tā āpattiḥ na ca sattā mātrām api viṣaya tva vyavasthāpakam asataḥ api viṣaya tvāt atas eva na kāraṇa tvena viṣaya bhāvaḥ api ca cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ api vijñānasya kāraṇam iti viṣayāḥ rūpa vijñānasya prasajyeran varttamāna avabhāsi ca vijñānam na bhavet kṣaṇika tvena utpādakasya artha kṣaṇasya utpādya vijñāna samaye vinipātāt eka sāmagrī adhīna tvena tu viṣaya tve varttamāna avabhāsita upapadyate sā tu na upapadyate asatoḥ api atīta anāgatayoḥ grahaṇe vyāpaka tvāt ati vyāpaka tvāt ca indriya ādi kṣaṇasya ekasāmagrī adhīnasya ālambana tva prasaṅgāt vijñāna āhita phala ādhāraḥ ālambanam iti ced kim punar vijñānena arthe janyate prākaṭyam na ca etad artha dharmaḥ api śukla ādi vat sarva puruṣa sādhāraṇam 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^3	 jñāna ahitasya artha dharmasya api jñānavantam pratyasādhāraṇa tva darśanāt yathā yasya apekṣā buddhi janitam dvi tvam artha dharmaḥ saḥ apekṣā buddhim antam eva puruṣam pratyasādhāraṇa eti tat na avyāpaka tvāt santi khalu atīta anāgata viṣayāṇi sahasraśas vijñānāni śabda anumāna jāni ca na caitanī arthe phalam ādhātum utsahante arthasya tadānīm asambhavāt na khalu asti sambhavaḥ asanna nutpanna rūpaḥ dharmī dharmaḥ asya avinaśyan pratyutpanna rūpaḥ iti sva kāraṇāt ātmānātma prakāśana śakti yuktam utpadyate jñānam tādṛśam yena kaścid eva asya viṣayaḥ na sarvam iti ced hanta bhoḥ śakteḥ śakya niṣṭha tvāt kim asya śakyam iti vaktavyam arthaḥ iti ced na na tāvat ayam asya nirvartyaḥ arthasya eva jñāna nirvarttaka tvāt na ca artha ādhāram phalam ādhat taiti uktam na ca asati śakye śakti saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt anākāram vijñānam bāhmam gocarayati iti manoratha mātram astu sa ākāram eva bāhya gocaram 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^4	 tathā hi nīla ādi ākāram jñānam nīla ādi gocaram nīlam asya svarūpam yatas atra evam vaktavyam kim sarva ātmanā sārūpya bhāvāt viṣaya bhāvaḥ āho katham cit sā rūpya bhāvāt na tāvat arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ jñānena prakāśa ātmanā sarvathā sārūpyam sārūpye jñānam api jaḍam bhavet iti jñāna tva hāniḥ eka deśena ca sārūpye tat kva nāma na asti iti sarvam jñānam sarvam vedayet api ca nīla jñānāt samanantara pratyayāt utpannam jñānam na tathā nīla artha sarūpam yathā nīla jñāna sarūpam iti samanantara pratyaya tad sārūpyābhyām viṣayaḥ syānana ca etat asti tasmāt na sārūpya samutpattī api viṣaya lakṣaṇam stām asya sārūpya samutpattī manaskāra indriya ādibhiḥ tathā api yam adhyavasyati saḥ a sya viṣayaḥ artham ca adhyavasyati iti arthaḥ eva asya viṣayaḥ na manaskāra ādīti ced atha kaḥ ayam adhyavasāyaḥ na tāvat grahaṇam na khalu dvau= ākārau gṛhyete nīlam iti anubhavaḥ na tu nīle iti su a ākārasya bāhya samāropaḥ adhyavasāyaḥ iti ced 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^5	 sa kim gṛhyamāṇe bāhye uta agṛhyamāṇe na hi nīla dvayam prakāśa taiti uktam na cāra upaviṣayam agṛhītvā āropyam āropayitum arhati iti na hi ananubhavan puras vartati śukla bhāsvaram rajatam āropayati tatra api ca agṛhyamāṇe bāhye pravṛtti niyamaḥ na bhavet itareṣām agṛhyamāṇa tvena aviśeṣa āt teṣu api pravṛtti prasaṅgāt na ca sa ākāra jñāna naye bāhya sadbhāve pramāṇam asti agṛhyamāṇa tvāt nanu nīla ādi ākārasya kādācid ka tvam eva pramāṇam tathā hi yadi asmin sati api kadā cit bhavet tad tad itara apekṣam yathā sati api sopāne vicchinna gamana racana pratibhāsāḥ pratyayāḥ santāna antara apekṣāḥ tathā ca sati api ālaya saṃtāne ṣaṣ api pravṛtti pratyayāḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ vāsanā paripāka pratyaya kādācitka tvāt kadā cit utpādaḥ iti ced nanu eka santāna patitānām ālaya jñānānām tad tad pravṛtti vijñāna janana śaktiḥ vāsanā tasyāḥ ca kārya jananam pratyābhimukhyam paripākaḥ tasya ca pratyayaḥ sva santāna varttī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ santāna antara apekṣā anabhyupagamāt 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^6	 tathā ca sarve ālaya santa anapatitāḥ paripāka hetavaḥ bhaveyuḥna vā kaścid api aviśeṣāt kṣaṇa bhedāt śakti bhedaḥ tasya kādācid ka tvāt kāryakādācid ka tvam iti ced nanu ekasya eva nīla vijñāna janana sāmarthyam śakti prabodha janana sāmarthya ca kṣaṇa antarasya tat na syāt sattve vā katham kṣaṇa bhedāt sāmarthya bheda eti ālaya santānavatrinaḥ sarve samarthāḥ iti samartha hetu sadbhāve kārya kṣepa anupapattiḥ sva santāna mātra adhīna tve tu niṣedhyasya kādācid ka tvasya viruddham sadātana tvam tasya upalabdhyā tu kādācid ka tvam nivarttamānam hetu antara apekṣa tve vyavatiṣṭhate iti pratibandha siddhiḥ na ca saṃtāna antara nimittāni pravṛtti vijñānāni santati antarāṇām api nitya sannidhānāt vijñānānām adeśa ātmaka tvena dūra tva anupapatteḥ vyatiriktasya anabhyupagamāt na api kālataḥ viprakarṣa sambhavaḥ apūrva sattva prādurbhāva anabhyupagamāt 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^7	 tat idam anumānam sautra antikānām bāhyāmi upagama eti tat ayuktam sva santāna mātra nimitta tve api nīla ādi vijñānānām kādācid katva upapattau sandigdha vyatiroki tvena hetoḥ anaikāntika tvāt nanu uktam na kṣaṇbhedaḥ kārya bheda hetuḥ iti kalpitasya santānasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ bhedaḥ kārya bheda hetuḥ iti na tu paramārtha sataḥ kṣaṇasya kārya bheda hetutvam iti kaḥ anyaḥ bhadantāt vaktum arhati nanu yadi kṣaṇa bhedaḥ śakti bheda hetuḥ tatas bhinānām kṣaṇānām na ekā śakti syāt tathā ca ekena kena cit nīla jñāne janite tat nīla jñānam kṣaṇa antarāt na syāt yadi bhinnānām na ekam sāmarthyam atha bāhya artha vādinaḥ api katham bhinnānām nīlotpala santānānām eka nīlotpala ākāra jñāna dhārā sāmarthyam yadi ucyate anyat eva nīla vijñānam yat nīlotpala santāna antarāt vayam api brūmahe anyat eva nīla vijñānam yat kṣaṇa antarāt iti tasmāt kaścid eva tādṛśaḥ sva lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ jāyate yaḥ kam cit eva kārya bhedam janayati na kārya antaram iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^8	 tasmāt sa ākārasya api jñānasya arthaḥ na gocaraḥ na ca agocaraḥ śakyaḥ anumātum iti na ca pratyakṣa vat anumānam api artha gocaram tasmāt sādhu uktam vārttika kṛtāḥ na citta vyatirekiṇaḥ viṣayaḥ grāhya tvāt vedanā vat iti nīla ādayaḥ hi viṣayāḥ ubhaya vādi siddhāḥ teṣām citta bheda abhedayoḥ vipratipattiḥ tatra eṣām citta vyatirekaḥ paraiḥ abhyupagataḥ pratiṣidhyate yāvān= ca pratiṣidhyate sarvaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti grāhya tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ citta vpayatiḥ ekaḥ tad viruddhaḥ tat avyatirekaḥ tena vyāptam grāhya tvam tasya upalabdhiḥ eva tad niṣedhyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti atra tāvat etat vaktavyam grāhyat tvasya abhedena vyāptau satyām bhedam nivartayet na tu abhedena asya vyāptiḥ tathā hi yat etat nīlam sthūlam vicchinnam upalabhyate tasya asya vicchedaḥ sthaulyam ca na jñānasya ātmā nānā diś deśa vyāpitāḥ hi sthaulyam 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^9	 na ca ekamadiś deśa ātmakam anavayavam vijñānam nānā diś deśa vyāpi sambhavati yathā āha tasmāt na arthe na vijñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt vahuṣu api na sambhavaḥ iti evam artha vicchedaḥ api na jñāna ātmakaḥ tasya tathā tve paramārthatoḥ atha advicchinnam jñānam syāt tasmāt ayam api na jñānam iti asan= abhyupagantavyaḥ na ca sat asatoḥ eka tvam iti anātmā api vijñāne prakāśa taitya nicchatā api svīkarttavyam tathā ca sat api prakāśiṣyate nanu anātmni arthe akiṃñcitkaram vijñānam katham artha prakāśakam atha akiñcitkaram jñānam sthaulye katham asya prakāśakam svabhāvāt iti ced atra api asau na daṇḍa vāritaḥ yat hi yasya svabhāvaḥ tasya na anya apekṣā yathā liṅgasya sva sādhya sambandhe svabhāvataḥ ca arthasya jñānam iti na tadīya tve anyat apekṣate asambaddha tvāt katham jñānam arthasya iti ced atha sambandhaḥ eva sambandhinoḥ katham sambandha antara kalpanāyām anavasthā 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^10	 tasmāt yathā sambandhaḥ eva sambandha antara manteraṇa sambandhinoḥ evam jñānam api sambandha antaram antareṇa arthasya iti samānam na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ sva kāraṇāt utpannasya kasya cit vijñānasya kaścid eva viṣayaḥ na anyaḥ na svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogam arhanti evam bhavatā evam mā bhavataḥ evam kasmāt na bhavatā iti akiñcitkarasya rūpa vijñānasya katham rūpa viṣaya tā iti ced kim rūpa vijñānam pramāṇam vivakṣitvā idam ucyate āho phalam vivakṣitvā yadi pramāṇam tatas na tat akiñcitkaram tatra hāna upādāna upekṣā prasava hetu tvāt atha phalam tat ayuktam kva nāma phalam kiñcitkaram na hi gati janyā nagara prāptiḥ caitrasya caitra nagara saṃyoga samavāyāya kim cit karoti evam artha viṣaya tvāya svābhāvikāya na jñānena kim cit aparam janayitavyam artha pratibaddha tvam jñānasya artha viṣaya tvam na hi jñānim anu vyavasāya jñānena nirūpyamāṇam artha nirūpaṇam vinā śakyam nirūpayitum iti uktam 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^11	 karmaṇi asamavetam katham karmaṇaḥ tad pāratantryāt iti ced kim idam pāratantryam tad nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvam iti ced tat iha api samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt tasmāt abhedena grāhyasya avyāpya tvāt grāhya tvam viruddha vyāptam na bhedam nivartayitum arhati iti dūṣaṇe sthavīyasi sati eva dūṣaṇa antaram āha vārtikakāraḥ vedanā sukha duḥkhe cittam vijñānam iti abhyupetya āha atha abhinnaṃvijñānam vedanā tā eti yathā aṅgulī agram na tena eva aṅgulī agreṇa spṛśyate evam jñānam na tena eva jñānena grahītum śakyate nanu na gṛhītiḥ grāhyāḥ na hi asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate kriyā phala śāli tayā karma bhavati na ca asyām asti phala antaram api tu svayam āvirbhūta svabhāvā gṛhītiḥ apara adhīna prakāśā grāhyā iti ucyate yadi vā eṣā svayam na prakāśeta na arthāḥ api prakāśeran tad prakāśa adhīna prakāśāḥ hi te 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^12	 tathā hi yat yat prakāśa adhīna prakāśam tat tasmin prakāśamāne prakāśate yathā daṇḍa prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ daṇḍi prakāśaḥ jñāna prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ ca viṣayaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ na ca jñānāt anyat sva saṃvedanam na dṛṣṭam iti etāvatā sva saṃvedanam vijñānam na bhavet iti darśana adarśanābhyām na hetuḥ gamakaḥ api tu sva sādhya avinā abhāvāt sa ca viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa pravṛttyā sidhyati iti kṛtam dṛṣṭāntena iti atraāha na karma kriyā ca ekam bhavati iti idam atra ākūtam kim punar idam arthānām saṃvid prakāśa adhīna tva prakāśa tvam nāma na hi saṃvid prakāśena arthe prakāśa antaram janyate api ca liṅga prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ hi liṅgi prakāśaḥ na ca liṅge prakāśamāne prakāśate kim tu liṅga prakāśe vinaṣṭe yadyucyeta na jñānāt atiriktaḥ aratha prakāśaḥ jñāna prakāśaḥ ca kim tu jñānam eva sva saṃvedanam arthasya sva ātmanaḥ ca iti evam tarhi kim āyātam na hi ātmā eva ātma āyattaḥ na ca jñānam eva ātmanaḥ parasya ca prakāśaḥ iti siddham 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^13	 anyaḥ hi jñāna prakāśaḥ mānasaḥ aindriyakaḥ ca artha prakāśaḥ na ca pramāṇa jñāna prakāśa adhīnoḥ atha prakāśaḥ kim tu pramāṇa jñāna satta adhīnaḥ phala adhīnam tu na kim cit iti aviditam tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitam vijñānam sva prakāśāt bhinnam prakāśamāna tvāt sattva antara prakāśasya sattva antara prakāśa vat tad anena abhisaṃdhinā uktam na ca karma ca kriyā ca ekam bhavati iti etena saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti parāḥ tam veditavyam artha jñāna upalambhayoḥ eka upalambha tā eva na asti kutas punar asya niyamaḥ iti atha yathāśrutaḥ saha upalambhaḥ hetuḥ iti ucyate tatas viruddhaḥ abhede saha artha asaṃbhavāt kṛta prapañcaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ nyāya kāṇikāyām iha tu vistara bhayāt na prapañcitā eti uparamyate saḥ api dṛṣṭam vijñāna bhedam anuvaya ukta vyaiti na saṃtāna mātra nibandhanaḥ vijñāna bhedaḥ bhavitum arhati nīla pīta ādi rūpaḥ na api saṃtāna antara ādhipatya sannidhāna nibandhanaḥ vijñāna anām adeśa ātmakānām svarūpeṇa deśa viprakarṣā yogāt 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^14	 na api kāla viprakarṣaḥ apūrva sattva prādurbhāva abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate svapna vat vijñāna średam iti bāhya abhāve api ādhyātmikaḥ vijñāna bheda hetuḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti saḥ api iti svapna jñānam api pāraṃparyeṇa bāhya nibandhanam iti arthaḥ avāhya nimittaka tvam svapna pratyayasya abhyupetya āha atha svapna pakṣe api iti vargaḥ pakṣaḥ na ca ekam vijñānam cintanīyam aparam cintakam iti vācyam vyatirikta ālambanatva anabhyupagamāt iti bhāvaḥ abhyupetya tu abāhya nimitta tvam svapna pratyayānām etat uktam bāhya nimitta tvam eva tu pāramārthikam iti āha ye ca ete svapna pratyayāḥ iti samāpi iti api śabdaḥ saṃbhāvanāyām mama pakṣe saṃbhāvyate etatyat sarve eva pratyayāḥ mithyā bhavanti iti arthaḥ sugamam itarat mithyā nidrā viṣayam antareṇa vijñāna sphuṭa tā ca avaktavyā iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^15	 sāmānya viśeṣa tadvatām grahaṇam sphuṭa tā sāmānya mātra grahaṇam asphuṭa tā tat ca etat asati viṣaye duṣkaram tad ākāra utpatteḥ aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ śaṅkate asati arthe vijñāna średaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced svapna māyā gandharvanagara mṛga tṛṣṇā ādi vijñāneṣu anuvartamāneṣu viṣayenrdiya manaḥ doṣana nimitta tvam astu ye punar amī pratīnām sarveṣām anuvṛttimantaḥ pūya pūrṇa nadī pratyayāḥ na te bāhya viṣayāḥ doṣavat tvāt bhavitum arhanti doṣa nimitta tvāt bahu nām anu vṛtteḥ abhāvāt aduṣṭa indriya artha sannikarṣaka tve tu jala rucira ākāra virodhāt tasmāt anādi vāsanā vaicitrya labdha janma tayā artha nirapekṣāḥ eva vicitra ākārāḥ buddhayaḥ udayante vyayante ca iti sāṃpratam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ na tatra nadī asti iti sva mata dārḍhyena uktam na vyāghāta ādi tañayimabhisaṃdhiḥ jana rudhirayaḥ rasa vīrya vipāka ādi bhedāt toya rasa vīrya paripāka ādi darśanāt nadyāḥ toya pūrṇa tve niścite pūya pūrṇa tva niścayaḥ pretānām mithyā iti niścaye tad anuvṛtteḥ deṣa anuvṛttiḥ kalpanīyāḥ doṣaḥ ca pretta śarīra nivarttakam karma eva 
NVTṬ_4,2.34.1^16	 yathā uktam tulya karma vipāka utpannāḥ pretāḥ iti karmaṇaḥ vāsanā anyatra phalam anyatra kalpatā eti phana palam putra paśu annādi tat yadi vijñānam tadā yatra jñāna santāne karma vāsanā tatra eva putra ādi ākāram vijñānam phalam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate putra paśu annādau tu artha rūpe phale vaiyadhikaraṇyam syāt tathā ca atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti tat na anabhyupagamāt iti na putra ādi svarūpeṇa phalam api tu tad nimittā prītiḥ tasyāḥ eva cetanena kāmyamāna tvāt tad lakṣaṇa tvāt ca phalasya iti bhāvaḥ muktakena artham sādhayitvā prayogān āha madīyāt cittāt iti yadi cittamātram pakṣīkriyate tadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti iti atas uktam madīyāt citāt iti madīya ahaṅkārān āspada tve satī iti viśeṣaṇāt na sva cittena vyabhicāraḥ āropanirākaraṇa artha tvāt ca hetūnām na asamartha viśeṣya tā iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.35.1	 api ca mitya upalabdhīnām bāhya anālambana tvam āsthāya tattva buddhīnām bāhya anālambana tvam sādhanīyam tāsām bāhya anālambana tvam bādhaka adhīnam bādhakam ca atra samāropita rajata ādi abhimānam nivarttayati na tu puras avasthitam artha sāmānyam śukla bhāsvaram tasmāt na bādhaka anurodhāt api mithyājñānam bāhya anālambanam iti svapna vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha evam sati mithyājñānasya pradhāna āśraya tve mithyā upalabdheḥ vināśaḥ tattva jñānāt bādhakāt svapna viṣaya abhimāna praṇāśa vat pratiṣedhaḥ na sāmānyasya api iti śeṣaḥ śeṣam bhāṣye bhāṣyam su bodham 
NVTṬ_4,2.36.1–4,2.36.2	 yaḥ tu mādhyamikaḥ mithyā buddhi dṛṣṭāntena bāhya apahnavam kṛtvavā tena eva dṛṣṭāntena vijñāna abhāvam kṛtvā vicāra asaha tvam tattvambhāvānām vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūva tam pratyāha buddheḥ ca evam nimitta sadbhāva upalambhāt arthe hi niṣiddhe bhavet api etat tad vyavasthāpane tadvat eva apratyūham buddhi sadbhāvaḥ api sidhyati na ca evam vādinaḥ pramāṇam asti asatā ca pramāṇena vicāra asahattvam bhāvānām vyavasthāpayan ślāghanīya prajñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ itan ni ca kalpanā mātrarmita aupāyaḥ tattva jñānāya paryāptaḥ na ca vanaspati ādi tattva jñānasya mithyā hasti jñānam nibandhanam api tu praṇihita manasā aindriya artha sannikarṣa viśeṣaḥ na ca asau mithyājñāna samaye āsīt na ca moha abhyāsaḥ samīcīnāya jñānāya kalpate sa hi māhema iva draḍhayati iti sarvam avadātam saḥ ayam mādhyamikaḥ anubhūyamānām mithyā buddhim na apahnotum arhati tathā ca mithyā buddhim pratipadyamānena tasyāḥ nimittam vaktavyam iti uktam 
NVTṬ_4,2.37.1–4,2.37.2	 tattva pradhāna bhedāt ca mithyā buddheḥ dvaividhya upapattiḥ mithyā buddhyā sva nimittam lakṣyate tena mithyājñāna nimittasya dvaividhyam iti arthaḥ yatra sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti jñānam bhavati tatra tattvam sthāṇuḥ iti pradhānam puruṣaḥ iti yaḥ pūrvam puruṣaḥ abhūt iti arthaḥ evam tāvat rūpa buddhīḥ pratipādya gandha ādi buddhīḥ api pratipādayati bhāṣya kāraḥ gandha ādau ca prameyaḥ iti upasaṃharati tasmāt ayuktam etat iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.38.1	 doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ iti uktam atha tattva jñānam katham utpadyate iti na tāvat āgama ta aupapattitaḥ vā tattva jñānam ahaṅkāra nivṛttim kartu mutsahate doṣa nimitteṣu utpanna jñānānām api pūrvavat ahaṅkāra doṣa anuvṛtteḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tu upāya abhāvāt ayuktā eti asya uttaram sūtram samādhi viśeṣa abhyāsāt 
NVTṬ_4,2.38.2–4,2.40.1	 samādhi padam vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ sa tu pratyāhṛtasya indriyebhyaḥ manasaḥ iti anena vikṣepam nivarttayati indriyebhyaḥ pratīpam āhṛtasya manasaḥ kva cit hṛd puṇḍarīka pradeśe ātmanaḥ nija okasi dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasya ātmanā saṃyogaḥ ayam sa khalu supta avasthāyām asti iti atauktam tattva bubhutsa āviṣiṣṭaḥ iti tad abhyāsaḥ ca tad viṣaya prayatna utpāda ṣaunaḥ punyam tasmāt ādara nairantarya dīrgha kāla viśiṣṭāt tattva buddhiḥ utpadyate etat ākṣepa sūtram avatārayati yat uktam sati hi tasmin= iti indriya viṣayaiḥ apahṛta manasaḥ dhāraṇā tathā ca tad abhyāsa abhāvāt na sattva sākṣātkāra eti sūtra arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.41.1–4,2.41.2	 samādhāna sūtram avatārayati astu etad samādhi vyutthāna nimittam iti sūtram pūrva kṛta phala anubandhāt tad utpattiḥ pūrva kṛtaḥ samādhiḥ tasya phalam saṃskāraḥtasya anubandhaḥ sthemā tasmāt iti sūtra arthaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ pūrva kṛtaḥ iti pravivicyate anena iti pravivekaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa tu ātma dharmā eti kasmāt punar adṛśyamānaḥ saṃskāraḥ kalpya taiti ataa āha niṣphale hi iti prayatna viśeṣāḥ hi viśara āravaḥ bahavaḥ api parasparam asahabhavantaḥ na tattva sākṣātkārāpaya pāryāptāḥ iti tad janitāḥ saṃskārāḥ kalpyante teṣām sthemnā sambhavati sambhūyakāritā iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.42.1–4,2.44.1	 pracaya kāṣṭhā pracaya avadhiḥyataḥ parama paraḥ pracayaḥ na asti tad sahakāri śāli tayā prakṛṣṭāyām samādhi bhāvanāyām samādhi prayatnaḥ samādhi bhāvanā tasyām iti arthaḥ pūrva pakṣa vādī āha yadi artha viśeṣa prābalyāt iti sa khalu ayam īdṛśaḥ bāhya arthasya mahimā yatā aindriya ādi anapekṣāt eva ātmanaḥ buddhim janayivyati iti abhimānaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ siddhānta sūtram na niṣpanna avaśyambhāvi tvāt vyākhyātam na khalu taṇḍulāḥ atyantam phalīkṛtāḥ api piṭhara udaka dahana saṃyoga pracayam antareṇa pulākāḥ bhavanti iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.45–46.1	 kim samādhi viśeṣaḥ eva tattva jñāna sādhanam mā evam kim tu tad artham yama niyamābhyām ātma saṃskāraḥ yogāt ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ samānam āśramiṇām dharma sādhanam ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahmacaryam aparigraha eti yamaḥ niyamaḥ iti yasya āśramiṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ dharma upāyaḥ yogaḥ iti viṣayeṇa yoga śāstram pātañjalam lakṣayati yoga ācāraḥ ekākitāḥ āhāra viśeṣaḥ ekatra anavasthānam ityādi yati dharma uktam ete api tattva jñāna krama utpāda krameṇa apamarga sādhanam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.47.1–4,2.47.2	 nanu yadi ete tattva jñāna utpāda krameṇa apavarga upāyaḥ kṛtam tarhi ānvīkṣikya iti atas āha jñāna grahaṇa abhyāsaḥ tad vidyaiḥ ca saha saṃvādaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe tad artham iti prakṛtam ātma vidyā anvīkṣikī abhyāsaḥ satata kriyā tatra prayatnaḥ iti arthaḥ prayojanam āha prajñā paripāka artham paripākaḥ tu saṃśaya= chedanam kim deha ādi atiriktaa ātmā uta na iti saṃśayaḥ tasya cchedanam lokasya tattva jñānam ātmani tad avarodhaḥ adhyavasitam pramāṇena tasya abhyanujñānam tarkeṇa 
NVTṬ_4,2.48.1–4,2.48.2	 sa brahmacārī saha adhyāyī guru śiṣya sahā dhyāyibhyaḥ anyaḥ śāstreṇa anuśiṣṭaḥ śiṣṭa śreyorthinaḥ śreyasi mokṣa lakṣaṇe śrāddhāḥ teṣām apavarge śraddhā darśanāt asti tad upāya abhyāsaḥ prāc abhavīyaḥ iti anumīyate tena teṣām api prāc bhavīya saṃskāra vaśāt pratibhā upāvasanīyā iti abhyupeyāt abhimukham upetya jānīyāt guru ādibhiḥ saha iti arthaḥ nīta artham gata artham 
NVTṬ_4,2.49.1–4,2.49.3	 tat anena guru ādibhiḥ vādam kṛtvā tatu anirṇayaḥ uktaḥ yadi ca manyeta pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ pratikūlaḥ parasya guru ādeḥ tasmāt na vādaḥ api ucitaiti tatra idam sūtram upatiṣṭhate pratipakṣa hīnam api vā prayojana artham arthi tve vyācaṣṭe tam abhyupeyāt iti varttate paratas guru ādeḥ prajñām upāditsamānaḥ tattva bubhutsā prakāśanena ātmanaḥ śarīra ādibhyaḥ bhedam bubhutsaiti abhidadhānaḥ sva pakṣam anavasthāpayan sva darśanam guru ādi kṛtāt vicārāt pūrva pakṣa ucchedena siddhānta vyavasthāpana lakṣaṇāt sva darśanam pariśodhayet anyonya pratyanīkānim ca prāvādukānām darśanāni ayukta parityāgena yukta parigrahaṇena ca pariśodhayet iti saṃbadhyate 
NVTṬ_4,2.50.1–4,2.51.1–4,2.51.2^1^1	 nanu yatra vādasya eva daśā iyam īdṛśī tattva nirṇaye datta jala añjalī tarhi jalpa vitaṇḍe iti atas āha sva pakṣa rāgeṇa ca ekai nyāyam ativarttante tatra tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat iti sūtram tat vyācaṣṭe anutpanna tattva jñānānām iti na kevalam tad artham ghaṭamānānām jalpa vitaṇḍe api tu vidyā nirveda ādibhinaḥ ca pareṇa avajñāyamānasya tābhyām vigṛhya kathanam iti sūtram yaḥ tu sva darśana vilasita mithyā jñāna avalepa durvidagyatayā sa dvidyānavairāgyāt vā lābha pūjā khyātyarthi tayā kuhetubhiḥ īśvarāṇām jana ādhārāṇām puratas veda brāhmaṇa para loka ādi dūṣaṇa pravṛttaḥ tam prati vādī samīcīna dūṣaṇam apratibhayā apaśyan jalpa vitaṇḍe avatārya vigṛhya jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām tattva kathanam karoti vidyā paripālanāya mā bhūt īśvarāṇām mati vibhrameṇa tad caritam anuvartinīnām prajānām dharma viplavaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_4,2.51.1–4,2.51.2^1^2	 idam api prayojanam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ na tu lābha khyāti ādi dṛṣṭam na hi para hita pravṛttaḥ parama kāruṇikaḥ muniḥ dṛṣṭa artham para pāṃsula upāyam upadiśati iti śaṅkā vārttikam vyāpaka tvāt antar karaṇasya iti asya vakṣyamāṇaḥ abhisandhiḥ nirākaroti na ukta uttara tvāt sāṃkhyam dūpayadbhiḥ iti arthaḥ śaṅkitā sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati sva aṅga gatī kṣaṇā iti yāvat hasta avacchinne ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ na jāyate na tāvat tatra karma na ca tatra ātma manaḥ sannikarṣam vinā prayatnaḥ 
NVTṬ_4,2.51.2^2	 na ca manasaḥ indriya saṃyogam vinā īkṣaṇam na ca aṇunā manasā indriyeṇa haste ca aparyāyeṇa sambhavaḥ tasmāt vyāpakam manaḥ iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na śarīra ātma manaḥ saṃyoga yaugapadyāt prayatna darśanayoḥ ī upagat utpatteḥ tatra ātmanaḥ śarīra sambandhāt svāṅga gatiḥ iti pāṇi cālana iccha apekṣeṇa ātma manaḥ saṃyogena pāṇim cālayāmi iti evam ākāraḥ prayatnaḥ jāyate tatra prayatna vat ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt pāṇau kriyā jāyate yadi api ātmanaḥ sarva aṅge saṃyogaḥ na viśiṣyate tathā api icchā viśeṣāt utpannaḥ prayatna viśeṣaḥ pāṇau= eva karma karoti na anyatra prayatna vat ātma sa yogāt cakṣuṣaḥ preraṇam yadi api ca anayoḥ prayatnayoḥ na yugapad utpādaḥ tathā api tad atyanta saukṣmyāt kāla bhedaḥ na lakṣyate nanu ekasmin= ātma pradeśe varttamāna saṃyogaḥ vā prayatnaḥ vā katham deśa antare asaṃyogitya prayatnavati kāryam ārabhataḥ iti ataa āha na ca ātmanaḥ pradeśāḥ santi iti pariśiṣṭa vārttikam bhāṣya vyākhyayā vyākhyātam 
NVTṬ_5,1.1.1^1	 atha pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ uddiṣṭāḥ lakṣitāḥ ca tat kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham pañcamaḥ adhyāyaa ārabhya taityatas āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vikalpāt jāti bahutvam iti bhāṣyam tasya artham āha vārttikakāraḥ jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktāyāḥ ityādi yadi api jāti nigraha sthāna bhedāḥ jāti nigraha sthāna sāmānya lakṣaṇa anantaram prathame adhyāye yuktā lakṣayitum tathā api eṣām bahu tvāt prameya parīkṣāyām vilambhā umā bhūt apekṣitā ca asau śiṣyaiḥ saṃśaya ādi parīkṣām tu vinā prameya parīkṣā na śakyate tasmāt muniḥ śiṣya anurodhena parīkṣām tāvat varttayām babhūva tad anantaram avaśiṣṭam jāti nigraha sthāna viśeṣa lakṣaṇam varttayati jalpa vitaṇḍā parīkṣā ca anantaram pravṛttā tad aṅgam ca jāti nigraha sthāne iti avāntara saṃṅgatiḥ asti iti sarvam adātam viśeṣa upayogi sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha tatra jātiḥ nāma iti pratiṣedha buddhyā prayuktā eti śeṣaḥ āhnika ārambham ākṣipati jāteḥ prayoga pratiṣedhāt iti parivarjanam tu sāmānya jñāna ādipa bhavat na viśeṣa jñānam apekṣate iti bhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.1.1^2	 samādhatte na ārambha prayojanasya ukta tvāt etat eva smārayati svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti prāśnikaiḥ katamā jātiḥ iti ukte svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti atha vā sat vidyā vidviṣāḥ adhikṣipte tatve ahnāya tad nirāsa hetau= asphurati sākṣiṇām puratas ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ api astu katham citpara parājayovā iti buddhyā pāṃśabhiḥ iva avakiranjātim prayuṅkte tena hi loke tattvam avasthāpitam bhavati anyathā asat mārga pravṛttaḥ lokaḥ syāt na ca nakha capeṭa ādibhiḥ vidyā vidveṣiṇaḥ nirākaraṇe tad utthāpita kuhetu nirākaraṇa dhīḥ asti laukikānām tasmāt na nakha capeṭa ādayaḥ upadeṣṭavyāḥ śāstra kṛta iti abhiprāyavān āha sādhu sādhana nirākaraṇa artham vā iti atattva viṣaya tvena paramārthataḥ asādhu api sādhana mahnāya dūṣaṇasya apratibhāsanāt sādhu iti uktam lābha pūjā khyāti kāmaḥ ca iti anvācaye cakāraḥ prasiddham tāvat tatva paripālane prayojanam tasmin sati etat api anvācīyatā etyarthaḥ mata antaram nirākartum upanyasyati 
NVTṬ_5,1.1.1^3	 asādhu sādhana iti tattva viṣayam api sādhanam asādhu iti viditavān vāda kāle ca apratibhayā asādhuttva upapādanam na sphurati asādhyetat iti smaran= eva asau jātim prayuṅkte tat idam uktam anabhijña tayā sādhana dośasya iti atha vā jānan= api jātim prayuṅktaḥ tasya sādhanasya doṣa pradarśana artham prasaṅga vyājena madīyam tāvat dūṣaṇa ābhāsam evam tvadīyam api sādhana ābhāsam yadi tvad sādhanam samyak tadā madīyam api samyak syāt iti prasaṅgaḥ tad vyājena sādhanam dūṣayati iti arthaḥ tat etat para matam dūṣayati etat tu iti jāti abhidhāne hi paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam niranuyojya anuyogaḥ ca iti dvayam nigraha sthānam tasmāt buddhvā iti uktam atha na budhyate tat kim iti jātim prayuñjīta iti yaḥ hi samādarśana mātrāt pūrva abhyastam api vismarati tasya kā eva kathā ananu saṃhita pūrva jāti udbhāvanasya iti bhāvaḥ etena buddha abuddhā vā iti vikalpā sambhavena anaikāntike sādhane prayukte pañcānām sādharmya sama vaidharmya sama vikalpa sama sādhya sama saṃśaya samānām jātīnām prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.1.1^4	 pūrvā para bhāva eti pūrvasya yuktasya sādhanasya yuktam uttaram aparasya ayuktasya sādhanasya ayuktam uttaram iti nanu sādharmya samādi iti ucyate na ca vastutas sādharmya sama ādīnām sāmyam asti sthāpanayā tathā satya jāti tva prasaṅgāt iti atas āha samīkaraṇa artham prayogaḥ iti ābhimāni kaṃsāmyam na vāstavam iti arthaḥ sādharmyam eva samam yasmin prayogaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tat idam uktam sama arthaḥ sādharmya sama arthaḥ samīkaraṇa arthaḥ prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti evam vaidharmyam eva samam iti atra vigrahe svarūpeṇa sāmyam uktvā viśeṣa hatva bhāvena sāmyam āha viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ vā iti ye tu āhuḥ sarveṣu eva ādapeśeṣu sarvāsām eva jātīnām prayogaḥ iti tān pratyāha sarva apadeśa vyāptiḥ sarva jāti prayogasya apadeśaḥ hetu vacanam ye punar sādharmya samaḥ ityādau sama śabdaḥ tasya sādhana vādi jāti vādinoḥ tulya artha tvāt yādṛśaḥ vādī tādṛśaḥ prativādi api sādharmyeṇa dvau samau= iti manyante tān pratyāha na ca vādi prativādinoḥ tulya tā sumārthaḥ prativādī jāti vādī vivakṣitaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.2.1	 pratiṣedhau= iti sūtra pūraṇena put liṅgam samarthayate anyathā jāteḥ prakṛta tvāt samāna adhikaraṇyena sādharmya vaidharmya same iti syāt tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ kṛte sādhya viparyaya upapatti artham iti arthaḥ bhāṣye nidarśanam kriyāvān ātmā dravyasya kriyā hetu guṇa yogāt iti asti khalu ātmanaḥ kriyā hetuḥ guṇaḥ prayatnaḥ adṛṣṭam vā loṣṭasya api kriyā hetuḥ guṇaḥ sparśavat vegavat dravya saṃyoga eti evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriyaḥ ātmā vibhu tvāt ākāśa vat iti atra ca sādhanam ābhāsam uttaram ca na jātiḥ vibhu tvasya akriyatvepana svabhāvataḥ pratibandhāt tena etat upekṣya vārtikakāra audāharaṇa antaram āha yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpatti dharmaka tvāt idam tu samyak sādhanam uttaram tu ābhāsam iti sādharmya ukte sādharmya samaḥ vaidharmya ukte vaidharmya samaḥ evam sādharmya ukte vaidharmya samaḥ vaidharmya ukte sādharmya samaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.3.1–5,1.3.2	 katham punar iyam jātiḥ atha prakaraṇa sama udbhāvanam samyak uttaram eva kasmāt na bhavati iti atas āha anayoḥ ca sādharmya vaidharmya samayoḥ uttaram go tvāt go siddhi vat tad siddhiḥ bhavet evam yadi anvaya vyatireka mātrāt hetoḥ gamaka tvam syāt tatas viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt prakaraṇa sama tvam bhavet na tu evam bhavati svābhāvika sambandha bhājaḥ gamaka tvāt svabhāva saṃbaddham ca kṛtaka tvam anitya tvena na tu amūrtta tvasya nitya tvena svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ buddhi karma ādau vyabhicārāt tasmāt gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tvāt na prakaraṇa samaḥ yathā go tvāt gauḥ sidhyati svābhāvika pratibandhāt na tu sāsnādi saṃbandhāt iti bhāṣyam sāsnādīti atad guṇa saṃvijñanaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tena vyabhicāriṇaḥ śṛṅga ādayaḥ gṛhyante vārttikam ekasya ananvayāt ekasya avyāvṛtteḥ ekasya sattvasya gavā ananvayāt aśva ādau vyabhicārāt ananvayaḥ ekasya ekaśapha tva ādeḥ vaidharmyasya goṣu eva avyāvṛtteḥ mahiṣa ādau= api vyāvṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.4.1–5,1.4.2^1	 sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇyāvarṇya vikalpa sādhya samāḥ ubhaya sādhya tvāt sādhya samaḥ pañcānām jātīnām sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt iti anena pañca eva lakṣaṇāni sūcitāni tāni ca jāti samākhyābhiḥ mithas viśiṣyante anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte yadā evam prativādī prasaṅgena pratyavatiṣṭhate yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt kṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt eva ghaṭa sādharmyāt rūpa ādi matā api śabdena bhavitavyam na ced rūpa ādimān mā bhūt tathā anityaḥ api na ca asti viśeṣa hetuḥ kṛtaka tvāt anityena bhavitavyam na punā rūpa ādimata iti saḥ ayam sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ ddharma vikalpāt vaicitryāt yatra utkarṣam prasañjayati saḥ utkarṣa samaḥ evam tat eva sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryam apakarṣeṇa viśiṣyamāṇam apakarṣa samasya lakṣaṇam 
NVTṬ_5,1.4.2^2	 sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryāt svarūpeṇā sādhya asādhana tva prasaṅga janane varṇyāvarṇya samau sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharma vikalpa hetuka varṇya tva nibandhanam tu hetu ādi avayavaḥ gitva prasañjanam sādhya samaḥ atas eva ubhaya sādhyat tvāt iti sādhya tvam hetum āham ādhya samasya sūtrakāraḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ api hetu ādi avayava sāmarthya yogī iti bruvāṇaḥ tad prasañjanam sādhya samam manyate tat etat vārttika kṛt āha ghaṭāḥ vā anityaḥ iti atra kaḥ hetuḥ iti na ca yadi samākhyā bhedena viśiṣyamāṇam lakṣaṇa padam bhinna artham tarhi samākhyā padāni eva lakṣaṇāni santu kṛtam lakṣaṇa padena iti vācyam lakṣaṇa pada sahitānām eva teṣām lakṣya bheda pratipādaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.5.1–5,1.5.2^1	 āsām ṣaṇṇām jātīnām pratyākhyānam kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddheḥ vaidharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ yasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya dharmeṇa svābhāvika saṃbandhaḥ sādhakaḥ dharmaḥ upapadyata aupapannaḥ bhavati sa dharmaḥ tasya sādhya dharmasya sādhanam sādhya dharthmaṇī upasaṃhviyate tathā ca śabdena iti upanaya padena iti arthaḥ yat punar etat vibhāga jā vibhagaja vikalpa vat nitya anitya vikalpa eti tatra āha yathā utpatti dhamraka tvam anvayavyatireki na evam vibhāga ja tvam ayam arthaḥ vikalpa samam uttaram vadatā hi yathā sati utpattimat tve ghaṭaḥ na vibhāga jaḥ iti vyavasthitaḥ vikalpaḥ evam sati utpattimat tve sati api vibhāga ja vat śabdaḥ api nityaḥ bhaviṣyati ghaṭaḥ tu anityaḥ iti uktam tatra tāvat utpatti dharmaka tvam yathā satya nitya tve ghaṭa ādau dṛṣṭam ākāśa ādiṣu ca asatya nitya tve na dṛṣṭam tena anitya tvena svabhāva pratibaddham avadhāritam na evam utpatti dharmaka tvasya vibhāga ja tu ena avibhāga ja tvena vā svābhāvika saṃbandhaḥ gṛhītaḥ yena utpattimat kim cit vibhāga jam kim cit avibhāga jam na bhavet 
NVTṬ_5,1.5.2^2	 tasmai dvi kalpa samam jāti uttaram vadatā ati nirbandhena vibhāga ja tvena śabdasya nitya tvam vaktavyam tatra dam upatiṣṭhate yathā utpatti dharmaka tvam anvaya vyatirekya nitya tvam prati na evam vibhāga ja tvam śabda nitya tvam pratyanvayavyatireki iti tad hi asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ asādhāraṇyam āha na hi kim cit śabdāt anyat vibhāgāt jāyamānam nitya māna tvam vā dṛṣṭam nanu vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ anitya uva dṛṣṭaḥ iti atas āha tha ukta viśeṣaṇam iti kāraṇa mātra vibhāga pūrvakaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāga jaḥ tu vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ iti siddham kāraṇa mātra vibhāga pūrvaka tvam asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.6.1	 ṣaṇṇām jātīnām pratyākhyānam uktvā varṇyāvarṇī asādhya samānām aparam pratyākhyānam āha sādhya atideśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ iti tat vyācaṣṭe dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyaḥ iti bruvatā iti caturdaśavidha jāti vādinām iha dūṣaṇam upanyasyati yat tu atra uktam jātīnām paunaruktyam iti lakṣaṇa bhedābhyām kila lakṣya bheda abhedau lakṣaṇam ca idam ekam iti na ṣaṣ jātayaḥ tasmāt vikalpa samāyām a iva utkarṣa sama ādīnām antarbhāva eti arthaḥ dūṣayati na paunaruktyam tad tad lakṣya pada sahitāni pañca lakṣaṇāni ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca iti anena saha lakṣaṇāni ṣaṣ iti na kevalam lakṣya bhedāt prayoga bheda darśanāt ca śaṅkate yadi lakṣya bhedāt jāti bhedaḥ tatas ānantyam iti ced nirākaroti na anavadhāraṇāt iti na lakṣyāṇām avadhāraṇam asti eṣām ānantyāt lakṣaṇa upagraheṇa caturviṃśatiḥ jātayaḥ iti arthaḥ lakṣyāṇām lakṣaṇa abhede api bhede nidarśanam āha tathā hi prakaraṇa sama ekā iti sugamam itarat 
NVTṬ_5,1.8.1^1	 prāpti aprāpti samau iti lakṣya padam śeṣam lakṣaṇam asat sādhyate na tu sat prāptam sat asataḥ prāpti asaṃbhavāt tasmāt na sādhyam api ca yena yasya prāptiḥ tena gaṅgā sāgaram prāptā sāgareṇa saṅga tā sāgareṇa abhinnā tadvat eva abhinne ced sādhya sādhane na asti sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti api draṣṭavyam aprāpti samaḥ tu sphuṭaḥ eva iti nanu prāpti aprāpti samayoḥ militayoḥ sādhana pratiṣedhasya eka tvāt katham prāpti aprāpti samau bhinnau= iti atas āha anayoḥ bheda upadeśaḥ vivakṣātaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.8.1^2	 sādhana pratiṣedhasya ekatve api prāpya vā aprāpya vā iti vikalpa bhedāt bheda vivakṣā iti arthaḥ abheda vivakṣāyām tu ekam eva uttaram yathā vṛkṣāṇām bahu tvam vivakṣitvā bahuvacana prayogaḥ vṛkṣāḥ iti tad bahutva saṃkhyāyāvaḥ eka tvam vivakṣitvā eka vacanam ekam vanam iti udāharaṇena sādharmyaṃvaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam iti jāti sāmānya lakṣaṇam manvānaḥ deśayati jāti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt iti pariharati na sūtra artha aparijñānāt iti sūtre na udāharaṇa sādharmyam vivakṣitam api tu yena kena cit vidyamānena asādhyena sādharmyam aprāptena vā hetunā sādhamaryam iti na sāmānya lakṣaṇa ayoga eti 
NVTṬ_5,1.9.1	 pratyākhyānam ghaṭa ādi niṣpatti darśanāt iti sūtram tat vyācaṣṭe mṛd piṇḍa prāptānām daṇḍa ādīnām na gaṅgāsāgara vat aviśeṣaḥ mṛd avayavāḥ pūrva vyūha parityāgena iti sādhyam karma tat ca mṛd avayavāḥ te ca siddhāḥ eva iti avyabhicāraḥ ghaṭaḥ tu phalam na sādhyaiti bhāvaḥ kaḥ aprāpti arthaḥ iti aprāptasya sādhaka tve atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ uttaram paraspara upaśleṣam antareṇa sādhaka tvam iti anyathā tu uddeśena ayam prāptaā iva yat uddeśena abhicāraḥ śyena ādinā kriyate tasya eva pratyavāyaḥ bhavati na anyasya iti niyamaḥ atra api hetu tvam kriyām prati dṛṣṭam yathā paṅka ākhyāyām bhuvi sugamam anyat 
NVTṬ_5,1.9.1–5,1.9.2^1	 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇam pramāṇam tasya anapadeśāt prasaṅga pa samaḥ sādhya samaḥ hi dṛṣṭānte sādhya vat hetu ādi avayavam prasañjayati pañca avayava prayoga sādhyatām dṛṣṭāntasya gatasya anitya tvasya prasañjayati iti arthaḥ prasaṅga samaḥ tu dṛṣṭānta gatasya anitya tvasya pramāṇa mātra sādhyatām iti apaunaruktyam bhāṣyam sādhanasya api dṛṣṭānta gatasya anitya tvaspaya sādhanam pramāṇam vācyam iti vārttikam ghaṭaḥ eva tāvat anityaḥ iti atra kaḥ hetuḥ iti atra kim pramāṇam iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ udāhniyate kiṃyā hetu guṇa yuktam ākāśam akriyam dṛṣṭam tasmāt anena pratidṛṣṭāntena kasmāt 
NVTṬ_5,1.9.2^2	 kriyā hetu guṇa yogaḥ niṣkriya tvam eva na sādhayati ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ yadi punar iyama na eka anitaka deśanā syāt kriyā hetu guṇa yuktasya api akriya tvam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśasya iti tat etat sat uttaram syāt na tu evam etat iti jātiḥ śaṅkate vāyu ākāśa saṃyogasya iti nirākaroti na tad samāna dharma upapatteḥ tad samāna dharmaṇaḥ dharmiṇaḥ kriyāvat tva upapatteḥ yadi tathābhūtaḥ eva ākāśe kasmāt na karoti iti atas āha yaḥ tu asau= iti yaḥ tu manyate kārya utpāda aikya vyaṅnyam eva kāraṇam na dṛṣṭa kārya kāraṇa sādharmī a vyaṅnyam api iti tasya dūṣaṇāni āha yadi ca iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.10.1–5,1.12.1	 yadi prajñāpana artham uttaram na aprajñātaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra laukika parīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyāt iti śeṣaḥ sa ca katham aheḥ tuna syāt iti katham hetuḥ syāt iti abhyupagamāt iti madīyasya ca dṛṣṭāntasya abhyupagamāt na tvadīyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ atha evam prayuṅkte yathā madīyaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ tathā tvadīyaḥ iti tathā api vyāghātāt na dṛṣṭāntaḥ madīyasya adṛṣṭānta tve sādhye pratidṛṣṭāntena hi tena madīyasyā dṛṣṭānta tā sādhyāḥ sa ced na dṛṣṭāntaḥ madīpasya adṛṣṭānta tā sādhyeti vyāhatam iti arthaḥ udāharaṇa puraḥsaram bhāṣya kāraḥ vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti uktaḥ iti tad aśrāvāt kāraṇa abhāvāt anitya tvasya kāryasya abhāve nitya tvam prāptam nitya tva anitya tvābhyām rāśi antara abhāvāt iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.13.1–5,1.13.2^1	 tasya pratyākhyānam tathā abhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ nitya tvena hi śabdasya dharmeṇa anutpattyā pratyavastheyam na ca anutpannaḥ śabdaḥ iti nityaḥ iti ca anutpatti dharmaka eti ca sambhavati utpannaḥ tṛt patti dharmā ca śabdaḥ ca ani tyaḥ ca iti na anutpattyā śakyam pratyavasthātum iti arthaḥ kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti arthaḥ yat uktam kāraṇa abhāvāt anitya tvasya kāryasya abhāve nitya tvam prāptam iti tatra āha vārtikakāraḥ jñāpakaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ na kāraka eti kārakaḥ hi hetuḥ nivartamānaḥ sva kāryam nivartayati na tujñāpakaḥ tad abhāve api bhūmau cira nikhātānām nidhi ādīnām anivṛtteḥ iti tatas ca viśeṣaṇa manarthakam prāk utpatteḥ ati prāc asataḥ hi sattā sambandhaḥ utpattiḥ prāk api ced asau= abhyupagataḥ prāk iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam utpatteḥ abhāve sadā eva anutpatti dharmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.13.2^2	 apare tu prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt iti ukte arthāpatti samaiveyam jātiḥ iti matvā asyāḥ uttaram āhuḥ yadā evaṃmucyeta prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tad arthāt aprayatna anantarīyaka tve nitya tvam uktam bhavati iti artha āpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samaiveyam jātiḥ iti abhimānaḥ evam kṛte te eva asyām jātau= uttaram bruvate na ayam niyamaḥ iti tat etat pareṣām matam dūṣayati etat tu iti śaṅkate jāti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt na iyam jātiḥ iti ced sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ na ca anutpatti samāyāḥ sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā asti kena cit iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sārūpyāt iti yathā anutpannāḥ tantavaḥ na paṭasya kāraṇam tathā śabda utpatteḥ prāk anutpannam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam na anitya tvasya kāraṇam iti sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam iti asti sāmānya lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ etāvatā ca arthāpatti samāyāḥ anutpatti samātaḥ bhedaḥ darśitaḥ iha anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sāmyena kārya pratiṣedhāt arthāpatti samāyām vākya artha viparīta āropeṇa pratiṣedhāt iti
