NVTṬ_5,1.14.1–5,1.15.1	 dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya hetoḥ ghaṭaḥ iti yathā hi viśeṣa darśanam niścayasya kāraṇam asti iti niścaya utpattiḥ eva sādharmya darśana mātram asti saṃśayasya kāraṇam iti saṃśayena api bhavitavyam iti arthaḥ sūtra artha prayojanam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām sphuṭīkaroti saṃśaya samā sādharmya samāyāḥ iti asya pratyākhyāna sūtram sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye a tyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ na sāmānya darśana mātram saṃśayasya kāraṇam api tu viśeṣa adarśana sahitam viśeṣa darśane tu tat rahitam na kāraṇam iti sūtra arthaḥ ubhayathā vā iti sādharmya viśeṣa darśanābhyām iti arthaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya iti nityam saṃśaya kāraṇa tva anabhyupagamāt sādharmi asya iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.16.1^1	 upalakṣaṇam ca etat ubhaya sādharmyāt iti ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti api draṣṭavyam etat vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ ubhayena nityena ca anityena ca iti dvitīyaḥ ca nitya sādharmyāt pratipakṣam pravartayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti atha dvitīya sādhana pravṛttau prathamasya sādhanasya kim bhavati iti atas āha evam ca sati prayatna aṃnantarīyaka tvāt iti hetuḥ anitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamānaḥ na prakaraṇam ativartate mā ativarttiṣṭa prakaraṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha prakaraṇa anati vṛtteḥ nirṇaya anativarttanam nirṇaya aniṣpattiḥ iti arthaḥ evam ānitya sādhana vādinam pratyuttaram darśayitvā nitya sādhana vādinam pratyāha samānam ca etat nitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamāna eti 
NVTṬ_5,1.16.1^2	 tat evam sādharmyeṇa prakaraṇa sama dvayam uktam tathā vaidharmyeṇa prakaraṇa sama dvayam nitya anitya sādhana vādinau= eva pratyāha samānam ca etat iti ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti nitya ākāśa vaidharmyāt kṛtaka tvāt anitya ghaṭa vaidharmyāt ca asparśavat tvāt iti tat evam prakaraṇa sama catuṣṭayam pūrva pakṣa vārttikam saṃśaya sama sādharmya samābhyām iti pariharati na ubhaya pakṣa sādharmyāt tad bheda upapattiḥ iti prakaraṇa same hi sva pakṣa niścayena mayā vādi pakṣa sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti buddhyā pravarttate sādharmya sama saṃśaya samayoḥ tu vādi sādhanena sāmya mātra āpādanena tad dūṣaṇam na tu pratipakṣa niścayena iti viśeṣaḥ iha tu sāmya mātra āpādanam na sādhanena kim tu dūṣaṇaiḥ iti etāvatā sama arthaḥ prayogaḥ samaḥ iti boddhavyam 
NVTṬ_5,1.17.1–5,1.17.2^1	 asya pratyākhyānam pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapatiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ dvayoḥ sādhanayoḥ tat ānīma gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣayoḥ kaḥ ayam abhimānaḥ prativādinaḥ yat mayā asvapakṣa sādhanena eva vādinaḥ sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti samāna balayoḥ ced ayam ātmīyāt sādhanāt sva pakṣa siddhipam icchati atas anicchan= api vādinā api sādhanāt siddhim abhyupagamayitavyaḥ anyathā sva sādhanāt sādhya siddhim upajīvya vyaktam iyam rājaṅkula sthitiḥ iti evam vyavasthite sūtra bhāṣye yojayitavye pratipakṣāt pratipakṣa sādhanāt prakaraṇasya prakriyamāṇasya sādhyasya iti yāvat siddheḥ samānāt sva sādhanāt pratiṣedhasya prativādi sādhanasya sva sādhya siddhi dvāreṇa parakīya sādhana pratiṣedhasya anupapattiḥ kasmāt pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti atas uktam pratipakṣa upapatteḥ phalataḥ parakīya sādhanasya samānāt sva sādhanāt prakriyā siddhim sva sādhya siddhim bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati prativādinā 
NVTṬ_5,1.17.2^2	 nanu evam prakaraṇa samāvhayaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ na udbhāvanīyaḥ prativādinā jāti uttara prasaṅgāt iti atas āha tattva anavadhāraṇāt ca prakriyā siddhiḥ sva sādhya nirṇayena para sādhya vighaṭana buddhyā prativādinā sādhanam prayujyamānam prakaraṇa sama jāti uttaram bhavati sat pratipakṣa tayā vādinaḥ sādhanam aniścāyakam karomi iti buddhyā pratipakṣa sādhanam prayuñjānaḥ na jāti vādī sat uttara vādi tvāt sat pratipakṣatāyāḥ hetu doṣasya anaikāntika ādi vat upapādita tvāt tattva anavadhāraṇāt iti anena prakaraṇa sama udāharaṇam darśitam vārtikam viruddha avyabhicārya īṣaukta uttaraḥ iti tulya balayoḥ ekatarasmāt su asādhya siddhim abhyupagacchatoḥ dvayoḥ api phalataḥ vyabhicāraḥ sidhyati na ca viruddha avyabhicārī sambhavati avyabhicāraḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ sa ca pañca rūpa sampattiḥ catū rūpa sampattiḥ vā na viruddha avyabhicāriṇi sā asti iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.18.1–5,1.22.2^1	 sūtra ābhāṣya vārtikāni pramāṇa sāmānya parīkṣā vyākhyānena vyākhyātāni udāharaṇa puraḥsaram sūtram yojayati anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti anitya sādharmyāt anityam śabdam bruvāṇaḥ bhavān anakṣaram nitya sādharmyāt nitya tvam śabdasya brūtaityarthaḥ na sādharmya samādau vādī abhiprāya varṇanam iti ataḥ bhedaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram anuktasya arthāpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ tat vyācaṣṭe anupapādya sāmarthyam iti tat eva khalu anuktam vacanāt labhyate yat kalpana manteraṇa vacana arthaḥ na ghaṭate yathā pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅktaiti ukte rātrau bhuṅkte iti yathā vā yāgena svargam bhāvayet iti ukte antara apūrvam kṛtvā iti vākya artha upapādane tasya sāmarthyāt na tu avyabhicāriṇaḥ sādharmyāt sādhye sādhyamāne arthāt uktam bhavati vyabhicāriṇā api sādharmyeṇa sādhayitavyam iti tasya vākya artha upapādane asāmarthyāt tad antareṇa vākya artha upapatteḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.22.2^2	 yadi punar anupalabdha sāmarthyam anuktam api gamyeta tatas tvayā nitya tva āpādane śabdasya ucyamāne anucyamānam anitya tvam pratyetavyam tathā ca bhavat abhimatasya nitya tvasya vyāvṛttiḥ tat ida māhaa nitya pakṣasya anuktasya siddhau= arthāt āpannam nitya pakṣasya hāniḥ iti viparyayeṇa api pratyavasthāna sambhavāt anaikāntika tvam āha ubhaya pakṣa samā ca iyam iti vyabhicārāt ca anaikāntika tvam āha na ca iyam vipayarya mātrāt iti na hi bhojana niṣedhāt eva abhojana viparītam sarvatra kalpate dhana tvam hi grāvṇaḥ patana anukūla guru tva atiśaya sūcanā artham na tu itareṣām patanam vārayati vārtikam su bodham 
NVTṬ_5,1.23.1	 yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāti aprayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭena aviśeṣaḥ a nitya tva ākhyaḥ śabdasya sattvāt sādharmyāt sarveṣām sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ na tu evam yathā prayana anantarīyaka tvāt api sādharmyāt na śabda ghaṭayoḥ anitya tvam aviśeṣa eti pratiṣedhaḥ aviśeṣa samaḥ aviśeṣaityasya vivaraṇam ubhayoḥ anitya tvaḥ iti deśyam vārtikam sādharmya samātaḥ na bhidyate iti parihāra vārttikam na eka samastā iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.24.1–5,1.24.2^1	 asya pratyādeśa sūtram kvacid dharma anupapatteḥ kvacid ca upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ kva cit sādharmye prayatna anantarīyaka tva ādau sati śabda ādeḥ ghaṭa ādinā saha tad dharmasya ghaṭa dharmasya anitya tvasya upapatteḥ kva cit sādharmye śabdasya bhāva mātreṇa saha sattva ādau bhāva mātra dharmasya anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāva eti yojanāḥ etat uktam bhavati avinā abhāva sampannam sādharmyam gamakam na tu sādharmya mātram iti sadbhāvaḥ papatti nimittam iti sadbhāva vyāpakam iti arthaḥ atra antare vaināśikaḥ sattā vyāpakam anitya tvam manvānaḥ deśayati atha matam anitya tvam eva dharma antaram iti nirākaroti evam khalu vai kalpyamānaḥ iti pūrva pakṣa uttara pakṣa pava nirvāhaḥ tṛtīye prapañcitaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.24.2^2	 api ca santaḥ ke cana pramāṇauvadhṛta nitya tvāḥ yatha ākāśa ādigātma paramāṇavaḥ ke cit pramāṇa viniścita anityabhāvāḥ yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ tasmāt sattvam anaikāntika tvāt asādhakam iti āha sataḥ ca nitya aniti abhāvāt iti api ca yat pratiṣedhāya prasaṅga āpādanam tat eva pratiṣedhyam sādhayati na tu niṣedha tī ti āha sarva bhāvānām sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti vārtikam kva cit sādharmyam upalabhyate iti vyāpyatayā iti śeṣaḥ atha śabda varjam ucyatā eti tatra āha vyarthaṃvā sarva bhāva grahaṇam uktaḥ ca viśeṣaḥ anvaya vyatireka saṃpannaḥ hetuḥ iti prayatna antarīyaka tvam na tu uttaraḥ sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti anvaya vyatireka sampanna eti 
NVTṬ_5,1.25.1–5,1.26.2	 yadi anitya tva kāraṇam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upapadyate tat asti śabdasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti prakaraṇa samāyām jātau pakṣa pratipakṣa sādhanayoḥ samāna bala tve api prativādi svāsādhana asu apakṣa siddhpavayā vādi sādhana dūṣaṇe pravarttate upapatti samāyām tu sva sādhanena eva iti viśeṣaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram upapatti kāraṇa abhyanujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ vādī abhimatasya sādhanasya upapattau yat kāraṇam tasvaya prativādinā abhyanujñānāt iti bhāvaḥ prakaraṇa sama pratyākhyāna vat asya api pratayā ākhyānam draṣṭavyam sugame bhāṣya vārttike 
NVTṬ_5,1.27.1^1	 anitya tva kāraṇasya iti jñāpakasya iti arthaḥ nanu yad vṛtta yoga prāthamyayoḥ sādhana dharmaḥ viṣayaḥ na tu sādhya dharmaḥ sa hi tad vṛtta yogasya viṣayaḥ evam prayujyate yaḥ yaḥ prayatna anantarīyakaḥ sa sarvaḥ anityaḥ anena hi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anityāt anyatas vyāvarttitam anitya tvam tu aniyatam sa yadi aprayatna ānantarīyake śabde anyatra vā bhavet kaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakattvasya anitya tva niyama virodhaḥ evam hi sa bhavet yadi nityaḥ api prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ dṛśyeta na tu evam asti tasmāt upalabdhi samāyāḥ utthānam eva na asti bīja abhāvāt iti atas āha vārtikakāraḥ sarva sādhya adhyāropeṇa avyāpaka tvam sādhanasya iti upalabdhi sama arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.27.1^2	 yadi api varṇa ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ ani tyatvena sādhya tayā vivakṣitaḥ prakaraṇāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti tathā api śabda mātram anena pakṣīkṛtam iti āropya bhāga asiddha tva āropaṇam sādhanasya iti upalabdhi sama arthaḥ samāropam eva udāharaṇa antareṇa darśayati sarvam anityam iti śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti pratijñāyām api sarvam anityam itna pavayā āropya iti yojanāḥ bhāṣya kāra udāharaṇa apatita upaḥ ca udāharaṇa antara pradarśana bījam yaḥ tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyām sarva aniti a tva āropaḥ nirbījaḥ iti na tuṣyati tam pratyāha śrūyamāṇā iti yadi api anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti śrūyate tathā api sāmarththāt ādya eti vivakṣitaḥ śabda antara utpādaka tvam sajātīya utpādaka tvam itievam ca na ayoga vyavacchedena śabda anitya tvam hetuḥ avyāpaka tvāt na api anya yoga vyavacchedena hetu antarasya vidyamāna tvāt iti jāti vādinaḥ abhisaṃdhiḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.28.1^1	 asya pratayā ākhyāna sūtram kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti bruvatā iti kāraṇataḥ prayatnāt śabdasya utpatti niyamaḥ vidhīyate varṇānām anitya tvaṃva sādhayitum na tu kāryasya kāraṇa niyamaḥ prayatnāt eva sarvaḥ śabdaḥ jāyate na tu vāyu saṃyogāt vṛkṣa bhaṅgāt iti niyamaḥ ucyate yena avyāpaka tvam hetoḥ syāt iti sūtra arthaḥ tu kāraṇa antarāt api jñāpaka antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ sādhya dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedha eti etat eva vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bruvatā prayatna anantarīyaka tvena iti śeṣaḥ sādhya antarāṇām śākhā bhaṅga ja śabdānām kāraṇam anitya tva jñāpakam na pratiṣidhyate yadi apakṣīkṛtānām api kāraṇa antarāt anitya tvam bhavati kāmam bhavatu iti arthaḥ na api śabdasya sādhyasya anitya tve kāraṇa antaram pratayaya bheda bhedi tva ādi pratiṣidhyate 
NVTṬ_5,1.28.1^2	 eka deśi matam āha apare tu parihāram bruvate yat eva prayatna ānantarīyakam itañtidetat pava dūṣayati etat tu na avivādāt iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam hi koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ kriyāyāḥ sā hi prayatna vat ātma saṃyogāt jāyate vāyoḥ punar uraḥsthāna ādiṣu saṃyoga vibhāga ādayaḥ na prayatna ānantarīyakāḥ prāk eva tu śabdaḥ yadā ca ādya śabdasya iyam gatiḥ tadā kā eva katha prayatna anantarīyaka tve antyasya śravaṇa vivara samavāyinaḥ śrūyamāṇsya śabdasya tasmāt yaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvam śabdaspaya vinā pramāṇena pratipadyate na tam prati kim cit sādhyate pramāṇena pramāṇa an adhīnasya pratibhāsa mātreṇa prameya siddheḥ sarvatra sulabhatavāt iti tad anena aparitoṣa bīja m uktam abhyupetya śabdasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam āha yadā tu prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam iti deśayati jāti iti pariharati na iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.29.1–5,1.29.3	 anupalabdhi sama pratiṣedhasya lakṣaṇam darśayitum tat pratiṣedhyam tāvat āha bhāṣya kāraḥ na prāk uccāraṇāt vidyamānasya anupalabdhiḥ iti tasmāt udaka ādi vat āvaraṇa ādiḥ asya anupalambha kāraṇam bhavati iti atas āha gṛhyeta ca etat asya agrahaṇa kāraṇam iti pratiṣedhyam utkvā pratiṣedhasya jāteḥ lakṣaṇam āha tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhi samaḥ vyācaṣṭe teṣām āvaraṇa ādīnām anupalabdhiḥ na upapadyate upalabhyamāna tve upalabdhi rūpa tayā anupalabdhi tva anupapatteḥ tathā ca anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt anupalabdhiḥ na asti iti āvaraṇa ādi upalabdhi siddhiḥ iti āvaraṇaḥ iva āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ api anupalabdhi sama iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.30.1–5,1.30.2^1	 anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ āvaraṇa ādīnām abhāvam gamayati na tu ātmanaḥ abhāvam āvaraṇa ādi upalabdhi rūpam na hi asau= anupalabdhiḥ api ātmanaḥ yena ātma abhāvam gamayet upalabdhiḥ api upalabhya viṣayā na ātma viṣayā kim punar anupalabdhiḥ tasmāt anupalabdhiḥ upalabhya abhāva hetuḥ na hetuḥ ātma abhāvasya tathā sati sā eva na syāt iti na syāt upalabhya abhāvaḥ api iti āvaraṇam tad upalabdhinaḥ ca syāt iti tat idam āha bhāṣya kāraḥ anupalambhāt iti ayama hetuḥ iti kasmāt anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ etat vyācaṣṭe upalambha abhāva mātra tvāt iti mātra grahaṇena jāti vādi abhimata ātma abhāva rūpa tām vyavacchinatti 
NVTṬ_5,1.30.2^2	 nanu iyam anupalabdhiḥ bhavatu upalambha abhāvaḥ mā ca bhūt upalabhyasya kim āyātam āvaraṇa ādi abhāvasya iti ataa āha yat asti tad upalabdheḥ viṣayaḥ upalabdhyā tat asti iti vijñāyate na punar anupalabdheḥ anupalambha ātma tayā tat pratijñeyam iti bhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ prajñā iyam āha yajñāsti saḥ anupalabdheḥ iti nanu jñāyatām kim etāvatā api iti atas āha saḥ ayam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambhaiti tvayā hi jāti vādinā āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambhena āvaraṇa upalambham āvaraṇam ca prasañjayatā anupalambhasya sva viṣaya lopena pratayavastheyam 
NVTṬ_5,1.30.2^3	 evam ced varam asya āvaraṇa tad upalambhau viṣayau evam anena bhāva abhāva buddhi vyapadeśa vyavahārāḥ sakala loka yātrā vāhinaḥ anukūlitāḥ bhavanti tat idam uktam saḥ ayam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambhaa āvaraṇa upalambha niṣedha viṣayam pramāṇam upalabdhi abhāve anupalabdhau sva viṣaye pravarttamānaḥ na sva viṣaya manupalabdhim pratiṣedhati api tu upalabdhim eva jāti vādinaḥ tu niṣedhyeta tathā ca sarva loka vyavahāraḥ samucchidyeta iti bhāvaḥ apratiṣiddhā ca āvaraṇa ādyavanupalabdhi rāvaṇa ādīnām abhāvam prati hetu tvāya kalpate nanu ca na anupalambha mātram abhāva graha hetuḥmā bhūt candramasaḥ para bhāge hariṇa sadasadbhāva saṃśaya eti atas āha āvaraṇa ādīni tu iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.30.2^4	 upalabhyam vā upalabdhiḥ vā na anupalambha mātrāt na asti iti sidhyati api tu darśana yogyam sat iti na ati prasaṅga eti arthaḥ nanu upalabdheḥ sva viṣayasya pratipādikāyāḥ abhāvāt āvaraṇa ādayaḥ mā nāma upalabhyantām abhāvaḥ tu teṣām kutastya iti atas āha anupalambhāt pratiṣedhakāt pramāṇāt anupalabdheḥ yaḥ viṣayaḥ upalabhya abhāvaḥ sa gamyate na santi āvaraṇa ādīni śabdasya agraha kāraṇāni iti tat kim idānīm sākṣāt eva upalambha niṣedhakam pramāṇam upalabhya abhāvam gamayati na iti āha anupalambhāt upalabdhi niṣedhakāt pramāṇāt anupalabdhiḥ āvaraṇasya sidhyati kasmāt iti atas āha viṣayaḥ sa tasya upalabdhi niṣedhakasya pramāṇasya anupalabdhiḥ tatas ca āvaraṇa ādi abhāva eti draṣṭavyam 
NVTṬ_5,1.31.1–5,1.31.2^1	 na kevalam niṣedha viṣaya pramāṇa gamyatā anupalabdheḥ upapatti gamyāḥ api tu sarva jana pratyātma vedanīyā iti āha sūtrakāraḥ jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam vyācaṣṭe ahetuḥ iti vartate śarīraḥ iti prāc uccāraṇāt śabdasya anupalabdheḥ asattve sādhyamāne anaikāntika tvam syāt yadi tu paścāt viśiṣyeta āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave satī iti tatas hetu antaram nāma nigraha sthānam syāt iti āśaṅkya vārtikakāraḥ āha āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sattva abhyupagame ca sati anupalabdheḥ iti prayogaḥ sattva abhyupagame ca iti asya upādāna prayojanam āha 
NVTṬ_5,1.31.1–5,1.31.2^2	 āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sattva abhyupagame viparyayasya avyabhicārāt na arthāpatti samaḥ ayam arthaḥ yadi āvaraṇa asaṃbhave sati anupalabdheḥ iti ucyamāne kaścid artha āpati samayā jātyā pratyavatiṣṭhate āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sati anupalabdheḥ iti ucyamāne arthāt āpatitam āvaraṇa ādi saṃbhave sati upalabdheḥ iti yadā tu sattva ādi abhyupagamaḥ iti viṣaya viparyayassūcyate tad āvaraṇa ādyasa bhave sati anupalabdheḥ asattvam iti asya viparyayaḥ evam prayoktavyaḥ sattva upagame ca āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sati upalabhyeta iti asya viparyayasya avyabhicārāt na artha āpatti samaityarthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.32.1–5,1.35.1	 asti ghaṭena anityena sarva bhāvānām sattvam sādharmyam iti asya pratyākhyāna sūtram sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt tat idam jāti vādinā sāmyam āpādya parama artha pratiṣedham āha dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayathā bhāvāt na aviśeṣaḥ sādharmyā mātram ca aśriti asādhyāḥ vinā abhāva rahitam iti deśya vārtti kam aviśeṣa samātā eti pariharati bhidyate iti yat ca aviśeṣa samauttaram iti sarva anitya tvam hi prasañjayatā na śabda anitya tvam niṣiddham bhavati iti tatra uktam iti arthaḥ atra śaṅkate nāsādhanāt iti pariharati na viśeṣa hetu upapatteḥ iti sugamam anyat dharmasya sarvadā bhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ api sarvadā bhāvaḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānya samavāya atirikta dharmā nityā dharmī ca anityaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.36.1^1	 asya pratyādeśa sūtram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ nityam anitya bhāvāt iti hetoḥ abhyupagame anabhyupagame ca doṣa eti arthaḥ utpannasya nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya anitya tvam tatra ca paripraśna anupapattiḥ yadi hi nirodhakāt abhāvaḥ anitya tvam tathā api praśna anupapattiḥ atha api asmad mate samavāyaḥ tathā api tad anupapattiḥ anitya tvam hi śabdasya apara antāva cchinna sattā samavāyaḥ na ca asau śabda ādheyaḥ tasya svatantra tvāt eva iti arthaḥ vārtikam pṛthak adharma tvena anitya tvasya anabhyupagamāt iti anātyantika sattā samavāyaḥ hi anitya tā na ca asau samavāyāt pṛgrak dharmaḥ na ca samavāyaḥ api dharmaḥ anāśrita tvāt pāratantryeṇa tu nirūpaṇāt katham cit dharmī iti ucyate iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.36.1^2	 api ca anātyantika sattā yogaḥ anityatā iti ukte na yuktaḥ praśnaḥ iti na hi ghaṭamānaya iti preṣitaḥ parivṛtya pṛcchati kim ghaṭaḥ ānetavyauta paṭaḥ iti tādṛśam etat iti arthaḥ api ca anitya tā nitnapayā anityā vā iti vikalpaḥ na avatarati virodhāt ityataḥ āha ātyantikānātyantika bhāva yogaḥ ca ekasya iti śaṅkate pratiṣedhya iti evam abhyupagacchataḥ ayam doṣaḥ iti etat param etat na tu sva pakṣa upavarṇana param etat iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na vikalpa anupapatteḥ iti virodhasya ca ukta uttara tvāt iti paripraśna anupapatteḥ iti uttaram virodhasya uktam iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.37.1^1	 udāharaṇa vapūrva kam asya artham vyācaṣṭe prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti kāryatva anitya tve ca paraspara asaṃkīrṇe prathamaḥ eva adhyāya īdarśite udāhṛtya jātim avatārayati evam avasthite prayatna kārya anekatvāt iti pratiṣedha aucyate iti prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam prayatna anantara utpādaḥ vā syāt prayatna anantara upalambhaḥ vā na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ asiddha tvāt tasmāt prayatna anantara upalambhaḥ āstheyaḥ tatra kārya samam pratiṣedham āha prayatna anantaram upalabhyamānānām prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ yathā ghaṭa ādīnām vyavadhāna apohāt ca abhivyaktiḥ vyavahitānām mūlaka kīlaka ādīnām tat kim prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ śabdasya aho svid abhivyaktiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ na asti 
NVTṬ_5,1.37.1^2	 tat evam kārya aviśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānam kārya samaḥ yena tu kārya samā jātiḥ anyathā eva uktā tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte anyat mṛd piṇḍa ādi kārya tvam ghaṭasya anyat ca vivakṣā prayatna vāyu preraṇa abhighāta kārya tvam śabdasya tasmāt śabda kṛtaka tvasya ghaṭa ādi kṛtaka tvāt bhedāt na sādhanam kṛta kattvam anitya tvasya iti sā iyam kārya anya tvena pratyavasthānāt kārya sameti tat āha kāryatva anyatva leśena yat sādhyā siddhi darśanam tad kārya samam iti bhadantena uktam kīrtiḥ api āha sādhyena anugamāt kārya sāmānyena api sādhane sambandhi bhedāt bheda uktiḥ deṣaḥ kārya samaḥ mataḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.37.2	 tat anena yadi īśvara sādhana nirālaraṇāya uktam tanu giri sāgara ādīnām anyat kārya tvam anyat ca prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura ādīnā miti tat api jāti uttaramena iti uktam bhavati na ca pratyakṣa dṛśyamānam buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam saudha ādīnām iva tanu bhuvana ādīnām tāsti iti etāvatā bhedena kārya bhede śabda mātra abhedaḥ iti sa aprantam abhūtvā bhāva lakṣaṇasya kṛtaka tvasya saṃsthānavat tvasya vā vastunaḥ eva abhedāt tasmāt etat api ayuktam avastu bhede pravṛttepi śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane a na ca iyam jātiḥ utkarṣa apakarṣa samābhyām bhidyate sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpena pravartamāna tvāt tasmāt sūtra kāra ukta ā iva kārya samosaṃkīrṇaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.38.1–5,1.38.2^1	 asya pratyādeśa sūtram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ kāryasya utpattiḥ na lakṣaṇasya anya tve abhivyakti lakṣaṇāt kāryāt prayatnasya abhivyaktim pratyahetu tvam na bhavati iti atas āha anupalabdhi kāraṇasya āvaraṇa ādeḥ upapatteḥ abhivyakti hetu tvam syāt evam tu na asti iti vyatireka param draṣṭavyam sati kārya anyatvaḥ iti bhāṣyam sūtra vat yojanīyam yatra prayatna anantaram iti atra yatra tatrayoḥ vyatyāsaḥ tatra prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ yatra anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhānam upapadyate iti kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ prayatna abhivyaṅgya tvam iti atas āha vyavadhāna ayogāt ca iti caḥ hetu arthe prayatna anantara bhāvinaḥ iti viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam upalakṣayati prayatna anantara bhāvinā eti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.38.2^2	 anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti asya vyatireka pradhāna tām āha na tu śabdasya anupalabdhī iti deśya vārtikam saṃśaya samātaḥ iti pariharati ubhaya sādharmyāt iti viśeṣa anupalabdhau satyām ubhaya sādharmyāt saṃśaya samaḥ idam tu viśeṣa upalabdhim avivakṣitvā iti viśeṣaḥ tat idam ukta mayam tu na tathā iti deśayati sādharmya samātaiti nirākaroti na het tu adhi āropaṇāt iti prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ayam prayatna anantaram upalabdheḥ iti adhyāropya pratiṣidhyate sādharmya same tu na āropaṇam iti arthaḥ tat evam jāti uttara vādinam prati sādhana vādinā sarvatra eva samyak samādhānam sva sādhanasya vaktavyam evam sati tattva nirṇaye kathā paryavasānam bhavati 
NVTṬ_5,1.39.1–5,1.39.2	 yadi punar vādī api jāti vādinam prati sādhana ābhāsena pratayavatiṣṭhate tatas ṣaṣ pakṣyām satyām na tattva nirṇaya avasānā kathā bhavet iti śiṣya hitaḥ sūtrakāraḥ samādhāna ābhāsa vādinam prati ṣaṣ pakṣīm avatārayati pratiṣedhe ḥpi samānaḥ doṣaḥ tad etat sūna tra avatāra param bhāṣyam hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam upapādyate prativādine anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti yadi ca anaikāntika tvāt asādhakam vādinaḥ vacanam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ yaḥ ayam prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ jāti vādi nanaḥ saḥ api anaikāntikaḥ evam hi aikāntikaḥ syāt yadi sarvam eva pratiṣedhet yatas tu kim cit pratiṣedhati kim cit ca na tasmāt ayam anaikāntika ḥataḥ asādhakaḥ iti arthaḥ vyākhyā antaram āha atha vā śabdasya iti nitya pakṣaḥ abhivyaktiḥ na utpāda evam anitya pakṣe utpādaḥ na abhi vyaktiḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ na sidhyati ayam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,1.40.1–5,1.42.1	 na kevalam asyām jātau= ayam samādhāna ābhāsaḥ vādinaḥ api tu sarvatra eva jātau= iti śiṣyān śikṣayati sūtrakāraḥ sarvatra evam asmin samādhāne prayukte vādinā punar jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate pratiṣedhaḥ jāti vādinaḥ tasya vipratiṣedhaḥ mūla sādhana vādinaḥ tasmin= tulyaḥ doṣa eti jāti vādinaḥ pratyavasthānam iti arthaḥ atha pañcamam pakṣam sādhana vādinaḥ caturtha pakṣa vādinam prati mata anujñāpa āpādanam āha pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ mata anujñā 
NVTṬ_5,1.43.1–5,1.43.3^1	 sā iyam mata anujñā tṛtīye pakṣe pañcama pakṣa vādinaḥ api sādhana vādinā eti jāti vādī ṣaṣṭha pakṣa sthitaḥ āha sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ sva pakṣaṇe lakṣyate tad utthāna tvāt jātiḥ sva pakṣa lakṣaṇā anaikāntika tva udbhāvana lakṣaṇā tām abhyupetya anuddhūtya pratiṣedhe api jāti lakṣaṇe samānaḥ anaikāntika tva doṣaḥ iti upapadyamānam sva pakṣe api doṣam para pakṣe jāti vādi pakṣe sādhanavādi upasaṃharati tatra ca anaikāntikam hetum brūte tat evam sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirddeśe para pakṣe yat svayam dūṣaṇam dattam tasya abhyupagamāt vādinaḥ api samāna uva doṣa eti jāti vādinaḥ vacanam ṣaṣṭhe pakṣe sthitasya tat evam vistīrya saṃkalayya āha tatra khalu sthāpanā hetu vādinaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,1.43.3^2	 sā iyam ṣaṣ pakṣī samāna doṣa āpādanena anirṇāyaka tvāt paunaruktyāt ca na tattva nirṇayāya paryāptāḥ tasmāt samādhāna ābhāsena jāti vādinam prati na pratyavastheyam kim tu samyak sādhanena tathā ca ṣaṭra pakṣī upahatānāvatarati tattva nirṇaya paryavasānā ca kathā bhavati yadi tu asya kadā cit samyak sādhana vādinaḥ api pratibhā kṣayāt samādhānam na sphurati tatas a tyanta parājayāt varam saṃśayaḥ api iti nyāyena samādhāna ābhāsena api pratyavastheyam eva iti āśayavān āha teṣām sādhu asādhu tāyām iti bhāṣya vyākhyayā vārtikam api vyākhyātam etāḥ tu jātayaḥ na tattva vivekam upakurvanti prayujyamāna tayā nirākaraṇīya tayā tu āsām api upakāraḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.1.1^1	 vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt vaicitryāt nigraha sthāna bahutvam iti saṅkṣepeṇa uktam tat idānīm vibhajanīyam tatra yaḥ evam āhuḥ sarvaḥ ayam sādhana dūṣaṇa prakāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhaḥ na vāstavaḥ iti tān pratyāha parājaya vastūni iti parājayaḥ vasati eṣu iti parājaya sthānāni iti arthaḥ kālpanika tve kalpanāyāḥ sarvatra sulabha tvāt sādhana dūṣaṇa vyavasthā na syāt iti bhāvaḥ nigraha sthānāni paryāya antareṇa spaṣṭayati aparādha iti yaḥ āhuḥ asādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam dvayoḥ nigraha sthāna tvam anyat tu na yuktam iti tān pratyāha sāmānyatas dve nigraha sthāne sāmānya vivakṣāyām pratijñā ahānyādayaḥ dvārviśatiḥ api na bhidyante tattva sādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam iti bhavadbhiḥ saṃgṛhītam ṛṣiṇā ca vipratipatti apratipattibhyām iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ atra vicārayati kartṛ karma karaṇānām iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.1.1^2	 tatra eke varṇayanti pakṣasya iti yathā pakṣa uddeśena sādhanam pravartamānam pakṣasya evam tad uddeśena dūṣaṇāni pravartamānāni pakṣasya eva iti evam ca āhuḥ dūṣaṇāni iti nyūna tā ādayaḥ hi sarve pakṣa uddeśena pravartamānāḥ pakṣasya eva iti arthaḥ dūṣayati etat tu na samyak iti pakṣa uddeśena pravṛtteḥ pakṣa viṣaya tām na apajānīmaḥ sākṣāt tu tat viṣaya tām nirākurmaḥ tasya vastu sataḥ tādavasthyāt evam sādhanam api yatra asamartham tatra prayujyamānam na svatas duṣyati yatra tu samartham tat sādhayati eva tasmāt kartuḥ eva doṣaḥ iti āha tasmāt asamarthayoḥ iti na kevalam svātantryāt kartuḥ nigrahaḥ api tu tad ādhāra tvāt vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ iti āha vipratipatti apratipapattyoḥ ca iti nanu vākye nyūna tā ādayaḥ doṣāḥ na puruṣa āśrayāḥ iti ataa āha vipratipatti apratipattī ca iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.1.1^3	 na svarūpeṇa vākyam duṣṭam tasya tādavasthyāt iti uktam kim tu puruṣasya vipratipatti apratipattibhyām tathā pratibhāti tena vākya gata nyūna tā ādi darśanāt puruṣe vipratipratti apratipatī pratīyete tena dvāreṇa puruṣaḥ nigṛhyate na tu vākyam etāvatā ca pratijñā doṣaḥ iti ucyate naca ayam api niyamaḥ yad vākya dvāreṇa puruṣī nigṛhyate ajñāna ādiṣu tad abhāva ādi tyāha kāni cit nigraha sthāni iti śaṅkate dva vidhyā anupapattiḥ iti sāmānyam vivakṣyate viśeṣaḥ vā sāmānya vivakṣāyām nigraha sthānam iti eva astu tasya sarvatra aviśeṣa akuto dvaividhyam viśeṣa vivakṣāyām pratijñāhānya ādīni bahūni iti ayuktam dvaividhya abhidhānam ubhayathā api iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na sāmānya bheda vistarasya vivakṣātaḥ pravṛtteḥ iti sāmānya vivakṣāyām api nigraha sthānam iti na uktam uddeśāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.1.1^4	 tasmāt lakṣaṇam praṇaya tā anyathā tad asambhavāt avāntara sāmānya dvaividhya vivakṣayā sāmānyam lakṣitam bhedānām tu vistara vivakṣayā pratijñāhānyāḥ dayaḥ api prapañcitāḥ iti arthaḥ āntar gaṇikānām tu bhedānām ānantyam iti āha udāharaṇa mātra tvāt ca iti dvāviṃśati saṃkhyā avacchinnaḥ bhedaḥ udāharaṇa mātram āntar gaṇika bheda vivakṣayām tu ānantyam iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam anubhāṣya akṣivapati prāyeṇa pratijñā iti samādhatte kriyā vacana doṣa dvāreṇa iti vacana doṣa dvāreṇa iti etāvat mātre vaktavye kriyā doṣa āmidhānam dṛṣṭānta artham nanu āśraya arthaḥ api ayuktaḥ puruṣa āśraya tvāt iti atas āha na ca ādhāra ādheya bhāva eti aparam api bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tattva vādi nam atattva vādinam ca iti samādhatte na para apadiṣṭā iti samyamsādhane jāti uttare datte tasya jāti tvam anudbhāvayan= tattva vādī api nigṛhyataiti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.2.1–5,2.2.2^1	 lakṣaṇam tu pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñā hāniḥ tat etat sūtram bhāṣya matena tāvat vyācaṣṭe pratidṛṣṭāntasya yodharmaḥ tam yadā sva dṛṣṭānte abhyanujānāti iti tat etat bhāṣya vyākhyānam upanyasya vārttikakāraḥ dūṣayati etat tu na budhyāmahe kadham atra pratijñā hīyate iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti sādhane prayukte prativādinā ca anaikāntika tve sāmānyena udbhāvite tṛtīya sthāna patitaḥ vā adya āha astu tarhi sāmānya vat ghaṭa ādiḥ nityaiti tathā satya aindriyaka tvam anaikāntikam na bhavati nitya mātra āgāmi tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām api nitya tā abhyupagamāt iti a āśayena yadi apapi tathā api sākṣāt anaikāntika doṣa udvāram akṣara ārūḍham anukvā sva dṛṣṭānte nityatām pratipadyate nitya tā pratipatteḥ ca asiddha tā dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ bhavati sādhya vikalatā iti arthaḥ saḥ ayam dṛṣṭānta doṣeṇa hetu doṣeṇa vā viruddha tvena ghaṭa ādīnām api nitya tva abhyupagamena aindri nayaka tvasya hetoḥ sādhya anitya tva viruddhena nitya tvena vyāpta tvāt nigrahaḥ vādinaḥ na pratijñā hāniḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.2.2^2	 na khalu anena astu śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti pratijñā parityaktā kim tvastu ghaṭaḥ api nityaḥ iti uktam yadi dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñāta arthasya asiddheḥ pratijñā ahāniḥ iti ucyate tatas sarve eva doṣaḥ pratijñāhāniḥ sarvasmāt eva doṣāt pratijñā hāneḥ upapatteḥ tasmāt katham cit dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñā ahāniḥ upacarita vnayā ca ca asau pradhānam pratijñā hānim vinā bhavitum arhati iti āha dṛṣṭāntam cajahat iti tat evam bhāṣya karīyam vyākhyānam dūṣayitvā sva matena vyācikhyāsuḥ pṛcchati katham tarhi iti dṛṣṭaḥ ca asau= ante nigamane vyavasthitaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭa antau pakṣa pratipakṣau= ucyete etat uktam bhavati pratidṛṣṭāntasya pratipakṣasya sāmānyasya yaḥ dharmaḥ nitya tvam tam sva pakṣe śabde abhyanujānāti udāharaṇam āha yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.2.2^3	 dvitīya pakṣa vād iti sāmānyena pratayavasthita edam āha tṛtīya pakṣe sthitaḥ vādī yadi sāmānyam aindri payakam nityam śabdaḥ api evam bhavatu iti pratijñāhāniḥ atra ca anaikāntika tvena pratyavasthitā eti upalakṣaṇam yena kena citgnakāreṇa sva pratijñāta artha anirvāham paśyan pratijñārthan jahat pratijñā ahānim āpnoti iti parama arthaḥ yat api ucyate svayam eva ghaṭam anityam aindriyakam udāhṛtya ghaṭasya aindriyaka tvam paśyan katham anunmataḥ san sāmānyasya nityasya aindriyaka tva darśana mātrāt śabde nityat tvam abhyupagacchet kintū bhayatra darśanāt saṃśayittaḥ syāt tatra sarvam nitya miti sāṃkhyīya rāt dhānta avaṣṭambhena api sva pakṣa nirvāham paśyataḥ anaikāntikatva uddhārāya prekṣāvataḥ api pravṛtti sambhavāt na ca ātyantikam prekṣāvat tvam iha grāhyam tādṛśasya nigraha adhikaraṇa tva anupapatteḥ tasmāt yathā jaḍam prati vicāraḥ na asti evam prāmāṇikam api prati nigraha avatātāraḥ na asti iti madhyamaḥ janaḥ nigrāhyaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.2.2^4	 tasya ca sambhavanti evam pramādāḥ iti śaṅkate prasaṅga vidhānāt iti ced nirākaroti tat ca na atas eva tad prāpteḥ hetu doṣam uddidhīrṣuḥ prasañjayan= abhyupagacchati eva na hi sāṅkhyīyam rāddha antam anabhyupagacchan= anaikāntika tvam uddhartum arhati iti bhāvaḥ tat anena para matam nirākṛta prāyam api sākṣāt nirākarttum upanyasyati hetu doṣeṇa anaikāntika tva lakṣaṇena caritārtha tvāt na pratijñā ahāni rnigraha sthānam iti anye yat āha kīrtiḥ atasmāt aindriyaka tu asya nitya anitya pakṣa vṛtteḥ vyabhicārāt asādhana aṅgasya upādānāt nigrahaḥ na pratipakṣa dharmasya abhyanujñānāt iti nirākaroti na anā ekāntika doṣa parihāreṇa vipratipatteḥ tad upapatteḥ yadā hi sāṃkhya pakṣa avalambanena śabda nitya tvam abhyupaḥ iti tadā pratijñā hāniḥ na viruddhaḥ hetuḥ na api anaikāntikaḥ vipakṣa abhāvāt kevalam pratijñāta artha hānam eva asya parājaya sthānam vipratipatteḥ svasādhya viruddha pratipatteḥ iti sarvam avadātam 
NVTṬ_5,2.3.1^1	 etat vyācaṣṭe pratijñātaḥ mīmāṃsakam prati vaiśeṣikeṇa anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya sādhana mainrdiyaka tvāt haṭa vat iti evam uktasya pratiṣedhaḥ mīmāṃsakena kriyate pratidṛṣṭāntena hetu vyabhicāraḥ tam āha sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam iti tasmin pratiṣedhe mīmāṃsakena kṛte dharmavavikalpāt tathā nirddenaśa iti yāvat na ucayate tāvat ardha uktaḥ eva dharma vikalpāt iti a nūdya vyācaṣṭe dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭa antayoḥ dhaṭa sāmānyayoḥ sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam tad yoge tad dharma bhedāt sāmānya maindriyakam sarva gatam aindriyakaḥ tu asarva gataḥ ghaṭaḥ iti dharma vikalpāt tad artham prati jñāta artha siddhi artham śabdasya asarva gata tvam mīmāṃsakānām pratipādayitum nirddeśaḥ tasya hi śabdasya asarva gata tvam asiddham praśna pūrvakam nirddeśa svarūpam āha katham yathā ghaṭaḥ asarva gataḥ anityaḥ iti evam śabdaḥ api asarva gataḥ anitya eti 
NVTṬ_5,2.3.1^2	 idam hi pratijñā vākyam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vat asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti mīmāṃsakam vipratipannam prati nirddeśāt na tu kṛtaka tvāt itivat udāharaṇa sādharmyāt asya hetu lakṣaṇam asti sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti tu pratijñā lakṣaṇa yogāt pratijñā antaram eva yadi api asya manasi viparivartate asarvata tvam sādhayitvā mayā asarva gata tve sati iti aindriyaka tvam hetuḥ viśeṣaṇīyaḥ iti tathā api etat anena na kṛtam kim tu asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat iti uktvā eva virataḥ para artha anumāne ca vacana gatāḥ guṇa doṣāḥ vicāryante na tu vacana anapekṣam vastu tat ida māhaa sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti dvitīyā pratijñā hetu rahitāḥ asya praśna pūrvakam nigraha sthāna tvam āha tat katham iti anarthakam niṣprayojanam iṣṭa artha siddheḥ abhāvāt iti vārttikam tatra anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāpa prathamā asyām sāmānyena aindriyakeṇa hetoḥ anaikāntika tvāt pratihataḥ vādī prativādinā asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ anitya eti pratijñā antaram pūrva pratijñā siddhi artham karoti iti anuṣajyate pṛcchati katham iti uttaram sādhana sāmarthya aprajñānāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.3.1^3	 anityaḥ śabdaā aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti etā= avat uktvā nirākāṅkṣaḥ vādī na tu asarva gata tve sati iti sādhanam viśeṣitavān na ca aviśiṣṭam sādhanam atra arthe asamartham viśiṣṭam tu samartham tasya sāmarthyam aparijñāya aviśiṣṭe tad āropya aviśiṣṭa sādhanam prayuktavān tatra nirākāṅkṣaḥ vādī savyabhicāra hetu prayogāt eva parājīyate na tu pratijñā antara prayogāt yadi tu vādini a paryavasita vādaḥ eva madhye prativādinā hetoḥ anaikāntika tve udbhāvite tam eva hetum asarva gata tve sati iti viśeṣṭum mīmāṃsake prati śabdasya asarva gata tvam pratijātīte 
NVTṬ_5,2.3.1^4	 asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāya ca na hetum bravīti tadā anaikāntika tva uddhārāya pratijñā antara karaṇāt na anaikāntika tvena parājīyate api tu pratijñā antarāt eva na hi pratijñā pratijñā antaram sādhayitum arhati iti saḥ ayam pratijñāṃmātrasya asādhaka tva apratipattyā asādhakasya eva vā sādhaka tva pratipattyā parājīyate tat etat āha na ca pratijñā pratijñāntaram sādhayati tena pratijñā yatra arthe sama arthā tad aparijñānāt pañca avayava sādhye ca sāmarthya āropaṇāt aparijñānāt iti śliṣṭa nirddeśaḥ prasajya pratiṣedha paryudāsau vivakṣitau tena ajñānāt viparīta jñānāt ca pratijñāntaram nigraha sthānam iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.3.1^5	 yat punar ucyate paraiḥ atyanta asambaddham etat yat pratijñā pratijñā sādhanāya iti yaḥ hi prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu udāharaṇa ādikam vaktum jānāti sa katham cit anukramam sādhanasya jānāti eva jānan katham avi kalā antaḥkaraṇaḥ pratijñām eva pratijñāna sādhanāya upādadīta iti tatra brūmaḥnāyam pratijñayā pratijñā sādhanīya iti buddhyā pravṛttaḥ kim tu asarva gata tvam śabdasya mīmāṃsakam prati sādhayitvā tena aindriyaka tvam viśiṣya anaikāntika tvam uddharaṇīyam iti manorathena pravṛttaḥ pratijñām kṛtavān asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti atha asya prativādyavaṣṭambhāt pariṣad darśanāt vā stambhita tve sādhana apratibhanayā tūṣṇīm bhavataḥ prekṣāvataḥ api pratijñā antaram bhavati nigraha sthānam ayam ca vikala antaḥkaraṇasya nigrahaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api ukta ā iva tad abhyupagamya apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāt iti vadadbhiḥ saḥ a yam i īdṛśaḥ asat pralāpaḥ bhavadbhiḥ śāstre nibandhanīyona tu asmābhiḥ iti vyaktam iyam rāja kula sthitiḥ iti sarvam caturasam 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^1	 atra pratijñā hetvoḥ iti pratiyogi dvaya mātra upalakṣaṇa param tena dṛṣṭānta ādayaḥ api pratiyoginaḥ unneyāḥ etat uktam bhavati yeṣām vākya gatānām padārthānām mithas vyāghātaḥ pratīyate pramāṇa antaram ca virodhakam sa virodhaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam lakṣya sthitaspaya pratijñā grahaṇasya api upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt na ca evam bhāṇḍa ālekhya nyāyaḥ eka deśena avyāpakena samudāya saṃgrahe sa hi bhavati na tu vyāpakena saṃgrahe vyāpakam ca anavayavena idaṃpratiyogi mithunayoḥ virodhaḥataḥ yathāśruti tāvit sūtram vyācaṣṭe vārtikakāraḥ yatra pratijñā hetunā virudhyate iti dvayoḥ virodhe yasya pramāṇa antara anugra haḥ tena tat bādhyate iti tena tat virudhyataiti ucyate 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^2	 yatra pratijñayā hetuḥ virudhyate tat udāharati yathā guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam bhedena agrahaṇāt iti atra hi bhedena agrahaṇāt iti anena grahaṇa pratiṣedhena grāhya abhāvaḥ upalakṣyate tena evam hetu arthaḥ bhavati guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam avyatirekāt iti saḥ ayam pratijñā hetu padayoḥ vyāpti smaraṇa anapekṣaā iva paraspara vyāghātaḥ astitāstipadayoḥ eva na ca evaṃvidhaḥ śabde nitya tva kṛtaka tvayoḥ yena kṛtaka tva vat viruddhaḥ ayam hetvābhāsaḥ syāt tatra hi kṛtaka tvasya nitya tvena vyāpti smaraṇa apekṣaā iva virodhaḥ pratīyate na tu ayam tathā astināstivat svabhāva virodhāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^3	 yadi api ayam asiddhaḥ api hetuḥ tathā api asya asiddhiḥ bādhakam pramāṇa antaram anusṛtya pratipattavyā pratijñā virodhaḥ tu uccāraṇa mātrāt eva prathamatas eva gamyate iti tena eva dūṣitena asiddhiḥ paścāttanī na dūṣaṇa tvāya kalpate bhasmīkṛte dahana vat pratijñā hetu virodha mātreṇa ca nigraha siddheḥ suhṛd bhāva mātreṇa pratijñāyāḥ balavat tā smaraṇam pratijñāyāḥ ca atra balavat tvam pramāṇa antara anugrahāt tathā hi darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha pratisaṃdhānāt rūpa ādi vyatiriktam dravyam sidhyati iti tad anugṛhītā pratijñā eva hetu artham bādhataḥ iti etena eva iti lakṣaṇena 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^4	 śramaṇā garbhiṃṇī iti śramaṇā brahmacāriṇī na antarvatnī bhavitum arhati jita indrayasya upastha saṃyamaḥ hi brahmacaryam na ca asādhana aṅgasya pratijñāyāḥ vacanāt eva nigṛhītaḥ iti kṛtam virodha udbhāvanena niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ dūṣaṇasya dūṣaṇa nyāya atipātāt iti sāṃpratam pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvasya prathamaḥ eva adhyāye darśita tvāt hetu virodhaḥ api yatra hetunā pramāṇa antareṇa anugṛhītena pratijñā bādhyate yathā sarvam pṛthak iti pratijñā na kim cit ekam iti arthaḥ hetuḥ samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti eka samuccaye ghaṭa ādi prayogāt iti arthaḥ na asti ekam eka samuccayaḥ ca iti vacanam mithas virudhyate vinā eva vyāpti anusmaraṇam iti na ca sarva nāsti tva vādinaḥ na eka samucca yova asti iti vaktavyam asati hetau sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^5	 na ca kalpitasya hetoḥ sādhana aṅgatā iti tatra tatra niveditam atra ca ekasamuccayasya pramāṇa anugrahāt na ekam kim cit iti pratijñā hetunā bādhyate etena lakṣaṇena pratijñāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ api vaktavyaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt yat prameyam tat nityam yathā ākāśam iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yadi api atra vastutas hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ tathā api dṛṣṭāntasya pratijñā virodhena eva nigṛhyate virodhasya vākye prathamam avagateḥ anityam ghaṭa ādi unnīya anaikāntika tva pratipatteḥ tad jadhanya tvāt iti hetoḥ ca dṛṣṭānta ādibhiḥ virodhaḥ etena vaktavyā eti anuṣajyate yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt anaindriya dvi aṇuka vat iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^6	 atra api aindriyaka tva an aindriyaka tvayāḥ śabdataḥ virodhaḥ pratīyate sādhana vaikalyam tu vastu svabhāva ālocanayā iti viśeṣaḥ evam upanayena virodhaḥ anaindriyakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti atra api vastu svabhāva ālocanayā anaindriyaka tva asiddhiḥ pratīyate śabdataḥ tu virodhaḥ iti pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca pratijñā hetvoḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi api bādhita viṣayam hetvābhāsa antargatam tathā api ihā api asti iti virodha hetvābhāsayoḥ atra nigraha sthānayoḥ samāveśaḥ astu na kva cit viṣaye samāveśāt ānarthakyam viṣaya antare samāveśa abhāvāt arthavat tvāt darśitam ca anantaram eva bhinna viṣaya tvam iti tat evam sādhana vādinaḥ virodham nigraha sthānam abhidhāya uttara vādinaḥ api nigraha sthānam anena eva saṃgṛhītam iti āha para pakṣa siddhena gotava ādinā iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^7	 yadā hi bauddhena prābhākaram prati sādhyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt iti yadi anitya tvam na bhavet śrāvaṇa tvam na syāt iti prābhākaraḥ anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayati śrāvaṇam śabda tvam nityam ca iti tad āsya anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam svakīya śabda tva nirākaraṇa viruddham iti para pakṣa siddham go tva ādi api īdṛśaḥ eva viṣaye viruddhe draṣṭavyam siddhānta viruddham ca sādhanam viruddham iti āha sva pakṣa anapekṣam ca nanu yadi anaikāntika udbhāvanam api viruddham kaḥ tarhi anaikāntika tva āpādanasya viṣayaḥ ityat āha ubhaya pakṣa sampratipannaḥ tu iti deśayati dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.4.1^8	 avayava antaram hi pratijñā ahet pava ādibhyaḥ udāharaṇe tena hetvābhāsa uktyā tasya saṅgrahaḥ pāramparyeṇa tu udāharaṇa ābhāsasya hetu dūṣaka tvena sarvam eva hetu dūṣakam iti bhāvaḥ pariharati hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt iti hetvābhāsāḥ iti atra hetu śabdaḥ sva artham aparityajya dṛṣṭāntam upalakṣayati upalakṣaṇe hetuḥ uktaḥ hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt hetvābhāsa pradhānaka tvāt dṛṣṭānta ābhāsena api hetuḥ eva dūṣyate yatas na ca etāvatā pratijña ādi doṣa upalakṣaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na hi yatra yatra nimittam asti tat sarvam upalakṣaṇīyam kim tu yat upalakṣyate tatra avaśyam nimittam vaktavyam na ca sūtrakārasya sarvatra lāghava ādaraḥ dṛḍha aiti uktam tasmāt sarvam ramaṇīyam 
NVTṬ_5,2.5.1^1	 aindriyaka tvasya hetoḥ anaikāntiṅka tva udbhāvanena śabda anitya tva pakṣe pratikṣipte vādī prativādinam brūyāt anaikāntika tvam uddidhīrṣuḥ kaḥ punar āha anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti yadi aham anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñātam apahvotum śaknoti tadā na sāmānyena nityena me hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati iti buddhyā ahnupate saḥ ayam evaṃvādī na śakyaḥ anaikāntika tvena jetum apahvavasya apahnava tva āvedane anaikāntika tva uddhārāt tasmāt anaikāntikasya anaikāntika tva sthāpanāya apahnavasya apahnava tvam udbhāvanīyam tatra kim apajnava tvam udbhāvya anaikāntika tvam vyavasthāpya nigṛhyatāmuta apahnavāt eva iti saṃśaye a pahnava tva udbhāvanena eva pūrva apara parāhate nirgṛhyate na anaikāntika tvena tad pūrvaka tvāt anaikāntika tva sthāpanasya 
NVTṬ_5,2.5.1^2	 tasmāt yat uktam kīrtinā kim idānīm hetvābhāsāt uttara pratijñā saṃnyāsa apekṣayā tasya prativādinaḥ hetvābhāse eva ādyam nigraha sthānam iti tat api apāst pratijñā saṃnyāsasya eva pūrva bhāvi tvāt yat api tena uktam pakṣa pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavataḥ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam pralapataḥ ca pralapitam nāma ityādi api vācyam syāt iti tat api asāṃpratam na hi tūṣṇīmbhāvena pralapita ādibhiḥ vā śakyam anaikāntika tvam uddhartum yathā pratijñā artha apahnavena na ca ete hetvābhasa udbhāvanasya purastāt tanāḥ tasmāt etat api anirūpita abhidhānāt yat kiñcid iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.6.1^1	 vyākhyātum nidarśanam āha nidarśanam eka prakṛti idam vyaktam bhūta bhautika indriyam eka prakṛtīnām vikārāṇām parimāṇāt tat yathā eka mṛd pūrvāḥ ghaṭa śarāva udañjana ādayaḥ parimitāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yāvān prakṛteḥ vyūhaḥ saṃsthānam tāvān vikāraḥ iti na ca etat udāharaṇam sādhana vikalam iti āha dṛṣṭam ca iti upanayam āha asti ca idam iti nigamanam āha tad eka prakṛtīnām iti asya parimita tvasya hetoḥ vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam prativādinaḥ nānā prakṛtīnām ghaṭa rucaka ādīnām eka prakṛtīnām ca ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām dṛṣṭam parimāṇam iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.6.1^2	 evam pratyasthite prativādini vādī paścāt parimita tvam hetum viśinaṣṭi eka prakṛti samanvaye sati śarāva ādi vikārāṇām parimāṇa darśanāt iti prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ eka svabhāva samanvaye sati iti arthaḥ eka prakṛti samanyavam sphuṭayati sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi idam sarvam vyaktam parimitam gṛhyate tathā hi metra dāreṣu narmadāyām maitrasya sukha buddhiḥ bhavati tad sapatnīnām ca duḥkha buddhiḥ caitrasya tām avindataḥ raṇa raṇakavataḥ mohaḥ vibhādaḥ narmadayā bhāva antarāṇi vyākhyātāni tat evam yatra eka svabhāva samanvaye sati parimāṇam tatra eka prakṛti tvam eva tat yathā eka mṛd piṇḍa svabhāveṣu ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādiṣu 
NVTṬ_5,2.6.1^3	 ghaṭa rucaka ādayaḥ tu na eka svabhāvāḥ mārda sauvarṇa ādīnām svabhāvānām bhedāt nidarśya atra sūtram yojayati tat idam aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhaḥ iti asya nigraha sthāna tvam āha sati ca hetu antara bhāvaḥ iti api ca yadi hetu antara vacane viśvam eka prakṛti sādhyate tadā nidarśanam na asti sarvasya pakṣe nikṣepāt atha nidarśana siddhi artham kim cit pakṣāt vyatiricyatetatas tena eva anaikāntika tvam anvitānām parimitānām bhinna prakṛtika tvāt iti āha hetu antara vacane sati yadi hetu artha nidarśana eti hetuḥ sādhanam arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tau hetu arthau nidarśayati vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvena iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.6.1^4	 nidarśanaḥ nidarśanaḥ hetu arthayoḥ nidarśanaḥ hetu artha nidarśanaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa yadi upādīyate tatas na idam vyaktam eka prakṛti bhavati dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛti antara upādānāt vārttikam sādhana antara upādāne pūrvasya iti datta uttara avasaraḥ eva vādini yadi prativādī hetu artham vyabhicārayati vādīca tṛtīya padake sthitaḥ hetum viśeṣayati tadā sādhana antara upādānāt nigṛhyatām uta anaikāntika sādhana upādānāt na tāvat anaikāntika sādhanāt asya nigrahaḥ hetu viśeṣaṇenanapava samāhita tvāt iti tasmāt hetu antara vacanāt eva nigṛhyate pūrvasya vastutas asamarthasya asāmarthya khyāpanāt sāmarthye vā hetu antarānarthakyam iti sūktam 
NVTṬ_5,2.7.1^1	 vyācaṣṭe yathā ukta lakṣaṇe pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahe sati vāde jalpe vitaṇḍāyām iti arthaḥ hetutaḥ sādhya siddhau prakṛtāyām vādī sādhanam brūyāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ asparśa tvāt iti atra antare sūkha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāreṇa hetoḥ asāmarthyam paśyana tad pracchādana artham prasakta anuprasaktyā tam tam artham upanyasi an= artha antareṇa nigṛhyate abhidheyasya kriyā antara yogāt kriyā viśeṣasya yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ bhidyamāna rūpaḥ śabdaḥ nāma iti yathā vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati vṛkṣam chinatti vṛkṣeṇa candramasam paśyati vṛkṣāya udakam āsiñcati ityādi tat evam abhidheyasya kriyā viśeṣa yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ śabdaḥ nāma iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.7.1^2	 ākhyāta svarūpam āha kriyā kāraka samudāya eti viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam upalakṣayati pacati pacyatā eti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyām kartāram karma ca abhivadanti tat etat lakṣaṇam asiddham ati vyāpakam ca na hi kartā karma vā ākhyātena abhidhīyate kriyā kṣepeṇa eva tayoḥ pratilambhāt ananya labhyasya ca śabda artha tvāt kartṛ karmaṇoḥ ca kāraka antaremyaḥ bhāvanāyām abhyarhitatama tvena tad saṅkhyā abhidhāna niyamāt asiddham kāraka abhidhānam ativyāpakam ca pācakaḥ pākya etyādeḥ nāmnaḥ api kriyā kāraka samudāya abhidhāyi tvāt tat asmin lakṣaṇe aparituṣyan lakṣaṇa antara dvayena ākhyāta padāni upasaṃgṛhṇāti 
NVTṬ_5,2.7.1^3	 kāraka saṃkhyā viśiṣṭa kriyā kāla yoga abhidhāyi a ākhyātam pacati pacyataityādau kartuḥ karmaṇaḥ vā saṃkhyayā kālena vartamāna ādinā viśiṣṭā kriyā pratīyate kālaḥ ca kva cit asti iti etā= ava uktaḥ na tu vivakṣitaḥ lakṣaṇe pacata yajeta iti evamādau tad yoga apratīteḥ anena lakṣaṇena sthīyate supyataityādīnām ākhyātānām asaṅghahaḥ kāraka tad saṃkhyayoḥ apratīteḥ tad saṃgrahāya dvitīyam lakṣaṇam āha dhātu artha mātram ca kāla abhidhāna viśiṣṭam abhidhīyataiti abhidhānam prayogeṣu iti nāmnaḥ vā ākhyātasya vā tad arthāt abhidyamāna rūpāḥ nipātāḥ yathā samuccaya vikalpa ādi nā ām apadaiḥ samuccaya ādayaḥ samuccetavyān nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhedena ucyante tatra ṣaṣṭhī prayogāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.7.1^4	 teṣām samuccayaḥ vikalpaḥ vā iti na evam ca ādayaḥ sva arthāt nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhedena abhidadhati rūpyante pratipādyante rūpāṇi arthāt nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhidyamānam rūpam pratipādyamānam yeṣām nipātānām te tathā uktaḥ upasūjyamānāḥ samīpe prāk prayujyamānāḥ kriyā vat yotakāḥ upasargāḥ avadyotanam ca upalakṣaṇam adhika arthāḥ viparīta arthāḥ ca upasargāḥ gṛhyante yathā abhyāgacchati pratiṣṭhata etyādiṣu tat asya nigraha sthāna tvam vārtikakāraḥ upapādayati abhyupagata iti yathā ca sādhana vādinoḥ atha antaram nigraha sthānam evam uttara vādinaḥ api draṣṭavyam 
NVTṬ_5,2.8.1^1	 varṇa krama nirddeśa vat iti vatiḥ atra yadā drāviḍaḥ sva bhāṣayā tad bhāṣā anabhijñam āryam prati śabda nitya tvam pratipādayati tadā tad nirarthakam nigraha sthānam sa khalu ārya bhāṣām jānan= asāmarthya pracchādanāya tad bhāṣā anabhijña tayā vā sva bhāṣayā sādhanam prayuktavān saḥ ayam pūrvasmin kalpe vipratipattyā nigṛhyate uttarasmin= tu apratipattyā vastutas sādhana sāmarthye api mūka vat ārya pratipādaka śabda apratīteḥ tad pratipādana ārambha vaiyarthyāt atra eva dṛṣṭānta mātra tayā vatinā atra varṇa kramaḥ darśitaḥ na punar etat udāharaṇam nigraha sthānasya yena kapola vāditra ādau= api prasaṅgaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.8.1^2	 yathā hi drāviḍasya artha bheda vivakṣa utthāpitam vacanam na evam varṇa krama nirddeśaḥ kapola vāditram vā apratipādaka tva sāmānyāt varṇa krama nirddeśa vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ atas eva āha bhāṣya kāraḥ evaṃprakāram iti na punar idam eva iti arthaḥ vārtikam udāharaṇam bhāṣyaḥ iti evaṃprakāra udāharaṇam iti arthaḥ sādhana anupādānāt iti para pratipādakam pañca avayavam vākyam sādhanam tat tena na upāttam tasya sva samayena pratipādaka tve api āryān pratyapratipādaka tvāt iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.9.1	 yat vākyam pariṣadā prativādinā ca na vijñāyate samāna saṃketena vādinā tris abhihitam yāvadbhiḥ vāraiḥ pariṣad prativādinoḥ artha pratyayaḥ bhavati sa ca prāyeṇa tribhiḥ iti tris abhihitam iti uktam nanu samāna saṅketena vādinā tris abhihitam avijñāta artham ca iti na saṃbhavati sambhave vā pariṣad prativādinai jaḍau na ca jaḍa anavabodhe pratipādakasya kaścid aparādhaḥ na hi badhiraḥ gītam na śṛṇoti iti gāyanasya kaścid aparādhaḥ iti atas āha śliṣṭa śabdam asati prakaraṇa ādau niyāmake yathā śvetaḥ dhāvati iti apratīta prayogam jarbharītuḥ pharītū iti atidruta uccāritam iti evamādinā kāraṇena tad avijñāta artham asya nigraha sthāna tvam āha asāmarthya iti vārtikam bhāṣya vyākhyayā gata artham 
NVTṬ_5,2.10.1^1	 yatra anekasya padasya āśliṣṭasya pratīta yogasya adruta uccāritasya vākyasya ca anekasya paurvāparyeṇa ayogaḥ sambandhaḥ na asti iti tasmāt asambaddha artha tā gṛhyate tad apārthakam nigraha sthānam niṣprayojanam kasmāt  samudāya arthasya vākya arthasya vā apāyāt vākya mahā vākya artha pratyāyana prayojanaḥ hi padānām vākyānām vā prayogaḥ asati tasmin= apārthakam iti arthaḥ vākyasya paurvāparya asambandha audāharaṇam āha yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūṣāḥ iti padānām paurvāparya asambandhe udāharaṇam āha kuṇḍam ajājinam iti raurukam raru sambandhi pāryya pāyayitavyam apratiśīnaḥ vṛddhaḥ vārtikakāraḥ śaṅkate nirarthaka apārthakayoḥ iti para pratyāyana prayojanam hi vacana uccāraṇam tatra nirarthakena iva apārthakena api na paraḥ pratipādyate iti ubhayoḥ abhedaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.10.1^2	 na ca varṇa krama mātram ekatra anyatra ca padāni iti etāvatā bhedena upādanam yuktam ekatra vākya upādānam anyatra pada upādānam iti apārthakayoḥ api avāntara bhedena bheda upādāna prasaṅgāt iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti bhidyate iti pṛcchati katham uttaram tatra anarthake varṇa mātram abhidheya śūnyam iha tu apārthake padāni padyate gamyate abhidheyam ebhiḥ iti padāni vākyāni ca abhidheyavanti asambaddhāni nirabhidheya niṣprayojanayoḥ nirarthaka apārthakayoḥ mahān viśeṣaḥ na tu īdṛśaḥ vākya padayoḥ niṣprayojanayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yena avāntara bhedam ādriyāmahe para pratyāyana prayojana abhāvā mātra vivakṣayā tu aviśeṣe sarva nigraha sthāna aviśeṣaḥ sarvatra para pratyāyana abhāvāt bhāve vā nigraha sthāna anupapatteḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.1^1	 vyācaṣṭe pratijñā ādīnām avayavānām yathālakṣaṇam artha vaśāt kramaḥ lakṣaṇa anatikrameṇa kramaḥ uktam etat asmābhiḥ prathama adhyāye yad apekṣita abhidhāyinaḥ vacanāt pare pratipadyante na anyasya tatra prathamam sādhya nirddeśaḥ apekṣitaḥ paraiḥ na tu sādhana nirddeśaḥ tatra yadi ayam prathamam sādhanam eva prayuñjīta katham apokṣitam brūyāt anapekṣita abhidhāyī ca katham pratipādakaḥ nāma tat evam sarvāṇi eva hetu vacana ādīni api kramavanti na ākramāṇi pratipādayitum arhanti iti viparīta kramebhyaḥ api ārtha krama anusaraṇāt eva artha pratipatteḥ saḥ ayam pratijñā ādīnām arthaḥ etādṛśaḥ yaḥ eṣām kramam antareṇa na śakyaḥ jñātum iti avayava viparyāse tava ākāṅkṣa abhāvāt tad pūrvaka tvāt ca padārtha sambandhasya asambandham nigraha sthānam iti arthaḥ vārtikam na evam apiva siddheḥ iti eke 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.1^2	 yathā āhuḥ atra api na kaścid krama niyamaḥ iṣṭa arthapa siddheḥ ubhayatra aviśeṣāt yadi ucyeta artha śabda vat ayam asmākam samayaḥ yat anena krama viśeṣeṇa arthaḥ pratyetavyaḥ na anyena iti atas tathā iva pratīyate na krama antareṇa iti atas āha samaya anabhyupagamāt ca padeṣu eva samaya pūrvakaḥ pratyayaḥ na vākyeṣu abhinavaka vi racita tad samaya anapekṣāt eva vākyāt artha pratīteḥ syāt etat vākyeṣu api krama niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā pācayām babhūva iti na punarvabhūva pācayām iti atas āha prayogāt ca iti tatra laukikaḥ prayogaḥ niyataḥ iha tu avayava vyatyayasya api dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ iti arthaḥ tat etat dūṣayati yat tāvat na evam api siddheḥ iti tatra uttaram prayogaḥ peta śabda vat etat etat eva vivṛṇoti yathā gauriti asya eva padasya arthem gāvī iti prayujyamānam padam kakudādimantam artham pratyāyayati 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.1^3	 yadi api śabdānām artha pratyāyanam na svābhāvikam tathā api parameśvara saṅketa pūrvakam adya yāvat anuvarttate atas eva sādhava ūr atha bhede śabda bhedāḥ yeṣām pārameśvara saṅketaḥ tad asaṅketāt tu pravarttamānāḥ api arthe asādhavaḥ śabdāḥ apabhraṃśāḥ bhavanti tad apekṣāḥ ca sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti ādayaḥ vidhayaḥ dharmeṣu nindā artha vādāḥ ca mantraḥ hīnaḥ svarataḥ varṇataḥ iti ādayaḥ vedānām ca prāmāṇyam pratipāditam dvitīye adhyāye na ca ayam arthaḥ ye ye sādhavaḥ te sarve dharma hetava eti kim tu dharma anuṣṭhānam tad anurūpa bhāṣaṇe prāpte sādhubhiḥ evati niyamyate tat evam vyavasthite aviśeṣeṇa go gāvi ādi śabdāḥ āryeṇa prayujyamānāḥ dṛśyante tatra ete kim aviśeṣeṇa eva sādhavauta kaścid ekaḥ sādhuḥ tad pūrvikā itarebhyaḥ pratītiḥ tatra eka śabdasya sādhu tva kalpanāyāmitarasmāt tad mūla tayā artha pratipatti upapattau na sarvatra sādhu tva kalpanā yuktā 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.1^4	 yathā āha smātra bhavān jaiminiḥ anyāyaḥ ca aneka śabda tvam iti tatra api katamasya asādhu tvam ekasya etoṣu iti jijñāsāyām tatra tattvam abhiyoga viśeṣāt syāt iti yaḥ a bhiyukta tamaiḥ indrapāṇiniprabhṛtibhiḥ sādhu tvena avigānataḥ smaryate sa sādhuḥ itaraḥ asādhuḥ iti niścīyate tena yadi api laukikāḥ gāvi ādi śabdebhyaḥ eva gavā ādi artham adhigacchanti iti dṛṣṭa artha mātra vyavahāriṇaḥ pratipattiḥ tathā api parīkṣakāṇām vicārayatām evam vicāra kramaḥ yat vṛddhatamena go śabde prayoktavye pramādāt gāvī śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tatas ca vṛddhatareṇa go śabdam unnīya go tvam pratītam yathā āhuḥ ambā amba iti yadā bālaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ prabhāṣate avyakte tad vidām tena vyakte bhavati nirṇayaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.2^1	 evam sādhau prayoktavye yaḥ apabhraṃśaḥ prayujyate tena sādhu vyavahitaḥ kaścid arthaḥ abhidhīyate apārśva sthāḥ ca atas anena mūla śabdam unnīya arthaḥ pratītaḥ iti agṛhītvā eva gāvī śabdāt eva ayam amum artham pratītavān iti tam eva go tvasya vācakam avagamya ani eṣām vṛddhaḥ babhūva tatas prabhṛti ananusṛta mūla śabda anām ayam vācaka tva bhramaḥ apabhraṃśe vartate na vṛddhatarasya ubhaya vedinaḥ mūla śabda anusāriṇasī pad artha pratipattiḥ idānīntanānām tu apabhraṃśāt eva atas eva anavākhyānam api prayojana vat asati asmin vācaka apabhraṃśa vibhāge jñāna an abhāvāt sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti niyama vidheḥ na mlecchita vai na apabhāṣita vai iti niṣedhasya ca viṣaya saṃśayena duradhigama tvena dharma anuṣṭhānasya aśakya tva prasaṅgāt yatra arthe yasya śabdasya bhagavatā īśvareṇa saṅketaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tatra sādhuḥ asādhuḥ anyatra yathā yaḥ eva asva śabdaḥ daridre sādhuḥ saḥ eva asādhuḥ vājini prayujyamānaḥ yathā nakula daṃṣṭa agra spṛṣṭā yā kā cit oṣa dhiḥ asau sarpa viṣam hanti evam īśvareṇa kṛta saṅketaḥ śabdaḥ sādhuḥ dharma aupayujyate na anyaḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.2^2	 yava varāha ādi śabdānām āri a mlecchayoḥ artha vivāde vaidikāt vākya śeṣāt ārya saṃmata ūr atho grahītavyaḥ na mleccha saṃmataḥ tatra vaidika vākyaśeṣa virodhāt yeṣām tu śabdānām āryeṣu na dṛṣṭa caraḥ prayogaḥ kevalaiḥ mlecchaiḥ eva artha bhede prayujyante yathā pika nema tāmarasa ādayaḥ vede tu prayuktāḥ teṣām mleccha vyavahārāt eva arthaḥ avadhāraṇīyaḥ tatra teṣām abhiyopagāt iti ārya vyavahāra aparipanthi tvāt ca iti tat evam vyavasthite nyāya mīmāṃsā pariśīlana vikalānām bāhyatarāḥ pralāpāḥ upekṣaṇīyāḥ tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam prayoga apeta śabda vat iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.11.2^3	 na ca śabdānvākhyānam vyartham iti ca iti pratijña ādīnām krama niyama kāraṇam praśna pūrvakam darśayati tat etat katham pūrvam tāvat iti dvitīyam deśyam anubhāṣya pariharati yat punar etat samaya anabhyupagamāt iti saḥ ayam arthasya anurvīm pratiti bala pravṛttām anvācakṣāṇaḥ nābhi ākhyeyaḥ iti na upālabhyaḥ śāstre vākyāni artha saṃgraha artham upādīyante iti na hiśāstre kṛtsnā sa divādara bhūtadivā iti artha saṅgrahaḥ yathā katham cit kriyate iti vāde api tathā kriyatām iti yuktam vāda ādiṣu pakṣa pratipakṣa vat vakroḥ api parīkṣyamāṇa tvāt parīkṣitasya ca śāstrita tvāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.12.1	 pratijña ādīnām pañca avayavānām militānām sādhana tvam upapāditam nyūna tve sādhana tvam na asti tad abhāve na sādhya siddhiḥna hi sāmagrī niṣpādyam kāryam sāmagrī eka deśāt bhavati iti arthaḥ pareṣām matam upanyasti eke tu iti eke tu pratijñānyūnam nāma nigra sthānam na asti iti bravate dūṣayati etat tu na yuktam iti kim pratijñānyūnam nigraha sthāna antaram na bhavati atha nigraha sthānam eva na bhavati etat eva āha kim asau nigṛhyate na vā iti prathama kalpe doṣam āha yadi iti dvitīya kalpe doṣam āha atha na nigraha eti pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvam uktam iti arthaḥ yat ca bravīṣi diṅnāga siddhānta parigrahaḥ eva iti etatu dūṣa prati etat api iti siddha sādhya arthayoḥ siddhānta pratijñayoḥ mahān bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.13.1^1	 tad etat niyama abhyupagamaḥ iti bhāṣyam tatra katham etat sādhyam sidhyati iti jijñāsā tatra ekena eva sādhanena sādhya siddheḥ sādhana antara abhidhānam anarthakam iti niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt yatra tu prativādinaḥ pariṣadaḥ vā jijñāsā bhavati kati sādhanānisaṃbhavanti asmin sādhya eti tatra yāvanti sādhanāni tāvanti sarvāṇi eva vācyāni anyatara abhidhāne nigraha prasaṅgāt iti na adhikam nigraha sthānam iti yaḥ āhuḥ tat matam upanyasyati tat ca na dārḍhyāt iti dūṣayati na dārḍhya artha iti yadi niścayaḥ dārḍhyam tat ekasmāt eva pramāṇāt bhavati aniścāyakasya apramāṇa tvāt atha sphuṭha tvam tat api ced niścayaḥ sa datta uttaraḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.13.1^2	 atha sāmānya viśeṣa tadvatām grahaṇam na tad anumāna sahasraiḥ api teṣām sāmānya vat dravya mātra viṣaya tvāt śaṅkate atha bravīṣi dve api jñāpake iti na asmākam anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam pramāṇa tvam yena ekena adhigate pramāṇa antaram apramāṇam syāt api tu gantṛ mātram pramāṇam tat ca dvitīyasya api aviśiṣṭam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti satyam dve api jñāpate iti puruṣaḥ atra aparādhyate yaḥ jñātam artham ajijñāsitam jñāpayati na tu pramāṇam tat hi sāmarthyena mene pravartate eva yadi jijñāsāyām sityām pravartate pratipādayati jñeyam na asya kaścid aparādhaḥ iti na hi dhānyeṣu alūneṣu dātram avraścanam bhavati tasmāt anapekṣita kāraṇāt anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca puruṣasya nigrahaḥ iti sthitam 
NVTṬ_5,2.14–15.1	 tat anena sūtra dvayena punaruktam ekam eva nigraha sthānam katham cit ava antara bheda vivakṣayā trividham uktam prāpañca artham tat eva punar uktam kva cit chabda abhyāsāt kva cit paryāya antarāt kva cit arthāt iti ākṣipati na ābādhanāt iti samādhatte satyam iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ vaktuḥ naipuṇyam cintyate punarukta prayoge tu anipuṇaḥ syāt anapekṣita abhidhānāt sādhanasya viṣayaḥ sādhyaḥ arthaḥ na siddhaḥ tasya aparijñanāt nigṛhyate vaiyarthyam ca ānarthakyam viruddha prayojana tvam vā abhimatam tathā hi punar ukta prayoge tad prayojana anusaraṇa samākula cittaḥ prathama abhidhānāt āpātatas pratītam api artham apratītam iva manyamānaḥ na niścetum arhati iti tatas ca pratipādanāya pravṛttaḥ na pratipādayitā iti viruddha prayojanavat tva vaiyarthyam syāt iti upapannam nigraha sthānam iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.16.1^1	 vyācaṣṭe vijñātasya vākya arthasya iti nigraha sthāna tve asya upapattim āha apratyuccārayan kim āśrayam pratiṣedham brūyāt iti vārttikam na idam nigraha sthānam iti ke cit uttareṇa auttara guṇa doṣa nirūpaṇena prativādinaḥ mūḍha tva amūḍha tva avasthāpanāt etat vibhajate uttareṇa guṇa doṣavatā iti iti tasmāt kim punar uccāritena uccāraṇena asti prayojanam iti śeṣaḥ asti hi kaścid iti kva cit pāṭhaḥ tatra asti hi iti nipāta dvayam vākya avatāre draṣṭavyam puṃsām vicitra svabhāva tvāt kaścid uttare samarthaḥ na pratyuccāraṇe na asau sat uttaparam abhidadhānaḥ tāvatā ananubhāṣaṇa mātreṇa nigraham arhati nanu yadi ananubhāṣaṇam na nigraha sthānam tadā anubhāṣitum upakramya sarvam ananubhāṣamāṇaḥ na nigṛhyeta iti atas āha yaḥ tu ārabhya na nirvāhayet sat uttaram tu brūyāt tasya syāt khalīkāra mātra samāmarthya kṛtam na tu tattva vādi tva vihatiḥ iti arthaḥ tam evam bhadanta ākṣepam samādhatte na uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt iti dūṣya viṣayam hi dūṣaṇam asati dūṣya abhidhāne na śakyam vaktum 
NVTṬ_5,2.16.1^2	 na khalu pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana doṣāḥ tad svarūpam anabhidhāya śakyāḥ doṣa tvena avasthāpayitum iti anuccārayat na doṣam abhidhātum arhati iti tat idam uktam tat idam vyāhatam ucyate na uccārayati uttaram ca bravīti iti syāt etat na prativādinā sarvam dūṣaṇīyam anyatama avayava dūṣaṇena eva sādhanasya dūṣita tvena doṣa antara abhidhāna vaiyarthyāt na khalu mṛtaḥ mṛtyunā rakṣitaḥ mārayitum śakyaḥ evam dūṣitam api dūṣayitum tasmāt sati api dūṣya bāhulye anyatamam dūṣyam tathā ca sarva anubhāṣaṇe sarvasya adūṣya tvāt yat dūṣaṇīyam tat punar anuvādyam iti sarva anuvāde dvis anuvādaḥ adūṣya anuvādaḥ ca iti dūṣaka nigraha sthāna dvayam tasmāt anubhāṣaṇam eva nigraha sthānam iti viparītam āpatitam iti ataa āha apratijñānāt ca iti etat vibhajate na ca idam pratijñāyate pūrvam eka granthena sarvam uccārayitavyam paścāt uttaram yat dūṣyam tad anuvādena abhidheyam yena dūṣya anuvādaḥ dvis anuvādaḥ ca doṣau syātām api tu yathākatham cit uttaraṃvaktavyam 
NVTṬ_5,2.16.1^3	 uttaravāda parasya uttaram āśraya abhāve na yuktam iti tad āśraya mātram anuvaditavyam tad antareṇa aśakya abhidhāna tvāt uttarasya iti tasmāt yuktam tanmātrasya apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam na sarvasya apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam iti arthaḥ nanu apratibhāyāḥ nigraha sthāna tva vidhānena ananubhāṣaṇasya api viditam tasya tad viśeṣa tvāt na khalu na anubhāṣata eti etāvatā eva nigṛhyate api tu ananubhāṣamāṇaḥ dūṣyam na budhyate abudhyamānaḥ ca tatra uttaram na pratipadyate tatas apratibhayā nigṛhyate tat evam ananu bhāṣaṇam apratibhā viśeṣaḥ iti apratibhāyāḥ vihitam nigraha sthāna tvam tad viśeṣe api vihitam bhavati yathā gavi sāsnādimattvam vihitam śābaleye api vihitam bhavati na punar tatra sāsnādimatva vidhānāya pṛthak yatna antaram ārabhante atra brūmaḥ na tāvat uttara apratipatti sāmānya viśeṣaḥ ananubhāṣaṇam puṃsām sāmaryya vaicitryāt kaścid dūnaṣyam dūṣaṇam ca vidan= api na anubhāṣitum pārayati bahuvacana kuṇṭha tvāt 
NVTṬ_5,2.16.1^4	 tasmāt asati āmapratibhāyām ananu bhāṣaṇa sambhavānna apratibhāyāḥ viśeṣaḥ ananubhāṣaṇam iti kaścid dūṣaṇa viṣayam veda anubhāṣate ca uttara pratipatti vikalaḥ tu syāt saḥ ayam apratibhayā nigṛhyate na ananubhāṣaṇena tatra sāmarthyāt kaścid punar dūṣyam eva na jānāti saḥ ajñānena nigṛhyate na ca ajñāne ananubhāṣaṇam avaśyaṃbhāvi dhāraṇāvatoḥ ayāni rūpaṇe vādi udīrita akṣara sva rūpa mātra pāṭha sambhavena anubhāṣaṇa upapatteḥ apratibhā tu avaśyam bhevat na hi asti sambhavaḥ dūṣyam na veda asya dūṣaṇam tu veda iti tathā api svarūpataḥ tāvat bhedaḥ na hi yat eva dūṣaṇa viṣayam ajñānam apratibhā tat eva dūṣya viṣayam ajñānam tasmāt sati api ananubhāṣaṇa apratibhā jñānānānām uttara anabhidhāna phala tve tulye avāntara bheda vivakṣayā bhedena upanyāsaḥ tris abhihitasya iti tris abhidhānam evam api apratipadyamānasya ati jaḍa tayā na vāde adhikāraḥ iti abhisaṃdhimataḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.17.1–5,2.18.1	 tat vyācaṣṭe vijñāta arthasya pariṣadā iti nigraha sthāna sāmanya lakṣaṇam atra yojayati vārtikakāraḥ apratipattitaḥ nigraha sthānam iti tat vyācaṣṭe para pakṣa iti vārtikam śloka pāṭhā ādibhiḥ avajñām darśayan= iti artha antare hi nigraha sthāne prasakta anuprasaktam tad siddhi artha tā vyājena avatārayatā na prakṛtau= ajñānam kriyate iha tu avajñānam etāvatā bhedena upanyāsaiti iyam ca apratibhā samyak sādhana upanyāse draṣṭavyā sādhana ābhāsa upanyāse tu paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam 
NVTṬ_5,2.19.1^1	 sādhanasya dūṣaṇasya ca upanyāsam abhyupagamya tad avasthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ eva prativādinaḥ dārḍhyam sabhyānām vā kaṭhora tvam avagamyā akasmāt kāryam vyāsa jya abhyupagatām kathām vyavacchinatti tatra vikṣepaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam tad anena apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ api saṃgṛhītaḥ veditavyaḥ kārya vyāsaṅgasya abhyupagata kathā viccheda mātra upalakṣaṇa tvāt na ca idam artha antaram tatra prakṛtam eva sādhayāmi iti vyājena prasakta anuprasakta avatāreṇa kathā viccheda abhāvāt iha tu kathā vicchedāt na ca asya hetvābhāseṣu antarbhāvaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.19.1^2	 na hi vikṣepasya anyatama liṅga dharma anuvidhānam na api prakṛta sādhya siddhaye prayogaḥ yena hetvābhāsaḥ syāt na ca vādinaḥ vikṣepaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ anantaram kathām ami upatyā eva hetum anabhidhāya apasāraṇāt yadi ca ayam samyañcam hetum abhidhāya tad samarthanā samarthaḥ apasaret kim etāvatā na nigṛhyeta hetvābhāsena vā nigṛhyeta kim tu vyāsaṅgāt eva anartha ka apārtha kāmyām tu bhede asya sphuṭaḥ eva na hi atra asamāna saṃketaḥ pratipādakaḥ yena anarthakaḥ syāt na api iha padāni vākyāni vā paurvāparyeṇa asambandhāni yena apārthakaḥ syāt na ca avajñānam yena apratibhā bhavet tasmāt vikṣepaḥ pṛthak nigraha sthānam iti siddham 
NVTṬ_5,2.20.1	 vyācaṣṭe yaḥ pareṇa deśita doṣam sva pakṣe abhyupagamya katham jñāyate abhyupagamya taiti ataa āha anuddhṛtya iti anabhyupagame asābudharet iti bhāvaḥ vārtikam kim tu para svena anati sṛṣṭena ādattena iti arthaḥ prasaṅga vidhānāt na nigraha sthānam iti anyaiti yadi puruṣa tvāt coraḥ aham tatas bhavān api coraḥ syāt na ca bhavataḥ evam iṣṭam tasmāt tvayā eva anaikāntika tvāt na ayam hetuḥ iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ tasmāt na ātmanaḥ cora tvam anena abhyupagatam iti mata anujñā na asau nigraha sthānam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti etat tu na kasmāt atas eva kutas yatas eva asau uttare kartavye prasaṅgam karoti atas eva nigṛhyate yadi hi vādī prativādinam brūyāt satyam aham coraḥ eva iti tadā kim anaikāntika tvam śaknuyāt kartum tasmāt puruṣa tvam na cora tva hetuḥ api tu para svena ādattena sambandhaḥ iti uttare kartavye yat uttara ābhāsam āha tena jñāpayati nūnam ayam sabhyaguttaram na jānāti samyak uttara ajñānāt nigṛhyate tat ca uttarā parijñānam mata anujñā t vāpareṇa udbhāvyamānam mata anujñā iti ucyate 
NVTṬ_5,2.21.1^1	 vyācaṣṭe paryanuyojyaḥ nāma iti nigrahasya upapattiḥ pramāṇataḥ siddhiḥ tayā iti arthaḥ etat tu na tāvat vādinā udbhāvanīyam na hi asau sva sva sādhana avadyam anunmattaḥ udbhāvayati na api prativādinā na hi anunmattaḥ ātmānam ātmanā nigṛhṇāti api tu paryanuyojyam jānānaḥ kasmāt upekṣatetasmāt sabhāpanitā vādi prativādibhyām anuyuktayā vā pariṣadā tad nigraha sthānam udbhāvanīyam atra ca tattva nirṇaya avasāne vāde dvayoḥ api nigrahāt pariṣad eva vijayate jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ ca tattva anapekṣam puruṣa sāmarthya parīkṣaṇa pravṛttayoḥ prativādī nigṛhyate sādhana ābhāsa vādinā api vādinā sphuratā prativādī stambhitaḥ yatas samyak sādhana upanyāsaḥ vihitaḥ prativādinā auttara apratipattiḥ apratibhā sādhana ābhāsa upanyāse ca uttara apratipattiḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam iti viśeṣaḥ vārtikam na anya vacanāt iti eke 
NVTṬ_5,2.21.1^2	 yatra prativādī tūṣṇīṃbhavati tatra tūṣṇīmbhāvena eva vādinaḥ uttarān arha tām darśaya nnasya sādhana ābhāsa vāditām sūcayati yatra asya doṣa udbhāvanam samyak doṣam anuktvā karoti tatra api asau duṣṭam uttaram dadat tat sādhana doṣam eva sūcayati upadiśanti hi vṛddhāḥ duṣṭe hi sādhane dṛṣṭa uttaram deyam iti tasmāt avacane anya vacane vā na paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam nigraha sthānam ubhayathā api anupekṣaṇāt iti arthaḥ dūṣayati tat ca na iti sādhanasya hi samyañcam doṣam jānan tam eva brūyāt saḥ ayam prāpta avasaraḥ abruvan vibruvan vā nūnam na samyañjam doṣa jānāti niścita pramāṇa bhāvasya puruṣasya iṅgita ādibhiḥ abhiprāyaḥpa sūcyate na tu aniścita pramāṇa bhāvasya yathā ahuḥ śruti smṛti atirekeṇa yukta jalpāka bhāṣitam tat yathā āśrati duṣṭam ced duṣṭam eva avadhāryatām iti suṣṭhu uktam jānānaḥ api ayam kimartham anyat bravīti iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.22.1	 na ca ayam apratibhātaḥ na bhidyate sā hi unara apratipattiḥ iyam tu anuttarasya eva uttara tvena pratipattiḥ iti mahān viśeṣaḥ anena eva sarvāḥ jātayaḥ nigraha sthāna tvena saṃgṛhītāḥ bhavanti na ca hetvābhāsān ām itas na bhedaḥte hi vādinaḥ nigraha sthāna mayam tu prativādinā eti mahān viśeṣaḥ atas eva bhavatām api gāthāḥ aasādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam tayoḥ nigraha sthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate iti apratibhāyāḥ eva prasajya pratiṣedha ātmikāyāḥ asyāḥ niranuyojya anuyogasya bhede darśayati bhāṣya kāraḥ nigraha sthāna lakṣaṇasya mithyā adhyavasāyā tsamāropāt iti arthaḥ sugamam vārtikam 
NVTṬ_5,2.23.1^1	 abhyupet payeti asya vyākhyānam kasya cit arthasya tathā abhāvam pratijñāya iti pratijñāta artha vipayaryāt iti abhyupeta artha viparyayāt siddhānta viparyayāt iti arthaḥ tat etat aniyama ādityasya vyākhyānam tatra sāṃkhyīyam siddhāntam āha yathā na sat iti tasya paryāya antareṇa kathanam na sataḥ itan na asidātmānam iti asya paryāya antareṇa vivaraṇam na asat utpadyate iti saḥ ayam siddhāntaḥ sāṃkhyānām tam abhyupetya tad viparyayāt kathā prasaṅgam āha sva pakṣam vyavasthāpayati pakṣa avasthānam darśayati ekā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya upalabhyamānasya artha jātasya yuktā iti pratijñā vikārāṇām iti vyaktasya eva anuvādaḥ anvaya darśanāt iti hetuḥ mṛd anvitānām iti sādharmya udāharaṇam tathā yam avyakta bhedaḥ sukha duḥkha moha samanvitaḥ gṛhyate iti upanayaḥ nigamanam āha tasmāt samanvaya darśanāt viśva vyaktasya kaiḥ iti apekṣāyām uttaram sukha ādibhiḥ iti 
NVTṬ_5,2.23.1^2	 eka prakṛtiḥ sarvaḥ vikāraḥ iti sā iyam kathā siddhāntam abhyupettyā evam uktavān sāṃkhyaḥ naiyāyikena paryanuyujyate dūṣaṇāya pṛcchyate atha prakṛtiḥ vikā paraḥ iti katham lakṣitavyam iti saḥ evam naiyāyikena pṛṣṭaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ uttaram āha yasya avasthitasya mṛd ādeḥ dharma antara nivṛttau śarāva vināśe yat dharma antaram maṇim ādi pravartate asat eva jāyate sā prakṛtiḥ mṛd ā ādi yat dharma antaram nivartate pravartate vā sa vikāraḥ iti etāsmin= udāharaṇe apasiddhāntam yojayati soyam pratijñāta arthasya siddhānta arthasya vādī viparyayāt aniyamāt kathām prasañjayati pratijñātaḥ siddhāntaḥ khalu anena na asat āvirbhavati iti utpadyate na sattiraḥ bhavati iti na vinaśyati iti tathā api kasmāt anena siddhāntaḥ bādhyate atha siddhāntena eva kasmāt na bādhya taiti atas āha 
NVTṬ_5,2.23.1^3	 sat asatoḥ ca iti idam hi laukikam pramāṇa siddham siddhāntaḥ tu abhyupagama mātra siddhaḥ aprāmāṇikaḥtasmāt anena siddhāntaḥ balavatā bādhyate tat etat mṛd dharmāṇām api na syāt iti na kevalam prekṣāvatām kartṝṇām api tu sat dharmāṇām api utpāda vināśau pravṛtti una paramau dṛśyamānau na syātām iti arthaḥ evam pratyavasthitaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ naiyāyikena pṛṣṭaḥ yadi asataḥ ātma lābham sataḥ ca ātma hānam abhyupaḥ iti tatas asya apasiddhāntaḥ bhavati atha na abhyupaiti pakṣaḥ asya na siddhyati vikāraḥ hi anena pakṣīkṛtaḥ eka prakṛti tvena tatra vikārāṇām anirūpaṇāt tad abhāve na pratijñā arthaḥ na ca hetu arthaḥ āśraya asiddha tvāt nanu evam pratijñāta artha virodhi tvāt sataḥ nirodhasya āsataḥ ca utpādasya hetvābhāsaā iva nigraha sthānam bhavet pratijñā virodhaḥ vā iti āśaṅkya vārtikakāraḥ āha 
NVTṬ_5,2.23.1^4	 pratijñāta artha vyatirekeṇa iti na hi atra eka prakṛtayaḥ vikārāḥ eka prakṛtika tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ sādhya viruddhena vyāptaḥ udbhāvitaḥ yena viruddhaḥ bhavet na api eka prakṛtika tvam vikārāṇām śabdataḥ viruddham samanvayena hetunā yena pratijñā virodhaḥ bhavet vaibhava mātreṇa ca pratijñā hetvoḥ virodha eti atra uktam vārtika kṛtā sva siddhāntaspaya go tva ardeḥ nitya tva virodhāt virodha eti api ca tatra balavatā siddhāntena anaikāntika deśanā bādhyate iha tu siddhāntaḥ eva bādhyate durbalaḥ iti udāharaṇa paunaruktyam api na asti tasmāt yatra pratijñā arthena virodhaḥ tatra viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ vai iha tu pratijñā artha vyatirekeṇa abhyupagama antareṇa virodhaḥ iti puruṣasya pūrva apara viruddha artha abhidhāyinaḥ asāmarthyāt nigraha sthānam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ iti siddham 
NVTṬ_5,2.24.1	 vyācaṣṭe hetvābhāmāḥ ca iti yadi anuktam api kim cit avaśiṣyate nigraha sthānam tat cakāreṇa samucceyam yathā uktāḥ iti sūtra avayava nirākaraṇīyām āśaṅkām āha kim punar lakṣaṇa antara yogāt hetvābhāsā nigraha sthāna tām āpadyante yathā pramāṇāni prameya tvam teṣām eva pratyakṣa ādīnām upalabdhi sādhana tvena lakṣyamāṇānām pramāṇa tvam pramāvya api atayā prameya tvam lakṣaṇa antareṇa pramāṇāni prameya tvam āpadyante iti śaṅkāyāḥ sambhavāt atas āha bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ yathā uktāḥ iti sakala śāstra artham upasaṃharati te ime pramāṇa ādayaḥ uddiṣṭāḥ lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca iti itiḥ śāstra pa pari samāptau vārtikakāraḥ saṃgṛhṇāti jātīnām sa prapañcānām iti nigraha sthāna lakṣaṇam iti samāsena jātīnām api prativādi nigraha sthāne asti niveśaḥ iti sūcayati śāstrasya ca upasaṃhāraḥ iti te ime pramāṇa ādayaḥ uddiṣṭāḥ iti anena kṛtaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NVTṬ_5,2.24.2	 yat alambhi kim api puṇyam dustara kunibandha paṅka magnānām uddyota kara gavīnām ati jaratīnām samuddharaṇāt saṃsāra jaladhi setau vṛṣaketau sakala duḥkha śama hetau tasya phalam akhilam arpitam etena prīyatām īśaḥ tattva jñāna prasava surabhiḥ gūḍha bahu artha jātā sā iyam mokṣa amṛta maya phalā sūkti mañju pravālāḥ pratyakṣa āpta āgama maya mahānyāya mūlā manojñā ṭīkā vīrudbhavatu kṛtinām nandrinī ṣaṭhpadānām krūrāḥ kṛtaḥ añjaliḥ ayam baliḥ eṣa dattaḥ kāyaḥ mayā praharata atra yathā abhilāṣam abhyarthaye vitatha vāc maya pāṃśu varṣaiḥ mā mā āvilīkuruta kīrti nadīḥ pareṣām
